[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba kha bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu slo ma lta bur 
[\[1b.2\]]gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha des ba ku la'i yal ga zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la grib ma byed cing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba dang /_bcom 
[\[1b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_
[\[1b.4\]]thos nas lha des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur to/_/ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig 
[\[1b.5\]]na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang bar mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu yang de rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dang ba chen 
[\[2a.2\]]po skyes so/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyi sems can gyis dang por sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa dang /_bu med pas bu rnyed pa dang /_dbul pos gter 
[\[2a.3\]]mthong ba dang /_rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid 
[\[2a.4\]]la bzhugs so/_/de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes 
[\[2a.5\]]bya ba nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa bdag cag la 'di lta bu ni mas ma bgyis te phas ma lags/_
[\[2a.6\]]rgyal pos ma lags/_lhas ma lags/_sdug pas ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/_dge sbyong dang /_bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]mdzad de/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/_thar pa dang mtho ris kyi sgo ni phye nas bdag cag lha dang mi rnams su ni bkod de/_btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag 
[\[2b.2\]]cag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_de dag stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 
[\[2b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la cung zad cig stsol cig dang /_de la bdag cag bgyi ba dag bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang sen mo bregs te byin no/_/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2b.4\]]kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten zhig brtsigs so/_/de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des mchod rten de'i 'khor sar ba ku la'i yal ga de bskyed de/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mchod rten 'di la bgyi ba 
[\[2b.5\]]bgyid cing mchis so zhes de de nyid na gnas so/_/de la kha cig gis ni yugs sa mo'i mchod rten no zhes bya bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni ba ku la'i 'khor sa zhes bya bar shes te/_mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag da dung yang phyag byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2b.6\]]gshegs pa dang /_ji tsam na bsti gnas gzhan zhig na drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/_de dag gi bsti gnas de ni me tog dang 'bras bu dang chu phun sum tshogs pas de dag des rgyags nas ci yang mi sems so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs 
[\[2b.7\]]nas bsti gnas der gshegs te byon pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis bsti gnas de'i me tog dang 'bras bu ni brlag_/chu ni bskams/_ne'u gsing rnams ni [(]glogs[,]slogs[)]/_'dug gnas dag ni brtib bo/_/de nas drang srong de dag lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/de rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi zhing rkang gnyis khyed 'dir gshegs nas bdag cag ni gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur 
[\[3a.2\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong dag bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu dang chu phun sum tshogs pa ci ste ma rung /_ji sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'am/_bcom ldan 'das mdzad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul brtul ba dang sngon gyi ji lta 
[\[3a.3\]]ba bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pa bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 
[\[3a.4\]]mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[3a.5\]]btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge 
[\[3a.6\]]slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/_lag na lhung bzed dang /_bya ma bum thogs pa dang /_skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_
[\[3a.7\]]dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]par gyur/_/de dag gis 'bad pa dang brtsal bas brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/
[\[3b.2\]]de dag la 'doms par byed pa'i drang srong gang yin pa des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis cha byad 'dis skye bo'i tshogs chen po bslus pa de dag je dad pa skyes par bgyis la slad kyis rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong lnga brgya dang sngon 
[\[3b.3\]]gyi dge slong rnams kyis zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te rim gyis gtun ri la byon to/_/de'i tshe gtun ril drang srong shing gos can zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_drang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 
[\[3b.4\]]sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas/_kun nas mdzes pa rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par gyur te/_de dad pa skyes nas bsams pa/_ma la bdag ri 
[\[3b.5\]]las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das blta zhing 'gror ni bcom ldan 'das gdul ba la gzigs pas 'das par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag nyid mchong bar bya'o snyam nas/_des ri las bdag nyid mchongs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi 
[\[3b.6\]]mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas shing gos can 
[\[3b.7\]]gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[4a.2\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dad pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste dge slong shing gos can no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te/_cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing 
[\[4a.3\]]grong khyer slo ma lta bur gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te sgo gcig nas zhugs na gzhan dag gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas ma la nga rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 
[\[4a.4\]]grong khyer slo ma lta bu'i dbus su gshegs so/_/de nas slo ma lta bu'i bdag po rgyal po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /_shing gi rna cha can dang /_rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang /_zha nye'i rna cha can dang /_rgyal po'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang /_srog 
[\[4a.5\]]chags brgya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zham ring byas shing tsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la 
[\[4a.6\]]bzhugs te/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po des bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/tsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhig la thug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te tsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhig par gyur na sbyin bdag rnams kyi bsod nams kyi bar 
[\[4a.7\]]chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la ngas 'di shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur bar shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul to/_/de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag rtogs te/_kha cig gis ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/_kha cig gis ni nges par 'byed 
[\[4b.2\]]pa'i cha dang mthun pa/_kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa 
[\[4b.3\]]mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/_/'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab 
[\[4b.4\]]pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/_/de nas shing gi rna cha can dang /_rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang /_zha nye'i rna cha can gyis gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas gdan bshams te/_nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 
[\[4b.5\]]'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_gau ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_
[\[4b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das grong khyer slo ma lta bu na chos 'chad kyis dong la mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang grong khyer slo ma lta bur chu bo lnga brgya phab nas chas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas 
[\[4b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_gau ta ma 'di gnyis gal te grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'ongs par gyur na/_yul phung bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod snyoms long shig_/maud gal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_glo bur ba dang /_'gro bar chas pa dang /_nad pa dang /_nad g.yog 
[\[5a.2\]]dang /_dge skos so/_/skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das dge skos su dgongs te/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_gau ta ma gang na ba der 
[\[5a.3\]]gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po grong khyer slo ma lta bu la soms la yul phung bar ma bya shig_/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gang srog chags grog sbur la yang gnod pa mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i dad pas mchis na/_slo ma lta bu na 
[\[5a.4\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_gau ta ma la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo /_/bcom 
[\[5a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol ba'i mdzad pa brtsams pa dang /_klu re re nas bsams pa/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das la bdag gi chu'i btung ba gsol lo snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te gcig gi chu gsol na ni des na gzhan dag gzhan du 
[\[5a.6\]]sems par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu song la gang na chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chu lhung bzed khong la khyer te shog shig_/btsun 
[\[5a.7\]]pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gang du chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de nas chus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lhung 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bzed bkang ba'i chu phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag pha dang mas ni bu gsos/_bsrings bskyed nu mas bsnun/_
[\[5b.2\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/_bus phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag cig shos la ni pha bzhag nas lo brgya tshang bar khur du thogs sam/_sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_man shel dang /_byi 
[\[5b.3\]]ru dang /_dngul dang /_gser dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_dung g.yas su 'khyil pa ste/_de lta bu'i dbang phyug la bdag por bcug kyang /_bus pha ma la de tsam gyis phan thogs pa'am lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/_gang gis pha ma dad 
[\[5b.4\]]pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud de so sor 'god par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_shes rab 'chal pa/_shes rab phun 
[\[5b.5\]]sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud de so sor 'god par byed na/_de tsam gyis bus pha dang ma la phan thogs pa dang lan lon pa yin no zhes gsungs na/_bdag gis ni ma la lan gcig yang ma lon gyis/_ma la bdag gis bdag gi 
[\[5b.6\]]ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong ngo /_/des de su'i gdul bya yin pa brtags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi yin par mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag lam ring po 
[\[5b.7\]]nas 'dir 'ongs pas ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol lo snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pha dang ma ni bu la shin du dka' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes te/_de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste gdul bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[6a.2\]]maud gal gyi bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis dong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi rtse mo la gom pa bor zhing gshegs pa dang /_zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du byon to/_/
[\[6a.3\]]bu mo bzang mo des tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_kye ma'o yun ring zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo /_/kye ma'o yun ring mo zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo /_/de nas skye bo'i 
[\[6a.4\]]tshogs chen pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 'di ni rgan na ji ltar bu mo 'di de'i ma yin/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo'i lus 'di 'dis bskyed de/_des na kho bo'i ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang 
[\[6a.5\]]mo de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas bu mo bzang mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes 
[\[6a.6\]]bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi rnams su rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pas mi bzad pa'i/_/
[\[6a.7\]]ngan song lam ni khyod kyi mthus bcad de/_/mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/khyed la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig_/nyes dang bral bas dag pa deng 'dir thob/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi thob 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]nas/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol bdag gis rgal/_/'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa/_/skye rga 'chi dang nad dang rnam bral ba/_/srid pa stong du mthong ba rnyed dka' ba/_/thub pa khyod mthong deng 'dir 'bras bur bcas/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags 
[\[6b.2\]]shing mngon par 'phags te/_bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyabs su mchi bar mngon par spro lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das maud 
[\[6b.3\]]gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu deng bsod snyoms sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig ste/_bcom ldan 'das dang tshe 
[\[6b.4\]]dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas 
[\[6b.5\]]bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag gnyis bcabs te/_lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bting nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[6b.6\]]chos bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos blangs te lhung bzed 'khru bar byed pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu 'dong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs so/_/su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/_bcom 
[\[6b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi'o/_/gal te de lta na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal soms shig_/bcom ldan 'das skol byon lags sam/_maud gal gyi bu yu bu phyin zin no/_/de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/_maud gal gyi bu 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]yid mgyogs yin no/_/btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni bdag gis glo bar ma chud do/_/gal te bdag gis glo bar chud par gyur na/_bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma ltar bgyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[7a.2\]]kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/_da ni shing tshig pa bzhin ci bgyir yang ma mchis so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig 
[\[7a.3\]]bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/_zas ci zhig bgyis na des bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[7a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas gang pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig 
[\[7a.5\]]gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing 
[\[7a.6\]]bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[7a.7\]]bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sIr nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum par gyur te/_chos bzhin gyis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta ba byed do/_/re zhig cig 
[\[7b.2\]]na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge skos bab ste/_des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang /_rlung langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar gyur to/_/des bsams pa re zhig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du gzhag go snyam pa las/_ji tsam na gtsug lag 
[\[7b.3\]]khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta ba des mthong nas de kun nas dkris pa drag pos/_rtsub po'i ngag phyung ba/_bran mo'i bu gang zhig dge skos byed/_dgra bcom pa des thos nas/_des bsams pa/_'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas re zhig bzhag la phyis go bar 
[\[7b.4\]]bya'o snyam nas/_gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe/_de'i drung du song ste smras pa khyod kyis kho bo su yin shes sam/_des smras pa shes te khyod dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin no/_/des smras pa gal 
[\[7b.5\]]te de lta yin mod kyi kho bos ni rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byas te/_kho bo ni 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/_khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin pas khyod kyis ngag rtsub po'i las phyung gis nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig dang /_des na las de bsrabs 
[\[7b.6\]]pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/des nyes pa la nyes par bshags pas sems can dmyal bar skye zhing bran mo'i bur 'gyur ba las/_de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes pas/_tshe rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te da ltar gyi bar du 
[\[7b.7\]]srid pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to/_/gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na phyug pa dang nor mang ba dang /_longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so/_/gang yang de na bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig 
[\[8a.2\]]tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma ni spangs la las gcig tu 
[\[8a.3\]]dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gleng gzhi ni 
[\[8a.4\]]rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo gnas so/_/de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag tu 'bab la/_chu mig dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur/_lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun 
[\[8a.5\]]legs par phab pas lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba na de gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[8a.6\]]klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo 'di snyam du sems te/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'di gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/_bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur mi 
[\[8a.7\]]byed pa ni bzang po ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/_de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong zhing /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su dong nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[8b.2\]]las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe/_lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur to/_/de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas gsol 
[\[8b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis shing /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos pa de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na bdag 
[\[8b.4\]]cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po dag khyed rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyis rgyal po la rtogs shig_/de gnyis kyis bsams pa dang /_don gyis na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma 
[\[8b.5\]]gnang ngo zhes smras nas de nyid na gnas so/_/klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo'i kun du spyod pa ni/_gal te nub mo bcom ldan 'das ltar 'gro na ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis so/_/'on te nyin par na ni khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis so/_/de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas 
[\[8b.6\]]shing nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun du spyod pa ni de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das lta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe 'ga' zhig bdag mthong na ldang bar mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen gtong 
[\[8b.7\]]bar byed do/_/des mi gnang chen zhig mngags te/_kye nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed ltos shig_/de song ba las ji tsam na khyim bdag gnyis shig mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di gnyis ni lha'i yul na gnas pas/_ci'i phyir ldang 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bar mi byed snyam nas des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha khyim bdag gnyis shig mchis pa ni lha'i yul nyid na gnas pa lags so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/_de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed kyis 'gro'o snyam nas 
[\[9a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bos rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi na ci re zhig rgyal po la 
[\[9a.3\]]bsti stang bgyi'am/_'on te chos la bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po dag chos la bsti stang byos shig_/dam pa'i chos la ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed do/_/chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams 
[\[9a.4\]]kyang bla mar byed do/_/tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang /_/ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang /_/da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa/_/mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad pa/_/bzhud dang bzhugs dang byon 'gyur ba/_/thams 
[\[9a.5\]]cad dam chos bla mar byed/_/'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/_/de bas 'dir bdag phan 'dod pa/_/bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa yis/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te/_/dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya/_/de gnyis kyis ldang ba ma byas so/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[9a.6\]]po mi bzod pa skyes te/_des gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa dang /_/ma dad pa yi sems kyis ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi/_/dam chos 
[\[9a.7\]]shes par mi nus so/_/gang gis khro dang bag med pa'i/_/sems ni dul bar byas pa dang /_/'di la mnar sems spangs pa des/_/legs par gsungs pa shes par nus/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di gnyis 'ongs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam nas/_de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo /_/de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_khyim bdag 'di gnyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba de'i tshe/_
[\[9b.2\]]khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces bsgos shig_/de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang /_blon po dag gis bsgo ba/_lha'i zhal nas khyed cag gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces gsung ngo /_/de gnyis 
[\[9b.3\]]kyis smras pa/_bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o/_/bsams pa bdag cag gnyis kyis yun ring po zhig nas bsams pa gang yin pa de ni tshegs chung ngus grub bo snyam mo/_/de nas 'od pa'i chu chen po phyung nas grog po chung ngu'i nang du zhugs so/_/grog po chung ngu nas grog 
[\[9b.4\]]po chen por ro/_/grog po chen po nas chu bran du'o/_/chu bran nas chu chen por ro/_/chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen por te/_gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod shin tu 'phel bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 
[\[9b.5\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /_chu mig dang mtsho dang /_mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par gyur la thug_/lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/_mu ge nyam nga ba 
[\[9b.6\]]dgon pa'i slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_grog mkhar gnas te/_de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab/_chu mig dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u 
[\[9b.7\]]rnams kyang chu che/_lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par gyur na/_da ni dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /_chu mig dang mtsho dang /_mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par gyur la thug_/
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/_mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa'i slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur na/_klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_grog mkhar shi'am/_bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' 
[\[10a.2\]]lding gis khyer ba'am/_sbrul khas sdigs kyis bzung ba'am/_des 'jigs nas bros par ma gyur grang /_de lta mod kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o 
[\[10a.3\]]snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la don 
[\[10a.4\]]de rgyas par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de gnyis ni shi ba yang ma yin/_bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis kyang ma khyer/_sbrul khas sdigs kyis kyang ma bzung /_des 'jigs pas kyang ma bros mod kyi rgyal po khyod nyid kyis 
[\[10a.5\]]yul nas bskrad do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar yang mi dran na de gnyis yul nas bskrad pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_rgyal po chen po ngas khyod dran par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam/_bcom ldan 
[\[10a.6\]]'das dran lags so/_/de gnyis ni klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_grog mkhar yin no/_/btsun pa de gnyis gang du mchi/_rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo /_/bdag gi yul ma rung bar gyur lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de gnyis la bzod pa byin cig dang ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[10a.7\]]de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na mchis na ji ltar bzod pa stsal/_de gnyis tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas/_nga'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang ngas rtags bstan gyis khyod kyis bzod pa byin cig_/bcom ldan 'das ci bdag gis rkang pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]gnyis la gtug par bgyi'am/_rkang pa gnyis la gtug par mi bya ste/_'on kyang lag pa rkyong la klu'i dbang po bzod par gsol lo zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos de gnyis 'ong ba la 'bad de sdod cing 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na de gnyis 
[\[10b.2\]]khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyang nas smras pa/_klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol lo/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[10b.3\]]po bzod par bgyi'o/_/gal te bzod par gyur na ni 'dir spyon cig_/rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag gis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas de nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus dang longs spyod skyes te/_gal te da 
[\[10b.4\]]che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na yul ma ga d+hAr yang mi shong bar 'gyur ro/_/'o na yul ma ga d+hA ma rung bar 'gyur mod/_ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar mi 'gyur/_khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnyis rtsigs la zla ba drug cing dus mchod gyis shig dang /_kho bo 
[\[10b.5\]]cag gi 'khor bzhag la dus mchod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o/_/rgyal pos de bzhin du byas pa dang /_de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang bzhag la dus mchod kyang rang nyid nyams su myong bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na 
[\[10b.6\]]klu gdug pa dag gis glags rnyed nas/_de dag gis ser ba dbab par brtsams so/_/rgyal po'i khab na bram ze ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod de/_des de bab cing bab pa dag bcad pa dang /_de la yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[10b.7\]]dbang thang byin no/_/lho phyogs na bram ze mes byin zhes bya ba ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des byang phyogs na yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na rgyal po sde mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de'i yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]gnas yod de/_de na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas de'i ched du 'gro'o zhes de chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba de'i gnas su zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na ser ba chen po bab pa bram ze gnyug 
[\[11a.2\]]mar gnas pa des gcad par ma nus nas de phyir byung nang du zhugs byed pa dang bram ze mes byin gyis dris pa/_mkhan po ci'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung nang du zhugs par mdzad/_des smras pa/_bu ser ba chen po bab pa gcad par ma nus par bas mod/_bdag 
[\[11a.3\]]gis dgum mo/_/bu legs so/_/des chu nyung zhig la bzlas te gtor bas tshal pa brgyar gyes so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_rngan pa thogs te bram ze de'i khyim du song nas smras pa/_mkhan po rgyal po'i 
[\[11a.4\]]khab kyi skye bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyur gyis rngan pa long shig_/ci'i phyir/_khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i slad du'o/_/des smras pa/_kho bos ni ma bcad de/_'on kyang bram ze 'dis bcad do/_/de dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug shig dang 
[\[11a.5\]]dbang thang sbyin no/_/de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes de gnas so/_/des ser ba de dus tha gi tsam zhig gi bar du sngags kyis bgags te mi 'bab par gyur to/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag nyid kyi bsod 
[\[11a.6\]]nams kyis ser ba mi 'bab na ci'i phyir de la dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do/_/bram ze des sngags brtul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang phyir yang ser ba bab par gyur to/_/de rnams bram ze de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_mkhan po bram ze'i khye'u de 
[\[11a.7\]]gar mchis/_des smras pa/_khyed cag gis de la bkur sti ma byas pas de song ngo /_/mkhan po gal te mchis na bdag cag la sbron cig_/de bzhin du bya'o/_/de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po sde mchog la rgyal ba dang 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/_lha khyod kyi yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman mchis kyis lha de ston cig_/lha'i skal ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kye bram ze klu'i 
[\[11b.2\]]rgyal po rab mdzes ni gtum po yin pas des khyod brlag par mi byed grang /_lha re zhig bdag la sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mchis te/_gal te klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'dam bu'i 
[\[11b.3\]]tshal bzhin gang bar gyur kyang bdag gi ba spu gcig kyang bskyod par rngo mi thog na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_'on kyang lha'i mi dgum pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam/_bram ze yod do/_/lha de bkri shig dang des de'i gnas ston par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[11b.4\]]de nas rgyal pos mi de la bos te bsgo ba/_kye nang rje bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas bram ze de khrid de chas so/_/ji tsam na mi ring ba zhig tu bsdad nas de la smras pa/_bram ze tshal sngo 
[\[11b.5\]]zhing sngo ba dag bsgrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam/_mthong ngo /_/de ni klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yin no/_/de song ste des der mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du grags nas/_des de thogs te yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal ba byin te/_
[\[11b.6\]]rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas bram ze de nyid kyi khyim du zhugs so/_/de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang /_de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug shig dbang thang sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_khyed 
[\[11b.7\]]cag gis bkur sti ma byas pas kho bo mi 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis de gzhag par gal gyis gcu bar brtsams te gsol ba btab pa dang khas blangs nas de dag gis 'tsho ba'i ris bcad do/_/'jig rten ni phun sum tshogs pa 'dod kyi rgud pa dang mi mthun pas/_des 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas te/_des de'i ming ri bo can zhes bya bar 
[\[12a.2\]]btags so/_/de yang rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu mo zhig btsas te/_de'i ming ni ser ba zhes bya bar btags so/_/bram ze mo ni 'khor bral zhes bya'o/_/mna' ma ni glog ces bya'o/_/des bsams pa/_yang dang yang du ser 
[\[12a.3\]]ba gcod cing ci las med/_yun ring rab tu sngags kyis dgag par bya'o zhes des yun ring por sngags kyis dgag pa byas te bzhag pas ser ba mi 'bab par gyur to/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag kho na'i bsod nams kyi mthus 
[\[12a.4\]]ser ba mi 'bab na/_ci'i phyir dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do/_/bram ze de phrag dog gi zil gyis non pas bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin du ma bcug go/_/bde ba la chags pas kha ton yang ma byas la sman yang skam du ma bcug go/_/des sngags kyi 
[\[12a.5\]]tshig rnams ni bsams na brjed sman ni ma bskams pas rul bar gyur to/_/de rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la snying na ches nas/_de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang dka' thub kyi tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/_shes ldan 
[\[12a.6\]]dag gang gis gang bsams pa dang /_gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/_/de na kha cig gis smras pa/_mer zhugs shig_/kha cig gis smras pa/_dug zo shig_/kha cig gis smras pa/_g.yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs 
[\[12a.7\]]shig_/kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag rang gi ske la thag pa thogs te shing gi yal ga las 'phyang du chug shig ces thams cad kyis 'chi ba'i thabs bstan gyi/_nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni ma yin pas de rim gyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo /_/des dge slong zhig mthong nas 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]dris pa/_'phags pa gang gis gang bsams pa dang /_gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga' mchis sam/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung shig_/der ci zhig bgyi/_der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs 
[\[12b.2\]]par spyod pa yang spyad par bya/_bsam gtan dang gdon pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste/_gal te re zhig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob na/_de nas de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa yin no/_/'on te sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin 
[\[12b.3\]]dus byed na gang bsams pa dang /_gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa de ni rngo mi thog na/_gzhan yang cung zad ci mchis/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol cig_/de yang 
[\[12b.4\]]rngo mi thog na gzhan bstan du gsol/_bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol te smon lam thob shig dang gang bsams pa dang /_gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub bo/_/'phags pa de ni rngo thog gis bgyi'o 
[\[12b.5\]]zhes des bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drangs te/_gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 
[\[12b.6\]]btab bo/_/de la chung mas dris pa/_rje'i sras smon lam ji zhig btab/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/legs te bdag 
[\[12b.7\]]kyang khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig_/bus smras pa bdag kyang khyod kyi bur gyur cig_/de bzhin du bu mos smras pa/_bdag kyang khyod kyi bu mor gyur cig_/de bzhin du mna' mas smras pa/_bdag kyang mna' mar gyur cig ces byas nas de rnams khyim rnying pa zhig tu zhugs 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]te nyal ba dang sprin kha dog lnga pa las char pa bab ste/_rtsig pa 'gyel bas non te kha dag go/_/klu rab mdzes shi 'phos nas 'khor klu drug khri dang der skyes nas de yang rab mdzes zhes bya bar grags so/_/chung ma ni 'khor bral zhes bya'o/_/bu ni ri 
[\[13a.2\]]bo can zhes bya'o/_/bu mo ni ser ba zhes bya'o/_/mna' ma ni glog ces bya'o/_/chos nyid kyis klu'am klu'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par gsum dran par 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis yin pa'o/_/des bltas 
[\[13a.3\]]na mi las shi 'phos so/_/gang du skyes she na/_klu rnams su'o/_/las gang gis she na/_smon lam gyi dbang gis so/_/ci'i phyir snyam na/_rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/des bsams pa/_ci lo tog ci lta ba bzhin du skyes pa la byas 
[\[13a.4\]]na mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ram/_'on te ma skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/_des ji ltar skyes pa la byas pa ltar ma skyes pa la ni de lta ma yin par mthong nas/_des 'khor rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag tshur sheg_/yul ma ga d+hAr deng la char pas 
[\[13a.5\]]lo tog thams cad bskrun cig_/de rnams kyis lo tog thams cad bskrun pa dang /_de nas drug stong gi 'khor dang gshol mda' tsam gyi char gyi rgyun gyis ji ltar yul ma ga d+hAr sog ma yang khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams so/_/de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/_
[\[13a.6\]]sog ma yang klu 'dis phrogs so zhes de'i ming sog ma med ces bya bar thogs so//_//sdom la/_rgyal po'i khab dang na lan da/_/'od ma'i dbyug pa dmar bu'i grong /_/chu bo gang gA sprin brtsegs dang /_/sgra chen yangs pa tha ma yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[13a.7\]]rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe gzhon nu ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis sbad nas pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bsad de rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings nas rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe de bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]pa mang po bya bar brtsams te/_dgrongs pa man chad bya ba'i phyir glang po che nor skyong dang khyi gtum po za ba dag sbad pa dang /_de'i ma lus 'phags mas smras pa/_bu bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur 
[\[13b.2\]]sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyis/_rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yul ang ga dang /_ma ga d+hA rnams 'byor cing nyams dga' ba yin no/_/snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/_ci gang na bcom ldan 'das med pa'i 
[\[13b.3\]]yul de dag zhig pa dang stongs par gyur tam/_de mas thams cad kyi thams cad du bzlog kyang ma btub nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di bsod nams ma yin pa mang du sogs kyis ngas 'di gzhi med pa'i dad pa la gzhag tu re zhig de'i dus la 
[\[13b.4\]]ma bab pas mnyan yod du gshegs so snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/_mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas 
[\[13b.5\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur sti ma yin pa byas pas de bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs nas rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon to zhes thos nas/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_re zhig rgyal po 
[\[13b.6\]]sdig can des pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bsad na/_des kyang ma chog nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin dang /_mi rnams kyis mchod pa de la yang bkur sti ma yin pa byas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin pas/_des 
[\[13b.7\]]na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon par gyur pas de yong ye rgyal srid las dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas de dag gis phan tshun pho nyas bzlugs nas blo gros gcig tu byas te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang /_rgyal po'i khab tu dong ste/_lo bcom nas phru mar bskor te 'khod do/_/klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis kyang ser ba'i rgyun phab pas lo tog lhag ma rnams ma rung bar byas 
[\[14a.2\]]so/_/dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /_chu mig dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u rnams skams la thug pas mu ge byung bar gyur to/_/chu lhag ma gzhan dag kyang mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis ma rung bar byas so/_/de nas ma skyes dgra sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar 
[\[14a.3\]]gyur pa la mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de/_rma la thal ba btab pa ltar mi ngas byung ste/_khyogs dang khyogs 'drud par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnod pa brgya phrag du mas snying dkrugs pas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 
[\[14a.4\]]'dug go/_/de nas lus 'phags mas smras pa/_bu ci'i phyir sems khong du chud/_yum gnod pa brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to/_/bu kho mos sngar khyod la bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig/_//'dul ba gzhi/_
[\[14a.5\]]bam po nyi shu drug pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re zhes ma smras sam/_de ni 'di yin no/_/yum de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bu bcom ldan 'das 
[\[14a.6\]]la bzod par gsol cig_/yum bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i rngo mi thog lags so/_/bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa khong khro ba dang rjes su chags pa spangs pa yin no zhes ma thos sam/_gal te 'ga' zhig 
[\[14a.7\]]gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dpung pa gcig la ste'u yis bzhog par byed la/_cig shos la tsan dan sa mchog gis nyug par byed na/_de la bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags pa yang mi mnga'/_khong khro ba yang mi mnga'o/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgras 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]mi zhig la smras pa/_kye nang rje tshur shog_/khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la/_son nas kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas te gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/_
[\[14b.2\]]stobs dang bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig_/btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas btsun pa bu ngan pa ni mchis kyi pha ngan pa ni ma mchis pas bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 
[\[14b.3\]]rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gsol/_gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer stongs te ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan 
[\[14b.4\]]nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[14b.5\]]btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas reg par bzhugs sam zhes snyun gsol lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/
[\[14b.6\]]kye mi khyod dang lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bde bar gyur cig_/btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas btsun pa bu ngan pa ni mchis kyi pha ngan pa ni ma mchis pas bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar 
[\[14b.7\]]bzung ste rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/_gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na zhes bya ba nas ming lus par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas mi de la gnang ngo /_/de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cang 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid bzhed kyi bar du mnyan yod du bzhugs nas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis 
[\[15a.2\]]rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+hAr byon to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni dug gis ma rung bar byas pa'i chu de dag bskams so/_/char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ngo /_/lha rnams ni 
[\[15a.3\]]char pa 'bebs pa la zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis ni rgyal po'i khab nas mi ma yin pa rnams bskrad nas mi ngas zhi bar gyur to/_/mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong nas grong khyer bskor ba btang ste dong ngo /_/tshong pa 
[\[15a.4\]]rnams kyis ni zong dag bkram mo/_/bzo phal pa gzhan dag gis ni rang rang byed par brtsams so/_/yul so so na gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams ni zong dang 'jug par brtsams so/_/lo ni legs par gyur to/_/lam po che dang srang dang /_sum mdo 
[\[15a.5\]]dang /_bzhi mdo rnams su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po sgrogs par gyur to/_/mu stegs pa rnams ni bag 'khums par gyur to/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 
[\[15a.6\]]'das yul ma ga d+hAr gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang snying dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dpag tshad phyed dang 
[\[15a.7\]]gsum gyi lam bstar ba dang /_grong khyer dag bzang por byos shig_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo sol te tsan dan gyi chus chag chag thob la dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyongs shig_/dri zhim po'i pog phor dag shoms la/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dag tshugs shig_/bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang mdzes pa dag byos shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas thams cad rgyas par byed du 
[\[15b.2\]]bcug go/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang /_rgyal po chen po'i mthus bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bsur song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba grol 
[\[15b.3\]]ba 'khor grol ba/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/_rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/_khyu mchog ba glang gi tshogs kyis 
[\[15b.4\]]bskor ba lta bu/_glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_bram ze slob ma'i 
[\[15b.5\]]tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_tshong dpon rang gi skye 
[\[15b.6\]]bos bskor ba lta bu/_rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_lus 
[\[15b.7\]]'phags po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_mig mi bzad klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]bskor ba lta bu/_tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba lta bu/_sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/_glang po che dam pa rgyags pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas ma g.yengs pa'i spyod lam gyi spyod 
[\[16a.2\]]pa can/_sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes 
[\[16a.3\]]pa/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa gsum dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_lha brgya 
[\[16a.4\]]stong phrag du mas zham ring byas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/_mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshes rnam pa drug tu g.yos par 
[\[16a.5\]]gyur te/_sa chen po 'di g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg cing /_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs 
[\[16a.6\]]mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur to/_/'jig rten 'di 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/lhas kyang bar snang la rnga dag brdungs so/_/nam mkha' la gnas 
[\[16a.7\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /_gur kum gyi phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dang /_gos dag 'thor bar byed de/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na de lta bu'i ya mtshan dag byung bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang dog pa dag ni yangs par gyur to/_/dma' ba dag ni mtho bar gyur to/_/mtho ba dag ni phya le bar gyur to/_/glang po che 
[\[16b.2\]]dag ni skad 'byin par gyur to/_/rta dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to/_/khyu mchog dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to/_/khyim gyi nang na bzhag pa'i snod sna tshogs dag ni ma brdungs par rang sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob par gyur to/_/'on pa 
[\[16b.3\]]rnams ni rna bas thos/_lkugs pa rnams ni smra nus par gyur to/_/dbang po lhag ma ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po so sor thob par gyur to/_/chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/_/dug 'thungs pa dag ni dug zhi bar gyur to/_/phan tshun khon byung ba rnams 
[\[16b.4\]]ni mdza' bar gyur to/_/sbrum pa dag ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/_/btson du bcings pa dag ni thar bar gyur to/_/nor med pa dag ni nor rnyed par gyur to/_/de lta bu'i 'byor pa de mthong nas dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_yul gang zhig tu 'jig rten 
[\[16b.5\]]gtso bo gshegs pa der/_/lo nyes mi ngas dang ni phyi dgra'i 'jigs pa med/_/lha rnams char 'bebs skye bo bsod nams rab tu byed/_/der ni ya mtshan brgya phrag gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/_skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[16b.6\]]dbugs phyung nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste 'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[16b.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad ces bya ba 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas 
[\[17a.2\]]stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag gis dgung zla gsum 
[\[17a.3\]]du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams 'dul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung 
[\[17a.4\]]bas gnang ngo /_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 
[\[17a.5\]]'dun dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas sangs rgyas la 
[\[17a.6\]]mngon par dga' ba'i lha rnams kyis mi ngas de bskrad nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba'i nang du byung ste/_yangs pa can du 'dug nas/_yangs pa can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung bar gyur te/_khyogs dang khyogs 'drud par gyur to/_/yangs pa 
[\[17a.7\]]can na bram ze mdun na 'don mda' bo che zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i rmi lam na yangs pa can na gnas pa'i lha zhig gis smras pa/_gal te mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog_/shAkya'i rigs dag pa yi bcom ldan 'das/_/yangs pa can du gshegs par gyur na ni/_/
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]gnod pa rnams ni rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/des nam nangs nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag gis rmi lam 'di 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[17b.2\]]kyi spyan sngar pho nya su zhig gtang zhes phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa dang /_mdun na 'don mda' bo che 'di nyid thams cad du nus pa yin la/_bdag cag la yang byams pa yin gyis gtang ngo /_/de la de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas 
[\[17b.3\]]bdag cag gi tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas snyun gsol la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'di skad ces kyang gsol cig_/btsun pa yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi 
[\[17b.4\]]mchid nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gsol/_gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs na ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag lus 'phags 
[\[17b.5\]]ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni khyed la yun ring du gnod pa byed pa phyir rgal ba dgra bor gyur pa yin pas bdag la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur grang /_de dag gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_yul 'khor gzhan yang 'gyed par yang /_/pho nya mi gsod ces grag 
[\[17b.6\]]na/_/khyod ni rgyal ba'i pho nya yin/_/kun gyis mi gsod smos ci dgos/_/de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo che dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/_rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de lam gyis dub pa bsal te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[17b.7\]]gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma yangs pa can gyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho 'am/_
[\[18a.2\]]gnod pa ma mchis sam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol lags so/_/mda' bo che khyod dang yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig_/kye gau ta ma yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs 
[\[18a.3\]]su gsol/_gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming tsam lus par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mda' bo che 'dir nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs 
[\[18a.4\]]cig la lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pas rgyal po la rtogs shig_/gal te rgyal pos gnang na nga de bzhin du gshegs par bya'o/_/des yangs pa can du bcom ldan 'das ni 'di skad ces 
[\[18a.5\]]gsung ngo zhes spring ngo /_/de rnams kyis kyang spring ba de nyid kyi phyir khyod lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song la son nas/_bdag cag gi tshig gis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam 
[\[18a.6\]]nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang dris la 'di skad ces/_lha bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_
[\[18a.7\]]lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes su ma gnang na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes smros shig_/de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches bsams pa/_ci re zhig rgyal po la bsnyen par bya'am/_'on te blon po rnams 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]la bya snyam du bsams pa dang /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_'ga' zhig gi dngags las bsnyen par mi bya ste/_'on kyang bsnyen pa byed pa la bsnyen par bya'o zhes 'byung bas/_mdor na blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya'o snyam nas/_des blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya 
[\[18b.2\]]bar brtsams so/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_mdun na 'don dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha la gsol ba 'debs su mchis kyis khyed cag gis grogs mdzod cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[18b.3\]]de bzhin du byas kho bo cag gis ji tsam na bos pa de'i tshe khyod shog cig_/de nas de dag gis skabs shes nas bos pa dang de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo che lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste song nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma 
[\[18b.4\]]ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas 
[\[18b.5\]]lha la gnod pa chung ngam/_reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba rgyas par snyun gsol lo/_/mda' bo che khyod dang /_yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig_/lha yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas 'di skad ces/_lha bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du 
[\[18b.6\]]gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes su ma gnang na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_mda' bo che kho bos 
[\[18b.7\]]yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de gal te yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs par gyur na kho bo yid la bsam pa tshegs chung ngus rdzogs par ma gyur tam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_mda' bo che song ngo /_/blon 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gcig kyang yongs su btang ba lta mchis sam/_shes ldan dag med do/_/de lta na lhas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis so/_/lhas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[19a.2\]]rjes su gnang yang rung /_ma gnang yang rung ste/_bcom ldan 'das ni yangs pa can gyi sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gshegs par 'gyur ba nyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bos ma shes kyis gal te de lta na khug shig_/de dag gis 
[\[19a.3\]]mda' bo che bkug nas rgyal pos smras pa/_mda' bo che kho bos dam bcas te bcom ldan 'das rjes su gnang bar bya'o/_/gal te kho bos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ci 'dra ba byas pa de kho na 'dra bar yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis bya na/_de lta na kho 
[\[19a.4\]]bos rjes su gnang ngo /_/des yangs pa can rnams la rgyal po 'di skad ces gsung ngo zhes spring ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_rgyal po mi gcig pur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bkur sti byed na/_bdag cag tshogs su gyur pas ci ste mi bya zhes de dag 
[\[19a.5\]]gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol cig dang /_bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang bkur sti bgyi'o zhes spring ngo /_/de nas mda' bo ches don de dag rgyal po la rig par byas so/_/de nas lus 'phags 
[\[19a.6\]]ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras 
[\[19a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]bkur bgyid par spro lags mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas gnang bar mi 'gyur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyi lus 'phags ma'i bu yul 
[\[19b.2\]]ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[19b.3\]]phyag byas te song ngo /_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gser 
[\[19b.4\]]gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /_gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni btul lags na/_btsun pa klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'di yun ring po zhig nas bdag cag la 
[\[19b.5\]]sha khon ma mchis par ni sha khon bgyid/_'gran zla ma mchis par ni 'gran zlar gyur/_gnod pa ma mchis par ni gnod par bgyid par gyur te/_lo tog gang dag skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzon par bgyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar 
[\[19b.6\]]bzung ste klu'i rgyal po sog ma med legs par gdul bar gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 
[\[19b.7\]]la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs te/_gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang phyogs su klu'i 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo /_/byang phyogs na ni phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bsod snyoms mod pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[20a.2\]]drang po yod do zhes gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po'i khab nas chu bo gang gA'i bar gyi lam dang grong khyer dag che thang du stor du bcug ste 
[\[20a.3\]]lam rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo thams cad bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi pog phor dag bshams/_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/_bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang dag byas so/_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI 
[\[20a.4\]]rnams kyis ni chu bo gang gA nas yangs pa can gyi bar du de bas lhag par khyad par du 'phags par lam dang grong khyer dag stor du bcug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[20a.5\]]bo na lan da gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dang yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_na lan dar byon nas na lan da na a mra'i tshal dgag dbye 
[\[20a.6\]]can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na lan da na kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa zhes bya ba rgas pa/_'khogs pa/_gtugs pa btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig gnas pa la/_na lan da'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_
[\[20a.7\]]mchod par byed de/_dgra bcom par bkur ro/_/de nas kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa'i sngon gyi grogs po dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag gis kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]tshong pa la 'di skad ces/_drang srong khyod tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces smras na/_gang yang bdag gi tshig mi nyan pa de srid pas/_ma la bdag de'i drung du song ste yid kyi dri ba 'dzin du gzhug go snyam nas/_de nas lha de kun 
[\[20b.2\]]du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong tshur shog_/kho bo las yid kyi dri ba long la kun chub par gyis shig_/ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya/_
[\[20b.3\]]ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya/_ci'i phyir spong /_ji ltar nad med pa 'thob/_drang srong gang zhig khyod kyi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pas sems rangs par byed pa de'i thad du khyod tshangs par 
[\[20b.4\]]spyad pa spyod cig ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pas lha de las yid kyi dri ba bzung ste kun chub par byas nas 'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyi drung du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas 
[\[20b.5\]]pa/_ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'od srung rdzogs byed kyis de'i yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes rnam par mi 
[\[20b.6\]]shes na lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems te/_'od srung rdzogs byed kyis bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes rnam par mi shes na lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas/_
[\[20b.7\]]de kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i mdun du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]byas pa/_ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gyis kyang bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/_rnam par mi shes 
[\[21a.2\]]na lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems te/_gang la yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i tshig gis lung bstan pa mi thob pa de 'dra ba'i rab tu byung bas bdag 
[\[21a.3\]]la ci zhig bya/_bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya cher yod pas/_ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa yang longs spyad cing sbyin pa yang btang /_bsod nams kyang bya'o snyam mo/_/yang de'i blo skyes pa/_ma la bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma gang na ba der 'gro bar bya'o 
[\[21a.4\]]snyam nas de chas pa na yang bsams pa/_re zhig dge sbyong dang bram ze rgan rabs gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_'od srung rdzogs byed nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_de rnams kyis re zhig yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang 
[\[21a.5\]]mi shes rnam par mi shes na dge sbyong gau ta ma nas gzhon pa gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsams te slar ldog par 'dod pa las/_yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon gyi kun du rgyu rnying pa rgan po 'khogs pa spyod pa'i slob dpon dag las bdag gis dge 
[\[21a.6\]]slong gzhon nu la brnyas par mi bya/_dge slong gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/_dge slong gzhon nu yang de ni dbang che ba mthu che bar gyur pa yin no zhes thos so snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[21a.7\]]yid kyi zhu ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/_ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_mdza' bo gzhan la rnam par smod byed cing /_/de ni bdag tu zad do zhes smra la/_/las kyang sla dgu 'dam zhing byed pa de/_/bdag gi bshes ma yin par shes par bya/_/gang zhig bden pa ma yin 
[\[21b.2\]]tshig_/mdza' bo dag la smra byed cing /_/smra la las su mi byed pa'ang /_/mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs shes te/_/de lta bu ni mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya zhe 
[\[21b.3\]]na/_gang zhig rtag tu bag med dbye ba yi/_/bsam pas glags lta de ni mdza' min gyi/_/gang zhig 'dir ni snying dang 'drar gyur par/_/gzhan gyis mi phyed de ni mdza' bo yin/_/de lta bu ni bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya'o/_/ci'i phyir spong zhe 
[\[21b.4\]]na/_skyes bu gces pa mthar 'byin cing /_/'bras bu lta bar byed pa ni/_/rab tu dga' ba skyed pa'i gnas/_/rab bsngags 'dren pa'i zhi ba sgom/_/de don du gnyer bar bsgom mo/_/ji ltar nad med pa 'thob ce na/_rab tu dben pa'i ro dang ni/_/nye bar 
[\[21b.5\]]zhi ba'i ro shes nas/_/chos la dga' ba'i ro 'thung ba/_/nad med sdig pa med par 'gyur/_/de ltar na nad med pa 'thob bo/_/de nas kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs kyis ni bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen no snyam du rig 
[\[21b.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong gau ta ma'i spyan sngar bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa spyad 
[\[21b.7\]]par bgyi'o/_/kun du rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/_de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa des zhes bya ba nas de sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to zhes bya 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong du 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[22a.2\]]ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can du nub mo nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[22a.3\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ma shes/_ma mthong /_khong du ma chud/_so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/_/bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/_nga dang khyed cag kho nas 
[\[22a.4\]]zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes pa nas/_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ma shes ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin 
[\[22a.5\]]du'o/_/ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/_da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/ngas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i 
[\[22a.6\]]bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/_da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces 
[\[22a.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/nga dang khyed cag kho na yis/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag_/ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas/_/lam ni ring du 'khor bar gyur/_/bden pa de dag mthong nas ni/_/srid pa'i sred pa bcad nas su/_/'khor ba'i skye ba zad pas na/_/
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[22b.2\]]kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu can gyi grong du byon to/_/
[\[22b.3\]]dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so/_/dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te/_dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so zhes 
[\[22b.4\]]thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /_khyu nas khyur phrad cing 'dug nas dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[22b.5\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dag yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'di la bag 
[\[22b.6\]]med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dang po yin no/_/bram
