[\[22b.7\]]ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang /_bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /_grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang /_bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /_grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/_bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa 
[\[23a.2\]]yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung /_bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung /_khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung /_dge sbyong gi 'khor du'ang rung /_'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 
[\[23a.3\]]'khor de dang der zhum zhum por gyur nas dga' ba med pa dang /_bag tsha bas 'gro bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag tsha bas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'di ni bag 
[\[23a.4\]]med pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag med pa'i rgyus yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med 
[\[23a.5\]]pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song 
[\[23a.6\]]ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang 
[\[23a.7\]]yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs lnga pa yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag yod pa'i phan yon yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon dang po yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la 
[\[23b.2\]]gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba 
[\[23b.3\]]dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang 
[\[23b.4\]]rung /_bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung /_khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung /_dge sbyong gi 'khor du'ang rung /_'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhum zhum po ma yin pa dang /_dga' ba dang bag tsha ba med pas 'gro bar 'gyur te/_/bram ze dang 
[\[23b.5\]]khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus zhes bya ba nas/_bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gsum pa yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la 
[\[23b.6\]]gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[23b.7\]]dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa yin no/_/de nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo 
[\[24a.2\]]sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi gnas su do mod bzhugs par gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/
[\[24a.3\]]de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa 
[\[24a.4\]]bram ze dbyar byed kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu can gyi grong du gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs te/_de la dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur sti byas 
[\[24a.5\]]so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs nas gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas dmar 
[\[24a.6\]]bu can gyi grong nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo /_/de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[24a.7\]]ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang 
[\[24b.2\]]dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 
[\[24b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du 
[\[24b.4\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 
[\[24b.5\]]'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas 'dug gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_'dug gnas kyi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te 
[\[24b.6\]]'dug gnas su zhugs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa 
[\[24b.7\]]mi'i las 'phags pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te 'dug gnas nas byung nas/_'dug gnas kyi grib ma la dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson pa su yin ci thos/_
[\[25a.2\]]btsun pa bdag gis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed lags par thos so/_/kun dga' bo legs so/_/legs so/_/ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed ni mkhas pa yin te/_'di ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 
[\[25a.3\]]rnams dang lhan cig bgros pa lta zhig_/kun dga' bo 'di nga 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/_/kun dga' 
[\[25a.4\]]bo phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs der 'di lta ste/_gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gang du lha bar ma dang phal pas gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs der ni 'di lta 
[\[25a.5\]]ste/_gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma dang phal pa rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir ni mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres pas phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/_gnas kyi phyir dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 
[\[25a.6\]]gyur te/_kun dga' bo ya rabs kyi gnas dang /_ya rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang /_zong 'grems pa rnams kyi nang na yang 'di lta ste/_dmar bu can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste/_me dang /_
[\[25a.7\]]chu dang /_nang 'khrug gis so/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/_phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_gser gyi bya ma bum thogs 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]te gsol ba 'debs shing spyan sngar 'dug go/_/'di skad ces kyang gsol te/_kye gau ta ma sbyin pa 'di las bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /_dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /_bde ba'i gzhi ci mchis pa de dmar bu can na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring 
[\[25b.2\]]po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gang zag dad pa can/_/gang zhig lha rnams mchod byed pa/_/ston pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa ste/_/de 
[\[25b.3\]]ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/_/mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis/_/gang gi phyogs su gnas 'cha' ba/_/tshul khrims ldan pa bshos gsol nas/_/de yi 'og tu yon bsngo bya/_/de rnams rjed pas rjed 'gyur zhing /_/mchod pas kyang ni 
[\[25b.4\]]mchod par 'gyur/_/de nas lto nas byung ba yi/_/bu la ma bzhin 'di la brtse/_/lha rnams brtse ba'i skyes bus ni/_/bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 
[\[25b.5\]]yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis der rgyu lhag gang yin pa de thams cad 
[\[25b.6\]]sbyin par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing /_'di snyam du sems kyis sems la mngon par 'du byed de/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni bdag gis gau ta ma'i sgo zhes gdags 
[\[25b.7\]]so/_/chu bo gang gA'i 'jug ngogs gang nas rgal ba de yang gau ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes gdags so snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/_dmar bu can gyi grong gi 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]dbus thog thag gshegs nas byang phyogs su rgyu ste/_chu bo gang gA gang na bar gshegs so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchod 
[\[26a.2\]]pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ba dang /_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis bsams pa/_lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma 
[\[26a.3\]]skyes dgra 'di bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rang nyid lhag par spro bar gyur na/_ci'i phyir na bdag cag gis spro bar mi bya snyam nas de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo /_/klu rnams 
[\[26a.4\]]kyis bsams pa/_re zhig mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur na/_bdag cag klu rnams ni rnam par lhung ba'i lus can yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag spro bar mi bya snyam nas/_de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i 
[\[26a.5\]]gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa/_re zhig mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur na/_mngon 
[\[26a.6\]]sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/_de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo /_/sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa/_lha dang mi 
[\[26a.7\]]'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la spro bar gyur na/_bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/_de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]pa/_ji ltar 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab bo snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na bdag gdugs 'dzin to snyam pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/_de 
[\[26b.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis steng du bzung ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[26b.3\]]kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_des na bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin 
[\[26b.4\]]gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan na las byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir 
[\[26b.5\]]rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/_rgyal po de la bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod do/_/rgyal po de'i kun du spyod pa ni bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid de 
[\[26b.6\]]'khyam par byed do/_/btsun mo rnams kyis bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di'i kun du spyod pa ni sras btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid nas 'khyam par mdzad pas bdag cag bu yod bzhin du bu med pa dang 'dras/_da ni nang khrims zhig bca' ste/_gal te 
[\[26b.7\]]bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur na/_des rgyal po la gdas par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/_/ji tsam na btsun mo gzhan zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de de dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag ste/_de zla ba brgyad dam 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]dgu 'das pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba mgo gdugs lta bu/_lag pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_yan lag dang nying 
[\[27a.2\]]lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/ji tsam na chen por gyur pa dang btsun mo de dag thams cad khye'u de la bu'i sdug pa skyes so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po shar gyi 
[\[27a.3\]]lus 'phags kyi gling nas rin po che sna bdun gyis sna drangs shing khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis yongs su bskor te bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas/_gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag par spa zhing 'ong ba gzhon nu khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[27a.4\]]kyi steng na 'dug pa des mthong nas/_des ma la dris pa/_yum mchi ba pha bi su lags/_bu khyod kyi yab rgyal po legs mthong chen po yin no/_/yum de 'das na bdag rgyal por 'gyur ram/_bu rgyal po de'i sras stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod 
[\[27a.5\]]pa de dag thams cad kyi phu bo gang yin pa de de 'das na rgyal por 'gyur na khyod ni thams cad kyi nu bo yin no/_/des smras pa/_yum gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal por mi 'gyur na gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_bdag dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim 
[\[27a.6\]]med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/btsun mo de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/_bu khyod la bdag cag gis bu'i sdug pa nyams su myong gis de ltar ma byed cig_/yum gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/de dag gis de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 
[\[27a.7\]]'chu bar shes nas smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na dam zhig bcas nas gnang bar bya ste/_gang yang khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs na de khyod kyis bdag cag la smros shig_/de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de de dag gis gnang nas des mtha' gcig tu song ste/_
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]mkhan po dang slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_bdag gis ma de rnams la khas blangs pa smra dgos pas song la sngon gyi dam bcas pa mthar dbyung 
[\[27b.2\]]ngo snyam nas/_bdag nyid chen po de dag ni ngag gis chos mi ston gyi lus kyis yin pas des de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa dag gi cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul 
[\[27b.3\]]la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas de dag shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/_rtogs so/_/'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/_bdag 
[\[27b.4\]]cag kyang bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/_khyod 'di nyid du skyed mos tshal du bzhugs shig dang /_bdag cag gis rgyun du bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/_/rang sangs rgyas des khas blangs nas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis 
[\[27b.5\]]bkur stir bya bar brtsams so/_/rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_bdag gi lus rnag can 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyis/_ma la bdag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go snyam nas/_de nas de ngang pa'i 
[\[27b.6\]]rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag kyang bstan nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs 
[\[27b.7\]]so/_/de nas de dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs te/_spungs nas bsregs te me'i phung po de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa de dag gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/_skyed mos tshal de nyid du rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te mgul gdub dang /_gdu bu 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]rgyan can dang /_gzhan yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag btsugs so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas so ga'i dus 
[\[28a.2\]]la bab pa na me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang /_krung krung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_bya ko ki la dang /_shang shang de'u skad 'byin pa'i tshal gseb tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir song nas/_de skyed mos tshal na 'khyam 
[\[28a.3\]]pa las dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo /_/de nas skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mi la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje 'di ci yin/_des smras pa/_lha bdag gis ni ma 'tshal te/_'on kyang 'di'i don ni btsun mos 'tshal to/_/de nas des btsun mo'i 
[\[28a.4\]]'khor rnams la smras pa dang /_de dag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/_des smras pa/_de bzhin du sbyin no/_/de dag gis skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed cag gis bu 
[\[28a.5\]]rgyal srid la mngon par dga' na de kho bo la ma gsol ba bzang po ma yin ba zhig byas so/_/gal te gsol bar gyur pa dang kho bo de kho na la rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba zhig_/'on kyang ngas bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las 'das 
[\[28a.6\]]par gyur kyang gdugs dang /_cod pan dang /_thor tshugs gdags so zhes de nas des bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang /_cod pan dang /_thor tshugs rnams btags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 
[\[28a.7\]]de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs mthong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/gang yang ngas de na bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang /_cod pan dang /_thor tshugs btags te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]po nyis stong lnga brgya byas so/_/las de kho na'i lhag mas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na lha dang mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to/_/gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs 
[\[28b.2\]]par ma gyur na gzhan du yang ngas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byed par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na nga'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can gang yin pa de ngas nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod du rnam par smin par bsngos te/_gal te mu tig bre gang 
[\[28b.3\]]gis 'bras bre gang khugs kyang 'on kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong 
[\[28b.4\]]dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma 
[\[28b.5\]]ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras gru zam 'dzugs su bcug pa dang /_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam btsugs so/_/klu rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag klu rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin pas 
[\[28b.6\]]ma la bdag cag gis gdengs ka'i zam pas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA bsgral bar bya'o snyam nas de rnams kyis gdengs ka'i zam pa btsugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag las gang 
[\[28b.7\]]zhig lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las chu bo gang gA rgal bar spro ba de ni de las rgol cig_/gang zhig yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis gru zam btsugs pa las spro ba gang yin pa de yang de las rgol cig_/nga yang 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gang gA brgal bar bya'o/_/de na kha cig ni lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las rgal to/_/kha cig ni yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams 
[\[29a.2\]]kyi gru zam las rgal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las rgal to/_/de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran bor te rgya mtsho 
[\[29a.3\]]rgal/_/skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo rnams chu rgal/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan bram ze rgal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs/_/dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha'o/_/gal te kun na chu yod na/_/khron pa'i 
[\[29a.4\]]chus ni ci zhig bya/_/sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas ni/_/su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sa phyogs gzhan zhig na mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa phyogs zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[29a.5\]]dga' bo khyod rgyal po sgra chen 'dzin gyi lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la sboms su 'dom drug bcu yod pa/_thams cad gser las byas pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig yod de/_sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas nas chu bo gang gA'i 
[\[29a.6\]]nang du bor ba gang yin pa de lta bar 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ba'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mchod sdong de bsgreng na dge slong rnams lta bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[29a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /_dra bas 'brel pa/_bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/_'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag gis sa la reg par mdzad pa dang /_klu rnams kyis bsams pa/_
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na/_mchod sdong gzigs par bzhed par mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis bsgreng ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis mchod sdong blta bar brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni 'dod pa chung ba yin 
[\[29b.2\]]pas mtha' gcig tu song nas phyag dar khrod pa dag 'tshem mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mchod sdong nub par 'gyur gyis rtags zung shig ces pa las de nub par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[29b.3\]]'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong rnams mchod sdong la lta bar bgyid na/_tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni 'dod pa chung bas mtha' gcig tu mchis nas phyag dar khrod pa 'tshem pa la gzigs/_ci lags re zhig 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[29b.4\]]ba'i slad du'am/_'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags/_gal te re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du lags na ni gzhan yang 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig mchis lags so/_/'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags na ni/_'dis gang du bsten lags/_
[\[29b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang yin la sngon yang bsten pa'i phyir yang yin no/_/'dis sngon gang du bsten lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po rab sgrogs zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de lha'i dbang po brgya 
[\[29b.6\]]byin dang grogs por gyur to/_/de bu 'dod kyang bu med nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste nor rdzas mang po zhig bsags na bdag la bu med pas bdag shin rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas brgya byin gyis mthong 
[\[29b.7\]]nas dris pa/_grogs po khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_kau shi ka nor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags na bdag la bu med pas bdag shi nas rgyal po gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur bas so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]grogs po khyod sems khong du chud par ma byed cig_/gal te lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos byung bar gyur na/_de khyod kyi bur bsko bar bya'o/_/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'chi 'pho'i chos 'byung ba la ni snga ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gos ma 
[\[30a.2\]]rnyings pa rnams rnyings par 'gyur ba dang /_me tog gi phreng ba ma rnyings pa rnams rnyings par 'gyur ba dang /_lus las dri mi zhim pa 'byung ba dang /_mchan khung nas rngul 'dzag pa dang /_rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/_/ji tsam na lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas 
[\[30a.3\]]lnga byung bar gyur nas de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig_/des smras pa/_kau shi ka de ni bag med pa'i gnas yin te/_kau shi ka rgyal po rnams ni nyes pa mang po byed pa 
[\[30a.4\]]yin pas chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na mi rung ngo /_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po khyod la ngas dran par bya'o/_/kau shi ka lha rnams ni dga' ba mang pos bag med pa yin no/_/grogs po de ni bden na 
[\[30a.5\]]'on kyang kho bos khyod la dran par bya'o/_/des rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to/_/gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams blangs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas 
[\[30a.6\]]khye'u zhig btsas te zhes bya ba nas/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing tshogs nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u'i ming cir gdags/_gnyen rnams kyis smras pa/_gang gi nyi ma kho na la khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du 
[\[30a.7\]]zhugs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur pas/_de bas na khye'u'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar gdags so zhes de'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar btags te/_khye'u sgra chen ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang /_dbye 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]ba dang /_klog pa la mkhas shing bshes gnyen can du gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur cing yul gyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang /_brtson 'grus thob pa/_sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan 
[\[30b.2\]]nas gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_mda' gzhu dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba 
[\[30b.3\]]dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pas gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phen pa dang /_dbyug pas rdeg pa dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stangs dang /_gcod pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par 
[\[30b.4\]]phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba dag ste/_gnas lnga po de rnams la shin tu byang bar gyur to/_/chos nyid kyis re zhig pha ji tsam gson gyi bar du bu'i ming mi grag pa yin no/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal 
[\[30b.5\]]po rab sgrogs shi nas sgra chen rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang /_des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas/_de nas chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug par gyur to/_/de nas brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po kho bos khyod rgyal 
[\[30b.6\]]po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig_/sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo'am/_des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug 
[\[30b.7\]]par gyur to/_/lan gnyis su yang brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig_/sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo'am/_des smras pa/_kau shi 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]ka bdag cag rgyal po rnams ni dga' ba mang pos bag med pas skad cig tu brjed par 'gyur gyis/_bdag la khyod kyis mtshan ma zhig zhog shig dang /_bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[31a.2\]]nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las thams cad pa la bsgo ba/_las thams cad pa song la khyod kyis rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang /_lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la/_sboms su 'dom drug bcu yod pa/_thams cad 
[\[31a.3\]]gser las byas shing rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul cig_/de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang /_lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod pa/_sboms su 'dom drug bcu yod pa/_thams cad 
[\[31a.4\]]gser las byas pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul to/_/de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis mchod sbyin gyi khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mchod sdong gi zhal ta bar bzhag go/_/de nas mchod sdong la 'dzam bu'i 
[\[31a.5\]]gling na gnas pa'i mi thams cad lta bar spro bas lhags nas zas zos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las sgrub par mi byed do/_/de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams bar chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to/_/blon po rnams kyis dpya nyung ngu 
[\[31a.6\]]phul ba dang rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir dpya nyung zad gcig 'bul/_lha 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs mchis nas 'tshal ma 'tshal cing mchod sdong la lta zhing mchis te rang gi las sgrub par mi byed pas zhing las kyi mtha' 
[\[31a.7\]]rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas dpya thang bzhin mi 'du lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_mchod sbyin gyi khang pa drol cig_/de rnams kyis de dral na yang de bzhin du skye bo'i tshogs de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing 'dug ste/_rang rang gi 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]las sgrub par mi byed pas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas de bzhin rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos dris pa/_shes ldan dag mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na ci'i phyir da dung dpya nyung bar gyur/_blon po rnams kyis 
[\[31b.2\]]smras pa/_lha skye bo'i tshogs rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing mchis te rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyid pas/_zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas des na dpya nyung bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis sbyin pa 
[\[31b.3\]]dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byas nas mchod sdong chu bo gang gA'i nang du bor ro/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong legs ldan 'di nyid yin te/_'dis sngon 'di bsten to/_/btsun 
[\[31b.4\]]pa mchod sdong 'di gang du zhig par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa na mi rnams kyis tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te/_mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi rgyal po dung zhes bya ba yang dag par sdom pa/_'khor 
[\[31b.5\]]los sgyur ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che 
[\[31b.6\]]dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che nyid do/_/de la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed 
[\[31b.7\]]pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/_chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]rgyal po dung gi mdun na 'don bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/_de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo /_/de byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas pas bu byams pa zhes bya ba zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[32a.2\]]bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/_/des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams byams pa la gtad nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri po rnams bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/_/de nas 
[\[32a.3\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis gter chen po bzhi po/_ka ling ka nas dmar ser te/_/mi thi la nas skya bo yi/_/sa 'dzin nas ni e la'i 'dab/_/bA rA Na sI'i grong nas dung /_/mchod sdong 'di yang khyer nas rgyal po dung la 'bul bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po 
[\[32a.4\]]dung gis kyang bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe la sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze tshangs pa'i tshes kyang bram ze'i khye'u byams pa la'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de rnams la'o/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mchod sdong de dum bu dum bur bcad nas 
[\[32a.5\]]'ged par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas mchod sdong de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas/_de nyid kyis skyo ba skyes nas nags su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi nyi ma kho na la nags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas 
[\[32a.6\]]par byas nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/_de'i mtshan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi nyi ma kho na la yang dag par 
[\[32a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin po che sna bdun nub par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dung yang khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i chung ma rin po che sa ga zhes bya ba yang bud med brgyad khri'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram 
[\[32b.2\]]ze tshangs pa'i tshe yang bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa 'khor dge slong 'bum 
[\[32b.3\]]phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang ri bya gag rkang gang na ba der gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de na dge slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa 'dug pas ri bya gag rkang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la kha dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[32b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas dge slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa phyag g.yas pas blangs nas phyag g.yon par bzhag ste nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces/_dge slong dag skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub 
[\[32b.5\]]pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba de'i nyan thos rnams las chog shes pa dang 'dod pa chung ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'od srung yin no zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin te/_shAkya thub pa yongs su 
[\[32b.6\]]mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan pa yang 'dis yang dag par bsdus so zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis mthong nas skyo ba skyes te/_'di 'dra ba'i lus kyis ji ltar 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur snyam nas de rnams skyo ba de nyid kyis dgra 
[\[32b.7\]]bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/_'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan mngon du bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/mchod sdong de ni der zhig par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis dkon mchog 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang gis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang du smon lam btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su rgyal po gos 
[\[33a.2\]]sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang /_lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag 
[\[33a.3\]]par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/byang phyogs na rgyal po nor ldan zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu 
[\[33a.4\]]rtag pa dang /_lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gos sbyin gyi mdun na 'don las khye'u spyi gtsug rin po ches brgyan pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston 
[\[33a.5\]]rgya cher byas nas de'i ming rin chen gtsug tor can zhes btags so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas skyo ba skyes te nags su song ngo /_/gang gi nyi ma kho na la nags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la des bla na med pa'i ye shes 
[\[33a.6\]]thob nas de'i ming yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po nor ldan steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir song ste blon po'i tshogs kyis 
[\[33a.7\]]bskor nas 'dug go/_/des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i ci 'dra ba de ltar rgyal po gzhan 'ga'i yul na 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang /_shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]rtag pa dang /_lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par bab pas lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lta yod dam/_yul dbus nas tshong pa zong thogs te byang phyogs su 'ongs pa de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha yul dbus na rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bya 
[\[33b.2\]]ba zhig mchis so/_/rgyal po nor ldan gyis thos ma thag tu mi bzod pa chen po skyes te/_de mi bzod pa skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[33b.3\]]po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang rta pa'i tshogs dang shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/_yul dbus su dong nas chu bo gang gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram du 'khod do/_/rgyal po gos sbyin gyis rgyal 
[\[33b.4\]]po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas yul dbus su 'ongs te chu bo gang gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na 'khod do zhes thos so/_/thos nas 
[\[33b.5\]]kyang des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang shing rta pa'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas chu bo gang gA'i byang phyogs logs kyi 'gram na 'dug go/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin 
[\[33b.6\]]chen gtsug tor can gyis de gnyis kyi gdul pa'i dus mkhyen nas chu bo gang gA'i 'gram du nub mo nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/_/chos nyid kyis gang 
[\[33b.7\]]gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_de rnams 
[\[34a.2\]]kyi kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung bar gyur pa rgyal po nor ldan gyis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la dris pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na snang ba rgya chen po byung ba 'di ci yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po gos sbyin gyi 
[\[34a.3\]]yul du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can byung ste/_de la blta ba'i phyir brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa mchis pa des na snang ba chen po 'di byung ste/_de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags pas 'di ni de'i mthu lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[34a.4\]]po nor ldan gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi yul du gang la brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba'i rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu byung ba de la bdag gis gnod pa ci 'dra ba zhig bya zhes/_des de la pho nya btang ste/_grogs po khyod 
[\[34a.5\]]de la bdag cung zad kyang mi byed kyis tshur spyon/_khyod ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po can zhig pas khyod kyi yul na gang la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 
[\[34a.6\]]gtsug tor can bzhugs so/_/'on kyang khyod kyi mgul nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/_de lta na bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro zhes spring ngo /_/rgyal po gos sbyin yid ma ches nas de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can 
[\[34a.7\]]gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag la rgyal po nor ldan gyis spring pa/_grogs po sdug pa khyod la bdag cag ci yang mi byed kyis tshur shog_/khyod kyi mgul ba nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/_de lta na bdag cag phan 
[\[34b.2\]]tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po song shig dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ci 
[\[34b.3\]]bdag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi'am/_rgyal po chen po rgyal po dpung chen po rnams la ni gtug par bya dgos so/_/de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs 
[\[34b.4\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chas te rgyal po nor ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po nor ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/_/de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis mgul nas 'khyud de yid gcugs par byas te btang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gos sbyin 
[\[34b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[34b.6\]]nas/_rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rgyal po thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa'i rgyal po gang lags/_rgyal po chen po 'khor los sgyur ba 
[\[34b.7\]]yin no/_/de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]can la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can 
[\[35a.2\]]gyis rgyal po gos sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas 
[\[35a.3\]]dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/_nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor 
[\[35a.4\]]can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs 
[\[35a.5\]]mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas/_rgyal po gos sbyin gyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams 
[\[35a.6\]]pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing 
[\[35a.7\]]tshim par byed de/_rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_btsun pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig ces smras nas de ma thag tu dung yang bus so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 
[\[35b.2\]]gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas skad chen po'i sgra dag byung ngo /_/rgyal po nor ldan gyis ca co'i sgra dag thos 
[\[35b.3\]]nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na ca co'i sgra grag pa de ci zhig yin/_de rnams kyis legs par brtags nas smras pa/_lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin 'khor 
[\[35b.4\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang rab tu dga' bas des na ca co'i sgra grag pa lags so/_/de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[35b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces 
[\[35b.6\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi ba gang lags/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no/_/de nas rgyal po nor ldan stan las langs te bla 
[\[35b.7\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po nor ldan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[36a.2\]]rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas song 
[\[36a.3\]]ngo /_/de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug 
[\[36a.4\]]tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham 
[\[36a.5\]]thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te rgyal po nor ldan gyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams 
[\[36a.6\]]pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing 
[\[36a.7\]]tshim par byed de/_rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[36b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces btab bo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[36b.3\]]byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de ltar na smon lam gyi dbang gis dkon mchog gnyis cig car 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo grong spyil bu can zhes bya ba gang 
[\[36b.4\]]na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed ces bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /_grong spyil bu can du byon to/_/grong spyil bu 
[\[36b.5\]]can gyi grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni tshul khrims yin no/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin yin no 'di ni shes rab yin no/_/dge slong dag tshul khrims goms 
[\[36b.6\]]par byas na ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin goms par byas na shes rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab goms par byas na 'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par 
[\[36b.7\]]grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi zag pa ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten to/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa kho nar shes par 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[37a.2\]]kun dga' bo sgra can gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /_sgra can du byon nas sgra can gyi drang srong 
[\[37a.3\]]sgra sgrogs kyi gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang /_brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang mdzes pa dang /_nye mdzes dang yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang bzang po dang 
[\[37a.4\]]shin tu bzang dang grags pa dang grags byin dang dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod 
[\[37a.5\]]snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bas sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung ste/_de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang /_brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang /_yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang bzang po dang shin tu bzang dang grags pa 
[\[37a.6\]]dang grags byin dang dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod snyoms la rgyus te zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing /_lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te bcom ldan 
[\[37a.7\]]'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'das bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po 'dir snga dro sham thabs 'tshal lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na sgra can 'dir skye bo'i tshogs la mi 
[\[37b.2\]]ngas byung nas/_de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang gum/_nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang /_mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang bzang po dang shin tu bzang dang /_grags pa dang grags byin dang dge bsnyen grags 
[\[37b.3\]]mchog kyang gum mo zhes thos lags na/_btsun pa de rnams kyi 'gro ba ni gang skye ba ni gang /_sngon du 'gro ba ni gang lags/_dge slong dag dge bsnyen brtan pa ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[37b.4\]]'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang bzang po dang shin tu bzang dang grags pa dang grags byin dang /_
[\[37b.5\]]dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas rdzus te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen nyis 
[\[37b.6\]]brgya lnga bcu lhag cig shi ba de dag kyang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge 
[\[37b.7\]]bsnyen sum brgya shi ba de dag ni kun du sbyor ba gsum yang spangs la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dag kyang bsrabs pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yin te/_'jig rten 'dir lan gcig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]grong khyer sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen lnga brgya lhag cig shi ba de dag ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba/_re ltar thogs na srid pa bdun pa yin te/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[38a.2\]]kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag khyed dus las 'das shing shi bar gyur pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba zhu bar byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la tho 'tsham pa yin te/_des na de bzhin 
[\[38a.3\]]gshegs pa bde bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang skye ba yod na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa yin na ngo mtshar ci zhig yod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa ste/_
[\[38a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mngon par mkhyen pas mngon par byang chub nas gsungs te/_'dogs par mdzad rab tu 'jog par mdzad rnam par 'byed par mdzad/_rnam par 'grel par mdzad gsal bar mdzad 'chad par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 
[\[38a.5\]]mdzad pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung 'di skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis 
[\[38a.6\]]skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba 
[\[38a.7\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'di med na 'di mi 'byung la 'di 'gags na 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags 
[\[38b.2\]]pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal 
[\[38b.3\]]ba dang yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'on kyang khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid 
[\[38b.4\]]la zung shig dang bshad do/_/chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam 
[\[38b.5\]]grangs yin te/_ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do zhes gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no/_/a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sgra can du byon nas/_sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas 
[\[38b.6\]]na bzhugs so/_/zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang a mra skyong ma de la ne tso bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba mi skad shes pa zhig yod de/_ne tso bzhin rgyas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin rgyas tshur shog_/khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas kho mo'i tshig 
[\[38b.7\]]gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/_gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho'am gnod pa ma mchis sam/_stobs dang bde bar reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol la/_'di skad ces a mra skyong ma'i mchid 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]nas/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs par gsol cig_/de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis a mra skyong ma'i ltar mnyan nas/_bcom 
[\[39a.2\]]ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba de yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI'i khye'u dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ne tso 'gro ba 'di ni smad 'tshong ma'i yin no zhes de dag gis de la mda' 'phang bar brtsams pa na/_de yang de dag gi steng du babs so/_/de nas ne tso des tshigs 
[\[39a.3\]]su bcad de smras pa/_yul 'khor gzhan yang 'gyed par yang /_/pho nya mi gsod ces grag na/_/bdag lta rgyal ba'i pho nya bas/_/lus can kun gyis ga la sod/_/de rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod kyi tshig gis mda' 'phangs pa/_/
[\[39a.4\]]ldog na bdag cag smos ci dgos/_/khyod ni rdzu 'phrul ches bskyabs pas/_/'jigs pa med par 'gro bar gyis/_/de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te 
[\[39a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la a mra skyong ma mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho'am gnod pa ma mchis sam/_stobs dang bde ba la 
[\[39a.6\]]reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lags so/_/bzhin rgyas khyod dang a mra skyong ma bde bar gyur cig_/btsun pa a mra skyong ma'i mchid nas bcom ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_thog mar bdag gi a mra'i 
[\[39a.7\]]tshal du gshegs su gsol zhes de skad mchi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ne tso bzhin rgyas la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed nas song ba las ring po ma lon pa kho nar 'ol bas srog dang phral te dus byas nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so/_/chos nyid kyis skyes nas ring po ma lon 
[\[39b.2\]]pa'i lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo ni sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis yin pa'o/_/des bltas nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[39b.3\]]sems mngon par dad pas so/_/de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin gyis/_ci nas kyang bdag zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 
[\[39b.4\]]'gro'o snyam nas/_de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing se mo do dang /_do shal gyis lus brgyan nas/_de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA 
[\[39b.5\]]ra ba'i me tog gis/_thu ba bkang nas shin tu 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog gis/_de'i nub mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de'i 
[\[39b.6\]]tshe sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrogs kyi 'dug gnas thams cad gsal bar gyur to//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_
[\[39b.7\]]bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de de thos pas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la mas ma bgyis te/_phas ma lags sdug pas ma lags rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 
[\[40a.2\]]ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags lha rnams kyis ma lags/_snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang /_yi 
[\[40a.3\]]dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/_lha dang mi rnams la ni rab tu bzhag_/'khor ba las ni ring du mdzad/_khrag dang /_mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_/nang song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo 
[\[40a.4\]]rnams ni phye/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis lags te/_btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/
[\[40a.5\]]bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas sngon ne tso byed 
[\[40a.6\]]pa'i lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas tshong pa zong rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba bzhin du 'byor 
[\[40a.7\]]pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yangs pa can gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed 
[\[40b.2\]]nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi bdag gi a mra'i tshal kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te/_bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yangs 
[\[40b.3\]]pa can nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/_des ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[40b.4\]]'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gis brtson 'grus dang 
[\[40b.5\]]shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig_/ngas rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin no/_/ji ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus la gnas pa yin zhe na/_'di la dge slong gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do 'bad do brtson 
[\[40b.6\]]'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to rab tu 'jog go/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do 'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to rab tu 'jog go/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/
[\[40b.7\]]'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to rab tu 'jog go/_/dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang goms par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang /_ye shes rgya chen po mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]skyed do 'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin cing rab tu 'jog pa ste/_de ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus can yin no/_/ji ltar na dge slong shes bzhin can yin zhe na/_'di la dge slong gis 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa la shes 
[\[41a.2\]]bzhin gyis gnas shing lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang bskum pa dang brkyang ba dang snam sbyar dang /_chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs pa dang /_'gro ba dang 'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang nyal ba dang /_gnyid ma log pa dang smra ba dang mi smra ba dang /_gnyid kyis 
[\[41a.3\]]snyom pas dub pa rnams la shes bzhin gyis gnas pa ste/_de ltar na dge slong shes bzhin can yin no/_/ji ltar na dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang /_shes bzhin dang dran pa dang 
[\[41a.4\]]ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/_/phyi'i lus dang nang dang phyi'i lus dang /_nang gi tshor ba rnams dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /_nang gi sems dang phyi'i sems dang nang dang phyi'i sems 
[\[41a.5\]]dang /_nang gi chos rnams dang phyi'i chos rnams dang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang /_shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/_de ltar na dge slong dran pa dang 
[\[41a.6\]]ldan pa yin no/_/dge slong dag ngas a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gis brtson 'grus dang /_shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig_/ngas rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin zhes ngas gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no/_/de nas a mra skyong ma bcom 
[\[41a.7\]]ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_
[\[41b.2\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas a mra skyong ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[41b.3\]]ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi 
[\[41b.4\]]gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang yangs pa can du phyin te/_yangs 
[\[41b.5\]]pa can gyi a mra skyong ma'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang so so nas shing rta dang rta rnams la zhon te/_kha cig ni rta sngon po dang /_shing rta sngon po dang /_srab skyogs dang /_lcag sngon po dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri shubs 
[\[41b.6\]]sngon po dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa sngon po dang /_'khor sngon por/_kha cig ni rta ser po dang /_shing rta ser po dang /_srab skyogs dang /_lcag ser po dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri shubs 
[\[41b.7\]]ser po dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa ser po dang /_'khor ser por/_kha cig ni rta dmar po dang /_shing rta dmar po dang /_srab skyogs dang /_lcag dmar po dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gdugs dang /_ral 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gri shubs dmar po dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa dmar po dang /_'khor dmar por/_kha cig ni rta dkar po dang /_shing rta dkar po dang /_srab skyogs dang /_lcag dkar po dang /_thor tshugs 
[\[42a.2\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri shubs dkar po dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa dkar po dang /_'khor dkar por chas te skad mthon po dang /_skad chen por slar khyer slar khyer ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byung 
[\[42a.3\]]ste/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[42a.4\]]pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag las sus sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro ba ma mthong ba de yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la ltos shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar da 
[\[42a.5\]]ltar gyi yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag bzhin du rdzu 'phrul 'di dang /_'byor pa 'di dang /_cha lugs 'dis skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro'o/_/ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs 
[\[42a.6\]]so/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI 
[\[42a.7\]]rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser 
[\[42b.2\]]skya'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni spobs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni 
[\[42b.3\]]spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_ang ga'i rgyal po nor bu'i go 'chang ba/_/ma ga'i dbang pos rnyed pa rab 
[\[42b.4\]]rnyed de/_/de yi yul du byung ba'i sangs rgyas ni/_/grags pa'i sgra dag gangs kyi ri bo bzhin/_/ji ltar pad ma bzang po legs 'khrungs pa/_/dgongs ka kha 'bye dri zhim ldan pa bzhin/_/bar snang la ni nyi ma lhag ge bar/_/snang ba lta bur nyi ma'i rgyud la ltos/_/
[\[42b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab stobs/_/ji ltar mtshan mo me 'bar lta bu ltos/_/de ni mig byed snang ba byed pa ste/_/lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom rnam par 'dul/_/lits+tsha bI lnga brgyas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so/_/bram ze'i 
[\[42b.6\]]khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so/_/zhes bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir byin no/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom 
[\[42b.7\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/gnas 'jog dag nga sngar a mra skyong mas spyan drangs so/_/btsun pa a mra 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]skyong ma dman pa shes rab dman pa des bdag cag bslus lags te/_des na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das thog ma nyid du blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi ba'i rngo ma thog mod kyi da dung yang bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi 
[\[43a.2\]]dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gnas 'jog de ni legs par smras so zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[43a.3\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu ni de nyid na 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par shes nas stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 
[\[43a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir bdag la lits+tsha bI lnga brgyas bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir stsal ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su 
[\[43a.5\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bla gos lnga brgya bzhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig 
[\[43a.6\]]rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_ser skya'i bu 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes 
[\[43a.7\]]bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung zhing de chos thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]su byang ba/_tshangs par spyod pa ston par 'gyur te/_ser skya'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang po yin no/_/gang dag chos de zhe sa dang bcas pas nyan cing bla 
[\[43b.2\]]mar byed/_dam par byed/_yid la byed cing sems rtse gcig tu rna blags nas sems thams cad bsdus nas nyan par byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[43b.3\]]ba gnyis pa yin no/_/chos de gang dag gis thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gsum pa yin no/_/chos de gang dag gis 
[\[43b.4\]]thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba rgya chen po 'thob pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba bzhi pa yin no/_/chos de gang 
[\[43b.5\]]dag gis thos nas don zab mo'i gzhi shes rab kyis so sor rtogs par byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba lnga pa yin no/_/ser skya'i bu skyes bu dam pa 
[\[43b.6\]]dag ni byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba can yin te/_de dag cung zad tsam byas na yang chud gzon par mi byed na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de lta bas na ser skya'i bu khyod kyis 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba can du bslab par bya ste/_cung zad tsam byas na yang chud mi gzon na 
[\[43b.7\]]mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_ser skya'i bu khyod kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]snga nas song ngo /_/de nas a mra skyong mas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/_nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod dag bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod 
[\[44a.2\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi 
[\[44a.3\]]dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas a mra skyong ma'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas a mra skyong mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing
