[\[44a.4\]]bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu 
[\[44a.5\]]bar rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong mas sbyin pa phul ba de la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/_gang zhig sbyin la dga' 'gyur skye bo sten/_/snyan 
[\[44a.6\]]pa 'thob cing de yi grags pa 'phel/_/ser sna med cing tshogs par 'gro ba na/_/zhum par mi 'gyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/de lta bas na mkhas pa bde 'dod pas/_/ser sna'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa gtong /_/de dag yun ring sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas/_/lha rnams dang 
[\[44a.7\]]ni skal ba mnyam par dga'/_/sbyin gtong dge byed de ni shi 'phos nas/_/rang gi 'od kyi dga' ba'i tshal na rgyu/_/de na de gnyis rtsen cing dga' byed pa/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag dang ldan/_/ma bcings skyob pa de yi gsung thos nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dga'/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/dge slong rnams 
[\[44b.2\]]the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_des gal te lha rnams su skyes na yang lha mthu che bar 'gyur la/_gal te mi rnams su skyes na yang mi mthu chen por gyur 
[\[44b.3\]]cing /_da ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper yang bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi 
[\[44b.4\]]za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/_'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shis bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i 
[\[44b.5\]]khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/
[\[44b.6\]]chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[44b.7\]]rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/_de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang grong khyer bA rA Na sI 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na dge bsnyen lnga brgya gnas so/_/de rnams kyis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas te/_rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs 
[\[45a.2\]]pa dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i gling du phyin to/_/de nas rin po che rnams kyis gru bo che yongs su bkang nas chas pa dang de nas rlung gis bdas nas rgya mtsho chen po'i klong zhig tu phyin to/_/de rnams bred cing re ba med par gyur nas yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[45a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye ma las mchod rten byas nas rin po che sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so/_/de nas gnyid log pa dang /_lha zhig gis smras pa/_khyed cag ma 'jigs par bag yod par byos shig dang /_zhag bdun gyi nyin par dus rlabs 'ong bar 
[\[45a.4\]]'gyur te/_des khyed cag bde legs su 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs nas de rnams phan tshun du smra zhing gros bya bar brtsams te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag la lhas mi 'jigs pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[45a.5\]]srung gi mthu yin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bdag cag gis rin po che phul ba dag slar blangs te 'dong ba ni mi rigs so/_/zhes de rnams kyis gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_gang yang bdag cag gis yang dag par 
[\[45a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gal te bdag cag lha rnams su skyes par gyur na bdag cag mthu che ba kho nar gyur cig_/gal te mi'i nang du mi rnams su skyes par gyur na mthu che ba dang mi rnams 
[\[45a.7\]]su skyes na yang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dper rung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni lits+tsha bI lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]bye ma'i mchod rten byas shing rin po che dag gi mchod pa byas pas des na mi mthu chen po rnams su skyes par gyur te/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yang dper rung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig 
[\[45b.2\]]tu gnag pa yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gang yang las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spongs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar 
[\[45b.3\]]bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yangs pa can gyi grong khyer du song la sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dang /_tshigs 
[\[45b.4\]]su bcad pa 'di smros shig_/bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_dgra bcom pa thams 
[\[45b.5\]]cad kyis bsams pa/_slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bden pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsams pa/_chos rnams kyis bsams pa/_'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/_tshangs pas bsams pa/_tshangs pa 
[\[45b.6\]]so sos bsams pa/_dbang pos bsams pa/_lhas bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/_lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi 
[\[45b.7\]]sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/mun tsa ta/_mun tsa ta/_ma 'dug shig yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig_/nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]lha'i bla ma gshegs te/_dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 
[\[46a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug 
[\[46a.3\]]ste/_de dag gis khyed rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_myur du byer cig_/khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni brlag par gyur cig_/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan 
[\[46a.4\]]zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar byed par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig_/dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/su mu su mu/_su mu su mu/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_
[\[46a.5\]]mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri ti/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_rI rI rI rI 
[\[46a.6\]]rI rI ti/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri ti/_ha si/_mi ri mi rI hI/_mi rI mi rI sI sI mi/_kang ka ra/_kang ka ra ta kang ka ra/_kang ka ra ka tshA/_kang ka rA kang ka rA/_kang ka rA kang ka rA/_kang ka rA kang ka rA/_kang ka rA kang ka rA/_kang ka rA kang ka rA ti/_ku rI she/_kang ka rI she/_kang ka rI she/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_
[\[46a.7\]]re phA sA ri ri pu ri pu ri pu ri pu ri pu ri pu ri pu/_nA thA na thA thA/_ri pu ri pu nA thA thA nir gats+tsha ta/_ri pu ri pu nir gats+tsha ta/_pa la yA ta/_ri pu ri pu pa la yA ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/_sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa/_byams pa la gnas 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]pa/_thugs rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/_lha thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi bla ma sangs rgyas kyis chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig grub pa grub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang gi srid 
[\[46b.2\]]pa 'chags pa dag_/rnam par bcom nas bral mdzad pa/_/thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/_/khyed la bde 
[\[46b.3\]]legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du 
[\[46b.4\]]rtag bskyangs de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa/_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing 
[\[46b.5\]]slu ba mi mnga' ba/_/gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/_/phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[46b.6\]]zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang /_/nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas/_/sems can thams cad rab dga' de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/_/sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing /_/bdud yid mi bder 
[\[46b.7\]]gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/'phags pa'i bden pa gsung ba gang /_/thub pa grags pa 'byung ba de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang gis chos kyi yid 'phrog pas/_/mu stegs 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]byed rnams pham mdzad la/_/tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/_/brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang /_/'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/_/khyed la dus 
[\[47a.2\]]kun sbyin gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/_/khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/_/don de de ring grub gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/khyed 
[\[47a.3\]]cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog_/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la gnas par shog_/khyed cag kun du bde legs shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/_/yongs 
[\[47a.4\]]su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/_/'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/_/grong khyer 'di ni 
[\[47a.5\]]gtong gyur cig_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/_/bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad ni med gyur cig_/kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 
[\[47a.6\]]'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/ces brjod cig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[47a.7\]]kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa can du song ste grong khyer gyi them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bden pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis 
[\[47b.2\]]bsams pa/_chos rnams kyis bsams pa/_'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/_tshangs pas bsams pa/_tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/_dbang pos bsams pa/_lhas bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/_lha ma yin thams cad 
[\[47b.3\]]kyis bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/mun tsa ta mun tsa ta ma 'dug shig_/
[\[47b.4\]]yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig_/nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha lha'i bla ma gshegs te dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_dbang bdag 
[\[47b.5\]]dang bcas pa rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[47b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/_de dag gis khyed rnams la gnod par byed par 'gyur gyis/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_myur du byer cig_/
[\[47b.7\]]khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni brlag par gyur cig_/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung ba byed par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig_/dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/su mu su mu/_su mu su mu/_su mu ru su mu ru/_su mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru 
[\[48a.2\]]mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri ti/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri ti/_ha si/_mi ri mi ri ti/_mi ri mi ri/_si si mi/_kang ka ra kang ka ra tA/_kang ka ra kang ka ra 
[\[48a.3\]]ka tsA kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA/_kang ka rA ti/_ku rI she/_kang ka rI she/_kang ka rI she/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_re phA sA ri/_ri pu ri pu/_ri pu ri pu/_ri pu ri pu ri pu/_nA thAn thA thA/_ri pu ri pun thA thA/_nir gats+tsha ta/_
[\[48a.4\]]nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_nir gats+tsha ta/_pa lA ya tha/_ri pu ri pu pA lA ya tha/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/_sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa/_byams pa la gnas pa/_thugs rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms la 
[\[48a.5\]]gnas pa gshegs te/_lha thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi bla ma sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig grub pa grub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang gi sred pa'i chags pa dag_/rnam par bcom nas 'dul mdzad 
[\[48a.6\]]pa/_/thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/_/
[\[48a.7\]]sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa/_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' ba/_/gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa de/_/khyed 
[\[48b.2\]]la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/_/phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang /_/nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos 
[\[48b.3\]]nas/_/sems can thams cad rab dga' de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/_/sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing /_/bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 
[\[48b.4\]]'khor lo bskor ba na/_/'phags pa'i bden pa gsung ba gang /_/thub pa grags pa 'byung ba de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang gis chos kyi yid 'phrog pas/_/mu stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la/_/tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/_/
[\[48b.5\]]khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/_/brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang /_/'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/_/khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams kyis ni bsams 
[\[48b.6\]]pa yis/_/khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/_/don de de ring grub gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog_/nyin mo bde legs 
[\[48b.7\]]mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la gnas par shog_/khyed cag kun du bde legs shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig_/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/_/'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/_/grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/
[\[49a.2\]]'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/_/bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad ni med gyur cig_/kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas 
[\[49a.3\]]pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/ces brjod pa dang /_der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus mi ngas zhi bar gyur to//_//sdom la/_'od 
[\[49a.4\]]ma dang ni dbus kyi grong /_/mi thi la dang lus 'phags dang /_/sA la khron pa ngan spong bu/_/ngur smrig gtsug phud bsngags ldan dang /_/gnag lhas dang ni sdig can dang /_/ku sha'i grong khyer tha ma yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' 
[\[49a.5\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'od ma can gyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang 'od ma can gyi grong du byon nas/_'od 
[\[49a.6\]]ma can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi grong shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'dir mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa 
[\[49a.7\]]slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung gis/_dge slong dag tshur khyed las smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang /_gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang /_'grogs bshes ji lta bu yod pa de dag ni yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor gyi spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam chos shig_/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]nga yang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang /_'od ma can gyi grong 'di nyid du dbyar bzhugs par dam bcas na thams cad bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur grang /_btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan 
[\[49b.2\]]nas smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang /_gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang /_'grogs bshes ji lta bu yod pa dag ni yangs pa can gyi nyen kor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang /_
[\[49b.3\]]'od ma can gyi grong khyer de nyid du dbyar bzhugs par dam bcas so/_/dbyar gyi gnas der bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pa grongs la thug pa zhig gis thebs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag nad tshabs chen po 
[\[49b.4\]]mi bzad pa drag pa shi la thug pas thebs la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na/_bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis 
[\[49b.5\]]bcil la/_mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa la lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o/_/snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas/_mtshan 
[\[49b.6\]]ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad pas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du mdzad de bsgrubs nas bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lhag par spyod pa dang lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog 
[\[49b.7\]]las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' [(]bas [,]bos [)]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pa grongs la thug pas thebs par glo bar chud nas bdag gi lus dug 'tshal ba bzhin du phyogs kyang bslad/_bdag gis thos pa'i chos rnams kyang bskyud par gyur lags te/_de la bdag glo ba 
[\[50a.2\]]re bar na re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi slad du zhal chems cung zad bka' ma stsal gyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o snyam du bgyid do/_/kun dga' bo gang zhig 'di snyam du dge slong gi dge 'dun ni bdag yin te/_bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[50a.3\]]bstan par bya'o/_/bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du sems pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir kha chems cung zad smra bar 'gyur ba nyid na/_kun dga' bo nga la 'di snyam du dge slong gi dge 'dun ni nga'i yin te/_ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[50a.4\]]ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du dgongs pa mi mnga' na/_ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir zhal chems kho na cung zad bstan du ci yod/_gzhan yang kun dga' bo nga la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rag lus pa ci zhig yod/_kun dga' bo ngas rtag tu goms par bya 
[\[50a.5\]]ba'i chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /[ (]'phag [,]'phags [)]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bshad 
[\[50a.6\]]zin to//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gang zhig gzhan dag gis shes na mi rung bas de bzhin gshegs pas bcab bo snyam du dgongs pa'i slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi mnga'o/_/kun dga' 
[\[50a.7\]]bo 'on kyang gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa snyun tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pos grongs la thug pas thebs pa de la nga 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag nad tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pa shi la thug pas thebs la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]na dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na/_bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil la/_mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa la lus 
[\[50b.2\]]kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o snyam nas ngas tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad par sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du bsgrubs nas bzhugs te/_des na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[50b.3\]]pa lhag par spyod pa dang ldan zhing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang kun dga' bo da ni de bzhin gshegs pa na tshod lo brgyad bcu lon pas sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te/_rnam pa gnyis la brten nas 'tsho'o/_/dper na shing rta rnying pa rnam pa gnyis 
[\[50b.4\]]la brten nas brtan pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang na tshod lo brgyad bcu lon pas sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te/_rnam pa gnyis la brten nas 'tsho'o/_/de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig_/nyon mongs par ma byed cig_/smre sngags 
[\[50b.5\]]ma 'don cig_/skye ba dang /_byung ba dang /_byas pa dang /_'dus byas pa dang /_bsags pa gang yin pa de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par 'gyes pa'i chos can de la mi 'jig pa de lta bu lta ga la rnyed de/_de ni gnas med do/_/kun dga' bo gang yang ngas khyod 
[\[50b.6\]]la sdug pa dang /_phangs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang 'bral ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_'gyes pa dang /_mi ldan par 'gyur bar snga nas bshad zin to/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas nad lta'am/_nga 'das kyang rung /_bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag 
[\[50b.7\]]nyid skyabs dang /_chos kyi gling dang /_chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo da lta'am/_nga 'das kyang rung gang su dag bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos kyi gling dang chos 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]kyi skyabs kyis gnas par byed kyi/_gling gzhan dang /_skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/_nga'i nyan thos bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/_/kun dga' bo ji ltar na dge slong gis bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs 
[\[51a.2\]]dang /_chos kyi gling dang /_chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/_gling gzhan dang /_skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten 
[\[51a.3\]]la gnod sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/_/nang gi lus dang /_phyi'i lus dang /_nang dang phyi'i lus dang /_nang gi tshor ba rnams dang /_phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /_nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /_nang gi sems dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_nang dang 
[\[51a.4\]]phyi'i sems dang /_nang gi chos rnams dang /_phyi'i chos rnams dang /_nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang /_yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/_kun 
[\[51a.5\]]dga' bo dge slong 'di lta bu ni bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos kyi gling dang /_chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas kyi/_gling gzhan dang /_skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal 
[\[51a.6\]]pa/_kun dga' bo dbus kyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs 
[\[51a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag 'byung zhing kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/gang dag 'og tu song ba de dag ni yang sos dang /_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]thig nag dang /_sdud 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol ba dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_a cu zer ba dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad+ma ltar gas 
[\[51b.2\]]pa dang /_pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni bsil bar 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni dro bar 'bab bo/_/des sems can de rnams kyi 
[\[51b.3\]]gnod pa'i khyad par dag so sor bcil lo/_/de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam pa dang /_de rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo /_/de rnams 
[\[51b.4\]]kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang med la/_gzhan du skyes pa med mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so sor bcil lo/_/
[\[51b.5\]]zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung ngo /_/gang dag steng du song ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris 
[\[51b.6\]]dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung 
[\[51b.7\]]dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis kyang bsgrags so/_/brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom 
[\[52a.2\]]par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas/_/chos 'dul 'di la brtson gyur na/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 
[\[52a.3\]]'das kyi rjes bzhin du 'gro'o/_/de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/dmyal bar skye bar 
[\[52a.4\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par nub par 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs 
[\[52a.5\]]kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye bar lung ston 
[\[52a.6\]]par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal gyi nang du nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 
[\[52a.7\]]bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa/_kha dog 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur pa/_/ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyis/_/yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsol to/_/rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa 
[\[52b.2\]]yis/_/sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis pa/_/rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog_/nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa 
[\[52b.3\]]po rnams kyi/_/the tsom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu'i ri bo lta bur brtan pa'i mchog_/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pa ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo phal chen 'di dag 
[\[52b.4\]]de nyan 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis sa 
[\[52b.5\]]phyogs 'di mthong ngam/_btsun pa 'di mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsum bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos myur ba myur bar bla gos bzhi ltab tu byas te bting nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[52b.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa kho na la bzhugs shig dang /_sa phyogs 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhis yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/skad 
[\[52b.7\]]cig gcig bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo grong khyer mi thi la gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags kyi ljongs 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mi thi lar byon nas/_mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong 
[\[53a.2\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i rgyu 
[\[53a.3\]]gang lags rkyen gang lags/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 
[\[53a.4\]]gyur te/_mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling 'di 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi bar bya gag gi 'phur stabs kyis chod pa byung bar 
[\[53a.5\]]gyur to/_/mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams la lus kyi gnod pa ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/_'di lta ste grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_rga ba yin no/_/mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi bu mo ni btsas nas lo lnga brgya lon 
[\[53a.6\]]pa dang khyo la gtong bar byed de/_dper na da ltar gyi lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'am lo bcu drug lon pa bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun 
[\[53a.7\]]dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag byung ste/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che nyid yin 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]no/_/de la yang bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar byung ste/_de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba 
[\[53b.2\]]med la/_chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas so/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'breg mkhan gyi mis skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na 'breg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/_kye nang rje nga'i dbu la skra dkar po skyes pa khyod kyis mthong dang lha'i pho nya byung ba 
[\[53b.3\]]yin gyis de'i tshe nga'i snyan du gsol cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'breg mkhan gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan to/_/dus gzhan zhig na 'breg mkhan gyis rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na rgyal po lha chen po'i mgo la skra dkar po skyes pas lha'i 
[\[53b.4\]]pho nya byung bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rgyal po lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_khyod kyi dbu la dbu skra dkar po skyes pas lha'i pho nya byung lags so/_/des smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod kyis skra dkar po de dag mi breg par dal bu 
[\[53b.5\]]dal bus phyung la nga'i lag tu byin cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'breg mkhan gyis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan nas skra dkar po de gser gyi smang tsher gyis mi drag par dal gyis dal gyis phyung nas rgyal po lha chen po'i lag par bzhag go/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos skra dkar 
[\[53b.6\]]po de lag pa gnyis kyis drangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_da ni bdag gi mgo bo la/_/na tshod 'joms pa'i skra skyes te/_/lha yi pho nya byung gyur pas/_/bdag gi rab byung dus la bab/_/bdag gis mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni spyad zin gyis bdag gis lha'i 'dod pa dag 
[\[53b.7\]]btsal ba'i dus la bab kyis/_ma la bdag gis gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug la rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyad do snyam nas/_de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu gzhon nu shes par gyis shig_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]nga'i mgo la skra dkar po skyes pas lha'i pho nya byung bar gyur te/_ngas mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni spyad zin pas ngas lha'i 'dod pa dag btsal ba'i dus la bab ste/_ngas bu gzhon nu khyod la rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po 'di gtad kyis de khyod kyis chos 
[\[54a.2\]]bzhin gyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/_/'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam 'dren mar spyod na khyod kyis yul 'khor du gnas su ma gzhug shig_/bu gzhon nu gang gi tshe khyod kyang mgo la skra dkar po skyes pa mthong ba dang lha'i pho nya 'ongs pa yin 
[\[54a.3\]]gyis/_de'i tshe khyod kyis kyang gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du chug la rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig_/'di ltar bu gzhon nu khyod kyi dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes bsab par bya'i rgyun chad par ma byed cig_/skyes bu tha shal du 
[\[54a.4\]]gyur ta re/_bu gzhon nu 'ga' zhig 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang po rgyud du byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tshob pa gang yin pa de de rnams kyi rgyun gcod pa yin zhing de de rnams kyi nang na skyes bu tha shal du gyur pa yin no/_/de lta bas na da khyod la 'di skad 
[\[54a.5\]]ces/_gang gi tshe khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang po rgyud du byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes sobs la rgyun chad par ma byed cig_/skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang 
[\[54a.6\]]phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal de nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo gang yin pa de rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug pa de'i ming yang 'khor los sgyur 
[\[54a.7\]]ba'i rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'breg mkhan gyi mis skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na zhes bya ba nas/_de de rnams kyi nang na skyes bu tha shal du gyur 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/kun dga' bo bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha la sogs pa 
[\[54b.2\]]de ltar brgyud pas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/de rnams kyi tha ma rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po zhig byung ste/_
[\[54b.3\]]de btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dag dang chos spyod de sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed cing bsnyen gnas la gnas te tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug go/_/de'i tshe lha'i dbang po 
[\[54b.4\]]brgya byin lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyi mdun du bsngags pa rjod par byed de/_grogs po dag lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/_lus 'phags kyi mi de rnams kyi rgyal po mu khyud ni 
[\[54b.5\]]chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po de btsun mo dang zhes bya ba nas tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/grogs po dag khyed cag rgyal po mu khyud lta bar 'dod dam/_kau shi ka shin tu 'tshal 
[\[54b.6\]]lo/_/grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed cag sdod cig dang kho bos re zhig rgyal po mu khyud blta'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 
[\[54b.7\]]rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang nas mi snang bar gyur te/_mi thi lar rgyal po mu khyud kyi khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'dug go/_/'di skad ces kyang smras te/_mu khyud khyod la lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dus shing 'dug pa rnams bsngags pa rjod pa ni khyod 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/grogs po lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyis rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/mu khyud khyod sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i 
[\[55a.2\]]phyir 'gro 'dod dam/_kau shi ka bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/mu khyud de'i phyir sdod cig dang re zhig kho bos khyod la rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bskur gyis de'i nang du khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog shig_/de bzhin du 
[\[55a.3\]]bgyi'o zhes rgyal po mu khyud kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdu la smras pa/_ma la gdu khyod song la myur ba kho nar rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta shoms te 
[\[55a.4\]]rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song la phyin nas 'di skad ces/_mu khyud khyod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyis/_'dir khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog shig ces smros shig_/kau shi ka khyod kyis gsungs pa shin 
[\[55a.5\]]tu bzang ngo zhes kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan nas myur ba kho nar rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bshams nas rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so/_/mu khyud khyod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rta cang 
[\[55a.6\]]shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyis/_'dir khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog shig ces zer ro/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po mu khyud rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i nang du mi g.yo bar zhugs pa dang /_de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus rgyal po 
[\[55a.7\]]mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mu khyud khyod kyi shing rta gang logs su drang /_gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba logs su'am/_gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba logs su drang /_ma la gdu de'i phyir kho bos gang du gnyi ga mthong bar 'gyur ba gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa dang /_gang na 
[\[55b.2\]]sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa der shing rta drongs shig_/de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus rgyal po mu khyud kyi shing rta rgyal po mu khyud kyis gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi 
[\[55b.3\]]dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa dang /_gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa gnyi ga rgyal po mu khyud kyis ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar drangs so/_/kun 
[\[55b.4\]]dga' bo rgyal po mu khyud sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas rgyal po mu khyud lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du zhugs pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la stan phyed bstabs nas rgyal po mu khyud dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyed la 'khod do/_/
[\[55b.5\]]kun dga' bo rgyal po mu khyud dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyed la 'khod pa na khyad par ram bsam pa'am tha dad du bya ba med kyi/_gzhan du na lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni mig 'dzums par mi byed do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[55b.6\]]so/_/mu khyud 'di nyid du 'dug la mu khyud khyod dga' bar spyod cig_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pa la rtsed mo byos shig_/dga' bar spyod cig_/dga' mgur spyod cig_/de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar snod dang 
[\[55b.7\]]shing rta dag_/re zhig dus kyi brnyan po ltar/_/gzhan dag dbang sgyur gang yin pa'i/_/gnas kyang de dang 'dra ba yin/_/'di nas mi thi lar song la/_/dge ba mang po rnams bya ste/_/bsod nams byas shing 'byor byas nas/_/mtho ris su ni 'gro bar bya/_/kun 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba gang gis dge ba'i lam nges pa de la zhugs shing /_gang dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa la brten nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong 
[\[56a.2\]]gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa byung ba gang yin pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya bar gyur te/_nga nyid kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa de srol btod cing dge 
[\[56a.3\]]ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa la brten nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi thi la 'di nyid na lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo de'i tshe nga 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug 
[\[56a.4\]]dang bcas par gyur te/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol lo zhes gsung ngo /_/kun dga' bo da 
[\[56a.5\]]ni nga 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[56a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byung nas 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral bas skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su 
[\[56a.7\]]grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su grol lo zhes gsung ngo /_/kun dga' bo da ltar na yang ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa srol btod pa de la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_sems can rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs shing dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa de la 
[\[56b.2\]]brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can nas sems can 'khrug pa'i chos can gyi bar dag 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de gang yin zhe na 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_
[\[56b.3\]]yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_'di ni ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs/_dge ba'i 
[\[56b.4\]]lam nges pa la zhugs pa de la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can nas gong ma bzhin du 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i bar yin no/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes bsab par bya'i rgyun 
[\[56b.5\]]chad par ma byed cig_/skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig_/kun dga' bo gang la la de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyud du byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tshob pa de ni de rnams kyi rgyun gcod pa yin zhing /_de de rnams kyi skyes bu tha shal du gyur 
[\[56b.6\]]pa yin no/_/de bas na nga khyod la 'di skad du ci nas kyang khyod kyis de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyud du byung ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu de'i rjes sobs shig_/rgyun chad par ma byed cig_/skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[56b.7\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lus 'phags gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags su byon nas lus 'phags 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]kyi phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan yin no zhes bya ba dang /_skad cig gcig bzhugs nas zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sa la gang na bar 
[\[57a.2\]]'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang sa lar byon nas sa la'i bram ze'i grong na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' 
[\[57a.3\]]sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di sa la'i bram ze'i grong na 'dug ste/_de snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos 
[\[57a.4\]]thogs te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs kyis/_ma la bdag gis sa la'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ji ltar dge sbyong gau ta mas ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa bkrus pa de kho na bzhin bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed par phyir ldog 
[\[57a.5\]]pa de lta de ltar byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis sa la'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed par 
[\[57a.6\]]slar byon pa de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/dge sbyong dge sbyong bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed dam/_
[\[57a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma nye bar 'ongs pa 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/_'di lta ste rnam par dkrug pa'i las byed do snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs la khyad bsad pas/_/khyod kyis 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bsod nams min mang bsags/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni brgal dka' bar/_/sdig can ci ga mi shes sam/_/dge sbyong de'i phyir slar yangs lar bsod snyoms la bzhud cig dang ci nas kyang bsod snyoms rnyed pa de ltar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[57b.2\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga la ci yang mi bdog pa/_/kye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste/_/'od gsal lha rnams ji lta bar/_/dga' ba yi ni zas bza'o/_/nga la ci yang mi bdog pa/_/kye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste/_/'jig tshogs lta la mi 
[\[57b.3\]]rten pas/_/dga' ba yi ni zas bza'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis bdag gi bsam pa shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[57b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khron pa can gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khron pa can du byon 
[\[57b.5\]]to/_/khron pa can na bud med gzhan zhig phyang thag dang chu dang chu snod khyer te khron pa'i drung du song ba dang /_skyes pa gzhan zhig de la chags pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba dang /_de yang lhag par de la chags pas de gnyis phan 
[\[57b.6\]]tshun du 'tham zhing khron par dong ngo /_/de'i bu khye'u chung ngu ma zhig de dang lhan cig phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ngo /_/de nas de skyes pa la rtog cing chu snod gtang ngo snyam ste/_khye'u chung ngu de'i mgul nas thag pas btags te btang ba las shi bar gyur to/_/des sngon ma thos pa'i 
[\[57b.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa thos pa/_'dod pa khyod rtsa ngas shes te/_/rtog pa las ni 'dod pa skye/_/khyod la rtog pa ma byas dang /_/de nas nga la mi 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyang lam de nas gshegs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo tshigs su bcad pa 'di zung shig_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin te/_'di ni so so'i skye bo'i lag tu 'ongs pas mi snang mi gsal/_rnam par mi gsal 
[\[58a.2\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas ji ltar sems 'di myur du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ni gcig kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bud med de bu'i mya ngan gyis gdung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 
[\[58a.3\]]bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas bud med des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_
[\[58a.4\]]bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa bdag la 'di lta bu ni mas ma bgyis te/_phas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams 
[\[58a.5\]]kyis ma lags/_sdug pas ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/_bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkum/_mtho ris 
[\[58a.6\]]dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]nas ni rkang pa drangs/_lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bzhag_/'khor ba las ni thag bsrings/_/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_
[\[58a.7\]]thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ni ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[58b.2\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na phyogs 'di nyid du drang srong ngan spong gi bus gdan dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu la spyan drangs so/_/phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga byang chub sems dpar gyur 
[\[58b.3\]]pa na rga ba la sogs pas yid byung ste/_phyogs 'di nyid du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rngon pa'i cha byad du byas pa la ka shi ka'i ras phran byin nas gos ngur smrig blangs pa yin te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis ngur smrig blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_
[\[58b.4\]]da dung du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ka shi ka'i ras phran sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzhag nas ka shi ka'i dus mchod chen po btsugs te/_da dung du yang de la sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 
[\[58b.5\]]dag bya ba byed do/_/phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na phyogs 'dir ral gri ut+pa la sngon po 'dra bas dbu skra bregs nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs pa yin te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa 
[\[58b.6\]]can rnams kyis dbu skra blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_da dung du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang dbu skra sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzhag nas gtsug phud kyi dus mchod chen po 
[\[58b.7\]]btsugs te/_da dung du yang de la sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bya ba byed do/_/phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan 'dun pas bkri nas slar btang ba yin te/_bram ze dang 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis bsngags ldan slar btang ba zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_da dung du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul gnag lhas can du byon nas de nas bcom ldan 
[\[59a.2\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gnag lhas can 'dir rigs kyi bu 'dun pa btsas nas 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sdig can du byon te/_sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das sdig can du 
[\[59a.3\]]gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu gang yin pa de dag gis ni lam bzang por byos shig_/bdag cag gis ni grong khyer bzang por bya'o/_/de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis lam bzang por bya bar 
[\[59a.4\]]brtsams pa na/_de rnams kyis pha bong zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de dor bar brtsams pa las dor bar ma nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs de nyid du gshegs nas bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'jog dag 'di ci bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du shul 
[\[59a.5\]]bzang por bgyi lags na pha bong 'di dor bar rngo ma thog go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te de lta na ngas dor ram/_bcom ldan 'das dor du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos pha bong steng gi nam mkha' la 
[\[59a.6\]]'phangs te mig rgyang gis kyang mi sod par bor ba dang de'i sgras gyad rnams sngangs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'jog dag ma 'jigs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis pha bong de phye mar brlags nas rdul 
[\[59a.7\]]'bab par brtsams so/_/gyad rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdul ga las 'bab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas pha bong de phye mar brlags pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das la legs pa zhig bgyis so/_/
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ci slar mtshams sbyar ram/_bcom ldan 'das slar mtshams sbyar du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mos pa'i stobs kyis slar sbyar nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid na bzhugs so/_/gyad lnga brgya po de dag kyang de nyid du 
[\[59b.2\]]tshogs nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis pha bong de stobs gang gis 'phangs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'jog dag yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis so/_/de rnams kyis gsol pa/_stobs gang 
[\[59b.3\]]gis phye mar brlags lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis so/_/gang gis slar mtshams sbyar lags/_mos pa'i stobs kyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs kyi tshad ji tsam lags/_gnas 
[\[59b.4\]]'jog dag mi bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang phal pa gcig gi yin no/_/glang phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni ba men sngon po gcig gi yin no/_/ba men sngon po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che phru gu gcig gi yin no/_/glang po che phru gu bcu'i gang yin pa 
[\[59b.5\]]de ni glang po che mo gcig gi yin no/_/glang po che mo bcu'i gang yin pa de ni glang po che phal gcig gi yin no/_/glang po che phal bcu'i gang yin pa de ni glang po che mche ba med gcig gi yin no/_/glang po che mche ba med bcu'i gang yin pa de ni sngon po gcig gi yin no/_/sngon 
[\[59b.6\]]po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni ser po gcig gi yin no/_/ser po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni dmar po gcig gi yin no/_/dmar po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni dkar po gcig gi yin no/_/dkar po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni 'bigs byed kyi glang po che gcig gi yin no/_/'bigs 
[\[59b.7\]]byed kyi glang po che bcu'i gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che gcig gi yin no/_/spos kyi glang po che bcu'i gang yin pa de ni tshan po che gcig gi yin no/_/tshan po che bcu'i gang yin pa de ni tshan po che chen po gcig gi yin no/_/tshan po che chen po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni rab gnon 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]gcig gi yin no/_/rab gnon bcu'i gang yin pa de ni stobs mchog gcig gi yin no/_/stobs mchog bcu'i gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed do/_/sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed gnyis gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs yin te/_
[\[60a.2\]]de de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshigs dang tshigs phran dag na yod pas gnas 'jog dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi tshogs can yin no//_//bar sdom la/_mi dang glang dang ba men dang ni de bzhin 
[\[60a.3\]]glang chen phru gu dang /_/glang chen mo dang phal dang mche ba med dang de bzhin bzhi tshan dang /_/'bigs byed glang chen spos kyi glang chen dang ni tshan po che gnyis dang /_/rab gnon dang ni stobs mchog dag dang sred med bu yi stobs gnyis so/_/sred med kyi bu'i stobs gang lags 
[\[60a.4\]]pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs lags na/_btsun pa yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_mos pa'i stobs las stobs gzhan mchis lags sam/_gnas 'jog dag yod de/_'di lta ste bsod nams 
[\[60a.5\]]kyi stobs zhes bya ba yin te/_gnas 'jog dag bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'khor 'byung po bye ba sum bcu rtsa drug can bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/_/btsun pa yab dang yum las byung ba'i 
[\[60a.6\]]stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_mos pa'i stobs dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs 'di bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lags sam/_gnas 'jog dag yod de/_'di lta ste ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba yin te/_ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan 
[\[60a.7\]]pas de bzhin gshegs pas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs bor spangs bsal te so sor spangs so/_/btsun pa yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_mos pa'i stobs dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]dang /_ye shes kyi stobs 'di bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lags sam/_gnas 'jog dag yod de/_'di lta ste rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zhes bya ba yin te/_gnas 'jog dag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas 'od srung rdzogs 
[\[60b.2\]]byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams cad mkhyen par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa dag spobs pa med par byas so/_/btsun pa 'di ltar yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_mos pa'i stobs 
[\[60b.3\]]dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_ye shes kyi stobs dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lags sam/_gnas 'jog dag yod de/_'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i stobs zhes bya ba yin te/_gnas 'jog dag mi 
[\[60b.4\]]rtag pa'i stobs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs gang yin pa dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs gang yin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs gang yin pa dang /_mos pa'i stobs gang yin pa dang /_ye shes kyi stobs gang 
[\[60b.5\]]yin pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs gang yin pa de dag thams cad shing sA la zung gi bar du gzi med par 'gyur ro/_/tshigs su bcad de yang bka' stsal pa/_ye shes stobs dang bsod nams stobs dang ni/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs dang sku yi stobs pas kyang /_/nga yi 
[\[60b.6\]]gzi brjid 'joms par byed pa yi/_/mi rtag nyid ni ches stobs ldan par 'dod/_/gang du gser gyi ri dbang rtse mo lta bur 'dug pa'i sku/_/'di 'dra mi rtag nyid kyi gzi yis bcom nas 'jig 'gyur ba/_/mi rtag shin tu stobs dang ldan par mkhas pas shes bya ste/_/gang 
[\[60b.7\]]du mi rtag nyid kyis rdzi ba med pa de thob bya//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu pa/_gnas 'jog dag da ltar gyi mi rnams tshe dang /_kha dog dang /_stobs dang /_longs spyod kyi bar dag nyams pa la ltos/_rdo 'di ni bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi bang 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]tshad kyi rdo yin te/_'di la lag rjes kyang snang ngo /_/de rnams shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas de rnams kyi stobs kyi dregs pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams 
[\[61a.2\]]dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_
[\[61a.3\]]de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la mas ma bgyis te/_phas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/_dge sbyong dang 
[\[61a.4\]]bram zes ma lags/_sdug pas ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa bdag cag la mdzad de/_bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi 
[\[61a.5\]]dgas rnams kyi gnas nas ni rkang pa drangs/_lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bkod/_'khor ba las ni ring du mdzad/_thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon 
[\[61a.6\]]sum du bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/de lta bas na bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng 
[\[61a.7\]]slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ku sha'i grong khyer gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sdig can du ma bzhud par ku sha'i grong khyer gang na bar rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang ku sha'i grong khyer du byon nas/_de nas 
[\[61b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ku sha'i grong khyer 'dir shing sA la zung gi bar du ring po mi thogs pa kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_ste'u dang 
[\[61b.3\]]lhas bltas lum bi ni/_/ser skya dang ni shing 'da' dang /_/gser thub zhing pa chos gos dang /_/khrus dang bya can bcu tshogs yin/_/bcom ldan 'das sgra ngan na sgra ngan rnams kyi grong rdal khra bo 'dul na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[61b.4\]]slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas zag pa zad pa shes shing mthong nas gsungs te/_rgyas par yang dag par ldan pa'i lung las phung po'i le'u las ste'u lta bu'i mdo 'byung ba yin no/_/lhas bltas su byon nas der tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[61b.5\]]bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo lhas bltas 'dir shAkya shin tu blo gsal btsas te 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/_/lum bi nir gshegs nas de na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lum bi ni'i tshal 'di rang btsas nas 
[\[61b.6\]]ring po ma lon zhing sus kyang ma blangs par gom pa bdun bor nas ngas phyogs bzhir bltas te nga'i srid pa'i skye ba'i mtha' ni 'di yin no zhes tshig tu smras so/_/ser skye'i gnas su byon nas der tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ser skya'i 
[\[61b.7\]]gnas 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang btsas te 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/_/shing bal gyi 'da' ba can du byon nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor bshad kyis de legs 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/chos ma yin pa'i 'khor gang zhe na/_'khor gang zhig 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba ste/_'di ni chos ma yin pa'i 'khor zhes bya'o/_/
[\[62a.2\]]chos kyi 'khor gang zhe na/_'khor gang zhig 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis ma yin/_gti mug gis ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa ste/_'di ni chos kyi 'khor ces bya'o/_/dge slong dag ngas khyed la chos ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[62a.3\]]'khor ngas bshad do zhes gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no/_/mtshams can gyi grong du byon nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mtshams can gyi grong 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[62a.4\]]gser thub bltams te/_'di nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/zhing pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na zhing pa'i grong 'dir yab zas 
[\[62a.5\]]gtsang gi las kyi mtha' rnams la bltas nas shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/phyogs gzhan zhig na yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[62a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyi na bza' chos gos brkyang ba yin no/_/khrus kyi grong du byon nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khrus kyi grong 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis 
[\[62a.7\]]khrus mdzad pas de bas na 'di'i ming khrus kyi grong khrus kyi grong zhes bya bar grags so/_/bye ma can du byon nas bye ma can du shing 'dzeg gi shing lta bu'i mdo'i lam gyi tshogs rgyas par bsdus so//_//sdom la/_'dod pa mthun dang shas che dang /_/lo ma bdun dang 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]'char ka dang /_/mnyan yod gdu bu sa can dang /_/seng ge'i grong dang grong gsar dang /_/grong khyer dang ni khre'u brtsegs/_/phyi ma n+ya gro d+ha grong ste/_/grong khyer de dag bcu gnyis gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod 
[\[62b.2\]]na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed kyis/_nga la bsod snyoms stobs pa dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i gso sbyong de nyid ma gtogs par dge slong su yang ma 
[\[62b.3\]]'ong shig_/bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum po de la nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas bsod snyoms stobs pa'i dge slong dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i gso sbyong de nyid ma gtogs par dge slong su yang der mi 'gro'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po de kho na 'das 
[\[62b.4\]]nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed la gal te gzhan mu stegs can dang kun du rgyu rnams nye bar lhags nas 'di skad ces 'dri ste/_
[\[62b.5\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma gnas pa gang zhig gis zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag bzhag par gyur ces 'dri na/_de skad ces dris pa la dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung bas bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag nga ni zla ba gsum po 'di la dbugs 
[\[62b.6\]]rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dran pa'i gnas pas nang du yang dag bzhag ste/_ngas dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na yang dran bzhin du brngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dran bzhin du dbugs phyung na yang dran bzhin du dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag 
[\[62b.7\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ring po dang thung ngu dang /_lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs brngubs na lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs brngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lus thams cad yang dag par myong 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]nas dbugs phyung na yang lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs brngubs pa dang /_lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung na 
[\[63a.2\]]yang dbugs phyung ngo dbugs brngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas/_'gog par rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag de la nga 'di snyam du 
[\[63a.3\]]sems te/_bdag gis gnas pa rags pa mngon par 'dus byas shing bsams kyis ma la bdag gis gnas pa de nyid las yang dag par 'das te bor nas ches phra ba 'dis lan mang du gnas par bya'o snyam nas/_ngas gnas pa de nyid las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i 
[\[63a.4\]]phyir bor nas gnas pa ches phra ba 'dis lan mang du gnas so/_/de nas lha gsum zhig nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas lha gcig ni 'di skad ces/_dge sbyong gau ta ma nongs so zhes zer ro/_/gnyis pa ni 'di skad ces 'di nongs pa ni ma yin te/_'on kyang nongs par 
[\[63a.5\]]mdzad pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/lha gsum pa ni 'di skad ces nongs pa yang ma yin nongs par mdzad pa yang ma yin te/_'on kyang dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnas pa ni 'di lta bur zhi ba kho na yin no zhes zer ro/_/dge slong dag gang yang dag par smra ba na 'phags pa'i 
[\[63a.6\]]gnas pa dang /_lha'i gnas pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang /_mi slob pa'i gnas pa zhes bya bar smra bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yin te/_slob pa'i gang zag rnams ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par 
[\[63a.7\]]bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin/_mi slob pa'i gang zag rnams mthong ba'i chos kho na la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/de yang dag par smra ba na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i dran 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]pas gnas pa smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba dran pas gnas pa ni 'phags pa'i gnas pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_mi slob pa rnams mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no zhes 
[\[63b.2\]]bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'dod pa mthun par byon nas/_'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bram ze pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba la ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[63b.3\]]gsal rgyal gyis dpya rgyu rtswa dang /_shing dang /_chur bcas par bram ze'i sbyin gtong du byin nas shas chen po rgyas pa la longs spyod do/_/bram ze pad ma'i snying po'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug ces bya ba mang du thos pa/_tshig gsal ba/_thags thogs med par smra 
[\[63b.4\]]ba zhig yod de/_bram ze pad ma'i snying po'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go/_/bram ze pad ma'i snying pos dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim 
[\[63b.5\]]nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes ldan gau ta ma de'i dge ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 
[\[63b.6\]]grags te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi 
[\[63b.7\]]rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas/_lha dang mi'i skye dgu dang bcas pa 'di la mthong ba'i chos kho na la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pas mngon 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]sum du byas te bsgrubs nas ni nga'i zag pa zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/_/zhes go bar byed pa de gsang tshig las kyang 'byung ste/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag 
[\[64a.2\]]dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba ni gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gyur te/_gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu 
[\[64a.3\]]dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che nyid yin no/_/de la yang bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan 
[\[64a.4\]]lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms 
[\[64a.5\]]pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten 
[\[64a.6\]]du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba de ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'dod pa mthun par byon nas/_'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug la smras pa/_ma sdug shes sam/_kho bos 
[\[64a.7\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas zhes bya ba nas/_tshangs par spyod pa rab tu ston to zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_kho bos de gsang tshig dag las bton pa 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba ni gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gyur te/_gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba nas/_'jig 
[\[64b.2\]]rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'dod pa mthun par byon nas/_'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so zhes thos kyis bram ze'i khye'u tshur/_khyod shes ldan gau ta ma 
[\[64b.3\]]gang na ba der song shig dang /_phyin nas ji ga shes ldan gau ta ma de'i dge ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su ji ltar grags pa de kho na bzhin yin nam ma yin pa dang /_de'i mtshan rnams grags pa yang 
[\[64b.4\]]dag pa yin nam ma yin pa rang nyid kyis rab tu shes par 'gyur grang /_bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gis bram ze pad ma'i snying po'i ltar mnyan nas shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs mang po dang lhan cig tu shas che ba nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 
[\[64b.5\]]dong ste lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[64b.6\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[64b.7\]]dga' bar mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ba na bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug mchil lham dang bcas pas 'chag cing glo bur du gtam dag gleng bar byed la/_gtam mthar phyin par mi sdod par ma 
[\[65a\]]
