[\[85b.4\]]nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe de snying dga' ba 
[\[85b.5\]]dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_snod du rung ba dang /_mthu dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos kun shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bshad pa yang 
[\[85b.6\]]dag phul gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rnams rgyas par rab tu bstan te/_dper na gos dkar po nag nog med cing gtsang ma kha bsgyur bar 'os pa tshon rtsi'i nang du bcug na 
[\[85b.7\]]legs par tshon rtsi 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du bram ze pad ma'i snying po stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs so/_/de nas bram ze pad ma'i snying 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]pos chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan 
[\[86a.2\]]pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 
[\[86a.3\]]'phags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags 
[\[86a.4\]]so/_/de nas bram ze pad ma'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas rjes su yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[86a.5\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag skabs su bab par bram ze pad ma'i snying po 'phya bar byed kyis/_de lta bas na yon sngo ba byed pa na dge slong gis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das lo ma bdun par byon nas lo 
[\[86a.6\]]ma bdun par sangs rgyas bzhi rnams kyi gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'char kar byon nas 'char ka na gnas tsher ma can gyi nags na bzhugs so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[86a.7\]]gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'char kar byon nas/_'char ka na gnas tsher ma can gyi nags na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang mi zhig la bsgo ba/_kwa'i nang rje tshur khyod dge sbyong gau ta ma gang na ba der song 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]la nga'i tshig 'di dag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_'tsho'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad du kye shes ldan gau ta ma ko sa 
[\[86b.2\]]la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal sang bcom ldan 'das la blta bar mchi 'tshal na/_shes ldan gau ta mas 'di ltar snga nas thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol zhes kyang gsol cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ltar mnyan 
[\[86b.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/shes ldan 
[\[86b.4\]]gau ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_'tsho'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol lags so/_/kye skyes bu khyod dang 
[\[86b.5\]]ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bde bar gyur cig_/kye shes ldan gau ta ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal sang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir mchi bar 'tshal na/_shes ldan gau ta mas 'di ltar snga nas thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/_kye nang rje nga nyid ko 
[\[86b.6\]]sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dus la bab par shes par gyis shig_/de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas/_yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de song nas ring 
[\[86b.7\]]po ma lon par tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod song la gtsug lag khang yangs pa zhig tu stan mang du shoms shig_/nga 'dug la deng nyid nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang 'du bar bya'o/_/btsun pa bka' 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_gtsug lag khang yangs pa zhig tu stan mang du bshams nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[87a.2\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa gtsug lag khang yangs pa zhig tu gdan mang du bshams lags te/_bcom 
[\[87a.3\]]ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang yangs pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la mi des rig par byas te song nas 
[\[87a.4\]]ring po ma lon par mi gzhan zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje tshur shog_/khyod kyis bzhon pa bzang po myur du stod cig_/de la kho bo zhon la de ring kho na dge sbyong gau ta ma la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi 
[\[87a.5\]]ltar mnyan te/_bzhon pa bzang po bstad nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bcibs pa bzang po bstad lags te/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su 
[\[87a.6\]]gsol/_de'i tshe sring mo mdzes ldan dang /_nyi ldan gnyis rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bkad sar 'ongs par gyur te/_sring mo mdzes ldan dang /_nyi ldan gnyis kyis lha deng nyid bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir bzhud do zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ko 
[\[87a.7\]]sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha gal te deng nyid bcom ldan 'das gzigs pa'i phyir gshegs na/_lha 'di ltar bdag cag gi tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la dbus phyag mdzod la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]nyung ngam/_'tsho'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol bar gsol/_de bzhin du bya'o zhes ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan nas/_de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bzhon pa bzang po la 
[\[87b.2\]]zhon te 'chag khang nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/_des ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/_rkang pa kho 
[\[87b.3\]]nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal 
[\[87b.4\]]po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma sring mo mdzes ldan dang nyi ldan gnyis bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_'tsho'am/_bskyod pa yang 
[\[87b.5\]]ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol lags so/_/sring mo mdzes ldan dang nyi ldan gnyis kyis pho nya gzhan ma rnyed dam/_ci na rgyal po chen po nyid las gzhan ma yin/_kye gau ta ma sring mo mdzes ldan dang /_nyi ldan gnyis bdag gi 
[\[87b.6\]]bkad sar mchis pa na/_deng nyid lha bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir mchi 'tshal lo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces mchis te/_lha gal te deng nyid bcom ldan 'das gzigs pa'i phyir bzhud par bzhed na/_bdag cag gi tshig gis 
[\[87b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la dbus phyag mdzod la zhes bya ba nas reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal po chen po khyod dang sring mo mdzes ldan dang nyi ldan gnyis bde bar gyur cig_/re zhig gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag phyogs gzhan 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/rgyal po chen po ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig_/kye gau ta ma bdag gis khyod 'di skad ces dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan gyis thams cad shes pa'am/_mthong ba 
[\[88a.2\]]gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de gnas med do zhes gsung ngo zhes thos na/_gau ta ma khyod kyis de skad du bka' stsal par dgongs lags sam/_rgyal po chen po de skad du smras par mi dran no/_/de'i tshe sde dpon 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba 
[\[88a.3\]]'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sde dpon 'phags skyes po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sde dpon nyi ma snga ma dang tshes snga ma'i nyi ma dag la rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_rgyal po'i 'khor 
[\[88a.4\]]rnams 'dus te 'khod pa na gtam de lta bu sus glengs pa dran nam/_lha dran te/_'di lta ste/_bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba lags so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mi zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod bkra shis ldan 
[\[88a.5\]]gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba gang na ba der song la phyin nas/_bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba la 'di skad ces ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod 'bod do zhes smros shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[88a.6\]]gyi ltar mnyan nas/_bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod 'bod do/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[88a.7\]]gsal rgyal gyis mi de song nas ring po ma lon par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma 'di la kha cig don dang tshig ngan par bzung ba 'dzin pa lta mchis lags sam/_rgyal po chen po yod de/_don de gzhan kho na yin pa las 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]de gzhan kho nar gzhan dag la smra'o/_/shes ldan gau ta mas ji lta bu zhig tu bka' stsal par dgongs lags/_rgyal po chen po ngas ni 'di skad du dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan gyis thams cad shes pa'am/_mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin go skabs med de 
[\[88b.2\]]gnas med do zhes bka' stsal par dran no/_/shes ldan gau ta ma de skad du gsungs pa ni rigs pa'i tshul lags so/_/shes ldan gau ta mas de skad du gsungs pa ni shin tu rigs pa'i tshul lags so/_/re zhig gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na shes 
[\[88b.3\]]ldan la bdag zhu ba gzhan yang phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/rgyal po chen po ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig_/kye gau ta mas rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs lags na de dag la khyad par ram/_
[\[88b.4\]]bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bgyi ba cung zad mchis sam/_rgyal po chen po yod de/_de la bram ze'i rigs gang dag yin pa dang /_rgyal rigs gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyis mthon por bkur ba yin no/_/rje'u rigs gang dag yin pa dang /_dmangs 
[\[88b.5\]]rigs gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyis dma' bar brtsis pa yin no/_/shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag cag mthong ba'i chos kyi don las brtsams te zhu ba ni mi zhu lags so/_/'on kyang tshe slad ma'i don las brtsams te zhu ba zhu lags so/_/kye gau ta ma 
[\[88b.6\]]rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs lags na de dag la khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bgyi ba 'ga' mchis sam/_rgyal po chen po rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_rgyal rigs 
[\[88b.7\]]dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs yin la/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gdams ngag sbyin pa dang /_rjes su ston pa dang /_chos ston pa rnyed na/_de dag la 'di lta ste/_ma 'ongs pa tshe phyi ma 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]la khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bya ba 'ga' yod dam/_kye gau ta ma rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs lags la/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[89a.2\]]pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gdams ngag stsol ba'am/_rjes su ston pa'am/_chos ston pa rnyed na/_de dag la 'di lta ste spangs pa la khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bgyi ba 'ga' mchis sam/_rgyal po chen po rigs 
[\[89a.3\]]bzhi po 'di dag ste/_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs yin la/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gdams ngag sbyin pa'am/_rjes su ston pa'am/_chos ston pa rnyed na/_de dag 
[\[89a.4\]]la 'di [(]sta [,]lta [)]ste/_spangs pa la khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bya ba 'ga' yod dam/_de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dri yis/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/rgyal po chen po dper na 'di la gdul ba bzhi po glang po che gdul ba'am/_
[\[89a.5\]]rta gdul ba'am/_glang gdul ba'am/_skyes pa gdul ba zhig yod la/_de las gdul ba gnyis ni ma dul ba rnam par ma dul bar gyur la/_gnyis ni shin tu dul ba shin tu rnam par dul bar gyur na/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_gdul ba gnyis po ma dul ba 
[\[89a.6\]]rnam par ma dul ba dag cig re zhig ma dul ba bzhin dul ba'i sar 'gro ba'am/_rnam par ma dul ba bzhin rnam par dul ba'i cha sta len par 'gyur ram/_kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/gang yang gdul ba gnyis po shin tu dul ba dang /_shin tu rnam par dul ba de dag shin 
[\[89a.7\]]tu dul bas dul ba'i gnas su 'gro ba'am/_shin tu rnam par dul bas dul ba'i cha sta len par 'gyur ram/_kye gau ta ma de lta lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du sa gang zhig dad pa can gyis thob par bya ba de ma dad pas 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med la/_
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]g.yo med pa dang /_skyon med pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_shes rab can gyis thob par bya ba de shes rab 'chal pas thob pa de ni gnas med kyi sa gang zhig dad pa can gyis thob par bya ba de dad pa can gyis 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod la/_
[\[89b.2\]]g.yo med pa dang /_skyon med pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_shes rab can gyis thob par bya ba de shes rab can gyis 'thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas de ni yod do/_/kye gau ta ma rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs 
[\[89b.3\]]dang /_dmangs rigs lags la/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gdams ngag stsol ba'am/_rjes su ston pa'am/_chos ston pa rnyed par gyur cing de dag gtso bo'i yan lag lnga dang ldan par gyur la/_de dag 
[\[89b.4\]]gis kyang mnyam mtshungs par spangs par gyur na de dag gis rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba la khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bya ba 'ga' mchis sam/_de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dri yis/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du 
[\[89b.5\]]lan thob shig_/rgyal po chen po dper na shar phyogs nas bram ze gzhon nu zhig 'ongs pa dang /_de la 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du gzhon nu tshur/_shing sA la skam po las gtsub stan byos la steng du gtsub shing zhog ste me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs la me phyung shig 
[\[89b.6\]]ces smras pa dang /_des shing sA la skam po las gtsub stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing bzhag ste/_me de dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs nas me phyung /_lho phyogs nas rgyal rigs gzhon nu zhig 'ongs pa dang /_de la 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du rgyal rigs gzhon nu 
[\[89b.7\]]tshur/_spa skam po las gtsub stan byos la steng du gtsub shing zhog ste/_me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs la me phyung shig ces smras pa dang /_des spa skam po las gtsub stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing bzhag ste/_me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs nas me phyung /_nub phyogs 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]nas rje'u rigs gzhon nu zhig 'ongs pa dang /_de la 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du rje'u rigs gzhon nu tshur/_shug pa skam po las gtsub stan byos la steng du gtsub shing zhog ste/_me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs la me phyung shig ces smras pa 
[\[90a.2\]]dang /_des shug pa skam po las gtsub stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing bzhag ste/_me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs nas me phyung /_byang phyogs nas dmangs rigs gzhon nu zhig 'ongs pa dang /_de la 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du kye dmangs rigs gzhon nu tshur/_
[\[90a.3\]]tsan dan skam po las gtsub stan byos la steng du gtsub shing zhog ste/_me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs la me phyung shig ces smras pa dang /_des tsan dan skam po las gtsub stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing bzhag ste/_me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs nas me phyung ba dang /_de 
[\[90a.4\]]dag 'ga' zhig gis gcig tu bsdus nas 'dam bu bcer ba'am/_sog ma'i phung por bcug na rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_mi rigs tha dad pas shing sna tshogs las phyung ba'i me de las ji ga me 'di ni 'od dang ldan pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_
[\[90a.5\]]gsal ba'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/_me 'di ni de lta ma yin no/_/me 'dis ni me'i bya ba byed nus so/_/me 'dis ni mi nus so zhes bya ba'i khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bya ba 'ga' yod dam/_'on te me de thams 
[\[90a.6\]]cad 'od dang ldan pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_gsal ba yin zhing me de thams cad kyis me'i bya ba byed nus/_kye gau ta ma zhugs de thams cad 'od dang ldan pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_gsal ba lags shing zhugs de thams cad kyis zhugs kyi bgyi ba bgyid rngo thog lags so/_/
[\[90a.7\]]rgyal po chen po de bzhin du bag yod pas thob pa gtso bos gtsubs pa'i me de la ni 'di lta ste/_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba la khyad par dang /_bsam pa dang /_tha dad du bya ba 'ga' yang med do/_/shes ldan gau ta mas de skad gsungs pa ni rigs pa'i tshul lags 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]so/_/re zhig zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na shes ldan khyod la bdag gzhan yang phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/rgyal po chen po ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig_/kye gau ta ma lha rnams mchis sam/_rgyal po chen po lha gang dag yin par shes/_lha gang 
[\[90b.2\]]dag sha khon dang bcas/_'gran zla dang bcas/_gnod pa dang bcas shing 'di lta bur 'ong zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/_lha gang dag sha khon med/_'gran zla med/_gnod pa med cing 'di lta bur mi 'ong zhing 'od bar mi 'gyur ba yin/_lha de dag ni re zhig der bas/_lha gang 
[\[90b.3\]]dag sha khon dang bcas/_'gran zla dang bcas/_gnod pa dang bcas shing /_'di lta bur mchi zhing mchi bar 'gyur ba'i lha de dag tshe bas/_sug las pas/_bsod nams bas nas gnas/_de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de na lha'am lha'i bus/_lha'am lha'i bu 
[\[90b.4\]]gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bgyi ba'am/_spyug par rngo thog lags sam/_rgyal po chen po lha gang dag sha khon dang bcas/_'gran zla dang bcas/_gnod pa dang bcas shing 'di lta bur 'ong zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ba de dag las zad/_tshe zad bsod nams zad nas gnas 
[\[90b.5\]]de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de na lha'am lha'i bus/_lha'am lha'i bu gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba'am/_spyug par mi nus so/_/kye gau ta ma de na lha gang dag sha khon dang bcas/_'gran zla dang bcas/_gnod pa dang bcas shing 'di lta bur mchi zhing mchi bar 
[\[90b.6\]]'gyur ba de dag gis lha gnod pa ma mchis pa de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bgyi ba'am/_spyug pa'i rngo thog lags sam/_de nas sde dpon 'phags skyes pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'di skad ces lha rnams 
[\[90b.7\]]ni tshe lhag par ring ba/_lhag par yun ring du gnas pa yin no zhes gsung bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rdul yab thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/_/
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/_sde dpon lus 'phags po 'di ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu yin la/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyi sras yin pas sras dang bu ni lhan cig gtam byar rung ngo snyam 
[\[91a.2\]]du rig nas sde dpon lus 'phags po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sde dpon ji snyam du sems/_ko sa la'i rgyal po'i rang gi yul yin la/_de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bca' ba la dbang sgyur na sems can dbang chung ngu kha cig gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/_
[\[91a.3\]]spyug par nus sam/_dge sbyong nus so/_/sde dpon ji snyam du sems/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rang gi yul ma yin la/_de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bca' ba la dbang mi sgyur na/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sems can dbang chung ba kha cig 
[\[91a.4\]]gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba'am/_spyug par nus sam/_dge sbyong ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi yul ma yin la/_de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bca' ba la dbang mi sgyur na/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sems can dbang chung ngu kha cig 
[\[91a.5\]]gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba'am/_spyug par mi nus so/_/sde dpon khyod kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yod skad thos sam/_dge sbyong ko sa la'i bdag po rgyal po 'di nyid las thos so/_/sde dpon ji snyam du sems/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 
[\[91a.6\]]sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba'am/_spyug par nus sam/_dge sbyong re zhig ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mthong ba yang nyams su ma myong na gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba'am/_spyug pa lta 
[\[91a.7\]]smos kyang ci dgos/_sde dpon de bzhin du gnod pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis gnod pa med pa'i lha rnams mthong ba yang nyams su mi myong na gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba'am/_spyug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma dge sbyong 'di'i ming ci lags/_rgyal po chen po kun dga' bo yin no/_/shes ldan kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa ni rigs pa'i tshul yin no/_/shes ldan kun dga' bos de skad du 
[\[91b.2\]]smras pa ni shin tu rigs pa'i tshul yin no/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/re zhig gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag zhu ba gzhan yang phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[91b.3\]]po chen po gang dang gang 'dod pa zhus shig_/kye gau ta ma ci lags/_tshangs pa de mchis lags sam/_rgyal po chen po tshangs pa gang yin par shes tshangs pa gang zhig gnod pa dang bcas pas 'di lta bur 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/_tshangs pa gang zhig gnod pa med 
[\[91b.4\]]pas 'di lta bur mi 'ong zhing 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba yin/_kye gau ta ma bdag ni de la tshangs pa gang zhig gnod pa ma mchis pas 'di lta bur mi mchi zhing mchi bar mi 'gyur ba'i tshangs pa de lags par 'tshal lo/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91b.5\]]dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam de lta bu glengs so/_/de nas mi des bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba khrid nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha de 'di 
[\[91b.6\]]lags so/_/de nas bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal bas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba can la ko 
[\[91b.7\]]sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u nyi ma snga ma dang /_tshes snga ma la rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po dang blon po dang 'khor rnams 'dus shing 'dug pa na/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di skad ces dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan gyis thams cad shes pa'am/_
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]mthong ba gang yin pa ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de de ni gnas med do zhes gsung ngo zhes pa'i gtam de lta bu sus smras dran nam/_lha dran lags te 'di lta ste/_sde dpon 'phags skyes po de skad mchi'o/_/'di lta ste/_bkra shis 
[\[92a.2\]]ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba'o zhes de dag phan tshun de ltar gtam khungs 'byin par byed do/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rim gro pa'i mis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha gshegs pa'i dus la bab lags so/_/lha dus la bab lags so/_/
[\[92a.3\]]de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/shes ldan gau ta ma bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams te zhu ba zhus pa yang shes ldan gau ta mas bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan lags/_
[\[92a.4\]]'dir rigs rnam par dag pa dang /_lhag pa'i lha dang /_lhag pa'i tshangs pa las brtsams te/_shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis zhu ba zhus pa yang shes ldan gau ta mas bdag la lhag pa'i tshangs pa zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan lags te/_shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis zhu ba gang 
[\[92a.5\]]dang gang zhus pa de dang de kho na shes ldan [(]gau [,]gau ta [)]mas bdag la zhu ba lung bstan lags pas/_shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis gzhan gsol du ci mchis/_shes ldan gau ta ma bdag ni bgyi ba dang bsgrub pa mang lags pas da mchi lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes 
[\[92a.6\]]par gyis shig_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas 
[\[92a.7\]]ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[92b.2\]]khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[92b.3\]]gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom 
[\[92b.4\]]ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/_stan ches 
[\[92b.5\]]dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[92b.6\]]'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[92b.7\]]dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa skabs skabs su gdugs tshod gsol bar byed pa na/_dge slong rnams kyis thog mar sprang po rnams la kha zas [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]byin pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang gis longs spyad nas lhung bzed kyi lhag ma la sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[93a.2\]]de na sprang po gnyis po bram ze'i khye'u zhig dang /_rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig yod pa las/_bram ze'i khye'us dus ma shes nas de dang por slong bar brtsams pa las/_de la dge slong 'gas kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma byin no/_/rgyal rigs kyi khye'us phyi nas slong ba dang /_
[\[93a.3\]]des phal cher rnyed nas des bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/_khyod kyis cung zad rnyed dam/_des khros nas smras pa/_gal te kho bo la dbang zhig yod na shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong thams cad mgo drung nas bcad de sa la dor ba zhig_/rgyal rigs kyi khye'us smras pa/_gal te 
[\[93a.4\]]kho bo la 'byor pa zhig yod na kho bos nyi ma re re sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bstabs pa zhig_/de gnyis de ltar gcig la gcig smra zhing mnyan yod nas byung nas shing drung zhig tu nyal ba dang /_shing rtas 'khyam pa 
[\[93a.5\]]zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/_des bram ze'i khye'u de'i mgo bcad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/_/yid mgyogs rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis ni/_/smras sam byas na de nas 
[\[93a.6\]]sdug bsngal de/_/'thob 'gyur 'khor lo 'phyan pas mgo bo bcad/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u sangs rgyas la sogs 
[\[93a.7\]]pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems gdug pas tshig rtsub po phyung ba gang yin pa de mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems gdug pas tshig rtsub po phyung nas mnyan yod nas byung ste shing drung zhig tu 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]nyal ba dang /_shing rtas 'khyam pas de'i mgo bcad par gyur to/_/ngas de las dgongs nas/_chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/_zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du/_'thob 'gyur 'khor lo 'phyan pas mgo bo bcad/_/ces bya ba'i bar 
[\[93b.2\]]gsungs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na tshong dpon zhig bu med par shi'o/_/mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'dus nas smras pa/_su zhig tshong dpon du gzhug_/kha cig gis smras pa/_su bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/ji ltar 
[\[93b.3\]]shes par bya/_brtag mod ces de nas de rnams brtag par brtsams pa las/_de rnams kyis rgyal rigs kyi khye'u de shing gi grib ma la nyal ba na shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma yol bar gzhol/_yol bar 'bab/_yol bar bab na/_shing de'i grib ma ni 
[\[93b.4\]]khye'u de'i lus las ma yol bar mthong nas/_de rnams kyis de bslang ste tshong dpon du dbang bskur ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la dpal gyi 'byor pa'i skal ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brten te yin gyis/_ma la 
[\[93b.5\]]bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo snyam nas/_de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[93b.6\]]gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam 
[\[93b.7\]]grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor 
[\[94a.2\]]zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_
[\[94a.3\]]khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas/_de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes 
[\[94a.4\]]bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba dang /_bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag dge 
[\[94a.5\]]bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshong dpon de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par 
[\[94a.6\]]bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan 
[\[94a.7\]]bshams pa la bzhugs te tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/_/yid mgyogs rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni/_/smras sam byas na de nas bde ba de/_/'thob 'gyur grib ma yol bar mi 'gyur bzhin/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pas bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyal rigs kyi khye'u sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems dang ba bskyed pa gang yin pa de 
[\[94b.2\]]mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems dang ba bskyed nas mnyan yod nas byung ste shing drung zhig tu nyal ba las mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis tshong dpon du dbang bskur nas/_
[\[94b.3\]]de mthong ba'i chos kho na la longs spyod mngon par 'phel bar gyur to/_/ngas de las dgongs nas/_chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/_/zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'thob 'gyur grib ma yol bar mi 'gyur bzhin/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs so/_/
[\[94b.4\]]gdu bu can du byon nas gdu bu can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/_/sa can du byon nas sa can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/seng ge can gyi grong du byon nas seng ge can gyi grong du sangs rgyas bzhi'i 
[\[94b.5\]]gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/_/grong gsar du byon nas grong gsar du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/grong khyer can du byon nas grong khyer can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal po'i khab tu 
[\[94b.6\]]byon nas de'i tshe kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba ma ga d+hA bzang mo'i rdzing gi 'gram na gnas te/_de mtshan mo mchil pas nya bshor cing za bar byed do/_/de nam langs nas ni khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas smra ste/_chos kyi 
[\[94b.7\]]chos mchog gis 'tsho srog chags dag_/'ga' la yang 'tshe mi byed dge slong 'gyur/_/zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyad/_/dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i drung du gshegs te bka' 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]stsal pa/_tshigs bcad de ni ji lta bar/_/gal te khyod kyang de 'dra na/_/khyod kyang dam par brtsir rung na/_/spong ba khyod ni de mi 'dra/_/re zhig nye bar zhi zhing dul ba dang /_/srog chags 'ga' la'ang 'tshe bar ma byed par/_/zhi 
[\[95a.2\]]ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyod/_/dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun/_/gang la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/_/nyes par byas pa yod pa ma yin la/_/gang zhig gnas gsum dag gis bsdams gyur pa/_/dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun/_/
[\[95a.3\]]de nas kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs kyis bsams pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs kyis ni bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[95a.4\]]mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_thos pas kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi 
[\[95a.5\]]rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag gis de khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug pa mthong nas/_dge slong zhig gis khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag ste chos mnyan na de bden pa'i snod du gyur kyang bden pa ma mthong nas/_
[\[95a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_ci'i phyir dge slong 'dis bden pa ma mthong snyam na ma gus pas yin par gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag nas 'dug pa 
[\[95a.7\]]yin no snyam nas de lta bas na dge slong gis khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug par mi bya'o/_/'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas n+ya gro d+har byon nas de nas snga dro sham thabs mnabs/_na bza' chos gos dang 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]lhung bzed bsnams te n+ya gro d+har bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo zhig n+ya gro d+har bag mar btang ba dang /_bram ze'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe 
[\[95b.2\]]byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes pa/_sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/_gshegs na rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu de 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[95b.3\]]ni shAkya'i rigs dga' ba las 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyal srid kyang spangs/_btsun mo mang po dang /_mdzod dang /_bang mdzod kyi 'byor pa rnams kyang spangs nas rab tu byung ba de yin te/_de da ltar bsod snyoms la rgyus/_gal te bdag las 
[\[95b.4\]]bsod snyoms kyi zan bzhes na ni de la bdag gis dbul lo snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i sems mkhyen nas lhung bzed bzed de/_sring mo gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'dir phul cig_/de nas de lhag par dad 
[\[95b.5\]]pa skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas dad pa drag pos bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[95b.6\]]'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba nas/_mdzod spur nub par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni zhes bya ba nas/_'dzum 
[\[95b.7\]]pa mdzad ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze'i bu mo gang zhig dad pa skyes nas nga la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba de mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bram ze'i bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum du 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang /_skye gnas phyi ma dang /_lus phyi ma dang /_bdag gis ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la rang sangs rgyas shin tu [(]lags [,]legs [)]smon zhes bya bar 'gyur 
[\[96a.2\]]ro/_/kun du bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes sgra grags so/_/de'i khyo me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir dgon par song ba des 
[\[96a.3\]]bdag gi chung mas dge sbyong gau ta ma la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/_dge sbyong gau ta mas de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang mi bzod pa skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[96a.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/shes ldan gau ta ma bdag gi sdum par byon tam/_bram ze son to/_/shes ldan gau ta ma bdag gi mchis 'brang gis bsod snyoms bshos shig phul nas khyod kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan skad na mad dam/_bram ze bden no/_/kye 
[\[96a.5\]]gau ta ma khyod 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung na/_da bsod snyoms bshos tsam gyi slad du ji ltar shes bzhin gyi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig gsung /_sa bon 'di tsam gyi 'bras bu 'di'o zhes bgyi ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/_bram ze de'i phyir khyod 
[\[96a.6\]]nyid la dri yis/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/bram ze ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos mthong ba 'ga' yod dam/_kye gau ta ma re zhig ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gzhan lta zhog_/n+ya gro d+ha 'di nyid du 
[\[96a.7\]]ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shig mthong ba de re zhig gson cig_/kye gau ta ma n+ya gro d+ha 'di'i shar phyogs na n+ya gro d+ha'i shing chen po zhig mchis te/_de'i ming gis grong 'di n+ya gro d+ha zhes bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og na shing rta lnga brgya ma reg cing phan tshun ma thug par mchis lags 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]so/_/bram ze n+ya gro d+ha de'i sa bon tshad ji tsam zhig yod/_ci re zhig zhing rnang tsam mam/_kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/re lde tsam mam/_til 'dru ba'i 'khor lo tsam mam/_shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam mam/_ba'i ko ba tsam mam/_bil ba tsam mam/_ka pid tha'i 'bras 
[\[96b.2\]]bu tsam mam/_kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/kye gau ta ma ye yungs kar gyi bzhi cha tsam mchis lags so/_/bram ze sa bon de tsam gyi 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam zhig skyes so zhes bya ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/_shes ldan gau ta ma yid ches kyang 
[\[96b.3\]]rung ma ches kyang rung bdag gi mngon sum du gyur lags so/_/kye gau ta ma re zhig zhing snag che ba ser sme ba dog sa tshwa sgo ma mchis pa'i phyogs su sa bon sar pa grung po ma nyams par mchis pa la dus dus su lhas char phab na des na shing n+ya gro d+ha chen po 'dir 'khrungs 
[\[96b.4\]]lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bram ze khyod kyis ji lta bur/_/zhing dang sa bon mngon sum ltar/_/de bzhin las kyi rnam smin yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum mo/_/ji ltar bram ze 
[\[96b.5\]]khyod kyi sa bon ni/_/chung dang shin tu shing chen de mthong ba/_/bram ze ngas kyang sa bon chung ngu dang /_/phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas ljags brkyang bas dbu skra la thug pa'i bar zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 
[\[96b.6\]]g.yogs nas bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze de ji snyam du sems/_gang gi zhal nas ljags byung bas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yog par byed pa de ci ga 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid stong gi phyir yang shes bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig gsung ngam/_
[\[96b.7\]]kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga yi ljags ni sgyu med bden pas bskyed pa dag_/ci ga mi bden pa ni gsung bar 'gyur srid dam/_/bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa de bzhin pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]yin zhes rtogs par bya ba'i rigs/_/de nas bram ze de mngon par dad nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas/_thog ma med pa'i dus 
[\[97a.2\]]nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bdag 
[\[97a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas bram ze de 
[\[97a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //_//sdom la/_kim pi la dang sbrul gdugs dang /_/ma thu la dang 
[\[97a.5\]]yul 'khor skyong /_/glang chen grong dang grong khyer che/_/srug na dang ni bram ze'i grong /_/grong khyer nag po ro hi ta/_/gsing ma can dang de bzhin du/_/dga' ba 'phel bas tshogs su ni/_/byas te yang dag brjod pa yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kim pi lar 
[\[97a.6\]]byon nas kim pi la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la bka' stsal pa/_kim pi la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brtsams te bsgom pa khyod la bshad kyis/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang 
[\[97a.7\]]bshad do zhes de skad bka' stsal pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la cang mi smra'o/_/lan gnyis su yang de bzhin/_lan gsum du yang de bzhin brjod par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]kim pi la khyod la ston pa gsung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'tshal to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rab tu 'tshal to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so/_/
[\[97b.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te bsgom pa bshad na/_de'i slad du dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir 
[\[97b.3\]]legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/'di la dge slong gang yang grong dang grong rdal zhes bya ba dang /_dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na dbugs brngubs so zhes slob ste zhes bya ba nas/_'gog pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ba slob ste zhes bya ba'i 
[\[97b.4\]]bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na/_dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste 
[\[97b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/_/kun dga' bo dper na lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi 
[\[97b.6\]]mchod rten zhig brtsigs par 'gyur la de nas shar phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/_khyogs sam/_shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na/_kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/_rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/_btsun pa 'gyur lags so/_/de bzhin 
[\[97b.7\]]du gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so/_/zhes bya ba nas nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dga' ba so sor myong ba zhes bya ba nas/_sems kyi 'du byed 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]shin tu sbyangs te tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob bo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/_/dper na kun 
[\[98a.2\]]dga' bo lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/_de nas lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/_khyogs sam/_shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas/_tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[98a.3\]]bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang /_sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang sems rnam par grol bar byed 
[\[98a.4\]]cing dbugs brngubs na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so zhes slob bo sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste/_sems la sems kyi rjes su lta'o/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i 
[\[98a.5\]]nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te mchod rten de nyid la nub phyogs nas zhes dper bya'o/_/de lus de dang tshor ba de dang sems de la brnab sems yid mi bde ba gnyis ka nub pas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so/_/de'i 
[\[98a.6\]]tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/_dper na lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten brtsigs par gyur la/_de nas byang phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam khyogs sam/_shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na/_kun dga' bo ji snyam 
[\[98a.7\]]du sems/_rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/_btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so/_/zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/_
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]kun dga' bo de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i dbang du byas te/_bsgoms pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ri 'or zhig tu byon to/_/ri 'or de na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba de tshe dang ldan pa maud 
[\[98b.2\]]gal gyi bu chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur bas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu zhang po la soms shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[98b.3\]]mnyan te/_de'i gdul ba'i dus shes nas drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su 'jug par brtsams so/_/de nas drang srong des smras pa/_dge sbyong 'dug shig_/bram ze rnams kyi bsti gnas 'dir ma 'jug shig_/des smras pa/_nga yang bram ze yin no/_/drang srong des 
[\[98b.4\]]tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bram ze khyod la bsang byed med/_/blugs gzar yang ni yod ma yin/_/khyod ni mgo reg me mchod min/_/bram ze bdag ces ci ste smra/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bram ze nga yi ngo tsha shes/_/
[\[98b.5\]]bsang byed blugs gzar shes rab nyid/_/chu rgyun rtag 'bab dad pa ni/_/nga yi ril ba spyi blugs yin/_/nang du legs par mnyam bzhag pa'i/_/bden pa kho bo me mchod de/_/yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/_/nyin mtshan du ni sbyin sreg byed/_/gal te de ltar 
[\[98b.6\]]gyur na yang dge sbyong mgo reg la ni 'dir skabs mi 'byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rlung dang char drag btang nas mtsho bran dang nye ba zhig tu song nas shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i 'khor zhig gnas pa 
[\[98b.7\]]des bsams pa/_'di ni 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yin te/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bla mar bya ba yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di'i mchod pa bya ba la brtson par bya'o snyam ste/_klu de gnas nas byung nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]chen po'i lus la lan bdun du dkris te steng nas mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/_/drang srong rnams kyi chos nyid kyis gal te sdug bsngal la ma bsams na drang srong gi chos las nyams par 'gyur bas de nas drang srong de 'di snyam du sems te/_rab 
[\[99a.2\]]tu byung ba de rlung dang char drag gis nyen nas shi bar gyur te/_bdag drang srong gi chos las nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de nas bsti gnas de nas phyir byung ste/_blta bar brtsams pa na/_des de mthong nas smras pa/_kye rab tu byung ba kho bo cag gi bsti 
[\[99a.3\]]gnas su zhugs shig_/des smras pa/_drang srong chen po khyod drang srong gi chos de las nyams par gyur tam/_drang srong des de'i nga ro las ngo shes nas smras pa/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po lags sam/_drang srong bdag skye bos de ltar shes so/_/'phags 
[\[99a.4\]]pa don ci zhig la byon/_khyod nyid kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas 'ongs so tshur spyon bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhud do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos zhang po khrid nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[99a.5\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gi zhang po drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ba 'di lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la chos bshad pa'i rigs 
[\[99a.6\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas drang srong des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas de nas stan las langs te bla 
[\[99a.7\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog zhes bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan 
[\[99b.2\]]zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po song ba dang /_klu gzhon nu de gnas de na gcig tu mi dga' bar 
[\[99b.3\]]gyur nas/_de nas ri 'or der yams kyi nad dag btang ste/_bdag nyid drang srong gi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas bsti gnas der song ste gnas so/_/de nas ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de bsti gnas der lhags nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong 
[\[99b.4\]]chen po bdag cag la yams kyi nad byung na bdag cag gis ji ltar bgyi/_drang srong gis smras pa/_phyogs 'di nyid du shog la 'dug shig dang /_zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de phyogs der lhags nas gnas so/_/phyogs 
[\[99b.5\]]der sbrul gyis gdugs byas pas sbrul gdugs sbrul gdugs zhes bya bar grags te/_dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad yod pa zhig brtsigs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma thu la na 'bab chu rab tu bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i 'gram slob pa rnams 
[\[99b.6\]]kyi a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos kyi gling dang /_chos kyi skyabs la gnas par bya'i/_gling gzhan ma yin/_skyabs gzhan ma yin 
[\[99b.7\]]no/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos kyi gling dang /_chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/_gling gzhan ma yin zhing skyabs gzhan ma yin pa 'di la so sor yang dag par bslab par bya'o/_/mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams ni ji lta bu zhig yin/_gang zhig yod na ci la brten nas ci la mngon par zhen te/_bdag ni ci yin zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[100a.2\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni 
[\[100a.3\]]ston pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid dge slong rnams la bshad na/_bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge 
[\[100a.4\]]slong dag gzugs yod na gzugs la brten nas gzugs la mngon par zhen te/_gzugs ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes 
[\[100a.5\]]pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/_dge slong dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yod na/_rnam par shes pa la brten nas rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen te rnam par shes pa ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta 
[\[100a.6\]]ba rnams la mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis ltos shig ces bya ba nas/_dran bzhin du dbugs 
[\[100a.7\]]brngubs na brngubs so zhes slob ste/_tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/_
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dper na kun dga' bo lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/_khyogs sam/_shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas/_tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i 
[\[100b.2\]]tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so zhes 
[\[100b.3\]]slob pa dang /_sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste/_sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de'i tshe 'phags 
[\[100b.4\]]pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/_/dpe ni nub phyogs nas khyogs 'ong ba de nyid bya'o/_/de lus de dang tshor ba de dang sems de la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba de dag nub pas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su 
[\[100b.5\]]gnas so/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/_'di lta ste lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/_de nas byang 
[\[100b.6\]]phyogs nas ni bzhon pa can nam/_khyogs sam/_shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na/_kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/_rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/_btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[100b.7\]]gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/_kun dga' bo de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brten nas bsgoms pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_bang 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]mdzod stug po can du byon nas/_bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bang mdzod 
[\[101a.2\]]stug po can du byon nas/_bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /_khyu nas khyur 'dus shing phrad nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags 
[\[101a.3\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par 
[\[101a.4\]]mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'khor de nyid du 
[\[101a.5\]]'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu sal gyis dag pa/_
[\[101a.6\]]ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di ni sla ba ma yin pas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[101a.7\]]'das kyis rnam grangs du mar bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]ngo /_/de nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/khyim bdag 
[\[101b.2\]]gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[101b.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag 
[\[101b.4\]]gi bu pha dang ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/_btsun pa ma gnang ngo /_/khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha dang ma gnyis kyis ma gnang ba rab tu 'byin pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed do/_/btsun 
[\[101b.5\]]pa bdag gis ci nas pha dang mas gnang ba de ltar bgyi lags so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas/_rang gi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_pha dang ma la 'di skad ces 
[\[101b.6\]]smras so/_/yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig_/khyod nged kyi bu gcig pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bzod pa mi mthun pa med pa 
[\[101b.7\]]yin pas khyod shi bar gyur na nged mi 'dod bzhin du 'bral grang /_gson bzhin du ga la gtang /_yab yum gal te re zhig gnang na legs/_gal te ma gnang na deng slan cad 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/_phyag yang mi 'tshal lo/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]skyong gis nyi ma gcig kyang zan bcad pa byas so/_/gnyis dang gsum nas bdun gyi bar du zan bcad pa byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu 
[\[102a.2\]]yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba 'dod pa yin pas khyod kyi sdug bsngal mi shes te/_tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/rab tu dben pa bya dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' ba dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa dang /_
[\[102a.3\]]nags khrod dang /_bas mthar gnas pa ni mnags dka'o/_/bu yul 'khor skyong tshur 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig_/de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/_/de 
[\[102a.4\]]nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas nye du rnams la bcol ba/_kye nye du dag re zhig bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_khyim bdag gi bu yul 
[\[102a.5\]]skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags zhes bya ba nas bsod nams dag gyis shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/_/de nas 
[\[102a.6\]]khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs rnams la bcol ba/_kye gzhon nu dag re zhig bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs rnams kyis yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sras 
[\[102a.7\]]des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags la zhes bya ba nas/_bsod nams dag mdzod cig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o/_/des de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/_/de nas gzhon 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]nu dag gis yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum sras yul 'khor skyong 'di gum pas ci zhig bgyi/_rab tu 'byung du gnong dang /_gal te dga' bar gyur na 'di gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la/_gal te mngon par mi dga' 
[\[102b.2\]]bar gyur na yang bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma lags pa gzhan su zhig mchis/_gzhon nu dag bdag cag la gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na de bzhin du gnang bar bya'o/_/de nas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs dag gis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di 
[\[102b.3\]]skad ces smras [(]sa[,]so[)]/_/des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig_/pha dang mas gnang ste 'di skad ces gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na'o zhes kyang zer ro/_/shes ldan dag blta bar bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rim gyis lus 
[\[102b.4\]]kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 
[\[102b.5\]]gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni pha dang mas gnang lags kyis/_btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par 
[\[102b.6\]]spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[102b.7\]]par mdzad nas bang mdzod stug po can du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bsnyen par rdzogs te lo bcu lon nas dgra bcom pa thob ste rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na pha dang ma la rab tu byung nas blta bar bya'o 
[\[103a.2\]]zhes khas blangs pa yod kyis/_ma la bdag gis khas blangs pa de mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs 
[\[103a.3\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na pha dang ma la blta bar bgyi'o zhes g.yar gyis blangs pas bdag g.yar gyis blangs pa de mthar 
[\[103a.4\]]'byin du mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sems khyab par mdzad cing khyab par mdzad nas thugs la mdzad cing /_thugs la mdzad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong ni slar yang khyim na 
[\[103a.5\]]gnas pa'am/_sogs 'jog spyod pas 'dod pa dag la longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin no snyam du mkhyen nas/_tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yul 'khor skyong khyod song la sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni sgrol cig_/ma grol ba rnams 
[\[103a.6\]]ni grol bar gyis shig_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs phyung shig_/yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs 
[\[103a.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]zhugs te/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar log nas gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste/_rim gyis 
[\[103b.2\]]spyad pa spyod cing rgyu ba na bang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas/_bang mdzod stug po can gyi bang mdzod stug po'i tshal du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bang mdzod 
[\[103b.3\]]stug po can du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de rim gyis bang mdzod stug po can nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na rang gi khyim gang na der song nas/_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha bar sgo'i khyams na skyes pa skra mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[103b.4\]]pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sgo drung na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kha zer bar byed de/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni dag gis kho bo'i rigs kyi rgyun bcad de/_'o ni dag gis kho bo'i bu gcig pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bzod pa mi 
[\[103b.5\]]mthun pa med pa yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni rnams la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi khyim nas rgya gag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/_
[\[103b.6\]]bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang myur ba myur bar phyir byung ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo zhig zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa zhig dor ba'i phyir thogs te sgor byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de mthong ngo /_/
[\[103b.7\]]mthong nas kyang bran mo rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo gal te zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa 'dor ba yin na kho bos bzas lhung bzed 'dir chug shig_/'phags pa gsol cig_/de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo des zan dron rul pa zhig lon pa lhung bzed du 'jug 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]pa na tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_bzhin dang /_sna dang /_smra dngags dag gi mtshan ma shin tu legs par bzung nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/rje'i sras yul 'khor skyong lags sam/_sring mo 
[\[104a.2\]]kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so/_/de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de rings pa rings par tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/sras 
[\[104a.3\]]yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas ring mo zhig lags na nyid kyi khab tu ni byon mi bzhed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas lag pa g.yon pas skra bsdus nas ras yug gcig gi smad g.yogs bgos bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa yul 
[\[104a.4\]]'khor skyong gang na ba der song ba dang /_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa za bar byed pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yul 
[\[104a.5\]]'khor skyong khyod bang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas ring mo zhig lon na ci'i phyir rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/_zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa khyod kyi gre bar yang ji ltar 'gror btub/_khyim bdag khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na rgya gag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/_bskrad 
[\[104a.6\]]kyang ma bskrad pa dang myur ba myur bar byung ngo /_/bu yul 'khor skyong yin par kho bos mi shes mod/_gal te_kho bos shes na de skad mi smra ba zhig_/bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol lo/_/khyim bdag bzod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[104a.7\]]yul 'khor skyong la yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas rang gi khyim du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas yul 'khor skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu yul 'khor skyong yun ring zhig lon nas 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]khyim du 'ongs kyis/_kye re zhig khyod bdag nyid kyis snod du tshos la sta gon gyis shig dang de la bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas rang nyid kyis snod du btsos nas sta gon byas so/_/de nas mi zhig gis tshe dang 
[\[104b.2\]]ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdun du gser gyi phung po chen po gal te mi gcig pha rol na 'greng na mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug pa mi mthong la/_mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug na gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi mthong ba spungs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas tshe dang 
[\[104b.3\]]ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu yul 'khor skyong khyod kyi ma la bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi nor dang /_bud med kyi bag rdzongs dang /_bud med kyi khud pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa yang 'di snyed cig yod do/_/gzhan yang khyod kyi pha'i ni mtshan mas thebs 
[\[104b.4\]]pa'i gser dang sa le sbram yang brgya phrag du ma dang /_stong phrag du ma dang /_brgya stong phrag du ma yod na phal gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bu yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang thong shig_/bsod nams dag kyang 
[\[104b.5\]]gyis shig_/khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems pa lta na/_bdag gis gdams shing rjes su bstan to/_/bu yul 'khor skyong gdams ngag stsol cig_/bu yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston cig dang /_khyod kyi tshig la 
[\[104b.6\]]bdag dad pas mnyan par bgyi'o snyam du sems so/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma tshur khyod kyis sha na'i ras skye sar par byos la/_gser dang sa le sbram gyis khong ste shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang gA'i rgyun shugs drag cing gting zab pa gang na yod pa der 'or cig_/gzhi de las 
[\[104b.7\]]khyod kyi mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur ta re/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis de lta bu'i bya bas kyang bu yul 'khor skyong bzlog par bya ba ma 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]nus so snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas mna' ma la bcol ba/_kye bag sar re zhig ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang /_khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang /_dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /_gos rnams bskon pa 
[\[105a.2\]]dang /_rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /_bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang /_phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/_bu yul 'khor skyong de sngon khyim par gyur pa na dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang /_khrus rnams kyis khrus dang /_
[\[105a.3\]]dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /_gos rnams bskon pa dang /_rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /_bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang /_phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyis la bu yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces/_gang gi slad du rje'i sras 
[\[105a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig ces kyang smros shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi chung mas ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang /_khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang /_dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /_gos 
[\[105a.5\]]rnams bskon pa dang /_rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /_bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang /_phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sngon khyim par gyur pa na dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang /_khrus 
[\[105a.6\]]rnams kyis khrus dang /_dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /_gos rnams bskon pa dang /_rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /_bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang /_phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba byas nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di 
[\[105a.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo de ji lta bu zhig lags/_sring mo kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa ni lha'i bu mo'i ched du ma yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]skyong gis sngon gyi chung ma la sring mo zhes tshig tu smras pas brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma la smras pa/_de yab yum gal te kha zas btang ba lags na ci mi stsal tam/_btang snyoms su bzhag ste ci mtho 
[\[105b.2\]]'tsham lags sam/_bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod cig_/ces de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang 
[\[105b.3\]]zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zos nas lag pa bkrus te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 
[\[105b.4\]]'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ltos shig lus ni nor bu dang /_/rna rgyan gyis ni bkra byas pa'ang /_/nad dang slu ba'i chos can te/_/brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin/_/skra yi lan bu brgyad lhas shing /_/mig ni mig sman gyis bskus pa'ang /_/
[\[105b.5\]]byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/_/pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/_/dri rnams kyis ni lus bskus la/_/rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang /_/byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/_/pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/_/mig sman gser gyis bkra byas shing /_/dul ba'i lus ni 
[\[105b.6\]]brgyan pa yang /_/byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/_/pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chor bas rnyi btsugs nas/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gzung bar ma nus ltar/_/rngon pa 'o dod 'bod bcug la/_/zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor 
[\[105b.7\]]skyong gis pha dang ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po kau rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi snyan pa yang sgrogs shing gnas te/_nam zhig na bdag shes 
[\[106a.2\]]ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/_nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po kau rab byas tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/_kwa'i nang rje khyod song la myur du bang mdzod stug po can 
[\[106a.3\]]gyi tshal phyag dar byos shig_/sang nga der skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro'o/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes pa des rgyal po kau rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal thams cad phyag dar byed pa na/_mi des tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi 
[\[106a.4\]]drung na nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po kau rab bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing gnas te/_nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/_nam zhig na 
[\[106a.5\]]gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/_bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyis/_ma la bdag gis rgyal po kau rab bya la sbran par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas skyes pa 
[\[106a.6\]]des rgyal po kau rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po kau rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing bzhugs la nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/_nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir 
[\[106a.7\]]skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni de lags te/_bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas rgyal po kau rab byas mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/_kwa'i nang 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]rje tshur bzhon pa bzang po myur du sdogs shig_/de la nga zhon nas deng kho na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po kau rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/_rgyal po kau rab bya gang na ba der song 
[\[106b.2\]]nas phyin pa dang /_rgyal po kau rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bcibs pa bzang po bsdogs lags te/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas rgyal po kau rab bya bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa yul 
[\[106b.3\]]'khor skyong la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song nas/_de ji tsam bzhon pa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/_bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po kau rab bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa 
[\[106b.4\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po/_rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so tshur spyon/_rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags pas bzhed na bdag kyang stan la g.yar drongs shig_/kye yul 'khor skyong bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/_'on kyang 
[\[106b.5\]]yul 'khor skyong gis bdag stan la g.yar drang bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po gdan mchis kyis gal te bzhed na bzhugs shig_/de nas rgyal po kau rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam
