[\[106b.6\]]rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po kau rab byas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gal te rigs dman pa'am/_longs spyod rnams yongs su zad pa'am/_gtugs 
[\[106b.7\]]par gyur na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba yod na/_bdag cag rigs ni kau rab bya yin la/_longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin gyis/_'di ltar kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi skal 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ba dag las bgo bsha' byas/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag thong shig_/bsod nams dag gyis shig_/rgyal po chen po cha ma lags pa'i mgron du 'bod pas bdag 
[\[107a.2\]]mgron du 'bod kyi 'tsham pas ni ma lags so/_/khyod lta bus bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du yang ma 'bod cig_/bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang 'tsham pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/_
[\[107a.3\]]rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/_khyod kyis 'di skad ces kye yul 'khor skyong kho bo'i yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/_sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med la slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba yin gyis/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can 'dir gnos shig dang /_
[\[107a.4\]]bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags na/_rgyal po chen po sems mngon par dad pa gang la gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo/_/gzhan yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan 
[\[107a.5\]]pa'i phyir skabs phye na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la bdag zhu lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gsungs shig_/thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o/_/kye yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni yongs su nyams pa lags te/_de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu 
[\[107a.6\]]bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rga bas yongs su nyams pa dang /_nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang /_nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang /_longs spyod kyis 
[\[107a.7\]]yongs su nyams pa'o/_/kye yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/_'di la rigs kyi bu rgas 'khogs gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag rgas 'khogs gtugs pas bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]sla ba ma yin na mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/_de rga ba'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig 
[\[107b.2\]]bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/_'di ni rga ba'i yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong rga ba'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag 
[\[107b.3\]]pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/_skra gnag pa/_na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan pa yin te/_gang gi tshe rtsed mo dang /_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_cha ba dang /_brgyan pa'i 
[\[107b.4\]]gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe nye du rnams mchi mas brnangs shing ngu bzhin dang bcas pas ma rangs bzhin skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 
[\[107b.5\]]gis ci zhig shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung /_de la ni kho bos rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/_/kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong nad kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/_
[\[107b.6\]]'di la rigs kyi bu na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bar gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bas bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs 
[\[107b.7\]]nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'di ni 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]nad kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin no/_/skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya 
[\[108a.2\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa med cing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_ran par 'jug pa'i drod dang ldan pa ste/_ha cang bsil ba ma yin pa dang /_ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang /_khams snyoms pas gnod 
[\[108a.3\]]pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur na/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de la ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/
[\[108a.4\]]de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/_/kye yul 'khor skyong nye dus yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/_'di la rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad nye du rnams kha dag nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye du rnams rabs chad nye du rnams kha dag pas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu 
[\[108a.5\]]bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nye du'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'di ni nye dus yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/shes 
[\[108a.6\]]ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nye dus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yul 'khor skyong gi nye du ni kau rab bya'i rigs nas bzung ste 
[\[108a.7\]]brgyud pa bang mdzod stug po can 'di nyid na rgyas par yod na/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de la ni kho bos rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/_/kye yul 'khor skyong longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]pa gang zhe na/_'di la rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod srabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi longs spyod ni srabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par gyur gyis/_ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs 
[\[108b.2\]]nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo /_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'di ni longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/shes 
[\[108b.3\]]ldan yul 'khor skyong ni longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/_zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni bang mdzod stug po can 'di na rigs mchog dang rigs bzang po yin pas 'di lta ste/_longs 
[\[108b.4\]]spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin na/_'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung /_de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/_/rgyal po 
[\[108b.5\]]chen po bzhi po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/_yid 'byung ba de dag gis yid byung nas rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos 
[\[108b.6\]]nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin/_'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin/_'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas 
[\[108b.7\]]bdog pa med pa yin/_'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes te sred pas 'khol bas chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/bdag gis mdor 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis don de nyid ci nas bdag gi shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar 
[\[109a.2\]]'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du gsol/_shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/_/zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/_de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid 
[\[109a.3\]]la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu 'am lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/_skra gnag pa/_nyam rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyi lus su 
[\[109a.4\]]'di lta ste tshe 'am/_kha dog gam/_stobs sam/_shugs sam/_smra dngags sam/_srid du 'am/_sboms su mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong ngam/_kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu 'am lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la 
[\[109a.5\]]bab pa/_skra gnag pa/_nyam rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste tshe 'am/_kha dog gam/_stobs sam/_shugs sam/_srid du 'am/_sboms su 'am/_smra dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/_da ni bdag na tshod kyis lo 
[\[109a.6\]]brgyad bcu lon pas rgas 'khogs gtugs te bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang langs pa yang gzhan gyis bya dgos so/_/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las 
[\[109a.7\]]dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/_/zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/_/
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/_/gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa bdag la ni bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_las 
[\[109b.2\]]bgyid pa dang /_bzhad gad pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan dang /_'dul sbyong mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta rkya dang /_shing rta pa dang /_bshan thogs dang /_gzhu 'dzin pa dang /_'drol bu dang /_go re long bgyid pa dang /_bro gar len pa rnams dang /_
[\[109b.3\]]rgyal po'i bu dpa' brtul phod pa/_rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag bdag gi gshed ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms par bgyid pa mchis na/_'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas 
[\[109b.4\]]skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/rgyal po chen po da ltar khyod la lus kyis gnod pa 'ga' mchis sam/_kye yul 
[\[109b.5\]]'khor skyong bdag la mchis te da ltar rlung gis rgyab tu gnod do/_/rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_las byed pa dang /_bzhad gad pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan dang /_'dul sbyong mkhan 
[\[109b.6\]]dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta rkya dang /_shing rta pa dang /_bshan thogs dang /_gzhu 'dzin dang /_'drol bu dang /_go re long byed pa dang /_bro gar len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/_rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/_bdag 
[\[109b.7\]]la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/_kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so/_/gang gi tshe rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_las 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]bgyid pa dang /_bzhad gad pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan dang /_'dul sbyong mkhan dang /_glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /_rta rkya dang /_shing rta dang /_bshan thogs dang /_gzhu 'dzin dang /_'drol bu dang /_go re long bgyid pa dang /_bro gar len pa dang /_
[\[110a.2\]]rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/_rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/_bdag la byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/_de'i tshe bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal 
[\[110a.3\]]drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med de skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs 
[\[110a.4\]]pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang rangs te 
[\[110a.5\]]bzod do/_/gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/_kye yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_las bgyid pa dang /_zhes bya ba nas/_rgyal 
[\[110a.6\]]po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang dag bdag mchi na rjes bzhin 'brang la/_'greng na 'greng ba dang /_nyal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mchis na/_'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas 
[\[110a.7\]]bdog pa med pa yin no/_/zhes gsung ba de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/_rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/_skye bo 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]mang po mi 'dod pa/_skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/_skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/_'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_las byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu dag 
[\[110b.2\]]tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin shog shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/_kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so/_/kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/_skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/_skye bo mang po 
[\[110b.3\]]mi dga' ba/_skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/_'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/_rgyal po'i bu'i bar gang dag yin pa tshur 
[\[110b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi ba'i phyi bzhin shog shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/_bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[110b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig 
[\[110b.6\]]bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang yang 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms 
[\[110b.7\]]mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/_kye yul 'khor skyong bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang /_mdzod dang /_bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs spyod na/_'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/_rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan 
[\[111a.2\]]thob shig_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang /_mdzod dang /_bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las shar phyogs nas mi yid gcugs pa/_yid ches pa/_brtan po/_'jig rten 
[\[111a.3\]]la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas de 'di skad ces lha bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na de na bdag gis ljongs 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag cig mthong ste/_lha ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung 
[\[111a.4\]]dang 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang /_'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs te gzhom pa dang /_choms nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo /_/zhes smra na/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_khyod yul der dra ma drang zhing drangs nas bcom ste/_rnal du 'god dam/_khyod ljongs de dag 'dod 
[\[111a.5\]]dam/_kye yul 'khor skyong gal te bdag gis ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang /_'di lta bu'i dpung dang /_'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drang ba dang /_dra ma drangs nas choms pa dang bcom nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes na/_ljongs de dag tu dra ma drang zhing dra ma drangs nas 
[\[111a.6\]]bcom la/_bcom nas rnal du dgod do/_/bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa lnga pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs 
[\[111a.7\]]pa des de las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no/_/zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]tu byung ste/_de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/_/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[111b.2\]]'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi/_/de dag chags dang bcas pas sogs byed cing /_/nor rnams rnyed nas gtong bar mi byed la/_/phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong /_/mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa/_/thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab nas ni/_/
[\[111b.3\]]rgya mtsho tshun cad kyis kyang mi chog ste/_/chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad/_/mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang po dag_/yongs su bzung la ngoms pa yod min pas/_/chog mi shes pas rang gi lus bor te/_/sred dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/srog ni ther 
[\[111b.4\]]zug ma yin tshe thung ste/_/rga bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min/_/'chi ba la ni nor rjes 'brang mi 'gyur/_/nye du ma yin grogs min bu ma yin/_/spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang /_/snying du sdug pa'i tshogs ni 'dus nas ni/_/kye ma kyi hud 'di ni lhar gyur 
[\[111b.5\]]ces/_/skra bshig mchi ma can gyi gdong gis ngu /_/de ni ras kyis dkris te phyung nas ni/_/me sbar nas ni de nas sreg par byed/_/rang gi las kyis sems can de khrid nas/_/de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas phrogs/_/'di ni skye ba na yang gcig pu skye/_/'chi 
[\[111b.6\]]ba na yang gcig pu 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/gcig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur/_/skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no/_/phyug po'am yang na bkres pa'am brtan po'am/_/bus pa de bzhin gnyis kas reg myong na/_/brtan po de yis nams kyang g.yos mi 
[\[111b.7\]]'gyur/_/bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g.yo/_/blo chung mi mkhas rjes su slob byed cing /_/de nas las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur zhing /_/mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/_/khon dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol/_/shes rab nor rnams kun gyi 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]mchog tu gsungs/_/de yis bdag nyid shes pas bdag nyid rig_/srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma rtogs pas/_/blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin/_/phran tshegs thabs sam yang na chos min pa'am/_/mthu yis gzhan dag las ni gang 'phrog 
[\[112a.2\]]pa/_/nyes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas/_/nying tor brgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin/_/ji ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs bzungs nas ni/_/sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom/_/de bzhin skye dgu nyes byed 'di dang ni/_/'jig rten pha rol rang gi las 
[\[112a.3\]]kyis bcom/_/shing las shing tog bzhin du mi rnams ni/_/gzhon dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang ltung /_/'dod pa sna tshogs sdug cing yid 'ong ba/_/rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'joms/_/'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur/_/'dod pa yod na khon 
[\[112a.4\]]dang 'jigs pa skye/_/de ltas rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste/_/dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin/_/de nas rgyal po kau rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song 
[\[112a.5\]]ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byon pa dang /_bram ze zhig gis bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_'od zer 
[\[112a.6\]]nyi ma stong pas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/_gser gyi mdog can mig tu sdug pa dang /_/dga' ba'i 'byung 
[\[112a.7\]]gnas yon tan kun dang ldan/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lha yi lha/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas/_mdzod spur nub 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]par gyur to/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/_/zhes bya ba nas kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[112b.2\]]gong ma bzhin du'o/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram zes de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa gang yin pa mthong ngam/_
[\[112b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma skye gnas phyi ma dang /_lus phyi ma dang /_bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi 
[\[112b.4\]]ma la rang sangs rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[112b.5\]]kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/_ngas grong mchog lnga byin pa de legs par rab tu 
[\[112b.6\]]nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_de lhag par snyan dngags la dga' 
[\[112b.7\]]bar gyur to/_/bA rA Na sI na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan zhig yod pa de la bram ze mos smras pa/_bram ze grang ba'i dus la bab kyis rgyal po de'i spyan sngar song la rjes su mthun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byos dang /_gal te na grang ba'i skyabs cung zad 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]ro/_/de song ba las ji tsam na rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo /_/bram ze des bsams pa/_ci bdag gis rgyal po la bstod dam/_'on te glang po che dam pa la snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_glang po che dam pa 'di ni 'jig rten 
[\[113a.2\]]thams cad kyis sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin la rgyal po la ni khyad par du yin pas/_re zhig glang po che dam pa mngon par bstod par bya'o snyam nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sa srung bu yi lus kyi sha tshugs ltar/_/mtshan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum 
[\[113a.3\]]tshogs/_/mdog dang tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs legs pa/_/glang chen dbang po bkra shis rab tu bsngags/_/de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kho bo'i glang chen sdug cing yid 'ong ba/_/mi rnams mig 'phrog dga' ba skyed pa gang /_/
[\[113a.4\]]de la khyod kyis bstod pa'i tshig smras kyis/_/khyod la grong gi mchog ni lnga sbyin no/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[113a.5\]]gcig gis bstod pas ngas 'di la grong mchog lnga byin no/_/da ltar yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas ngas yang 'di rang byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/grong khyer chen por gshegs nas grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong 
[\[113a.6\]]ma bzhin du'o/_/yul srug nar gshegs pa dang yul srug na na bram ze dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs dang lang tsho dang /_thos pas rgyags par gyur nas bdag dang 'dra ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes sgrogs shing rnam par sgrogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig 
[\[113a.7\]]na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te chos 'chad do/_/bram ze dbang po zhes bya bas dge sbyong gau ta ma yul srug nar byon to zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhes thos kyis/_ci bdag 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nam/_'on te ma yin ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de byung ba dang /_ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis 
[\[113b.2\]]brgyan pa 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bdag bas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi/_tshad ni lhag par ring ba ni ma yin no snyam nas/_bcom 
[\[113b.3\]]ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na ma mthong nas de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze dbang po la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze nyon mongs kyis thong shig_/gal te ri rab kyi rtse 
[\[113b.4\]]la 'dzegs te bltas kyang 'on kyang ches nyon mongs su zad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor mi mthong ngo /_/zhes ma thos sam/_
[\[113b.5\]]'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad mthong bar 'dod na khyod kyi khyim na me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na tsan dan sa mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyis de phyung la gzhol cig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab dang /_yum las 'khrungs pa'i sku'i tshad 
[\[113b.6\]]ni de yin no/_/bram ze dbang pos bsams pa/_de yang ngo mtshar zhig ste bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na song ste blta'o snyam nas de rings pa rings par song nas me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab kyi 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to/_/de mngon 
[\[113b.7\]]par dad par gyur nas bsam pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis song la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med 
[\[114a.2\]]pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag 
[\[114a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas bram ze dbang po stan las 
[\[114a.4\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis tsan dan sa mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams lags so/_/
[\[114a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze gnang gis song la shoms shig_/de nas des sa phyogs dben pa skabs yod pa zhig tu rim gro chen pos mchod sdong de bsgrengs nas dus mchod chen po bshams so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang rten dge bar gyur 
[\[114a.6\]]cig ces bya bar rig nas/_rtswa ku sha btags te bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar grags so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas mu stegs can rnams ni spa bkong /_lha dang mi 
[\[114a.7\]]rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/_skye bo dam pa rnams ni yi rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas shing kha cig ni bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bram ze'i grong du gshegs 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]so/_/mu stegs can rnams kyis ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rings pa rings par bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du dong ste lhags nas smras pa/_chos thos par gyur cig_/chos thob par gyur cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[114b.2\]]pa dag de ci zhig kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni mthong gis/_ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gi rgud pa gang lags/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu 
[\[114b.3\]]dang spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing 'ong ste/_bu dang bcas pa dum bu med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe kho na bzhugs shing grogs bgyi ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni bzang po ma lags te/_bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo /_/
[\[114b.4\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma gsod na ni 'khod par bya'o/_/bzhugs shig gsad par bgyi'o zhes de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang gzhu thogs/_khu tshur bcangs/_go bgos te byung ba dang /_lam gyi dbus na shAkya rgan po zhig 
[\[114b.5\]]'dug pas mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang du 'dong /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_dgra bsad pa'i phyir ro/_/khyed cag gi dgra su yin/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'o/_/shes ldan dag gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin/_shes ldan dag 
[\[114b.6\]]slar log shig_/de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang /_des bsams pa/_'di dag ni chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/_rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o snyam nas/_des ri brags su zhugs nas me btang ba dang /_ri brags kun tshig pas ca co 
[\[114b.7\]]dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sdangs te smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag dang dge sbyong gau ta ma ni thag ring po kho na yin gyi/_ri brags 'dir ni phung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brags bsregs kyis me bsad kyis slar ldog go zhes de rnams kyis bsad par brtsams 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]pa dang /_bsad par ma nus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'jog dag 'di ci byed/_bcom ldan 'das ri brags rnams zhugs kyis tshig na dgum par rngo ma thog lags so/_/ngas bsad dam/_bcom 
[\[115a.2\]]ldan 'das dgum du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho nar 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de zhi bar gyur to/_/de rnams mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gi 
[\[115a.3\]]slad du gshegs lags/_khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos 
[\[115a.4\]]bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the 
[\[115a.5\]]tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa shAkya rgan po 'dis nye du la chags pas bsod nams ma lags pa mang du bsags te ri brags bsregs pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' 
[\[115a.6\]]zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te ri brags bsregs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags zhig na spre'u lnga brgya'i tshogs 
[\[115a.7\]]gnas pas lo thog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gsan to/_/ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag spre'u rnams kyis lo thog la gnod pa byed na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_gzhan dag gis smras pa spre'u 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]rnams gsad mod/_de rnams ji ltar gsad par bya/_ri brags kyi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de shing tin tu ka gcig pu zhig bzhag la nyen kor rnams tsher mas bskor tang de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'dzeg par 'gyur te/_de ltar gyur tang der de rnams 
[\[115b.2\]]gsad par bya'o/_/de nas de rnams kyis brags kyi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de shing tin tu ka gcig pu bzhag nas nyen kor rnams tsher ma'i ra bas bskor te srung ma pa'i mi bzhag nas bsgo ba/_khyod kyis gang gi tshe spre'u rnams tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbron 
[\[115b.3\]]cig_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang /_spre'u rnams kyis sde dpon la smras pa/_sde dpon shing tin tu ka smin cing mchis kyis gsol du gshegs so/_/de nas sde dpon 'khor lnga brgya dang shing tin tu ka la 'dzegs 
[\[115b.4\]]te shing tin tu ka de la bza' bar brtsams so/_/de nas srung ma'i mis ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/_shes ldan dag shing tin tu ka la spre'u thams cad 'dzegs nas za bar byed kyis khyed cag gi bya ba'am byed pa gang yin pa de gyis shig_/de nas ri brags 
[\[115b.5\]]na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lag na mda' gzhu dang dgra sta thogs/_khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas shing tin tu ka bcad par brtsams pa dang /_de nas spre'u de rnams bred de mchong rgal zhing shing ka phan tshun rgyu bar byed do/_/sde dpon ni sems las chung ngus za bar byed pa dang /_
[\[115b.6\]]spre'u de rnams kyis de la smras pa/_sde dpon bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga ba thob cing mchis te phan tshun du rgyu lags na/_khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung ngus bzhugs des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bya ba mang po'i mi rnams la/_/bya ba min pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/
[\[115b.7\]]shing gi 'phro ni mang yod pas/_/sems las bskyungs te bza' bar gyis/_/de nas yang sde dpon gyi phru gu zhig ri brags de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_de sems 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]khong du chud pa mthong nas smras pa/_grogs po ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud/_des smras pa/_da ltar ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du gsod du dong na ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/_ci'i phyir khyod 
[\[116a.2\]]kyis pha rol gnon pa ma byas/_bcings na ji ltar pha rol gnon pa bya/_kho bos khyod dgrol lo zhes des de bkrol ba dang /_de nas des ri brags der me btang ste/_ri brags kun tshig pas ca co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sngangs te smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[116a.3\]]dag bdag cag dang spre'u rnams ni thag ring po kho na yin gyi/_phung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brags bsregs kyis me gsad kyis slar ldog go zhes de rnams me gsad pa'i phyir brgyugs pa dang /_spre'u rnams kyang shing tin tu ka las babs nas bros so/_/dge slong dag ji 
[\[116a.4\]]snyam du sems/_spre'u'i phru gu gang yin pa de ni shAkya rgan po 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brags bsregs la da ltar yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brags bsregs so/_/nag po'i grong khyer du gshegs nas nag po'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas bzhi'i 
[\[116a.5\]]gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ro hi ta kar byon nas ro hi ta ka na gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe gnod sbyin glang chen stobs gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi 'dun sar song ba dang /_gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[116a.6\]]bskyed par byon nas ro hi ta ka na bdag gi gnas kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_
[\[116a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]gnod sbyin glang chen stobs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das do mod bdag gi gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad 
[\[116b.2\]]du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul te/_stan nang tshangs can dang /_sngas nang tshangs can dang /_gor bu lnga brgya 
[\[116b.3\]]dang /_zhugs ling lnga brgya bshams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[116b.4\]]gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song nas de'i ne'u zla kha che yul gyi gnod sbyin sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba de la des bsgo ba/_kho bos 
[\[116b.5\]]sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis byang phyogs kyi 'bras bu rnams skur cig ces des de la pho nya btang nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas/_nang par sngar langs te gtsug lag khang 
[\[116b.6\]]chag chag dang phyag dar byas nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/_khang skyong gis gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_gnod sbyin sgra sgrogs kyis rgun 'brum gyis skon pa bkang ste gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu bskur te/_de dag gis gtsug lag khang gi dbus su phung por 
[\[116b.7\]]spungs te bzhag go/_/dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu 'di dag ci'i yin pa dang /_ji ltar brtag par bya ba mi shes nas/_de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag byang phyogs kyi nags kyi 'bras bu rgun 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]'brum zhes bya ste/_mes brtag pa byos la rim shig_/dge slong rnams 'brum bu re re nas byed pa na shin tu yun ring du thogs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phung po gnyis sam gsum du byos la mes reg par byos shig_/de nas 
[\[117a.2\]]gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos 
[\[117a.3\]]mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[117a.4\]]dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang rgun 'brum mang du lhag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgun 'brum rnams mnyes la khu ba brim par bya'o/_/'on kyang lhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dro 'jar byas te bzhag pa 
[\[117a.5\]]dang dge 'dun gyi dus ma yin pa'i btung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga ni tshe thung ngu'i 
[\[117a.6\]]dus la byung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la bab na gdul ba'i don bya ba ni rab tu mang bas gal te nga dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu byang phyogs su gshegs na ni gdul ba rnams kyi don bya dka' bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig gshegs 
[\[117a.7\]]par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje bos pa/_dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shog_/dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang /_/zhi ba thob pa'i sems kyis ni/_/dran dang ldan 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]pa bde bar nyal/_/dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shog_/dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang /_/rgyal dang pha rol rgyal spangs nas/_/dran dang ldan pa bde bar nyal//_//bar sdom la/_spungs pa can na sangs rgyas stobs/_/re tu ka na chos stobs te/_/sin 
[\[117b.2\]]du na ni phor chen zhabs/_/mgo reg spyi blugs sog ma med/_/hu lu klu dang de bzhin nags/_/gnyid 'grogs drang srong nyams pa dang /_/kan tha 'bras kyi grong khyer du/_/mchog gi ma btul dbang ldan rdza/_/gsing ma'i gnod sbyin chen po dang /_/de bzhin brtsegs 
[\[117b.3\]]skyong dga' 'phel dang /_/srid pa'i lha dang gtum byed kyi/_/bu bdun rnams ni btul ba dang /_/gnod sbyin phyugs skyong 'gro mgyogs dang /_/nab so'i klu la gzugs brnyan btang /_/sbu bu can dang sbubs can btul/_/mdung can gyi ni grong khyer na/_/mdung can zhes 
[\[117b.4\]]bya'i gdon sbyin mo/_/'bra go can dang rdul mchod rten/_/sog med tshogs su bsdus te brjod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje tshur byang phyogs su klu sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[117b.5\]]zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa dag 
[\[117b.6\]]gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa dag mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/de ni u shi ra'i ri yin te/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na zhi gnas 
[\[117b.7\]]dang rjes su mthun pa rnams kyi gnas mal gyi mchog ta ma sa'i tshal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das spungs pa can du gshegs so/_/de'i tshe spungs pa can na gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs zhes bya ba 'dug pa sdig pa'i bsam pa can zhig gnas pas spungs 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis mgu bar byas kyang de dus dus su gnod pa byed do/_/spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das spungs pa can du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos 
[\[118a.2\]]nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan 
[\[118a.3\]]pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad ces bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas spungs pa can na 
[\[118a.4\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 'di bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig 
[\[118a.5\]]nas sha khon ma mchis par ni sha khon bgyid/_'gran zla ma lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid/_glags ma btsal bar ni glags tshol bar bgyid lags na/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs gdul bar gsol/_
[\[118a.6\]]de'i tshe gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas stobs khyod kyis thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[118a.7\]]stobs khyod kyis thos sam/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis thos lags so/_/dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log shig_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ldog lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]gzhi rnams la bzhag go/_/de nas des spungs pa can zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis kyang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 
[\[118b.2\]]zhabs 'bring du chas pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar bzlog nas bka' stsal pa/_skye bo'i tshogs 'di srungs shig_/ngas kyang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ci nas spyan ldings te 'bab par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/gzhan dag gis kyang phyogs 
[\[118b.3\]]der mchod rten brtsigs pas mchod rten spungs pa can zhes bya bar grags so/_/re tu kar byon nas/_re tu kar gnod sbyin chos stobs zhes bya ba btul te/_des re tu ka zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs so/_/sin dur gshegs pa dang /_sin du na mnyan pa gzhan 
[\[118b.4\]]zhig yod pa de bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad pa bskyed de/_de nas dad pa skyes nas bden pa rnams la bzhag go/_/gnod sbyin phor chen btul nas zhabs kyis bcags pas phor chen zhabs kyis bcags pa zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[118b.5\]]ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su gshegs nas der drang srong mgo reg dang ril ba spyi blugs can btul nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gnas mal ril ba spyi blugs can zhes bya ba brtsigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la 
[\[118b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /_klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gshegs so/_/
[\[118b.7\]]klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang khros 'khrugs rngam yi ma rangs nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te ser ba dang rdul gyi char dbab par brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'khrugs 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]so zhes byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_char pa de dag a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so/_/de nas 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mdung thung la sogs te 
[\[119a.2\]]mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams pa de dag kyang lha'i ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra bar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so/_/de nas sog ma med kyis khro ba'i mes du ba dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[119a.3\]]kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis dud pa dbyung bar brtsams so/_/de nas de spungs dang /_rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal bcom par gyur nas gnas su zhugs te 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_klu gdug pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te/_'jigs 
[\[119a.4\]]pa dang /_'khrugs pas yin gyis/_ma la ngas 'di 'jigs su gzhug go snyam du thugs su chud nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'jigs par gyis shig_/de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan 
[\[119a.5\]]te/_rdo rje ri'i rtse la 'phangs nas ri'i rtse mo bshig ste lhung ba des klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas non par gyur to/_/de nas sog ma med sngangs skrag phongs nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas 
[\[119a.6\]]phyogs thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na zhi zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par de gang dang gang du song ba de dang de na mi mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin 
[\[119a.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci bdag la tho btsam lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rga ba'i chos can ci ngas tho btsams sam/_gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dag ma thob na/_khyod kyis nga ming lus par byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /_dra bas 'brel ba/_bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/_'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par 
[\[119b.2\]]mdzad pas spyi bo la reg par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi la zan byin te/_sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha gya nom pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba las khyod kyis smon lam log par btab pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes 
[\[119b.3\]]te/_rdeg pa dang gsod pa la zhen cing pha rol gyi srog 'phrog pa dang /_pha rol gyi srog la gnod pa byed pas 'tsho bar byed na/_'di nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba ma gtogs par khyod kyi 'gro ba ni gang zhig yin/_skye ba ni gang zhig yin/_tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig yin/_
[\[119b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshur nga las skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams zung la/_yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa byin cig_/btsun pa bdag deng slan cad bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[119b.5\]]spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos nas yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i chung ma dang /_bu mo dang mna' ma rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[119b.6\]]bdag cag kyang skyabs su mchi zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams byin no/_/de'i bu ri bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nod 
[\[119b.7\]]lags so/_/sog ma med kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni mi mdza' ba mang ba lags kyis/_ri bo la skyabs su mchi ba stsal cing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams ni mi dpog par gsol/_'dis bdag cag bsrungs par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]'das kyis de la skyabs su 'gro ba byin no/_/de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes sog ma med grogs po dang /_gnyen 'dab dang /_mdza' bshes rnams btul bar gyur pa mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bas gar byas te smras pa/_khros pas lce bskyod 
[\[120a.2\]]mgo mang bsgul nas mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bebs/_/rang gnas skyes bu rang la phyogs pa ri mtho rtse lta bu/_/du ma'i tshogs lhags ngal chad dbugs brdzags bzur cing lta byed pa/_/sbrul bdag sog ma med de drang srong bka' btsan rnams kyis btul/_/de nas bcom 
[\[120a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis sog ma med 'khor drug khri dang bcas pa btul nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa dag gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis 
[\[120a.4\]]tshal sngo zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa dag mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/lag na rdo rje de ni kha che'i yul yin te/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon nas dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_/
[\[120a.5\]]des klu gdug pa hu lu du btul nas thabs bshams te de las skyil mo krung shong ba'i sa blangs nas kha che'i yul kun du bstan pa 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i lhag mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/_kha che'i yul mchog tu 'gyur te/_grong khyer dang 
[\[120a.6\]]grong rdal drug khri dang /_grong rdal drug stong dang /_grong rdal drug bcu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni kha che'i yul yin no/_/yul gnyid 'grogs su drang srong dang gnod sbyin nyams pa 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo/_/yul gan thar gnod sbyin mo 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo/_/'bras 
[\[120a.7\]]kyi grong khyer du byon nas 'bras kyi grong khyer du rgyal po sde mchog gi ma bden pa rnams la rab tu bzhag go/_/yul dbang ldan du byon te/_dbang ldan na rdza mkhan gzhan zhig yod pa de bzos shin tu rgyags te snod rnams skams nas 'khor lo las 'gogs par byed do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas rdza mkhan gyi cha byad du nyid mngon par sprul te de dang lhan cig gtam bya bar brtsams pa/_khyod kyis snod ci 'dra ba dag cig 'khor lo las 'bebs par byed/_des gsol pa/_bskams nas 'bebs so/_/nga yang bskams 
[\[120b.2\]]nas 'bebs so/_/khyod dang bdag mnyam lags so/_/'di kho nar zad dam ci/_nga ni so btang nas kyang 'bebs so/_/khyod lhag go/_/so gtong ba 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do/_/'o na ci zhe na/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel gyi rang bzhin du yang 
[\[120b.3\]]byed do/_/de mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdza mkhan gyi cha byad mi snang bar mdzad de rang bzhin gyi cha byad du bzhugs nas de 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas te bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do/_/gsing ma can du gshegs nas gsing ma can du gnod sbyin 
[\[120b.4\]]chen po 'khor dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bzhag go/_/brtsegs skyong du klu ba lang skyong dang /_dgar ba gnyis so/_/dga' 'phel du gshegs nas dga' 'phel du rgyal po srid pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gtum byed kyi bu 
[\[120b.5\]]bdun dang /_gnod sbyin sa 'tsho bden pa dag la rab tu bkod do/_/de na mtsho chen po yod pa gang yin pa de na 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis klu'i skye gnas su skyes te lo bcu gnyis 'das shing steng du byung ste 'khrugs pas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos 
[\[120b.6\]]ma bshad pas des na bdag cag rnam par ltung ba klu'i skye gnas su skyes kyis ci nas bdag cag gis de'i bstan pa gzhig par bya'o zhes smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_klu 'gro mgyogs dang nab so ni 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas nga yongs su 
[\[120b.7\]]mya ngan las 'das nas nga'i bstan pa thal bar rlag par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do snyam du mkhyen nas/_bcom ldan 'das klu 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la bka' stsal pa/_'gro 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]mgyogs dang /_nab so tshig bzhi pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba yod pa bshad kyis shes par byos shig_/btsun pa bdag cag dam pa'i chos 'tshal bar bgyid pa su zhig mchis snyam du rig nas/_de nyid du slar zhugs te/_de gnyis 
[\[121a.2\]]'di snyam du sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag cag la chos bshad na bdag cag gis rnam par ma shes so snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs der sku'i gzugs brnyan btang nas 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis kyis de la bltas shing bltas shing 
[\[121a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das da dung bzhugs pa lta zhes slar yang dang yang du zhugs so/_/phyogs de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo sbu bu can dang /_sbubs can gnyis btul to/_/mdung can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/_/mdung can gyi grong khyer na gnod sbyin mo mdung 
[\[121a.4\]]can zhes bya ba khro zhing gtum la gzu lums can zhig gnas pas mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag za bar byed do/_/mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mdung can gyi grong khyer du 
[\[121a.5\]]gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang khyu nas khyur phrad cing 'dus nas mdung can gyi grong khyer nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[121a.6\]]phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i 
[\[121a.7\]]bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//_//
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa drug pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te 
[\[121b.2\]]lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /_gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni 
[\[121b.3\]]btul lags na/_btsun pa gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bgyi ba 'di bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha khon ma mchis par ni sha khon du bgyid/_'gran zla ma lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid/_glags ma btsal bar ni glags tshol bar bgyid de/_byis pa btsas shing 
[\[121b.4\]]btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_gnod sbyin mo mdung can gdul bar gsol/_de'i tshe gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod 
[\[121b.5\]]sbyin mo mdung can la bka' stsal pa/_mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so/_/mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis thos lags so/_/dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log shig_/btsun 
[\[121b.6\]]pa dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te 'di dag bdag gi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig par bgyid na bdag ldog par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag khyed kyis thos sam/_
[\[121b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das thos lags so/_/khyed cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_bcom ldan 'das brtsig lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa brtsig lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor dang bcas te btul nas gshegs so/_/'bra 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]go can du gshegs pa dang 'bra go can na byis pa chung ngu dag cig rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa chung ngu dag rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang yang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal 
[\[122a.2\]]pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis byis pa chung ngu rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba dag mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/lag na rdo rje nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi brgya lon pa na 'dir ku sha na'i rigs kyi rgyal po ka nis ka zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba des phyogs 
[\[122a.3\]]'dir mchod rten rtsig par 'gyur te/_de'i ming ka nis ka'i mchod rten zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du srog 
[\[122a.4\]]chags sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag bdun btul nas ro hi ta kar gshegs te gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas nang du yang dag bzhag go/_/bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[122a.5\]]dga' bo dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ni 'di skad ces kun dga' bo byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo /_/
[\[122a.6\]]byang phyogs na ni phan yon rnam pa lnga yod do zhes gsungs la/_da bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du kun dga' bo dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo zhes gsungs na de ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga gnod sbyin 
[\[122a.7\]]lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu byang phyogs su gshegs nas ta ma sa'i tshal rnams lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas rdul gyi mchod rten lung bstan to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/kun dga' bo ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pas srog chags 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag bdun btul te/_byang phyogs na ni nyes dmigs lnga yod de/_mthon dman can dang /_sdong dum dang /_tsher mas gang ba dang /_rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo mang ba dang /_khyi za ba dang /_bud med gnas ngan len kun du spyod 
[\[122b.2\]]pa'o//_//sdom la/_dang po'i rgyal srid rta [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/bcom brlag dang ni o ta la'i/_/kun dga' ra ba dgra mtha' dang /_/tshugs par dka' dang gang gA'i chu/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dus dpog phyi ma yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul dpa' sde nas 
[\[122b.3\]]ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dang po'i rgyal srid du gshegs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur ba dang po rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de ni dang po'i rgyal po 
[\[122b.4\]]yin no/_/de'i phyir 'di dang po'i rgyal srid ces bya bar grags so/_/rta [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gshegs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i rta bzang po rin po che byung ste/_de'i 
[\[122b.5\]]phyir 'di rta [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bcom brlag gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[122b.6\]]mnyan te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa dag gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis tshal sngo 
[\[122b.7\]]zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo de ni ri bo rtse mthon zhes bya ste/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang /_bcom brlag nas gar mkhan dang dpa' bo zhes bya ba spun gnyis kyis de la gtsug lag khang rtsig 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]par 'gyur te/_de'i ming gar mkhan dpa' bo zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo bcom brlag 'dir spos 'tshong gi khye'u sbas pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 
[\[123a.2\]]'gyur te/_de'i bu nye sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi mtshan med pa zhig 'byung ba de nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bas nye 
[\[123a.3\]]sbas de rab tu 'byin par 'gyur te/_gdams ngag ston pa rnams kyi phyi ma ni nye sbas yin par 'gyur ro/_/gar mkhan dpa' bo de la phug srid du khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_zheng du khru bcu gnyis pa/_'phang du khru bdun pa zhig yod par 'gyur te/_des gang dang gang dag la gdams ngag 
[\[123a.4\]]bstan nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa de dang de rnams kyis thur ma sor bzhi tsam pa re re phug de'i nang du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe phug de dgra bcom pa'i thur mas gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe nye sbas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_de yongs su mya ngan 
[\[123a.5\]]las 'das nas dgra bcom pa'i thur ma de dag nyid spungs nas de rnams kyis sreg par byed do/_/dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na skye bo mang po la snying brtse ba dang 
[\[123a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas lung bstan pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de'i tsher ma zad ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung 
[\[123a.7\]]ba ri bo rtse mthon 'di nyid kyi ngos gsum la rang sangs rgyas dang drang srong dang /_spre'u rnams gnas te/_ngos gcig na ni rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o/_/gnyis pa la ni drang srong lnga brgya'o/_/gsum pa la ni spre'u lnga brgya'o/_/spre'u'i sde dpon gyi kun du spyod pa ni spre'u'i phru 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]gu btsas shing btsas pa dag gsod par byed pa yin no/_/de nas spra mo de dag phru gu'i mya ngan gyis non pas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan spra mo dag nyon cig_/bdag cag gi phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag sde dpon 'dis gsod par byed kyis de la thabs 
[\[123b.2\]]shig bsham par bya ste/_bdag cag las spra mo gang zhig sbrum par gyur na des sde dpon la brjod par mi bya'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spra mo zhig sbrum par gyur nas de de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu sbas nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus bsnyod de spre'u'i phru gu byung nas de 
[\[123b.3\]]yang de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu bsnun gsos bskyed de/_de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe des sde dpon de rang gi khyu nas bskrad nas ri bo rtse mthon na phan tshun du 'khyam par brtsams so/_/de 'khyam pa na rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra thos nas de de rnams kyi 
[\[123b.4\]]drung du song ste/_gang gi tshe bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe de rnams la rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang so shing dag 'bul bar byed do/_/de rnams kyis kyang de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi kun 
[\[123b.5\]]du spyod pa ni zos shing zos nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/spre'u des kyang de rnams kyi spyod lam mthong nas skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gi lus rnag can 'dis thob par bya ba 
[\[123b.6\]]gang yin pa ni thob zin gyis/_bdag cag zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go snyam nas/_de nas de rnams kyis 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 
[\[123b.7\]]su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de rnams ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe mi ldang nas spre'u des de rnams ma mthong bas mi dga' bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na spre'u de phug tu zhugs nas rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi chos gos rnams nas gsig par brtsams so/_/de nas phug 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]de na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_spre'u 'dis rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku bshig na mi rung ngo snyam nas rdo leb chen pos sgo bcad nas 'dug go/_/de nas spre'u de mya ngan dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_smre sngags bton te song 
[\[124a.2\]]nas ri bo rtse mthon la kun nas 'khyam pa na mi rnams 'dod pas mi dga' bar gyur te/_rna ba gtod cing mi'i sgra thos par 'dod pa las/_des drang srong de rnams smra ba'i sgra dag thos nas/_de 'gron pa lam stor ba bzhin du rings pa rings par de rnams kyi drung du song ngo /_/
[\[124a.3\]]drang srong de dag kyang dka' thub drag pos gdung bar byed de/_kha cig ni lag pa bsgreng nas 'dug go/_/kha cig ni rkang pa ya gcig gis so/_/kha cig ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe spre'u de de rnams dang lhan cig bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa 
[\[124a.4\]]de'i tshe drang srong de rnams la rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_so shing dag sbyin par byed do/_/de rnams kyang de la zas kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do/_/des de rnams kyi spyod lam dkrugs shing rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston par byed de/_/de 
[\[124a.5\]]na gang dag lag pa sgreng ba de rnams kyi lag pa dag phab nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste/_sbran nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/gang dag rkang pa ya gcig pa de rnams kyi rkang pa phab nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/gang dag gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed pa de 
[\[124a.6\]]rnams kyi me gsad nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste mdun du skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go/_/de nas drang srong de rnams kyis gdams ngag 'bogs pa la smras pa/_mkhan po spre'u 'di bdag cag gi dka' thub la bar chad bgyid do zhes de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras 
[\[124a.7\]]pa shes ldan dag spre'u de dag ni dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/_gdon mi za bar 'dis drang srong kha cig gi spyod lam de lta bu mthong gis khyed cag gis kyang skyil mo krung chos la 'dug shig_/de rnams kyis skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang /_de rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]du gyur nas de rnams kyis mkhan po dang slob dpon med pa'i shes pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum bcu rtsa bdun dang mthun pa'i chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas de rnams spre'u de la chos las byung ba'i dad pa skyes nas/_de rnams kyis ljongs nas bsod 
[\[124b.2\]]snyoms lo tog sar pa dang 'bras bu sar pa dang /_dus gsar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams las de la thog mar byin nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spre'u de dus las 'das so/_/de nas rang byang chub de rnams kyis yul khams dang 
[\[124b.3\]]phyogs sna tshogs na yod pa'i shing dri zhim po rnams blangs te/_shing dri zhim po thams cad kyis phung por spungs nas bsregs so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_rang byang chub rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'i spre'u gang yin pa de ni nye sbas 'di nyid yin te/_'di 
[\[124b.4\]]de'i tshe yang skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs so/_/da ltar na yang ngas 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang snying rje bar lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang /_bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams 
[\[124b.5\]]kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma bcom brlag tu phyin nas de shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag par 'dod de 'chad par byed 'dogs par byed/_rab tu 'jog par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_bye brag tu 'byed par byed/_gsal bar byed/_ston par byed/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[124b.6\]]ston par byed do zhes thos nas/_gal te de bcom brlag tu 'dug na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i bar chad du 'gyur la de ni bkur sti ma yin pas skrag go zhes grag gis/_gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin pa byas nas de lta na de bcom brlag tu 'dug par mi 'gyur 
[\[124b.7\]]ro/_/gal te de la mi smad rigs kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin pa byas na des ni legs par 'gyur na/_bdag cag gi nang na skyes bu gtso bo su zhig yod snyam mo/_/de'i tshe bcom brlag na bram 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ze sngor gyur ces bya ba rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed pa/_pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar gcod par nus pa de'i tshig bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhig yod do/_/de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze 
[\[125a.2\]]rnams 'dus shing tshogs te/_sngor gyur gyi drung du song nas mkhan po 'dir dge sbyong gau ta ma mchis nas/_der shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do zhes thos zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de ni bkur sti ma yin pas 
[\[125a.3\]]skrag go zhes gda' na/_gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na/_de lta na de bcom brlag tu mchis par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de la mi smad rigs kyis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis 
[\[125a.4\]]bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na legs par 'gyur na/_bdag cag gi skyes bu gtso bo mkhan po ma lags pa su zhig mchis/_khyod kyis de la bkur sti ma lags pa'i tshig gi rgya lcag gis spyo bar gsol/_sngor gyur gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag gi lce 'di ni bden 
[\[125a.5\]]pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_gal te spyo bar 'os pa zhig na spyo'o/_/'on te bstod par 'os pa zhig na bstod do/_/de nas bram ze sngor gyur bcom brlag na gnas pa'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba na/_
[\[125a.6\]]bram ze sngor gyur gyis rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 
[\[125a.7\]]'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba shing drung zhig na rten cing zhi ba'i spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ya mtshan skyes te mig bgrad de bltas nas bstod par brtsams pa/_lus dang ngag dang dbang por bcas pa yi/_/yid kyis tshul bzhin rtse gcig bgyis 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]nas ni/_/yon tan rang bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho che/_/khyod kyi yon tan phyogs gcig brjod par bgyi/_/smra ba rnams kyi dam pa rab mchog lags/_/skyon med dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag_/pha rol rgol ba brtson pa thams cad kyis/_/don dam 
[\[125b.2\]]thugs su chud la bskyod mi nus/_/khyod kyi spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa nyid/_/brtul zhugs bsgrubs pas brtul zhugs shin tu rdzogs/_/stobs ldan khyod kyi ting 'dzin zad med pas/_/sred med bu dang ri yi rgyal po bzhin/_/skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la gnod mi 
[\[125b.3\]]mnga'/_/mi zhum bsnyengs pa mi mnga' dub mi mnga'/_/'byung po rnams la'ang mi bzod 'ga' mi mnga'/_/khyod ni ma chags 'thab pa ga la mnga'/_/brtabs pa med cing ha cang zhum mi mnga'/_/gdung ba med cing dgyes pa'ang yong mi mnga'/_/ri yi bdag po 
[\[125b.4\]]lhun po rab brtan ltar/_/khyod kyi thugs ni rtag tu dge ba nyid/_/thub pa skyes mchog khams rnams thams cad nas/_/khyod kyi ye shes yangs pa sgrib mi mnga'/_/skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ni/_/ma thogs nyams shing zad pa med par 'jug_/thub pa 
[\[125b.5\]]khyod la gang la'ang som nyi med/_/yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod ma yin/_/khyod nyid kyis ni mchog dang mchog min pa/_/rig pas thugs su chud nas thams cad mkhyen/_/mthong na dga' bar 'gyur la mthong na legs/_/mthong na legs pas mthong na mkhas 
[\[125b.6\]]pa dga'/_/khyod la dga' dang mi dga' mnyam pas na/_/rtag tu dga' ba'i spyod lam de bzhin mdzad/_/khyod ni snyan pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags/_/'dzum pa'i gsung dang dran ldan bsnyengs pa med/_/mkhas rnams 'dod pa rab tu 'chad pas na/_/'jig rten 
[\[125b.7\]]gsum du khyod kyi grags pa 'byung /_/mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang /_/srin po mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dag_/thub pa'i drung du yang dang yang lhags nas/_/khyod la yang dang yang zhu mi bzod med/_/khyod ni snyan pa'i gsung gis dga' mdzad pas/_/mi 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang /_/srin po yid gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che/_/khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar mchi'o/_/bzhengs dang bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang /_/mnal dang mi gsung yang na gsung ba'am/_/'on 
[\[126a.2\]]te lhung bzed chos gos bsnams pa dag_/gau tam khyod kyi thams cad mdzes pa nyid/_/thogs pa med mnga' mi myur mnyam pas na/_/gsung ni snyan pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan/_/mi yi mchog ni dus su gsung bas na/_/gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa 
[\[126a.3\]]lags/_/'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par grags/_/skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gtso/_/'jig rten lhar bcas 'di ni mtha' dag la/_/nga rgyal mi mnga' khyad du gsod mi mdzad/_/mdza' ba dang ni mdza' ba ma lags dang /_/mthun pa dang ni 
[\[126a.4\]]mthun pa ma lags dang /_/g.yo dang mi g.yo rang bzhin gnas pa la/_/ngo mtshar 'dzin pa nam yang mi mnga'o/_/smre sngags 'don cing snying brtser smra ba dang /_/kha chu 'dzags pas nyam thag skad 'byin dang /_/yongs su gdungs dang rnam par gdungs ldan dang /_/
[\[126a.5\]]'jigs dang rims nad mya ngan gyis nyen pa/_/sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya yis gtses pa dang /_/yun ring nas ni mgon med bde ba med/_/srid pa'i sred par zhugs shing mun bsgribs pa'i/_/'gro ba 'khrugs pa la ni rab gzigs nas/_/bdag nyid rnam 
[\[126a.6\]]pa sna tshogs mthu dag gis/_/thub pa thugs rje chen po 'jug mdzad cing /_/shAkya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis/_/phongs par gyur rnams dgrol phyir brtson par mdzad/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas 'di dang /_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal zad pa gang yin 
[\[126a.7\]]dang /_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba yi/_/lam ni mtshungs pa med pa khyod kyis bshad/_/rnam par 'dren pa chen po brtson 'grus che/_/rab mchog pha rol smra ba rnams kyi mchog_/'jig rten gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na/_/khyod las 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]lhag pa lta zhig ga la mchis/_/khyod la khong khro rjes su chags mi mnga'/_/thub pa khyod la yongs su zag mi mnga'/_/sdug dang 'gal dang rtsod pa brtul zhugs bzang /_/khyod la mi mnga' rtag tu mi mnga' lags/_/thub pa sdug dang mi sdug bde ba dang /_/
[\[126b.2\]]sdug bsngal mnyam dang de bzhin mi mnyam spangs/_/dga' dang mi dga' ba dag bzod mdzad de/_/yang dag bsdams shing 'di na nyer zhi spyod/_/smad pa byas kyang gnod pa mi mnga' la/_/rab tu bsngags pas khengs par mi 'gyur bas/_/grags pa grags 
[\[126b.3\]]pa ma yin khyod la mnyam/_/glang chen mche bar ldan pa g.yul ngo ru/_/'dor ba drag tu 'phangs pa'i mda' dag ltar/_/skye bo sdig can rnams kyis smras pa yi/_/tshig ngan tshig rtsub dag kyang bzod par mdzad/_/drang srong khyod snyan gsung zhing tshig kyang 
[\[126b.4\]]bzod/_/shin tu ngan du smras pa'ang mi bzod med/_/smad par smras sam dge bar smras kyang rung /_/thub pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags/_/mchod 'os rtag par mi dang lha dag dang /_/lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang ni/_/drang srong bdag nyid chen 
[\[126b.5\]]pos rtag mchod na/_/khyod ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'/_/'di bas bdag mchog ces kyang rlom mi mnga'/_/'di bas bdag chung zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'/_/bdag ni 'di dang mnyam zhes mi rlom pas/_/khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa gsum mi mnga'/_/
[\[126b.6\]]brtan dang ldan la bong ba gser dang mtshungs/_/bai DUr+ya dang gseg ma gyo mor mtshungs/_/thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi/_/'gro ba 'di ni rtswa shing 'dra bar spyod/_/zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad nas/_/grang dang tsha ba'i rlung dag langs na yang /_/ri yi dbang po 
[\[126b.7\]]lta bur bzod mdzad de/_/thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'/_/gzims cha dang ni stsang nas bshos dang ni/_/bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dag_/thub pa zag med so sor brtags nas ni/_/de yi don du bsten par mdzad pa lags/_/mgon po 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]bdag la med ces thugs ngan med/_/ma bcings legs gsung bdag gir 'dzin mi mnga'/_/gnod pa sna tshogs dag las yongs su grol/_/rnyed pa brnyes na'ang dgyes par mi 'gyur la/_/de ma brnyes pas kyang ni zhum mi 'gyur/_/
[\[127a.2\]]khyad du gsod pa bzod pa mdzad cing 'dir/_/bkur sti dag la'ang chags pa mi mnga' lags/_/lha gnas ri yi ngos las 'khrungs pa yi/_/khrag ltar dmar ba'i tsan dan mchog dag dang /_/mda' dang ral gri rnon pos khyod kyi thugs/_/lan 'ga' yang ni 
[\[127a.3\]]'gyur ba mi mnga' lags/_/don med gtam ni gsung bar mi mdzad gang /_/skye bo ngan pas bsten pa'i gtam ma lags/_/rnyed pa'i gtam min zang zing bcas gtam min/_/bdag nyid che rnams mi 'dod ma lags kyi/_/gtam gang rab dben bde ba 
[\[127a.4\]]skyed byed cing /_/rab tu zhi ba 'ba' zhig rab brjod pa/_/lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni gang dag cig_/gsungs nas sdig pa rnam par 'dul ba gsungs/_/snyan pa rnams dang 'brel pa rnams dang ni/_/legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa yi/_/
[\[127a.5\]]rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag thub pa che/_/'gro ba'i don slad rab tu gsung bar mdzad/_/mi mkhas dag dang log par lta rnams dang /_/gzu lums can dang dga' bar ldan rnams dang /_/phra ma can dang tshig rtsub sgyu can gang /_/de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen/_/
