[\[127a.6\]]mi ni gang dag drang zhing sgyu med la/_/bden la dga' zhing dbang po thul ba dang /_/rtag tu legs par brtags nas byed pa ni/_/de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen/_/chos mkhyen lugs mkhyen gang zag mkhyen pa dang /_/drug po mngon mkhyen khyod la rtag phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[127a.7\]]thub pa zhing mkhyen mchog dang mchog min mkhyen/_/tshul dang tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/_/khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rgya chen legs mthong nas/_/bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig yongs su brjod par bas/_/'phags pa khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]rol ni/_/rtogs par rngo thog 'gro ba'i nang na mi ma mchis/_/de lta bu la sogs pa bstod pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngor gyur ji ltar stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa 
[\[127b.2\]]mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bram ze sngor gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas song ste de lam du zhugs pa na/_bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig gi rgya lcag gis pags pa las thal ba tsam du brgyad de/_mkhan po khyod 
[\[127b.3\]]la kho bo cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma la bkur sti ma yin pa byos shig ces smras na/_khyod da gzod slar bstod de 'ong ngam/_shes ldan dag kho bos sngar kho bo'i lce ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_gal te smad par 'os pa zhig na smod la/_bstod par 'os pa 
[\[127b.4\]]zhig na bstod do zhes sngar ma smras sam/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bstod par 'os pas kho bos bstod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas bcom brlag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de'i tshe bcom 
[\[127b.5\]]brlag na rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bab bo/_/de nas bcom brlag na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma bcom brlag tu 'ongs na bdag gi rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bar chad byed par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[127b.6\]]spyan sngar sgren mor byed nas 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo re zhig bud med ni shin tu bkab kyang bzang ba ma yin na sgren mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas lha mo de skyengs nas phyogs gcig tu song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[127b.7\]]kyis lam las bzur te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bcom brlag na ni nyes dmigs lnga po 'di dag yod de/_lnga gang zhe na mthon dman 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]dang sdong dum dang tsher mas gang ba dang /_rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo mang ba dang /_dgongs ka za ba dang bud med mang ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs par bcom brlag gi gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas gang na ba de logs su 
[\[128a.2\]]gshegs te byon nas/_gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas byul te shing drung zhig tu rten cing nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu bong bu'i gzugs su byas nas 'phyan pa dang de la khye'u dang bu mo dag zhon pa dang /_des de dag rtser bcug_/dga' bar 
[\[128a.3\]]byed du bcug nas nags thibs por song nas za bar byed pas/_de'i ming gnod sbyin bong bu gnod sbyin bong bu zhes bya bar grags so/_/bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las lha mo zhig 
[\[128a.4\]]gis tho btsams pas/_bcom brlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas su gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag so so nas snod du btsos shing bsdogs te shing rtar bcug nas bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[128a.5\]]na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[128a.6\]]gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs 
[\[128a.7\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du 'dir gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis shing rta bkang ste 'tshal te mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bar bzung ste de bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus shig_/
[\[128b.2\]]bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go/_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na/_dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa 
[\[128b.3\]]de dag thams cad/_rim gro'i gnas su bsogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 
[\[128b.4\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsogs lags te/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_
[\[128b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[128b.6\]]'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas zhes bya ba nas/_phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[128b.7\]]'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /_gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni btul lags na/_btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu 'di bdag cag la yun ring po zhig nas sha khon ma mchis par ni sha khon bgyid/_'gran zla ma lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid/_glags ma btsal 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]bar ni glags tshol bar bgyid de/_bus pa btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste gnod sbyin bong bu gdul bar gsol/_de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 
[\[129a.2\]]'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu la bka' stsal pa/_bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so/_/bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis thos lags so/_/dam pa ma yin 
[\[129a.3\]]pa'i chos sdig pa las log shig_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi slad du phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rtsig par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na bdag ldog go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams 
[\[129a.4\]]la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag khyed cag gis thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das thos lags te brtsig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang btul to/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis de'i ched du gtsug 
[\[129a.5\]]lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin mda' can dang gnod sbyin nags ldan dang gnod sbyin mo bslang rnyed ma dang mchu rnams btul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom brlag tu zhugs so/_/zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo 'gran zla ma 'khor 
[\[129a.6\]]lnga brgya dang btul nas de'i don du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang dang phyi rol du gnod sbyin nyis stong lnga brgya btul nas de'i ched du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nyis stong lnga brgya brtsigs 
[\[129a.7\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das o ta lar gshegs te/_o ta lar o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/_/de na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing pa lnga brgya tsam mgo bo rdul gyis yog cing sha na'i ras kyis smad g.yogs bgos nas zhing rmed pa las zhing pa de rnams kyi sangs 
[\[129b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_gzi brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chos bshad pas zhes bya ba nas mchod par bya ba dang rjed par bya ba dang /_
[\[129b.3\]]mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas rmon pa stong po de dag gnya' shing dang ru thag bcad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskor te 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig 
[\[129b.4\]]gsum gyi chos bshad pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes nas zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[129b.5\]]btsun pa zhing pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur nas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skyes shing 'di rnams ni rmon par gyur lags/_dge slong dag 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/_
[\[129b.6\]]'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin te/_'di rnams kyis de na le los dus 'das par byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur to/_/rmon pa 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung nas bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo 
[\[129b.7\]]rnams la gus par ma byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes so/_/'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bus dge sbyong shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang 
[\[130a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang o ta lar byon nas/_o ta la na o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs te/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i dge ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs 
[\[130a.3\]]su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags par gyur te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[130a.4\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa skye dgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams la rang gi mngon 
[\[130a.5\]]par shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi zag pa zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /_des chos bshad pa ni thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_
[\[130a.6\]]don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa rnam par byang ba 'ba' zhig ston to zhes thos nas/_dge sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni legs pa yin/_nye bar 'gro ba ni legs pa yin/_bsnyen bkur byed pa ni legs pa yin 
[\[130a.7\]]no snyam du bsams nas shing rta rta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te o ta la nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/_de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/_bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu 
[\[130b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 
[\[130b.3\]]'das la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang yul tha dad pa can rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi/_gzhan gyis spyod yul dang yul gzhan nyams su myong bar mi 
[\[130b.4\]]'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_mig gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_sna'i dbang po dang /_lce'i dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po gang dag lags pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong bar bgyid pa ni gang lags/_de rnams kyi ston pa yang gang lags/_
[\[130b.5\]]bram ze dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang /_yul tha dad pa can 'di lta ste/_mig gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_sna'i dbang po dang /_lce'i dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba ni yid yin no/_/
[\[130b.6\]]de rnams kyi rton pa yang yid yin no/_/kye gau ta ma yid kyi rton pa gang lags/_bram ze yid kyi rton pa ni dran pa yin no/_/kye gau ta ma dran pa'i rton pa gang lags/_bram ze dran pa'i rton pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no/_/kye gau ta ma dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton 
[\[130b.7\]]pa gang lags/_bram ze dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yin no/_/kye gau ta ma byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa gang lags/_bram ze byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no/_/kye gau ta ma rig pa dang 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]rnam par grol ba'i rton pa gang lags/_bram ze rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/_/kye gau ta ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i rton pa gang lags/_bram ze ha cang thal ches so ha cang thal ches so dri ba rnams kyi mtha' 
[\[131a.2\]]gzung bar mi nus te/_nga'i drung du ni yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi mthar bya ba'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa can spyod par byed do/_/de nas bram ze o ta la'i 
[\[131a.3\]]bu 'di snyam du sems te/_'di la gnod pa ci zhig bya snyam mo/_/des kyang sngon dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab na des ci bsam pa dang ci gsol pa de thams cad so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes thos so/_/de nas 
[\[131a.4\]]bram ze o ta la'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par 
[\[131a.5\]]gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/_gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas smon lam log pa gdab 
[\[131a.6\]]par brtsams pa bdag gis shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed cig bshos gsol ba 'di thams cad bdag gi glang du gyur cig snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram ze o ta la'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bram ze o ta la'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[131a.7\]]bram ze khyod kyis mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar dge slong 'di thams cad ni yang srid pa zad pa yin gyis/_sems gzhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze o ta la'i bus smon lam log pas bslang ba'i sems 
[\[131b.2\]]sdig pa can bskyed kyis/_khyod cag gis zan zos nas gtsug lag khang gi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cig dang log pa'i smon lam 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang 
[\[131b.3\]]yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_o ta la na bran mo rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de bum pa thogs nas chu chur khron pa'i drung du song ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i gdul ba'i dus 
[\[131b.4\]]mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la rgan mo pha bi la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis chu phul cig ces sgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_rgan mo 
[\[131b.5\]]ka tsang ga la gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rgan mo ka tsang ga la la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ka tsang ga la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis chu phul cig des smras pa 'phags pa bdag nyid 'tshal te mchi'o/_/de nas ka tsang ga las chus bum pa bkang nas rings pa [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[131b.6\]]par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /_ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_'od zer nyi ma stong bas 
[\[131b.7\]]lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu yang de la bu'i sdug pa skyes nas des lag pa bsgreng ste bu bu zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de bzlog go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]dge slong dag khyed kyis rgan mo 'di ma zlog shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang /_/rtag tu nga yi yum gyur pas/_/nga yi sku la reg pa las/_/gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na/_/de'u re mod la khrag dron dag_/'di yi kha nas 
[\[132a.2\]]skyug par 'gyur/_/bu la gdung ba 'di mthong nas/_/byas pa gzo ba rjes dgongs te/_/thugs rje dang ni thugs brtse bas/_/sku la reg tu gnang bar bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgur nas 'khyud du gnang bas de bu la chags pa dang bral nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[132a.3\]]kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos nas 
[\[132a.4\]]ka tsang ga las 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas ma bgyis te mas ma 
[\[132a.5\]]lags zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang gsol pa/_ma la lan 
[\[132a.6\]]du phan 'dogs pa'i/_/bu mchog gis ni bgyi ba gang /_/thar la sems gzhol 'gyur ba de/_/khyod kyis de ring bdag la mdzod/_/khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/_/drangs te mtho ris thar la bzhag_/khyod ni brtsal ba chen po yis/_/dka' ba legs par mdzad pa 
[\[132a.7\]]lags/_/zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na ka tsang ga las jo bo la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 
[\[132b.2\]]'thob pa lta na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/_/de nas des rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no/_/des brtson 'grus dang 'bad pa dang /_brtsal 
[\[132b.3\]]ba byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom mar gyur te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas rjed par bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa 
[\[132b.4\]]bdun pa/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsdus te mdor bka' stsal nas/_gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir 'jug par mdzad pa de'i tshe ka tsang ga las de rgyas par lung ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 
[\[132b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma ka tsang ga la 'di mchog yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun 
[\[132b.6\]]pa ka tsang ga las las ci zhig bgyis na des na rgas nas rab tu byung bar gyur/_las ci zhig bgyis na des na dbul ba dang bran mor gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa tha ma de'i mngal du ma bzung bar gyur/_rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis shing bcom ldan 
[\[132b.7\]]'das kyis kyang mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa dag ces bya ba nas/_/lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa na 'di nga'i yum du gyur te/_gang gi tshe nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe 'dis nga bzlog pas las de'i rnam par smin pas rgas nas rab tu byung ngo /_/nga sbyin pa 
[\[133a.2\]]gtong ba na 'dis bar chad byas pas des na dbul bar gyur to/_/ji ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo ltar 'dis bsod nams dang dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ba'i las ma byas te/_des na nga'i srid pa tha ma 'dis mngal du ma bzung ngo /_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[133a.3\]]las rab tu byung nas dge slong ma slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams la bran mo zhes tshig tu brjod pas des na bran mor gyur to/_/des na 'dis gang dag bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel 
[\[133a.4\]]bar 'byung pa la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas/_des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/rab tu 'byin pa'i mkhan mo gang yin pa de yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[133a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa dang /_des na 'dis kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yon gnas bla 
[\[133a.6\]]na med pa la tshe ji srid cig tu tshangs par spyod pa la spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe 
[\[133a.7\]]lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas/_ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces byas te/_de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis ngas da ltar mdo sde rnam par 
[\[133b.2\]]'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes 
[\[133b.3\]]de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yul dgra mtha' gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas 
[\[133b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /_ji tsam na kun dga' ra ba zhig na bram ze zhig khron pa nas chu bcus shing kun dga' ra ba bcu bar brtsams so/_/bram ze des rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsams pa/_gal te dge sbyong 
[\[133b.5\]]gau ta ma kun dga' ra bar zhugs na kun dga' ra ba dang chu ma rung bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas sgo bcad de dpyang thag dang chu snod sbas nas 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis kun dga' ra bar zhugs pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len 
[\[133b.6\]]gyis khron pa de bzung nas kun dga' ra ba de thams cad chus yog par byas so/_/de nas bram ze de dag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no/_/snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur te gsol pa/_shes ldan gau ta ma tshur spyon/_dpyang thag ni 'di 
[\[133b.7\]]lags/_chab snod ni 'di lags kyis chab ci bder bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gal te kun na chu yod na/_/khron pa'i chus ko ci zhig bya/_/'dir ni sred pa'i rtsa bcad nas/_/gang zhig yongs su 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]brtsal bar spyod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/_dge 
[\[134a.2\]]slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mdo la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab 
[\[134a.3\]]par gyur/_/des brtson 'grus dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal bar byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes 
[\[134a.4\]]bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang yul dgra mthar gshegs te/_dgra mtha' na sbu bu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dgra mtha' na rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba 
[\[134a.5\]]dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang dgra mthar byon nas/_dgra mtha' na sbu bu can 
[\[134a.6\]]gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni mtha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed par byas/_mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur la/_gal te bdag gis dge sbyong 
[\[134a.7\]]gau ta ma la bkur sti ma byas na mtha'i rgyal phran rnams shes ldan dag kye ma rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin ni byis pa yin te/_de'i grong dang zhing na dge sbyong gau ta ma nye bar rten cing bzhugs na bsnyen bkur ma byas so zhes smod par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so snyam du bsams nas/_rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang /_rgyal po chen po'i mthus dgra mtha' nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang 
[\[134b.2\]]dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab 
[\[134b.3\]]tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[134b.4\]]gsol to/_/shes ldan gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom 
[\[134b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/_rjes su yi rangs nas stan las langs te 
[\[134b.6\]]song ngo /_/de rang gi khyim du song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sna [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_sran tshod sna tshogs dang /_tshod ma ro dang ldan pa dang /_'bras chan rab tu mang por tshos shig_/dgra mthar dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_dge 
[\[134b.7\]]sbyong gau ta ma zla ba gsum du gzhan gyis gdugs tshod ma gsol cig_/gang zhig gis gdugs tshod gsol na de ni chad par gsad do zhes des de skad du dril bsgrags nas nub mo nyal ba dang rmi lam na bdag gi rgyu mas dgra mtha'i grong khyer thams cad bskor ba rmis so/_/rmis nas kyang 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]sngangs skrag bred cing spu zing zhes byed nas myur ba myur bar mal chen po nas langs te/_lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las de nam 
[\[135a.2\]]nangs nas bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa/_mkhan po bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam zhig mthong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/_'di ltar lhas rmang lam bzang po zhig rmis te gal te bdag gis de dang mthun par bsnyad na 'di lhag par yang 
[\[135a.3\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma la dad pa skyed par 'gyur gyi ma la bdag gis 'di ngan par bsnyad do snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_lha rmang lam mi bzang lags so/_/mkhan po 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur/_lha gdon ma 'tshal bar rgyal srid las nyams pa'am srog gi bar chad du 'gyur lags 
[\[135a.4\]]so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_e ma'o kyi hud bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas bram ze mdun na 'don la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang gis na kho bo rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_srog gi bar 
[\[135a.5\]]chad du mi 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/_des smras pa/_lha gal te mi gda' ba'i phyogs su zla ba gsum bzhugs na/_des na lha rgyal srid las mi nyams shing srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bsams pa/_gal te de lta 
[\[135a.6\]]na de bya sla bas dril sgrogs su gzhug go snyam nas/_des yul thams cad du dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_nga la zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye bar su yang ma 'ong shig_/gang zhig 'ongs na de ni chad par gsad do zhes dril sgrogs su bcug nas zla ba gsum du mi snang ba'i phyogs shig 
[\[135a.7\]]na 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/_rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba las/_ji tsam na rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams sems las chung ngus 'khod pa dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]dag ci sems las chung ngus 'khod dam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci zhig bgyir mchis/_rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs sam/_khyed cag sems las 
[\[135b.2\]]chung ngus 'khod nas gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed/_gdan yang mi shom na ci sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gcod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo lhas lnga brgya rnams kyi ched du zhal zas bsod pa mang du sta gon byos shig 
[\[135b.3\]]ces ni bka' stsal gyi/_che ge mo zhig gi don du'o zhes bka' ma stsal lags so/_/shes ldan dag deng lha la zhus shig_/'phags pa lhas dril sgrogs su stsal ba/_nga la zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye bar su yang ma 'ong shig_/gang zhig 'ongs na de chad par gsad do zhes 
[\[135b.4\]]bsgrags na ci bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis mchis sam/_bdag cag ni mi zhu lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[135b.5\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong 
[\[135b.6\]]gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des zhal zas gsol cig ces sbron cig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i 
[\[135b.7\]]lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des zhal zas gsol cig_/dgra mtha'i bram ze dang 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag cag lta zhig re res kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro lags mod kyi/_rgyal po sdig can 'dis dril sgrogs su stsal ba/_
[\[136a.2\]]gzhan sus kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te zla ba gsum du zhal zas ma gsol cig_/gang zhig gis zhal zas gsol na de ni chad par gsad do zhes bsgrags lags so/_/ji tsam na byang phyogs nas ded dpon zhig rta lnga brgya la khal bkal te 
[\[136a.3\]]dgra mthar phyin nas des bsams pa/_gal te mod la chas na rta rnams kyi rmid pa dub pas 'theng bar 'gyur zhing lom par yang mi 'gyur bas 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam nas/_de de nyid du 'dug nas des rta cang shes la ni chas nas bre'u chung do/_rta lhag ma rnams la 
[\[136a.4\]]ni bre'u chung re rer thang bcad do/_/des rgyal pos rtsis mgo 'di dang 'di dag byas so zhes thos la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa yang thos nas des bsams pa/_bdag ni rgyal po 'di'i yul na gnas pa ma yin pas bdag la rgyal pos ci byar yod 
[\[136a.5\]]snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag gis rta cang shes la ni chas nas bre'u chung do/_rta lhag ma rnams la ni bre'u chung re re'i thang lags na/_gal te bcom ldan 'das nas gsol bar spro na/_bcom 
[\[136a.6\]]ldan 'das la ni bdag gis nas bre'u chung do do/_dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni bre'u chung re re dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[136a.7\]]'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las nga nyid kyis byas shing bsags pas nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]so sor myong bar 'gyur te/_las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song 
[\[136b.2\]]la dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims te/_khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig dgra mthar zla ba gsum du longs spyad par spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces sgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[136b.3\]]mnyan nas tshul shing brim par brtsams pa na/_gang yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang bas tshul shing blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bser ma'i bro nad mchis pas dgung zla gsum du stsang nas kyis 
[\[136b.4\]]longs spyad par mi spro lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/_bdag ni 'di'i bro g.yog lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu dgra mthar dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/
[\[136b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu ni ri bo rtse gsum gyi khar song ste dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bdud rtsis bstabs so/_/de nas ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la ni nas bre'u chung do do 'bul lo/_/dge slong gzhan 
[\[136b.6\]]rnams la bre'u chung re re'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byos shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[136b.7\]]ltar mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal blangs te bud med rgan mo gzhan zhig gang na yod pa der song nas phyin pa dang /_bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su bya na khyod nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]pa bdag rgan mos rngo mi thog ste 'on kyang bu mo 'di gzhon lags kyis 'di la stsol cig dang /_'dis ni ci legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i drung du song ste phyin nas smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched 
[\[137a.2\]]du nas la ci legs su byed nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag dang dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te bdag la tshig 'ga' gsung ba lta na ci legs su bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_byi dor gyis shig dang smra'o/_/de nas 'dru zhing dris pa/_'phags pa sangs rgyas zhes bgyi 
[\[137a.3\]]ba 'di ci lags/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/_gal te 'di la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zab pa yin pas 'dis shes par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di la 'khor 
[\[137a.4\]]los sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na rin po che sna bdun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bdun po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang rin po che 
[\[137a.5\]]dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che yin no/_/sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na 'khor lo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[137a.6\]]sring mo 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la mgo khrus byas te smyung ba byas nas/_de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug pa na/_shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rin po che lte ba dang bcas pa/_rtsibs stong 
[\[137a.7\]]dang ldan pa/_myu khyud dang bcas pa/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/_mdzes pa/_mkhan bzos ma byas pa/_bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gang yin pa 'dis gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]kyi tshe zhes bya ba nas thams cad gser las byas zhes bya ba nas de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bdag ni gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to snyam nas/_de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'khor lo 
[\[137b.2\]]rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_'khor lo rin po che de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste lag pa g.yas pas spor cing /_kye 'khor lo rin po che 
[\[137b.3\]]sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig_/rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig ces smra'o/_/de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spar ba dang /_steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas shar phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor 
[\[137b.4\]]los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin pa nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo rin po che de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[137b.5\]]rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing /_shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces lha tshur gshegs/_
[\[137b.6\]]lha byon pa legs so/_/yul 'khor 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di ni lha'i lags kyis/_lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/_bdag cag ni lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[137b.7\]]de'i phyir sna bo dag khyed cag rang rang gi yul 'khor chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/_/'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam 'dren mar spyod pa zhig yod na/_khyed kyis de yul 'khor du ma bzhag cig_/de lta na khyed cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]no/_/de nas 'khor lo rin po che de shar phyogs mngon par phab nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs su yang sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur bas/_
[\[138a.2\]]de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spar ba dang /_steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas byang phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo rin po che de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[138a.3\]]po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing /_byang phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang 
[\[138a.4\]]dag yin pa de dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces lha tshur gshegs/_lha byon pa legs so/_/yul 'khor 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi 
[\[138a.5\]]mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di ni lha'i lags kyis/_lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/_bdag cag ni lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de'i phyir sna bo dag khyed cag rang rang gi yul rnams chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin 
[\[138a.6\]]no/_/'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/_'dren mar spyod na khyed kyis yul 'khor du ma bzhag cig_/de lta na khyed cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no/_/de nas 'khor lo rin po che des byang phyogs mngon par phab nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste/_rgyal 
[\[138a.7\]]po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin nas dkor khang gi steng du srog shing btsugs pa bzhin du gnas so/_/sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na 'khor lo rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na glang po rin po che ji lta bu 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i glang po ni thal kar me tog ku mu da'i mdog lta bu yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa yin no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'di 
[\[138b.2\]]mthong na sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/_kye ma'o glang po rin po che bzang po zhig yin gyis myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/des 
[\[138b.3\]]pa khyod kyis glang po rin po che 'di myur ba kho nar legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan mkhas pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas/_glang po rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob 
[\[138b.4\]]par byed de/_de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad slob pa na nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs pa ni dper na glang po che gzhan rnams lo du ma dang /_lo khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/_glang po rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig 
[\[138b.5\]]la bslab pa thams cad bslabs pa na nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so/_/de dul bar rig nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed de/_lha glang po rin po che bzang po ni dul lags te/_lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas 'khor 
[\[138b.6\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas/_nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che de la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po bskor te/_rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal tshus la 'bab ste/_sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 
[\[138b.7\]]'jig rten du byung na glang po rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na rta rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rta ni thams cad sngo ba mgo gnag cing rngog 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]mjug sdug pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa yin te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos de mthong nas sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/_kye ma rta rin po che bzang po zhig yin gyis myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/_de 
[\[139a.2\]]nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa khyod kyis rta rin po che 'di myur ba kho nas legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rta mkhan mkhas pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[139a.3\]]po las mnyan nas/_rta rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed de/_de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob pa na/_nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs pa ni dper na rta gzhan rnams lo du ma dang /_lo khyud skor 
[\[139a.4\]]du mar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/_rta rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad slob pa na nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so/_/de dul bar rig nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar 
[\[139a.5\]]byed de/_lha rta rin po che bzang po ni dul lags te/_lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta rin po che brtag par 'dod nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po 
[\[139a.6\]]bskor te rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal tshus la 'bab ste/_sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na rta rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na nor bu rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 
[\[139a.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor bu ni zur brgyad yod pa/_bai DUr+ya bzang po'i rigs can/_dang ba/_gsal ba/_rnam par dang ba yin te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang na me mar gyi bya ba thams cad nor bu de'i 'od kyis 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]byed do/_/de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod nas mun gnag smag tu gyur la/_lhas mtshan mo char gyi rgyun dal bu dal bus 'bebs shing /_glog 'gyu ba'i dus su nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag nas skyed mos tshal gyi nang du 
[\[139b.2\]]dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong ba na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_rgyang grags phyed kho ra khor yug tu nor bu'i 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te/_sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung 
[\[139b.3\]]na nor bu rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na btsun mo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo ni gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_
[\[139b.4\]]blta na sdug pa/_ha cang mi dkar ba/_ha cang mi sngo ba/_nya khar ba ltar pags pa 'jam pa/_ha cang mi ring ba/_ha cang mi thung ba/_bong ran pa/_ha cang mi sbom pa/_ha cang mi skem pa/_ha cang mi tsho ba/_sha bre ran pa gang yin pa ste/_sring mo de ni grang ba'i tshe 
[\[139b.5\]]lus la reg na dro ba/_tsha ba'i tshe lus la reg na bsil ba/_yul ka ling ka'i gos ltar reg na 'jam pa'o/_/sring mo de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo /_/kha nas ni ut+pa la sngon po'i dri 'byung ngo /_/ji srid kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun 
[\[139b.6\]]mo rin po che'i bar du bshad pa de srid kyis bu mo des kyang nas kyi bya ba zin nas/_des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[139b.7\]]dga' bos nas byi dor byas pa khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nas 'di su zhig gis byi dor byas/_btsun pa bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig gis bgyis lags so/_/kun dga' bo khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam dag byas sam/_bcom ldan 'das bgyis lags 
[\[140a.2\]]so/_/kun dga' bo des na khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad nga la rgyas par gsol cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bram ze'i bu mo dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das 
[\[140a.3\]]la rgyas par gsol to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis ci'i phyir bu mo de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa ma brjod/_btsun pa bdag gis 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[140a.4\]]chos ni zab pa lags pas bu mo 'dis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis so snyam du bsams nas/_de'i slad du bdag gis de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod lags so/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te/_khyod kyis gal 
[\[140a.5\]]te de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod pa byas na/_des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod pa zhig_/kun dga' bo 'on kyang bu mo de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin 
[\[140a.6\]]po cher 'gyur ro/_/kun du bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi don du nas byi dor byas pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan to zhes sgra grags pa dag bu mo lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba zhig gis thos nas/_dge 
[\[140a.7\]]slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba rnams kyi nas byi dor byas te/_de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab pa/_bdag cag de'i 'khor du gyur cig_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis nas kyi bshos gsol bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas/_
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe brgyud pa de dang de rnams su phyag dang /_zhabs dang /_dbu la sogs pa bcad cing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de da ni nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta zhes mchi ma dbyung 
[\[140b.2\]]bar brtsams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing mchi ma glog_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs na rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste/_phyag 
[\[140b.3\]]dang /_zhabs dang /_dbu la sogs pa bkum zhing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes pa de da ni stsang nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta snyam bgyid lags mod/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod de 
[\[140b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi zan za bar 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mche ba'i bar nas nas kyi zan phyung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bza' bar brtsams 
[\[140b.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis sngon 'di lta bu'i ro myong bar dran nam/_btsun pa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skyes shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs las chen por gyur lags na/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi mche ba'i 
[\[140b.6\]]bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi bshos 'di lta bu'i ro ni sngon myong bar mi dran lags so/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ro bro ba'i mchog ces bya ba ro rnams 'phrog pa yongs su dag pa yod de/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pas kha zas phal pa la longs spyad na 
[\[140b.7\]]de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ro brgya par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo zhes sgra bsgrags so/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]mtha'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/_mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo zhes thos nas/_de 
[\[141a.2\]]rnams kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la pho nya btang ba las de rnams nang du ma chud de sgo na sdod do/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste bskur ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can de 'di snyam du sems te/_dge 
[\[141a.3\]]sbyong gau ta ma la bdag gis lan mang po zhig thob tsam par byas na lan 'ga' yang skabs ma rnyed kyis/_'dir yang re zhig 'di la brgal bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bor bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/_shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug 
[\[141a.4\]]nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag gar 'dong /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na 
[\[141a.5\]]nas gsol lo/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi don du 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya po 'di bskur ba lags so/_/des smras pa shes ldan dag_/bcom ldan 'das la ni lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[141a.6\]]rnams mngon par dad de/_gal te nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzed na der yang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i bdud rtsis 'gengs par byed na/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nas gsol/_slar log shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[141a.7\]]'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag cag chas lags na da ci ste ldog mchi'o/_/bdud kyis bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di dag bzlog par ma nus kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o zhes de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas char pa shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi rgyun dbab par 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]brtsams te/_des re zhig shing rta de dag gi lte ba man chad nub pa de tsam gyi bar du char phab bo/_/de nas shing rta de dag gi glang rnams bkrol te dong ngo /_/de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[141b.2\]]pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni ri rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas lha'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/_/de nas ded dpon des zla ba gsum 'das nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa 
[\[141b.3\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis ri bo rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas pa yang 'ongs so/_/de nas ded dpon gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon 
[\[141b.4\]]byas te zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los 
[\[141b.5\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig_/rta cang shes ni bu rgyal tshab tu gyur cig_/rta lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang bu lnga brgyar gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan pa gang lags pa de ni bdag gi btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig_/bud med lnga brgyar gnyis 
[\[141b.6\]]kyis ma tshang ba gang lags pa de ni de'i 'khor du gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ded dpon khyod ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/rta cang shes ni khyod kyi bu rgyal 
[\[141b.7\]]tshab tu 'gyur ro/_/rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang bu lnga brgyar 'gyur ro/_/bu mo de ni btsun mo rin po cher 'gyur ro/_/bud med lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba de dag kyang de'i 'khor du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi drung du song la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyed kyi yul du kho bos zla ba gsum 
[\[142a.2\]]gnas zin te 'gros shes par gyis shig ces kyang smros shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba dang /_de'i tshe rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin 
[\[142a.3\]]bkra shis 'ong ba la sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo ba'i skyes pa la smras pa/_kye nang rje tshur khyod rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gang na ba der song la phyin nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la 'di skad ces dge slong kun dga' bo lha mthong bar 'tshal nas 
[\[142a.4\]]sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes smros shig_/'phags pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo ba'i skyes pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i ltar mnyan nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dge slong 
[\[142a.5\]]'phags pa kun dga' bo lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/_/des smras pa/_kye skyes bu nga bkra shis 'ong ba sdod cing 'dug gis dge slong kun dga' bo ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_de nyid nga'i bkra shis su gyur cig_/
[\[142a.6\]]de la ni bzang po lnga yod de/_ming bzang ba dang /_gzugs bzang ba dang /_kha dog bzang ba dang /_spobs pa bzang ba dang /_sgrub pa bzang ba yin gyis nang du spyon cig_/shes ldan kun dga' bo la su zhig 'gog_/sgo bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin du 
[\[142a.7\]]smras nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang du zhugs so/_/mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de rnams kyang de nyid dang lhan cig nang du zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la nad med par gyur cig ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod nad med par gyur cig_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du ngas zla ba gsum du gnas zin te 'gros shes par gyis shig ces kyang bka' 
[\[142b.2\]]stsal to/_/'phags pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dang ji ga yul dgra mthar dbyar bde bar bzhugs sam/_bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal bar ma gyur grang /_mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho 
[\[142b.3\]]nya de dag gis smras pa/_lha khyod ni rgyal srid la mi rtog pa lags te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su bzhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ni zla ba gsum du nas rul pa'i bshos gsol 
[\[142b.4\]]lags so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum du nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba mad dam/_rgyal po chen po mad lags so/_/de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /_chu mang po zhig gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang /_
[\[142b.5\]]blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag rnams la nyin re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa rab tu mang po sta gon gyis shig par ma bsgo 'am/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha de kho na skad bka' stsal pa mchis kyis che ge mo zhig la stsol cig ces ni 
[\[142b.6\]]khyed kyis bka' ma stsal te/_'on kyang da dung du zhal zas sta gon kho na bgyid do/_/de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[142b.7\]]tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad ces bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nongs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa nongs lags te/_ji ltar yang bus pa lags/_ji ltar yang rmongs 
[\[143a.2\]]pa lags/_ji ltar yang mi gsal ba lags/_ji ltar yang mi mkhas pa lags te/_'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla gsum du spyan drangs nas mi gda' ba'i phyogs su mchis lags so//_//
[\[143a.3\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nongs pa de glo bar chud cing nongs par mthong lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste nongs pa la nongs par gzung du gsol/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par khas blangs na bden te/_
[\[143a.4\]]ji ltar na yang bus pa yin/_ji ltar na yang rmongs pa yin/_ji ltar na yang mi gsal ba yin/_ji ltar na yang mi mkhas pa yin te/_gang yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mi snang ba'i phyogs na 'dug gam/_rgyal po chen po gang 
[\[143a.5\]]gi phyir khyod kyis nyes pa shes shing mthong la de mthong nas 'chags par byed na/_khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing mthong la de 
[\[143a.6\]]mthong nas 'chags shing phyir sdom par byed na/_dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_
[\[143a.7\]]thabs cig la bdag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]po de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshe thung ngu'i dus su byung zhing gdul ba'i don bya ba ni rab tu mang la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la yang 'bab pas mi gnang ngo /_/gal te de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das lo bdun nam/_zla ba bdun nam/_dgung bdun zhig gnang bar mdzad 
[\[143b.2\]]du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis der yang ma gnang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang 
[\[143b.3\]]bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_ngas gal te 'di'i zas gcig kyang gsol bar ma gnang na rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin khrag dron du skyugs nas dus las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i gnas yod do snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[143b.4\]]'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te rang gi gnas gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_
[\[143b.5\]]blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams cad sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha zhal zas 'di thams cad dogs la bkram la dge slong rnams kyi 
[\[143b.6\]]zhabs kyis bcags na de de ltar na yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur lags so/_/des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag kha zas ji snyed yod pa 'di thams cad sa la kun du khrom shig_/de rnams kyis thams cad kun du bkram mo/_/de nas rgyal po bram ze 
[\[143b.7\]]mes sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ji tsam na rgan zhugs zhig mi bzod 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]pa skyes te bdag cag zla ba gsum du nas rul pa zos nas da ni rgyal po sdig can 'di'i 'byor pa ston to snyam du bsams nas bza' ba dang bca' ba sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phags pa rnams ni bza' ba dang 
[\[144a.2\]]bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed do zhes smod par byed/_phyar kha gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni 
[\[144a.3\]]dge slong dag bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas reg par byed pa yin no snyam nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas sa la bkram 
[\[144a.4\]]pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pas bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams smod par byed/_phyar kha gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas bcag par mi bya'o/_/bcags na 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[144a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba nas/_phyag bcabs te lhung bzed 
[\[144a.6\]]gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang 
[\[144a.7\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom 
[\[144b.2\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag gis yul dgra mtha' rnams su dgung zla gsum mchis 
[\[144b.3\]]lags kyis/_btsun pa spyil bu gzhig lags so/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis spyil bu ma gzhig shig_/spyil bu rnams ji srid du yun ring du gnas par gyur pa de srid du sbyin bdag gi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid dang /_bsod nams skyed par 'gyur ba 
[\[144b.4\]]nyid do/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /_dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /_bde ba'i gzhi yin par rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos la gnas pa zhig gang gis gtsug lag 
[\[144b.5\]]khang na gnas shing sems kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas na gzhi de las sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /_dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /_bde ba'i gzhi dpag tu med par rig par bya'o/_/gtsug 
[\[144b.6\]]lag khang ji lta bar chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal yang de dang 'dra ste/_bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /_dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /_bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad re zhig bsod nams sam/_bsod 
[\[144b.7\]]nams kyi 'bras bu'am/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes gzung bar mi nus te/_'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/dper na chu bo chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/_gang gA dang /_ya mu na dang /_
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]sar yu dang /_gnas ldan dang /_chen po zhes bya ba de dag 'bab cing 'dre bar 'gyur ba de la ni chu'i tshad chu'am/_chu bum pa'am/_chu bum pa brgya'am/_chu bum pa stong ngam/_chu bum pa brgya stong 'di snyed ces gzung bar mi nus te/_'on kyang chu mang ba'i phyir 
[\[145a.2\]]chu'i tshogs chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /_dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /_bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad bsod nams sam/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/_bsod 
[\[145a.3\]]nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes gzung bar mi nus te/_'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho bkra shis gtsang la dag_/ngogs bde rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho mchog der/_/mi 
[\[145a.4\]]dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshogs kyis bsten pa yi/_/chu bo so so nas 'bab 'du ba ltar/_/de bzhin gos dang zas skom ster ba'i mi/_/mal cha stan dang gding ba sbyin byed la/_/bsod nams rgyun ni kun nas 'du 'gyur te/_/dper na rgya mtshor chu klung 'bab pa bzhin/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[145a.5\]]the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_gang gis na phyag dang /_zhabs dang /_dbu la sogs pa bkum pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis slong mo pa'i skye 
[\[145a.6\]]bo tshim par mdzad de/_bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du sems can gyi don gyi slad du bdag nyid 'o brgyal nas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad lags pa/_yul dgra mtha' na dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu nas rul pa gsol la/_tshe dang 
[\[145a.7\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni bdud rtsi 'tshal lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[145b.2\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de 'khor dge slong brgyad khri dang rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/
[\[145b.3\]]de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na tshogs rnams slob par byed pa'i bram ze zhig lnga brgya'i tshogs la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug ste/_'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang lhag par bkur sti byas/_rim gror byas/_rjed par byas/_mchod par byas te dgra bcom 
[\[145b.4\]]par bkur ro/_/gang kho na nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du gshegs pa de kho na nas bzung ste/_de la su yang bkur sti bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba mi byed pa dang /_de 
[\[145b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la shin tu phrag dog skyes par gyur to/_/ji tsam na dge slong slob pa dang mi slob pa rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen 
[\[145b.6\]]ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de nas tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chan gyis lhung bzed bkang nas slar log pa bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/_kye dge slong dag ji 'dra ba'i bsod snyoms zhig rnyed blta'o/_/de dag drang po'i rang bzhin can yin 
[\[145b.7\]]pas bstan pa dang /_de phrag dog gi rang bzhin can zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te smras pa/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chan za bar 'os pa ma yin gyi nas rul pa za bar 'os pa yin no/_/de rnams 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]kyis kyang rjes su yi rangs nas mkhan po de de lta lags te/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chan 'tshal bar 'os pa ma lags kyi nas rul pa 'tshal bar 'os pa lags so/_/de na yang bram ze'i khye'u bzang po dad pa can 
[\[146a.2\]]dge ba'i bsam pa can gnyis shig 'dug pa de dag gis mkhan po de skad ma gsung shig_/'di dag ni bdag nyid chen po ste/_lha'i bdud rtsi 'tshal bar 'os pa lags kyi/_nas rul pa ni 'os pa ma lags so zhes smras so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[146a.3\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi tshogs rnams la smod par byed pa gang yin pa de nga nyid yin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba 'di dag yin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u bzang 
[\[146a.4\]]po dad pa can dge ba'i bsam pa can gnyis po gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu 'di gnyis yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyan thos slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams la sems gdug pas ngag gi las rtsub mo phyung ba dang /_
[\[146a.5\]]bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang bas rjes su yi rang ba dang /_gnyis kyis rjes su yi ma rang ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas de'i bar yul dgra mthar de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu nas rul gsol to/_/
[\[146a.6\]]shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni lha'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/_gcig tu dkar ba'i las rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag 
[\[146a.7\]]khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo tshugs dka' gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs lnga len nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang tshugs dkar gshegs nas/_tshugs dka'i chu bo gang gA'i 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin 
[\[146b.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus 
[\[146b.3\]]pa'i chos thos nas gcig tu dben pa bag yod pa/_rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so/_/gcig tu dben pa bag yod pa/_rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na/_gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur 
[\[146b.4\]]smrig bgos te/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyid pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la 
[\[146b.5\]]bsten to/_/bya ba byas so 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta bu mdor bsdus te legs par bshad du gsol zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA gang na ba de logs su gzigs pa las bcom ldan 
[\[146b.6\]]'das kyis chu bo gang gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong chen po zhig khyer ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyed kyis chu bo gang gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong po chen po khyer ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/gal te 
[\[146b.7\]]'di tshu rol gyi 'gram du ma chags/_pha rol gyi 'gram dang dbus su ma chags/_skam la ma phyung /_mi dang mi ma yin pas ma bzung /_klong du ma nub/_khong rul bar ma gyur na dge slong shing sdong po chen po de ni rim gyis rgya mtshor gzhol bar 'gyur/_rgya mtshor 'bab 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/rgya mtshor bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_gal te dge slong khyod kyis tshu rol la ma chags zhes bya ba nas khong rul bar ma gyur na/_de lta na dge slong khyod rim gyis mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur/_mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab par 
[\[147a.2\]]'gyur/_mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bdag gis ma 'tshal na tshu rol gyi 'gram ni ci lags/_pha rol gyi 'gram ni ci lags/_dbus su thogs pa ni ci lags/_skam la phyung ba ni ci lags/_mis bzung ba ni ci lags/_mi ma lags 
[\[147a.3\]]pas bzung ba ni ci lags/_klong du nub pa ni ci lags/_khong rul ba ni ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas zhes bya ba nas/_'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu mdor bsdus te/_
[\[147a.4\]]legs par bdag la bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong tshu rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni nang gi skye mched drug gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/pha rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni phyi'i skye mched drug gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/dbus su thogs pa zhes bya 
[\[147a.5\]]ba de ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/skam la phyung ba zhes bya ba de ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/mis bzung ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di na la la rab tu byung ba dang khyim pa 'dres par gnas te/_dga' bar mtshungs pa dang bde 
[\[147a.6\]]bar mtshungs pa dag_/bde na bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal na sdug bsngal zhing 'phral gyi bya ba byung zhing byung ba rnams yang dag par blangs te mthar 'byin par byed pa lta bu yin no/_/mi ma yin pas zin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di na la la tshul khrims sam/_brtul zhugs 
[\[147a.7\]]sam/_dka' thub bam/_tshangs par spyod pa bsten pa 'dis bdag lha'am/_lha gang yang rung ba zhig tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lta bu'o/_/klong du nub pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di ni la la bslab pa phul nas babs pa lta bu yin no/_/
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]khong rul ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di na la la tshul khrims 'chal pa/_sdig pa'i chos can/_khong myags shing phyir 'dzag pa/_shing rul lta bur gyur pa/_lung bong ltar spyod pa/_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs 
[\[147b.2\]]par spyod par khas 'che ba yod pa lta bu yin te/_dge slong khyod kyis gal te de bzhin du tshu rol gyi 'gram du ma thogs zhes bya ba nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[147b.3\]]mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis shing sdong po chen po'i dpe 'di'i gdams ngag gis gtams te 
[\[147b.4\]]gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na/_gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na 
[\[147b.5\]]med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar shes nas go bar byas te/_tshe dang ldan pa de dgra bcom pa sems
