[\[147b.6\]]shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag rdzi dga' bo zhes bya ba 'dug par gyur pa khar ba la brten nas gnag skyong zhing 'dug pa las de'i khar bas sbal pa zhig brdzis so/_/de gnad rnams chad la thug_/tshigs 
[\[147b.7\]]rnams bye la thug pa dang sems bskyed pa/_gal te bdag gis lus 'gul tam/_skad phyung na gzhi des gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]rnams su skyes so/_/de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos khar ba phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la gnag 
[\[148a.2\]]rdzi dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni tshu rol gyi 'gram du mi chags/_pha rol gyi 'gram du mi chags/_dbus su mi chags/_skam la mi 'byung /_mis mi gzung /_mi ma lags pas mi gzung /_klong du mi 'byin/_khong du mi 'drul bar bgyi lags na/_
[\[148a.3\]]legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/dga' bo khyod kyis bdag po rnams la gnag gtad dam btsun 
[\[148a.4\]]pa mi 'tshal lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa ba rnams kyang gzhon la be'u rnams kyang tshar lags te/_so so'i gnag ra 'tshal bas so so'i gnas su mchi lags pas/_bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par 
[\[148a.5\]]rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/dga' bo ba rnams kyang gzhon la be'u rnams kyang tshar te rang rang gi gnag ra shes pas rang rang gi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang gnag rdzi 
[\[148a.6\]]zas dang gos bdag gir byed pas ni 'di ltar bdag po rnams la de bya dgos so/_/de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas 'jigs so/_/'jigs so zhes sgra chen po 'byin 
[\[148a.7\]]cing brgyug par brtsams pa dang /_lam gyi bar nas gnag rdzi ngo shes lnga brgyas mthong ste de rnams kyis smras pa/_ci zhig gis 'jigs/_des smras pa/_skye bas 'jigs so/_/rga bas 'jigs so/_/'chi bas 'jigs so/_/de rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin du brgyug 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]par brtsams pa dang /_gnag rdzi dang /_phyugs rdzi dang /_rtswa thun dang /_shing thun dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi gzhan dag kyang de rnams mthong nas brgyug par brtsams so/_/lam gyi mdun nas 'ong ba rnams kyis de dag de ltar 
[\[148b.2\]]sgra 'byin pa mthong nas de rnams kyis dris pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'jigs so/_/ci zhig gis 'jigs/_skye bas 'jigs so/_/rga bas 'jigs so/_/'chi bas 'jigs so/_/de rnams kyis kyang thos nas slar log go/_/
[\[148b.3\]]ji tsam na ri 'or dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang /_de nas ri 'or de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs des skye bo'i tshogs chen po mthong nas sngangs pas phan tshun du 'dong bar byed de/_kha cig ni bros so/_/kha cig ni rdzas rnams sbed do/_/kha cig ni go bgos nas 'dug go/_/mi 
[\[148b.4\]]dpa' bo gzhan dag cig yod pa de dag gis bsu nas dris pa shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'jigs so/_/ci zhig gis 'jigs/_skye bas 'jigs so/_/rga bas 'jigs so/_/'chi bas 'jigs so/_/de nas ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[148b.5\]]tshogs de bag phebs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gnag rdzi dga' bo song nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[148b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du gnag rdzi dga' bo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal ba bzlog ste sdum par btang lags/_shA ri'i bu gnag rdzi dga' bo slar khyim pa khyim na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_
[\[148b.7\]]sogs 'jog yongs su spyod pas 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/gnag rdzi dga' bo de'u re bdag po rnams la gnag gtad de 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /_de gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas 
[\[149a.2\]]so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na gnag rdzi dga' bos bdag po rnams la gnag gtad nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[149a.3\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis bdag po rnams la gnag rnams gtad lags te/_btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[149a.4\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnag rdzi dga' bo 'khor lnga brgya dang rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/_/de ltar rab tu byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa de zhes bya ba nas sems shin tu 
[\[149a.5\]]rnam par grol bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o/_/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis yin pa'o/_/sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i 
[\[149a.6\]]lha'i bus bltas na dud 'gro dag nas shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas yin nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis gang yang zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang 
[\[149a.7\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_mal bdag gis zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus rna cha dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs nas zhes bya ba nas 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]gang gA'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbal pa byed byed 
[\[149b.2\]]pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pa zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig 
[\[149b.3\]]tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang /_
[\[149b.4\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs 
[\[149b.5\]]rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba lta bur 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/
[\[149b.6\]]dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson zhing gnas pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas kyang the tshom du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_ci lags/_bcom 
[\[149b.7\]]ldan 'das ma dang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis sam/_dge slong dag nga blta ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_lha rnams 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin gyi/_'on kyang gnag rdzi dga' bo'i khar bas sbal pa brdzis te gnad rnams kyang chad la thug_/tshig rnams kyang bye la thug pa dang /_gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam bar chad par 
[\[150a.2\]]'gyur ro snyam nas/_mi g.yo zhing sgra ma phyung bar 'dug nas nga la sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa de mdang nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs nas/_ngas de la chos bshad nas bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song 
[\[150a.3\]]ba yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gnag rdzi dga' bo dang 'khor lnga brgyas las ci zhig bgyis na gnag rdzi dag gi nang du skyes shing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 
[\[150a.4\]]byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa lags/_sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na sbal par skyes par gyur cing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[150a.5\]]pa/_dge slong dag de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags la tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya 
[\[150a.6\]]ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/_de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i gsung rab la gnag rdzi dga' bo rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum pa chos smra ba rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs 
[\[150a.7\]]pa can 'khor lnga brgya pa rtsod pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhig ste/_de dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams zhi bar byed pa dang /_de na dge slong khengs pa nga rgyal can gnyis shig lan 'ga' yang de'i drung du mi 'dong ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis phan tshun du rtsod pa 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]byung nas don de'i phyir de gnyis de'i drung du dong nas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis la 'di dang 'di lta bu'i rtsod pa byung na zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di gnyis kyi rtsod pa deng kho na zhi bar byas na rag ma 
[\[150b.2\]]las pas 'di gnyis phyis 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des dge 'dun thams cad bsogs nas rtsod pa de dge 'dun gyi nang du glengs nas chad par ni ma byas so/_/phyi de nyin yang de la ri 'or du dogs pa zhig byung nas de der song ba dang /_de nas de gnyis 
[\[150b.3\]]kyis thogs so zhes dge 'dun gyi nang du rtsod pa de glengs nas de nas dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas so/_/ji tsam na dge slong sde snod gsum pa de ri 'or de nas 'ongs te lam gyis dub pa bsal nas lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la dris pa re zhig rtsod pa 
[\[150b.4\]]dang rtsod zla gnyis mi 'ong ngam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan po de gnyis kyi rtsod pa de zhi bar bgyis lags so/_/su zhig gis zhi bar byas/_dge 'dun gyis so/_/ji ltar byas/_de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa dang /_des ngag rtsub po'i las 
[\[150b.5\]]byung ba/_tshe dang ldan pa dag mi shes te/_ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas so/_/de rnams kyis kyang mkhan po de de bzhin te/_ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis so zhes mthun par smras so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du 
[\[150b.6\]]sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de ni gnag rdzi dga' bo 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni gnag rdzi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin no/_/gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[150b.7\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gnag rdzi zhes bya ba'i tshig smras shing /_lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyis kyang mthun par smras pas/_las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'khor lnga brgya dang gnag rdzi rnams su skyes par gyur to/_/
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gang 'dis bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas/_da 
[\[151a.2\]]ltar 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kho na'i gsung rab la dge slong spong ba pa 
[\[151a.3\]]zhig tu gyur te/_ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der son to/_/de mtshan mo'i thun dang po la skyil mo krung bcas te yid la bya ba goms par bya bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na 'don pa byed pa'i dge slong rnams kha ton byed pa dang /_
[\[151a.4\]]bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas de sgras sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma btub nas des bsams pa/_'di dag kha ton zer du chug gung thun la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas gung thun la langs te 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong gzhan dag kha ton byed nas des bsams 
[\[151a.5\]]pa/_thun tha ma la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas/_de thun tha ma la langs te 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na gzhan dag kha ton byed nas de 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas kun nas dkris pa drag po skyes nas des smras pa/_'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni sbal pa 
[\[151a.6\]]bzhin mtshan thog thag sgra 'byin to zhes byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_dge slong spong ba pa gang yin pa de ni sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la sbal 
[\[151a.7\]]pa zhes tshig tu smras pas las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar sbal par skyes par gyur te/_da lta'i bar du yang sbal par skyes pa yin no/_/gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pas des na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes par gyur 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]to/_/gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas des na da ltar bden pa mthong bar byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba 
[\[151b.2\]]nas brtson par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA rgal ba dang /_de na ngang pa dang /_nya dang ru sbal lnga brgyas bskor te 
[\[151b.3\]]bskor ba byas so/_/de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa mdzad de/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas nga la 
[\[151b.4\]]sems mngon par dad par gyis la/_ci nas kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis shig_/de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas kha zas za bar byed pa ni bdag cag gi cha 
[\[151b.5\]]ma yin no snyam nas/_de rnams kyis bzas bcad pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams ni me'i shas che bas dus las 'das te shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so/_/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon 
[\[151b.6\]]par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis yin pa'o/_/de rnams kyis bltas na dud 'gro dag las shi 'phos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_me tog man dA ra 
[\[151b.7\]]bas thu ba bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dang chu bo gang gA snang bas gsal bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dang /_khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes 
[\[152a.2\]]bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang /_des lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod do/_/btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas ma bgyis te/_mas ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang /_gnyen 
[\[152a.3\]]gyi tshogs dang sdug pas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/_sems can dmyal ba dang 
[\[152a.4\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/_lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bkod/_'khor ba las ni ring du mdzad/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni 
[\[152a.5\]]phye/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/
[\[152a.6\]]bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags 
[\[152a.7\]]so/_/de nas sngon nya dang /_ngang pa dang /_ru sbal byed byed pa'i lha'i bu de rnams tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang zhes bya ba nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa nya dang /_ngang pa dang /_ru sbal 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na des na ngang pa dang /_nya dang /_ru sbal rnams su skyes lags/_las ci zhig bgyis na des na lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar 
[\[152b.2\]]bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngang pa dang /_nya dang /_ru sbal 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag 
[\[152b.3\]]sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/_de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i bstan pa la de 
[\[152b.4\]]rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te/_de na dge slong de rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams dral bas las de'i rnam par smin pas nya dang /_ngang pa dang /_ru sbal rnams su skyes par gyur to/_/gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnams su skyes par gyur to/_/
[\[152b.5\]]gang yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa des na bden pa mthong bar byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na/_gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong 
[\[152b.6\]]dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA rgal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sdong dum tshig pa lta bu/_keng rus sgreng ba lta bu/_rang gi skras lus yog pa/_lto ri 
[\[152b.7\]]sul ltar 'dug pa/_kha khab kyi mig tsam yod pa 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor nas/_de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams ni rnam par 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]ltung ba'i lus can rnams lags te/_sngon gyi las kyi nongs pas chab kyang mi rnyed lags na 'tshal ma mthong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_khyod ni thugs rje chen po mnga' ba lags na bdag cag la chab stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chu bo gang gA 
[\[153a.2\]]bstan nas/_chu bsil skye bo kun gyis nye bar spyad bya ba/_/skal ldan shing rta klung [(]chan [,]chen [)]'di ni grong dag dang /_/yul 'khor dag dang grong khyer tshim par byed cing 'bab/_/zhing rnang sA lu ku mu da dang ut+pal skrun/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis gsol pa/_chu bo skye bo kun gyis nye bar spyad 
[\[153a.3\]]bgyi ba/_/skal ldan shing rta 'bab 'di bdag cag rnams la skams/_/'di ni khrag gi dri mas gang zhing lag pa na/_/dbyug pa dgra star bcas pa thogs pas 'di bsrungs mthong /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gA'i lha la bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni grong dang yul 'khor grong 
[\[153a.4\]]khyer tshim byed cing /_/zhing rnang sA lu ku mu da dang ut+pal skrun/_/ci phyir [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skom pas rab nyen tshim mi byed/_/khyod la byis pa'i skye bo sdug bsngal snying rje med/_/gang gA'i lhas gsol pa/_byis pa'i skye bo la bdag 'jigs pas ma lags shing /_/tshig rtsub sgyus kyang mi 
[\[153a.5\]]mthun chab gtong mi bgyid de/_/nongs bgyis sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa 'di dag la/_/chu bo skams gyur 'di la bdag gis ci zhig nongs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la chu 
[\[153a.6\]]lud cig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la chu blud par brtsams pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de rnams kyi kha khab kyi mig tsam po dag bskyed par ma nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[153a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis de rnams kyi kha bskyed nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos chu blud pa dang /_de rnams skom pas nyen pas mang du 'thungs pas lto rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang ba bskyed nas shi'o zhes bya ba nas/_bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]song ngo /_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na des na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skyes lags/_las ci zhig bgyis 
[\[153b.2\]]na des na lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/_zhes bya ba'i bar gong 
[\[153b.3\]]ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_zhes bya ba nas/_de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[153b.4\]]bzhin du'o/_/de'i nyan thos rnams kyis dad pa las bslangs nas sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la bya ba byed do/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa rgyas par ma gyur pa de'i tshe dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang nyung bar gyur 
[\[153b.5\]]to/_/gang gi tshe rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang mang bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na 'dun khang zhig na dge bsnyen lnga brgya bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lhags shing 'dus par gyur pa dang /_dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong rab tu mang po dag de rnams kyi drung du song nas sbyin du 
[\[153b.6\]]gzhug par 'dod pa na/_de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub pa'i las phyung ba/_'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skyes pa bzhin rtag tu lag pa zed par byed do zhes smras so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang 
[\[153b.7\]]dag yin pa de dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_gang yang 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi tshig smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skyes par gyur te/_da 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]lta'i bar du yang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skyes pa yin no/_/gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnams su skyes so/_/gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des na bden 
[\[154a.2\]]pa mthong bar byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i 
[\[154a.3\]]bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA las rgal ba na glang po che'i lta stangs kyis g.yas phyogs nas chu bo gang gA la gzigs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du g.yas phyogs nas 
[\[154a.4\]]chu bo gang gA la gzigs par mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag chu bo gang gA'i gleng gzhi nyan par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te/_bcom 
[\[154a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang gA'i gleng gzhi gang lags pa bshad na dge slong rnams nyan par 'gyur lags so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa dgu pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po smyug sbams zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_
[\[154a.6\]]de'i yul 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_shing me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa/_lha rnams dus dus su char 'bebs pas sa gzhi lo thog dang ldan zhing 'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'khrug long dang /_
[\[154a.7\]]chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur la/_mi rnams rtag tu chos la gzhol ba na chos kyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/ji tsam na rgyal po de so ga'i dus la bab nas shing rnams kyi me tog kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang /_ji tsam na mi lus gnyer mas gang ba/_mgo skya ba/_lus kyi yan lag rnyis pa/_dbang po rgud pa/_
[\[154b.2\]]sha skem pa/_zho sha chung ba zhig khar ba la brten nas gom pa dal bu dal bus 'gro ba zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi lus gnyer mas gang ba mgo skya ba zhes bya ba nas/_khar ba la brten nas 'gro ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[154b.3\]]gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha de ni 'du byed rnams dengs pas rgas 'khogs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha chos de ni thun mong lags so/_/de 
[\[154b.4\]]nas rgyal po yid mi bde zhing chas pa dang yang mi skya bo rbab rbab bo/_lus gas shing hrud hrud po/_lto ri sul ltar 'dug pa/_rma rnag gis gang ba/_yan lag dang nying lag rnams las 'dzag pa/_lhan pa rnams kyis dkris pa zhig shugs ring po ring por 'byin cing khar ba 
[\[154b.5\]]la brten nas 'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi skya bo bseng bseng po zhes bya ba nas/_'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di 
[\[154b.6\]]ni nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha chos 'di ni thun mong lags te/_nyes par spyod pa'i las bgyis pa rnams la sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas 'byung bar 
[\[154b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_rnam pa thams cad du sdig pa mi bya'o snyam du bsams nas chas pa dang /_yang des ras sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan dang /_
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]dung dang /_rnga pha Ta ha dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dag bun long zhing /_mi bzhis bteg nas mgyogs mis ni sna drangs/_skyes bu lag na shing thogs pa ni phyi bzhin 'brang zhing kyi hud pha/_kyi hud sdug pa/_kyi hud spun/_
[\[155a.2\]]kyi hud jo bo zhes kun du ngud mo'i sgra 'don pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ras sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan cing zhes bya ba nas/_ngud mo'i sgra 'don pa 'di ci zhig yin 
[\[155a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha chos 'di ni thun mong lags so/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[155a.4\]]pos rgas pa dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste/_bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod rnams spang dgos so snyam nas slar log ste/_mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug go/_/de'i yul na bram ze dus dpog ces bya ba phyug pa nor mang 
[\[155a.5\]]ba longs spyod che ba zhig yod de/_des ji ltar rgyal pos rgas pa dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba mthong ste yid byung nas mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang bram ze brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing shing rta rta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar 
[\[155a.6\]]ba'i nang du zhugs te/_gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs nas rgyal po smyug sbams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bram ze dus dpog chab sgo na mchis so/_/de nas rgyal po phyir byung nas dkor khang du 'dug pa dang /_
[\[155a.7\]]bram ze dus dpog gis rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas te 'dug nas smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan gyi khang par zhugs te bzhugs/_rgyal pos ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bram ze dus dpog la rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa lha 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]bu la spyod pa lags pas 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ma mchis so/_/sems can legs pa'i las bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis/_nyes pa'i las bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis/_gnyi ga'i las bgyid pa yang mchis te/_'khor los sgyur ba rnams ni rtag tu las legs 
[\[155b.2\]]pa bgyid de/_gum na yang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha yang 'khor los sgyur ba lags te/_mi'i bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa bstar nas lha'i bde ba yang nyams su bstar bar 'gyur mod kyi/_lha 'on kyang mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa mchod sbyin la brtson par 
[\[155b.3\]]mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag yul thams cad du dril sgrogs su chug ste/_rgyal po gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed kyis khyed shog la longs spyod cig ces sgo shig_/de nas rgyal pos sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas zas 
[\[155b.4\]]'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba byin no/_/der 'bras khu dbo ba'i dong byas nas/_der dron po dag blugs pa dang bsil bar gyur pas ma dros pa ma dros pa zhes bya bar grags so/_/de'i 'bras khu dang 'bras bkrus pa'i khu bas lo bcu 
[\[155b.5\]]gnyis tshang par bkang bas lud par gyur pa'i kha de nas 'bab chur bab pas 'bras khu'i chu 'bras khu'i chu zhes bya bar grags so//_//sdom la/_gzhon nu bskyed dang glang chen sgra/_/dpung rgyan ldan dang nor bu can/_/sa la stobs dang sa la'i stobs/_/[(]gsar [,]gser [)]bre 
[\[155b.6\]]dang ni gnas bcas dang /_/thug pa dang ni mnyan yod dang /_/ma dros grong khyer bin du dang /_/yangs pa can ni tha ma yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul gzhon nu bskyed par gshegs nas gzhon nu bskyed par tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[155b.7\]]dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba btsas nas 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/_/des na grong khyer yang gzhon nu bskyed pa zhes bya bar grags so/_/krung krung sgra can du gshegs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo krung krung sgra 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi glang po che dam pas krung krung zhes bya ba'i skad phyung bas/_krung krung can krung krung can zhes bya bar grags so/_/dpung rgyan ldan du gshegs nas dpung rgyan ldan 
[\[156a.2\]]gyi phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/_/nor bu can du gshegs nas nor bu can du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nor bu can 'dir byang chub sems dpas nor 
[\[156a.3\]]bu mang po'i mchod sbyin byas pas nor bu can zhes bya bar grags so/_/sa la'i stobs su gshegs nas/_sa la'i stobs kyi phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gser gyi brer gshegs 
[\[156a.4\]]nas kun dga' bo gser gyi bre 'dir byang chub sems dpas gser mang po mchod sbyin byas pas da dung yang bram ze rnams gser bres 'jal zhing 'ged pas gser gyi bre gser gyi bre zhes bya bar grags so/_/gnas bcas su gshegs nas gnas bcas su tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[156a.5\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gnas bcas 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de dus gzhan zhig na spyi bor sha rmen 'jam 
[\[156a.6\]]zhing shin tu 'jam pa zhig skyes te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa skyed par mi byed do/_/de yongs su smin nas brtol ba las gzhon nu zhig byung na/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_pags 
[\[156a.7\]]pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba zhes bya ba nas yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_/spyi bo skyes spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar grags so/_/rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyis gzhon nu byung ma thag tu btsun mo'i 'khor drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang /_
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]mthong ma thag tu btsun mo de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o ma zags nas so so nas smras pa/_nga las nu/_nga las nu zhes smras pas/_nga las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar grags so/_/de la kha cig gis ni spyi bo skyes/_kha cig gis ni nga las nu zhes bya bar 
[\[156b.2\]]shes so/_/gzhon nu nga las nu yul zhig tu song ba dang /_rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na bar gyur nas/_de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman gyis bkur sti byas kyang /_de slar thu bar gyur nas/_des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_
[\[156b.3\]]shes ldan dag myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang skur cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis pho nya btang nas rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags pa snyung bar gyur nas des bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu spyan drongs la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur 
[\[156b.4\]]ba nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces byung gis/_de bas na gzhon nu myur du gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes spring ngo /_/de chas pa na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shi'o/_/de nas yang blon po rnams kyis yang de la pho nya btang ste/_gzhon nu khyed kyi yab nongs kyis gshegs 
[\[156b.5\]]te rgyal srid bzhes su gsol zhes spring ba dang /_gzhon nu nga las nus bsams pa/_bdag gi yab ni nongs na bdag der ji ste 'gro snyam du bsams nas de nyid na 'dug pa dang /_yang blon po rnams 'dus nas blon po'i gtso bo pho nyar btang nas de song ste smras pa/_
[\[156b.6\]]gzhon nu gshegs la rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/_des smras pa/_gal te bdag gis chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid 'thob na 'di nyid du rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/blon po rnams kyis spring ba/_lha rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba la ni mang du 'tshal te/_
[\[156b.7\]]rin po che'i gcal dang /_seng ge'i khri dang /_gdugs dang /_cod pan dang /_dpung rgyan gyis pho brang gi nang du rgyal srid dbang bskur 'tshal lo/_/de bas na gzhon nu 'di nyid du gshegs pa'i rigs so/_/des smras pa/_gal te bdag gis chos bzhin gyis 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur na thams cad 'di nyid du 'ong grang /_gzhon nu nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya ba des rin po che'i gcal dang /_seng ge'i khri de nyid du blangs so/_/pho brang na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang 
[\[157a.2\]]gdugs dang /_cod pan dang /_dpung rgyan khyer te rang lhags te pho brang na gnas pa rang lhags shing rang lhags pas gnas bcas gnas bcas zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[157a.3\]]dga' bo mnyan yod gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nas rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /_ji tsam nas phyogs shig na bram ze zhig 
[\[157a.4\]]zan ma zos par zhing rmed pa na/_de'i ched du bu mo zhig thug pa khyer te 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs de nyid du gshegs so/_/de nas bram zes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par 
[\[157a.5\]]brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu yang de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te/_ji ltar 
[\[157a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can la thog mar sangs rgyas mthong ba de ltar ni lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas goms par byas pa la sems las su rung ba skye ba dang /_bu med pa bu rnyed pa dang /_dbul pos nor gyi gter mthong ba dang /_rgyal srid la dga' ba rgyal srid 
[\[157a.7\]]kyi dbang bskur ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/des thug pa de khyer te myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma 'di ni thug pa lags te/_gal te shes ldan gau ta ma bdag la 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]thugs brtse na 'jams gsol cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la khron pa rnying pa zhig bstan nas/_bram ze khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na khron pa rnying pa 'dir lugs shig_/des khron pa rnying pa der blugs so des khron pa rnying pa der blugs 
[\[157b.2\]]pa dang /_'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus khron pa rnying pa de thug pas gang nas rlangs pa 'thul zhing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de bos nas bram ze thug pa brims shig_/des brim 
[\[157b.3\]]par brtsams pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dge 'dun thams cad kyis 'thungs kyang khron pa rnying pa de de bzhin du thug pas gang nas rlangs pa 'thul zhing 'dug par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bram ze de lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur te/_
[\[157b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra bar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur 
[\[157b.5\]]ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags 
[\[157b.6\]]so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad 
[\[157b.7\]]lags so/_/de nas bram ze de tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo thog legs pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba lta bur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/ji tsam na zhing drung du phyin pa dang /_zhing de la gser gyi nas she dag skyes par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ya mtshan 
[\[158a.2\]]skyes nas mig bgrad de tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_kye ma yon tan rang bzhin zhing /_/nyes kun rnam par spangs pa la/_/bdag gis de ring sa bon btab/_/de ring nyid du 'bras bu thob/_/de nas bram ze de rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas 
[\[158a.3\]]son pa dang /_rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bdag gis stsang nas stsal ba de rnams gser she dag tu gyur gyis de la spyan zhig bsko bar gsol/_rgyal pos spyan bskos te btang ba dang /_bram zes phung por byas te/_bgos pa las 
[\[158a.4\]]rgyal po'i skal ba nas tha mal par gyur nas/_spyan gyis rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang /_rgyal pos bsgo ba/_yang bgos shig_/yang bgos pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyal po'i skal ba ni nas tha mal par gyur nas/_de ltar lan bdun gyi bar du bgos na de kho na 
[\[158a.5\]]bzhin du nas su gyur pa dang /_rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes nas de bdag nyid song ste bltas na de bzhin du gyur nas des bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze 'di ni khyod kyi bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyis/_rgyal po'i skal ba thong la khyod kyis ci dpags pa de kho bo la byin cig_/
[\[158a.6\]]de nas bram ze de shin tu mgu bas ci byin pa de dag gser gyi nas she dag tu gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /_ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing pa skya bo rbab rbab po rkang pa dang lag pa ser ga byung ba/_sha na'i ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa lnga brgya 
[\[158a.7\]]zhing rmed do/_/rmon pa de dag kyang lcag gzer bu can gyis gzhus pas/_lus smas shing rma byung bas rnag 'dzag la sngam pa 'don bzhin du zhing rmod do/_/zhing pa de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnams la thog mar 
[\[158b.2\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba ni zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na nas zhing pa rnams 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang gdul ba'i don du lam la bzur nas dge slong gi dge 
[\[158b.3\]]'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas zhing pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhing pa de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_
[\[158b.4\]]khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom 
[\[158b.5\]]nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa legs par gsungs 
[\[158b.6\]]pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab 
[\[158b.7\]]tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la gdams ngag byin nas de rnams kyis 'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba drag po zhes bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/glang de dag kyang gnya' shing dang /_ru thag bcad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum 
[\[159a.2\]]gyi chos bshad pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dper na chu bo gang gA rgal te gshegs pa na ngang pa dang /_nya dang /_ru sbal rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ba bzhin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa 
[\[159a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sngon zhing pa bgyid bgyid pa'i dge slong 'di dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las des zhing par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa 
[\[159a.4\]]mngon sum du bgyis lags/_sngon glang bgyid bgyid pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis kyang las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na glang rnams su skyes shing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams 
[\[159a.5\]]byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[159a.6\]]zhes bya ba nas/_de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i bstan pa la zhing pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te/_de na 'di dag gis ma bklags ma bton/_
[\[159a.7\]]yid la bya ba goms par ma byas so/_/'on kyang dad pas byin pa zos shing zos nas 'du 'dzi la chags te le los dus 'das par byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_dge slong lnga brgya po gang yin pa de ni zhing pa lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin no/_/gtsug lag khang gi 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]bdag po gang yin pa de ni zhing pa 'di dag gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag 'di nyid yin te/_gang yang 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i dad pas byin pa zos nas ma bklags ma bton/_yid la bya ba goms par ma byas la/_'du 'dzi la chags te/_
[\[159b.2\]]le los dus 'das par byas pa'i las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de'i zhing pa rnams su gyur te/_da lta'i bar du yang zhing par skyes pa yin no/_/'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung 
[\[159b.3\]]nas tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa des na da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/sngon glang byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di rnams kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu 
[\[159b.4\]]byung bar gyur te/_'di dag gis de na bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams dral bas las des na glang rnams su skyes so/_/gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnams su skyes so/_/gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs 
[\[159b.5\]]par spyod pa spyad cing bsrungs pas da ltar lha'i bur gyur nas bden pa mthong bar byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu 
[\[159b.6\]]la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chu [{]mangs [,]mang [}]gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[159b.7\]]kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das chu [{]mangs su [,]mang du [}]gshegs pa dang /_phyogs gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig zhing rmed do/_/de nas bram ze des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/des bsams pa/_gal te shes ldan gau ta ma'i drung du phyag 'tshal du song na ni bdag gi las 
[\[160a.2\]]'chor la/_'on te phyag 'tshal du ma song na ni bsod nams yongs su nyams par 'gyur na/_de la gang gis na las kyang mi 'chor la bsod nams kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod snyam pa las de blo skyes pa/_'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du 
[\[160a.3\]]phyag byas na de lta na las kyang mi 'chor la/_bsod nams kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des ji ltar lcag gzer bu can nyid thogs shing gnas de nyid du 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag byas so/_/de nas 
[\[160a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bram ze 'dis nyes te/_gal te pha bi las phyogs 'di na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig par bzhugs so snyam pa de lta bu'i so so rang 
[\[160a.5\]]gis rigs pa'i ye shes shig yod par gyur na nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs te phyag byas pa zhig_/de lta na pha bis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis la phyag byas par 'gyur ba zhig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[160a.6\]]srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa bzhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos myur ba myur bar bla gos bzhi ltab tu byas te bting nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol/_des na sa 
[\[160a.7\]]phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis kyis longs spyad par 'gyur lags te/_gang yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_gang yang da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa rnams lta bar 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la 
[\[160b.2\]]bab lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa gang dge slong rnams la bstan pa mthong lags na/_dge slong rnams sems mngon par dad par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[160b.3\]]'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/_chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas klu rnams kyis bsams 
[\[160b.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa gzigs par bzhed par mthong nas/_de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par 
[\[160b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig par phyung ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rtags zung shig_/nub par 'gyur ro zhes pa dang nub bo/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 
[\[160b.6\]]'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa/_nyan thos rnams la bstan to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yang ngo mtshar skyes nas btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul 
[\[160b.7\]]mi rnams dang /_lhan cig chas so/_/de bzhin du lus 'phags po dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /_drang srong sbyin dang /_so phag mkhan rnying pa dag dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma ngo mtshar skyes te chas so/_/
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]kha cig sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul ba dang /_ji tsam na de mi snang bar gyur to/_/de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa nub par gyur to zhes thos 
[\[161a.2\]]so/_/thos nas kyang yang de rnams kyis bdag cag 'dir lhags pa dag ni don med par gyur to zhes sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba skyes so/_/dge bsnyen zhig gis sa phyogs der bskor ba byas nas sems la sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas te/_
[\[161a.3\]]bdag gis 'di la gom pa bor bas bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i 'gyod pa skyes pa bsal ba'i phyir dang /_dge bsnyen de'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_mkhas 
[\[161a.4\]]pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni gom 'dor na/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi srang tshad ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/dge bsnyen gzhan zhig gis yang phyogs der 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig bzhag nas sems kyis 
[\[161a.5\]]'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas te/_re zhig gom pa bor ba'i bsod nams kyang de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/_'di la 'jim pa'i gong bu bzhag pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge bsnyen de'i bsam pa 
[\[161a.6\]]thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_gang zhig rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi/_/mchod rten la ni 'jim gong 'jog byed na/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gong bu ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/de thos nas srog chags brgya 
[\[161a.7\]]stong phrag du ma dag gis kyang 'jim pa'i gong bu bcer to/_/gzhan dag gis de la me tog sil mas gtor nas/_sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas pa/_re zhig gom pa bor ba dang /_'jim pa'i gong bu'i bsod nams kyang de snyed du bcom ldan 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]'das kyis gsungs na/_bdag cag gi me tog sil ma rnams la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_gang zhig rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi/_/
[\[161b.2\]]mchod rten me tog sil ma spungs pas 'thor/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi bre bo ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/gzhan dag gis de la me tog gi phreng bas bskor ba byas nas sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/_me tog sil ma rnams kyi bsod 
[\[161b.3\]]nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/_bdag cag gis me tog phreng bas bskor ba la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_mkhas pa gang 
[\[161b.4\]]zhig rab tu sems dang bas/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten me tog phreng bskor ba/_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi sgrom dag ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/gzhan dag gis de la mar me'i phreng ba phul nas/_sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/_me 
[\[161b.5\]]tog phreng bas bskor ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/_bdag cag gis me mar phul ba'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_
[\[161b.6\]]mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me 'bul byed na/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser srang bye ba ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/gzhan dag gis de la dri'i chus chag chag btab nas/_sems kyis mngon par 
[\[161b.7\]]'dus byas pa/_mar me phul ba'i bsod nams de snyed du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/_bdag cag gis dri'i chus chag chag btab pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten dri chus 'thor byed na/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi phung po ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/gzhan dag gis de la 
[\[162a.2\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan btags nas sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa gom pa bor ba dang /_'jim gong bzhag pa dang /_me tog sil mas gtor ba dang /_me tog phreng bas bskor ba dang /_me mar phul ba dang /_dri'i chus gtor ba'i 
[\[162a.3\]]bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/_bdag cag gis gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan btags pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs 
[\[162a.4\]]su bcad de gsungs pa/_rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan ni 'dogs byed na/_/gser ni ri bo lhun po dang mnyam pa/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de bzhin 
[\[162a.5\]]gshegs pa tshad med pa/_/ded dpon bla na med pa la/_/yon du bshad pa de yin no/_/de rnams 'di snyam du de la re zhig bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bya ba byas pa'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/_bzhugs pa 
[\[162a.6\]]la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_'di na sems rab dang byas nas/_/gang zhig bzhugs dang gang zhig ni/_/mya ngan 'das la mchod byed pa/_/
[\[162a.7\]]bsod nams mnyam ste khyad par med/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/bsam mi khyab la dad rnams kyi/_/rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]thogs pa med pa skor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag gi yon tan ni rtogs par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la gang thos na srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub 
[\[162b.2\]]tu sems bskyed/_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/_kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa thob/_kha cig gis ni rtse mo/_/kha cig gis ni bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod 
[\[162b.3\]]pa dag_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[162b.4\]]byas/_'khor de las phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab par bkod pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis phyogs de nyid du dus ston btsugs pa dang /_de nas chu [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dus 
[\[162b.5\]]ston can chu [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dus ston can zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim 
[\[162b.6\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas/_mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bdag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste 
[\[162b.7\]]phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad ces bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs 
[\[163a.2\]]te zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya 
[\[163a.3\]]ba nas/_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas/_nang par sngar langs te gdan bting nas nor bu'i chu snod sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod lags 
[\[163a.4\]]shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_/sgo srungs kyi mi la bsgo ba/_kye nang rje re zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du gzhan mu stegs pa dag nang du ma btang zhig_/de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa 
[\[163a.5\]]rnams la sbyin no/_/jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo srungs kyi mis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[163a.6\]]gyis mdun gyis bltas nas zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dgon pa'i gnas mal zhig nas skra dang kha spu ring zhing chos 
[\[163a.7\]]gos ngan pa zhig gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs te/_des bltas na rgyal byed kyi tshal stong par 'dug nas des dge skos la dris pa/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gang du bzhud/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis spyan drangs so/_/des bsams 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]pa/_de nyid du bsod snyoms bza' zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/_de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du song ba dang /_sgo srungs kyis smras pa/_'phags pa nang du ma bzhud par gzhes shig_/ci'i phyir khyim bdag 
[\[163b.2\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas re zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du gzhan mu stegs pa dag nang du ma btang zhig_/de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa rnams la sbyin no zhes bsgo lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bsams 
[\[163b.3\]]pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis bdag la dge sbyong shAkya'i sras kyi yin no zhes bya bar ma shes pa de ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis song la skye bo bkren pa rnams la snying rje bya'o snyam du bsams te skyed mos tshal du song nas des bsams pa/_deng bdag gis su zhig rjes 
[\[163b.4\]]su gzung bar bya snyam pa dang /_re zhig cig na grong phyi nyug ma mdzes thebs pa lus zhigs shing lus las rnag khrag 'dzag pa zhig slong mo la rgyu zhing 'dug nas de'i drung du de song ba dang des kyang bslangs na 'bras khu zhig rnyed nas/_des tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus mdzes pa dang sems dang 
[\[163b.5\]]zhing spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas des bsams pa/_nges par bdag gis yon gnas 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pas des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas su gyur gyis/_gal te 'phags pa 'od srung chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'bras khu bzhes na bdag gis 'di dbul lo snyam pa 
[\[163b.6\]]dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas lhung bzed bzed de/_sring mo gal te khyod kyis btang ba yin na lhung bzed 'dir lugs shig_/de nas des sems mngon par dad par byas nas lhung bzed der blugs pa dang sbrang ma zhig lhung ngo /_/
[\[163b.7\]]des de dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /_'bras khu de'i nang du sor mo gcig chad de lhung ngo /_/des bsams pa/_'phags pas bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma phor zad kyi 'on kyang gsol ni mi gsol lo snyam pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]de'i mngon sum kho nar 'bab pa'i rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas 'thungs pa dang /_des bsams pa/_cung zad du na bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir gsol gyi/_'on kyang 'dis zas kyi go chod par ni ma byas so snyam pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 
[\[164a.2\]]de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas grong phyi nyug ma de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo rab tu dga' ba skyed cig dang khyod kyis byin pa'i zas 'dis kho bo nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar bya'o/_/de lhag par dga' ba skyes nas bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la bsod snyoms 
[\[164a.3\]]bstabs na bzhes so snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la sems dang ba bskyed nas shi bas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis des 'bras khu zhig phul nas sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba ni mthong na gang du skyes pa ma mthong nas/_
[\[164a.4\]]des sems can dmyal bar brtag par brtsams na yang ma mthong /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_mi dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams su yang ma mthong ste/_'di ltar lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug gi gong du mi 'jug go/[(]/[,) ]//
[\[164a.5\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu pa/_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_'od srung bdag nyid chen po can/_/bsod snyoms phyir ni rgyu ba na/_/'od srung 
[\[164a.6\]]'bras khu phul ba yi/_/bud med de ni gar dga' lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' ldan zhes bya'i lha de rnams/_/'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa ste/_/'od srung 'bras khu phul ba yi/_/bud med de ni de na dga'/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya 
[\[164a.7\]]byin 'di snyam du sems te/_re zhig mi 'di dag ni bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong na yang sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed na/_bdag bsod nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa go ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtang bsod nams 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]dag mi bya snyam nas/_'phags pa 'od srung chen po 'di sdug pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa la thugs brtse ba yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di la bsod snyoms bstab par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_bkren pa'i srang du khyim shag shig tu 'dug pa/_
[\[164b.2\]]lhang lhong rdol ba shin tu mi bzad pa zhig sprul nas/_bdag nyid thag pa skra yegs pa/_sha na'i ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa/_rkang lag ser ga byung ba zhig tu sprul nas ras 'thag par brtsams so/_/lha mo bde sogs kyang thag pa'i chung ma'i cha byad du byas nas ras skud 
[\[164b.3\]]'ju bar brtsams so/_/de'i phyogs gcig tu ni lha'i zhal zas zhig sta gon byas te bzhag pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bkren pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_phongs pa'i skye bo rnams la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir rim gyis khang pa der phyin nas 'di ni sdug bsngal 
[\[164b.4\]]ba zhig go zhes lhung bzed bzed nas sgor bsdad pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i zhal zas kyis bkang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'di snyam du 'di'i zas lha'i bdud rtsi la khyim gyi spungs ni 'di tsam pas shin tu 'gal lo zhes bsams te/_bdag 
[\[164b.5\]]gi snying la the tshom skyes pa/_'di ni chos nyid yin te/_dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yin par mthong nas des smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[164b.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi yun ring po nas rjes su 'brel pa'i the tshom dang som nyi'i zug rngu rtsa nas phyung zin na ci'i phyir skye bo sdug bsngal ba'i bar chad byed/_'phags pa 'od srung chen po skye bo sdug bsngal ba'i bar chad ci ste bgyid/_re 
[\[164b.7\]]zhig mi 'di rnams ni bsod nams dag mngon sum du ma mthong na yang sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag bgyid na/_bdag bsod nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa go ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtang /_bsod nams dag mi 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_bsod nams dag ni bya dgos te/_/bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag ni byas pa yis/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol dga'/_/zhes ma gsungs sam/_de phyin chad tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[165a.2\]]'od srung chen po bsams nas khyim rnams su bsod snyoms la 'gro bar brtsams so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du lha'i zhal zas kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung gi lhung bzed 'gengs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lhung bzed khas 
[\[165a.3\]]bub pas bza' ba dang btung ba bor bar gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir rjes su gnang gis lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs bcang bar bya'o/_/grong phyi nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas 
[\[165a.4\]]'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras khu gsol nas de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi ris su skyes so zhes kun du sgra grags so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis grong phyi nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras khu gsol nas dga' ldan gyi 
[\[165a.5\]]lha'i ris su skyes so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[165a.6\]]gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las 
[\[165a.7\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od srung chen po'i slad du dgung bdun du bdag 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[165b.2\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bting nas nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom 
[\[165b.3\]]ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa zhes bya ba nas/_rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/mu lto ba zhig rgan gral logs na 'dug pa rgyal po 'di bsod nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 
[\[165b.4\]]la gnas pa yin pas bsod nams dag gis ngoms mi shes par sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag byed do zhes sems mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod 
[\[165b.5\]]pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom 
[\[165b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po su'i ming nas brjod de yon bsngo ba bya/_ci khyod kyi 'am/_'on te khyod pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gang yin pa zhig gi/_rgyal pos bsams pa bdag gi bsod snyoms bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pas bdag 
[\[165b.7\]]bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gzhan lta su yod snyam du bsams nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjod cing bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu lto ba 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]de'i ming nas brjod cing yon bsngo ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin du nyi ma drug gi bar du mdzad pa dang /_nyi ma drug pa la rgyal po lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas/_bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi bsod snyoms longs spyad cing yon bsngo ba ni mu lto ba'i ming nas brjod nas mdzad do 
[\[166a.2\]]snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de blon po rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag da ltar bcom ldan 'das ni nga'i bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyad na yon 
[\[166a.3\]]bshad pa ni mu lto ba'i ming nas brjod cing mdzad na/_ci ste sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug_/de nas blon po rgan po zhig gis smras pa/_lha thugs khral chung ngur bzhugs shig dang bdag gis sang ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha kho na'i mtshan nas brjod de yon bsngo ba mdzad pa 
[\[166a.4\]]de ltar bgyi'o/_/des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_khyed kyis sang kha zas ches bsod pa dang rab tu mang po sta gon gyis la brim pa yang 'di ltar ci nas kyang phyed ni dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi nang du 'gro la/_phyed ni sa la 'bo bar gyis shig_/de dag gis phyi de nyin kha zas ches bsod 
[\[166a.5\]]pa dang /_ches rab tu mang ba bshams te/_de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par bzhugs par rig nas brim par brtsams te/_phyed ni dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed du blugs/_phyed ni sa la pho'o/_/de nas mu lto bas sa la pho ba rnams bsdu ba'i phyir brgyugs pa dang 
[\[166a.6\]]de phyag tshang 'brim pa dag gis slar bskrad do/_/de nas mu lto ba des smras pa/_gal te rgyal po 'di la nor rdzas rab tu mang po yod na bdag cag lta bu sdug bsngal ba slong ba gang yin pa de dag la ci'i phyir mi sbyin/_kha zas 'di bor ba ci phan zhes mu lto ba de sems 'khrugs pas sngon gyi ji lta ba de 
[\[166a.7\]]ltar sems dad par bya ma nus so/_/de nas rgyal pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de rnams gdugs tshod gsol zin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming nas smos te yon bsngo ba ni mi mdzad do snyam du bsams nas yon bsngo ba ma mnyan pa kho nar khyim du song ngo /_/
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ming nas smos te yon bsngos pa 'di skad du mdzad de/_glang po rta dang shing rta dpung bu chung /_/zhon nas grong khyer yul bcas 'khol byed pa/_/zan dron lan tshwa dag gis ma btab cing /_/snum bag med pa'i ma thu ni yin par 
[\[166b.2\]]ltos/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang du gdugs tshod lan mang du gsol nas ming nas brjod de yon bsngo ba mdzad na/_'di lta bu'i yon bsngo ba mdzad 
[\[166b.3\]]pa ni bdag gis sngon chad ni lan 'ga' yang ma thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nas kyi dar thug lan tshwas ma btab pa la brtsams te las kyi rgyu ba khyod nyan par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lags so/_/
[\[166b.4\]]bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nas kyi dar thug lan tshwas ma stsal ba las brtsams te las kyi rgyu ba bshad pa bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[166b.5\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par 
[\[166b.6\]]byed pa las bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba nas bskyed bsrings te de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo bdag cag gi bu lon ded pa dang /_nor 'phrog pa skyes kyis bdag zong thogs te yul gzhan 
[\[166b.7\]]du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig_/des zong thogs te yul gzhan zhig tu song ba las de de nyid du ma stes te shi bar gyur to/_/de ched po mi bdog pa zhig pas de'i khyim gyi nor rnams zad pas de'i bu yang sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang /_khyim bdag de'i sten grogs shig 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]yod pa des de la smras pa/_khye'u kho bo'i zhing las dag byos shig dang ngas khyod kyi zan sbyar bar bya'o/_/des de'i zhing las dag bya bar brtsams nas des kyang de'i zan sbyar to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dus ston la bab nas khye'u de'i mas bsams pa/_deng ni 
[\[167a.2\]]khyim bdag gi chung ma mdza' bshes dang gnyen dang nye du dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze'i skye bo rnams zan sbyin pas brel bar 'gyur gyis/_snga 'tshogs su song la khye'u de'i zan bskyal lo snyam nas/_de snga 'tshogs su song nas khyim bdag gi chung ma la don de dag go bar byas pa dang de khros 
[\[167a.3\]]nas smras pa/_re zhig dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_nye du rnams kyang da dung ma byin par mngag gzhug pa khye'u la sbyin nam/_re zhig de ring ni sdod cig_/sang nyis 'gyur du sbyin no/_/de nas khye'u de'i mas bsams pa/_khye'u bkres par ma gyur grang snyam nas bdag nyid kyi nas kyi zan dron lan 
[\[167a.4\]]tshwas ma btab pa 'di bskyal lo snyam mo/_/des de khyer nas zhing thog tu song ba dang khye'u des de rgyang mi ring ba zhig nas mthong nas des smras pa/_yum zhim po cung zad ma mchis sam/_des smras pa/_bu de ring ni zan nar ma gang yin pa nyid kyang med do/_/yum ci ste lags/_des bu la khyim bdag gi 
[\[167a.5\]]chung ma ji skad du zer ba de dag thams cad rgyas par bsnyad nas zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di yang kho mo nyid kyis khyer te 'ongs kyis/_bu 'di zo shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_zhog la bzhud cig_/des bzhag ste song ngo /_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs 
[\[167a.6\]]rgyas dman zhing ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig phyogs der phyin pa dang /_des de lus mdzes pa dang /_sems dang ba dang /_spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas des bsams 
[\[167a.7\]]pa/_gdon mi za bar bdag gis yon gnas yang dag pa 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pa des na bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur gyis/_gal te bdag las zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di bzhes na bdag gis de la dbul bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_de nas rang sangs rgyas des skyes bu 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bkren pa de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas lhung bzed bzed de/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te khyod kyis btang ba yin na lhung bzed 'dir chug shig_/de nas des dad pa drag pos zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[167b.2\]]dus kyi khye'u bkren pa gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis rang sangs rgyas la zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa phul ba gang yin pa'i las des na lan drug sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so/_
[\[167b.3\]]mnyan yod 'di nyid du yang lan drug rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur to/_/las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gyur te/_ngas 'di'i zan dron gyi rnam par smin pa rdzogs pa de la dgongs nas/_glang po rta dang shing rta dpung bu chung /_/zhon 
[\[167b.4\]]nas grong khyer yul bcas 'khol byed pa/_/zan dron lan tshwa dag gis ma btab cing /_/snum bag med pa'i mthu ni yin par ltos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa las brtsams nas las kyi rgyu ba bshad do 
[\[167b.5\]]zhes kun du sgra grags pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/_de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal 
[\[167b.6\]]rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[167b.7\]]btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag dgung zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /_snyun gsos kyi rkyen 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum 
[\[168a.2\]]du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas dge slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos re re bskon te/_'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba bsogs nas mar me'i phreng ba bltam par brtsams so/_/de na gdugs tshod kyi kha dang /_mchod pa'i tshe ca co'i sgra chen po grag pa dang /_ci tsam na grong nyug ma shin tu 
[\[168a.3\]]sdug bsngal ba zhig rdza'i chag dum zhig thogs te slong ba la zhugs pa des sgra chen po dang sgra mthon po thos so/_/thos nas kyang dris pa/_shes ldan dag sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[168a.4\]]'dun la zla ba gsum du gdugs tshod gsol nas dge slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos re re bskon te/_'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba bsogs te mar me'i phreng ba gtong bar rtsom pa yin no/_/de nas grong nyug ma de 'di snyam du sems te/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di bsod nams kyis
