[\[168a.5\]]ngoms mi shes nas da dung yang sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag byed na/_ma la bdag gis kyang 'ga' zhig las bslangs la bcom ldan 'das la me mar zhig bltam mo snyam nas/_des bslangs pa'i 'bru mar nyung zad snod gyo ral gyi nang du blugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa'i slad du mar 
[\[168a.6\]]me bltam nas/_zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na 'jig rten du byung ba de bzhin du bdag kyang skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba kho nar 'gyur zhing /_yang ji 
[\[168a.7\]]ltar 'di'i zung mchog dang zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang /_yab zas gtsang dang /_yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /_sras gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po dang /_grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi lags pa de bzhin du bdag gi yang zung mchog dang zung bzang 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]po shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang /_yab zas gtsang dang /_yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /_sras gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po dang /_grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'gyur zhing ji ltar yang bcom ldan 'das 'di sku gdung gses nas yongs su mya 
[\[168b.2\]]ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sku gdung gses nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/ji tsam na mar me de dag thams cad ni shi'o/_/des btang ba'i mar me ni 'bar zhing 'dug go/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji srid nang du yang dag 
[\[168b.3\]]ma bzhag pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nye gnas rnams nang du yang dag mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med pas ma la bdag gis mar me de gsad 
[\[168b.4\]]par bya'o snyam nas des lag pas gsad par brtsams pa las ma nus so/_/de nas chos gos kyi grwa dang /_de nas bsil yab kyis g.yabs na 'on kyang gsad par ma nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ci byed/_des gsol pa/_
[\[168b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gi glo ba la bsams pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa ni gnas ma mchis shing go skabs ma mchis kyis/_ma la bdag gis zhugs mar dgum mo snyam nas bdag gis de sug pas dgum par brtsams na rngo ma thog go/_/de nas 
[\[168b.6\]]chos gos kyi grwa dang /_de nas bsil yab kyis g.yabs na 'on kyang rngo ma thog lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dub par ma byed cig_/gal te rnam par 'thor rlung langs na des kyang gsad par mi nus na lag pa dang /_chos gos kyi grwa dang /_bsil yab 
[\[168b.7\]]kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'di ltar mar me 'di ni bu mo 'dis sems kyis mngon par 'du byed pa chen pos bus pa yin no/_/gzhan yang kun dga' bo bu mo 'di ni skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing de'i zung mchog dang zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang /_yab zas gtsang dang /_yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /_sras gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po dang grong khyer [(]sar [,]ser [)]skya'i gzhi zhes bya 
[\[169a.2\]]bar 'gyur la/_de sku gdung gses nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/grong nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa'i slad du mar me btang bas de bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes kun du 
[\[169a.3\]]sgra grags pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis thos nas/_de'i ma 'ongs pa'i yon tan la bsams nas yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas de nas ngo mtshar skyes te/_'bru mar bum pa stong bsdogs nas mar me sna 
[\[169a.4\]]tshogs su sbrengs te rin po che sna bzhi'i mar me 'chag sa'i slad du bus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po mchod pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun gyi bar du 
[\[169a.5\]]gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sngon gyi 'tshal ma dron po lan tshwas ma stsal ba las brtsams te las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gis dgung zla gsum du gdugs tshod gsol nas dge 
[\[169a.6\]]slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos phrugs re bskon te/_'bru mar bum pa bye ba bsdogs te phreng bar sbrengs nas zhugs mar bltam lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan lags na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig 
[\[169a.7\]]rten gyi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar lta na/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan na legs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni zab pa/_zab par snang ba/_mthong bar dka' 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_zhib mo brtags pa'i rtogs pa dang /_mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te/_de ni khyed kyi sbyin pa lan gcig byas pas thob par sla ba ma yin te/_sbyin pa lan brgyas ma yin/_sbyin 
[\[169b.2\]]pa lan stong gis ma yin/_sbyin pa lan brgya phrag stong gis ma yin no/_/'on kyang rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod na sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/_bsod nams dag kyang bya zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag kyang bsten par bya/_bsnyen par bya/_bsnyen 
[\[169b.3\]]bkur bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de bzhin du sbyin pa dag ni btang /_bsod nams dag ni byas shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag kyang bsten/_bsnyen bsnyen bkur byas na de lta na khyod nam zhig na 'jig rten gyi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur grang /_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_ko sa 
[\[169b.4\]]la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mchi ma blags te ngus so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gos kyi mtha' mas mchi ma phyis nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba na 
[\[169b.5\]]sbyin pa ni ci snyed cig stsal/_bsod nams ni ji snyed cig bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po re zhig 'das pa'i bskal pa gzhan rnams lta zhog gi/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bas rnam 
[\[169b.6\]]grangs du mar sbyin pa btang ba dang /_bsod nams byas pa de dag legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig dang bshad do//_//bar sdom la/_nga las nu dang legs mthong che/_/dus dpog ku sha gdol ba dang /_/lha chen po dang mu khyud rgyal/_/me long gdong dang nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/thams 
[\[169b.7\]]cad sgrol dang 'dum byed do/_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/_de'i spyi bor sha rmen 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa zhig skyes pa dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur gnod pa 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]cung zad kyang mi skyed do/_/de yongs su smin nas rdol ba las gzhon nu gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_yan 
[\[170a.2\]]lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/byung ma thag tu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkri ba dang /_rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo brgyad khris gzhon nu mthong nas nu ma rnams las 'o ma 
[\[170a.3\]]zags pa dang /_bud med re res kyang nga las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas de'i ming nga las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhan dag na re 'di spyi bo las skyes pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming spyi bo skyes zhes bya'o zhes zer to/_/de na kha cig gis ni nga las nu zhes bya bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni 
[\[170a.4\]]spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar shes so/_/gzhon nu nga las nu gzhon nu'i rtsed mos rtse ba la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/rgyal tshab la gnas pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/gzhon nu nga las nu yul zhig tu song ste/_de yul du phyin pa dang rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na bar gyur nas de 
[\[170a.5\]]rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman gyis snyen bkur byas na yang phyir thu ba kho nar gyur nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis pho nya bkug ste 
[\[170a.6\]]rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags bsnyung nas/_des gzhon nu spyan drongs la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal gyis/_gzhon nu myur du byon pa'i rigs so zhes spring ngo /_/de chas pa dang rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shi'o/_/de nas blon po dag gis yang pho nya gzhan zhig 
[\[170a.7\]]gtong ba la gzhon nu khyod kyi yab ni nongs kyis/_tshur spyon rgyal srid bzhes shig ces spring ngo /_/gzhon nu nga las nus bsams pa/_gal te bdag gi yab nongs na/_der song yang ci phan snyam du bsams nas de nyid na 'dug go/_/blon po rnams yang 'dus nas blon po zhig pho nyar btang 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ba dang der song nas smras pa/_gzhon nu rgyal srid bzhes shig_/des smras pa/_gal te kho bos chos dang mthun pas rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur na rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/blon po rnams kyis spring ba/_lha rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba la ni mang 
[\[170b.2\]]du 'tshal te/_rin po che'i gcal dang /_seng ge'i khri dang /_gdugs dang /_cod pan dang /_dpung rgyan gyis pho brang gi nang du rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bar bgyi 'tshal bas de lta bas na gzhon nu 'di nyid du byon pa'i rigs so/_/des smras pa/_ngas chos dang mthun par rgyal srid 
[\[170b.3\]]'thob pa lta na thams cad 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya ba des rin po che'i gcal dang /_seng ge'i khri de nyid du blangs so/_/pho brang na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang gdugs dang /_cod pan dang /_dpung rgyan khyer 
[\[170b.4\]]nas rang de nyid du lhags te/_pho brang 'khor ba rang lhags pas gnas de'i ming gnas bcas gnas bcas zhes bya bar grags so/_/phyis blon po de rnams dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis ni dbang bskur ba khyer te dong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 
[\[170b.5\]]dbang bskur ba bzhes su gsol/_des smras pa/_nga mi rnams kyis cod pan bcing ngam/_gal te chos kyi rgyal srid 'thob na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis cod pan 'ching grang /_ji tsam na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis cod pan bcings pa dang /_de'i rin po che sna bdun byung ba 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin 
[\[170b.6\]]po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che nyid do/_/de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang 
[\[170b.7\]]tshang bar byung ngo /_/yangs pa can gyi nyen kor na nags tshal stug po dag dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig yod pa de na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa lnga brgya bsam gtan byed do/_/nags tshal stug po de na yang bya gar rab tu mang po dag cig kyang gnas so/_/bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]sgra yin pas bya gar rnams lding zhing skad 'byin par byed pa dang /_de nas drang srong rang bzhin ngan zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de 'khrugs nas des bya gar rnams la 'dab gshog rnams lhags par shog shig ces dmod pa bor ro/_/de rnams drang srong 'khrugs pas 'dab gshog 
[\[171a.2\]]rnams lhags par gyur to/_/de nas de rnams rkang pas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_rgyal po de yang ljongs rgyur song bas bya gar rnams rkang pas 'gro ba mthong ngo /_/de nas des blon po rnams la dris pa ci'i phyir bya gar 'di rnams rkang pas 'gro bar gyur/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 
[\[171a.3\]]bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra lags pas drang srong 'khrugs pa dag gis 'di rnams la dmod pa bor ba dang /_de nas drang srong 'khrugs pas 'di rnams kyi 'dab gshog rnams lhags par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_gang dag sems can rnams la snying brtse ba med pa'i drang srong 'di lta bu 
[\[171a.4\]]yang yod pa lta zhes smras nas/_shes ldan dag deng la drang srong rnams la khyed cag nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces sgo shig ces smras so/_/de nas blon po rnams drang srong gi thad du dong nas bsgo ba/_rgyal po'i zhal nas khyed cag nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces bka' stsal to/_/drang srong rnams kyis 
[\[171a.5\]]bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di ni gling bzhi la dbang ba yin pas ri rab kyi bang rim du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de rnams der dong ste gnas so/_/rgyal po nga las nu'i mi rnams ni sems par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_nye bar rtog par byed pa yin te/_de dag gis bsams shing nye bar brtags nas 
[\[171a.6\]]bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa rnams bya bar brtson pas de rnams sems par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_nye bar rtog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ming shed las skyes shed las skyes zhes bya bar grags so/_/de rnams kyis zhing las dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /_rgyal po ljongs 
[\[171a.7\]]rgyur song bas mi de rnams zhing las dag byed par mthong nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/_mi 'di rnams ci zhig byed/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha sman du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du lo thog la sogs pa skrun pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci bdag gi rgyal srid kyi mi rnams zhing las 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]byed dam/_de nas des smras pa/_lhas sa bon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi char phob shig ces byas pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas sa bon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi char phab bo/_/rgyal po nga las nus yul mi rnams la dris pa/_'di 
[\[171b.2\]]dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i yang lags/_bdag cag gi yang lags so/_/yang mi de rnams ras bal gyi zhing rmo bar brtsams pa dang /_yang rgyal po nga las nu ljongs rgyur song bas mthong nas/_des blon po rnams la smras pa/_mi 'di 
[\[171b.3\]]rnams ci zhig byed/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mi 'di rnams ni ras bal gyi zhing rmed lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci zhig tu dgos/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gos bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas rgyal po nga las nus smras pa/_ci nga'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams ras bal 
[\[171b.4\]]gyi zhing rmed dam/_lhas ras bal kho na'i char phob cig ces byas pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas ras bal kho na'i char phab bo/_/rgyal pos yul mi rnams la dris pa/_'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i yang 
[\[171b.5\]]lags/_bdag cag gi yang lags so/_/yang mi de rnams ras bal de rnams 'khal bar brtsams pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_mi 'di dag ci zhig byed/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha skud pa 'tshal ba'i slad du ras bal de 'khal lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[171b.6\]]ci nga'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams ras skud 'khal lam/_lhas ras skud kyi char kho na phob shig ces byas pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas ras skud kho na'i char phab bo/_/rgyal po des smras pa/_'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i 
[\[171b.7\]]yang lags/_bdag cag gi yang lags so/_/de nas rim gyis ras 'thag par brtsams pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_'di dag ci zhig byed/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gos su bgyi ba'i slad du ras 'thag lags so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_da ci nga'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams ras 'thag 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]gam snyam nas/_lhas ras nyid kyi char phob shig ces byas pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas ras nyid kyi char phab bo/_/rgyal pos dris pa 'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i yang lags/_bdag cag gi yang 
[\[172a.2\]]lags so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_mi 'di rnams ni bdag gi bsod nams dag gi mthu rab tu mi shes te/_bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/_bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che 
[\[172a.3\]]dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_btsun mo rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/_bdag la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar 
[\[172a.4\]]yod kyis/_kye ma bdag gi pho brang gi nang du rin po che'i char 'bab cing de las phyi rol du ni kAr ShA pa Na 'ga' yang mi 'bab par gyur cig snyam pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu pho brang gi nang du zhag bdun du rin po che'i char bab la/_phyi rol du ni kAr ShA pa Na 'ga' yang ma bab ste/_
[\[172a.5\]]ji ltar mthu chen po/_rdzu 'phrul chen po bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba byas pa rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu so sor nyams su myong ba bzhin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis nyes te/_
[\[172a.6\]]gal te khyed kyis lha'i bsod nams kyis lags so zhes smras pa dang /_ngas 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu rin po che'i char phab par 'gyur ba zhig_/'on kyang khyed las rin po che su 'dod pa des rin po che ci 'dod pa dag long shig_/de nas rgyal po nga las nu de rgyal srid chen po'i dbang byed du 'jug pa la 
[\[172a.7\]]brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya ba de la rgyal pos smras pa/_gang ngas bka' stsal dgos pa bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/_lha gnas kyis smras pa/_lha shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bgyi ba'i gling 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba mchis kyis/_lha der gshegs te bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_
[\[172b.2\]]skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/_bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/_bdag la bu dpa' ba/_
[\[172b.3\]]rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang /_bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du bab na/_shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling zhig yod ces grag gis/_ma la bdag der yang song la rjes su bstan par 
[\[172b.4\]]bya'o snyam pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang nam mkha' la 'phags te/_rgyal po nga las nu shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du chas nas rgyal po nga 
[\[172b.5\]]las nu shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du gnas te/_rgyal po nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba byas pa/_mthu chen po/_rdzu 'phrul chen pos rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba ltar shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du lo mang po dang /_
[\[172b.6\]]lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por rjes su bstan par byas so/_/de shar gyi lus 'phags gling na rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/yang rgyal po nga las nus gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/_bka' 'og tu ma chud 
[\[172b.7\]]pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/_lha gnas kyis smras pa/_lha nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba mchis kyis lha der yang gshegs te rjes su bstan du gsol//_//
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/_de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/_bdag gi pho brang gi 
[\[173a.2\]]nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du bab/_bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du yang phyin/_lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rjes su bstan na/_nub kyi ba 
[\[173a.3\]]lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling zhig yod ces grag gis/_ma la bdag der yang song la rjes su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che 
[\[173a.4\]]sna bdun dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/_rgyal po nga las nu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du chas nas rgyal po nga las nu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du gnas te/_rgyal po nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba byas pa/_mthu chen po/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[173a.5\]]chen pos rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba ltar nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por rjes su bstan par byas so/_/de nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na rjes su ston pa la brgya 
[\[173a.6\]]byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/yang rgyal po nga las nus gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/_bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/_lha gnas kyis smras pa/_lha byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bgyi ba'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo 
[\[173a.7\]]legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang la/_gzhan yang mi de dag ni bdag gir bgyi ba ma mchis pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa zhig mchis kyis/_kye ma lha der yang gshegs te/_nyid kyi dpung gi tshogs rnams la rjes su bstan du gsol/_de nas 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/_bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du bab/_bdag shar [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]lus 
[\[173b.2\]]'phags kyi gling du song ste yang lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rjes su bstan/_bdag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du yang song ste lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po 
[\[173b.3\]]dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du rjes su bstan na/_byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya ba'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang la/_
[\[173b.4\]]gzhan yang mi de dag ni bdag gir bya ba med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa zhig yod ces grag gis/_ma la bdag der yang song la rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba 
[\[173b.5\]]brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang nam mkha' la 'phags te chas pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nus ri rab kyi ngos logs nas sa phyogs dkar zhing dkar ba dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin 
[\[173b.6\]]lha gnas la smras pa/_lha gnas sa phyogs dkar zhing dkar ba pha bi ci zhig yin/_lha de ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru lags te/_'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru la 
[\[173b.7\]]longs spyod pa lags pas lha yang der yang gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po nga las nus thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_sna bo dag khyed kyis sa phyogs dkar zhing dkar ba dag mthong ngam/_lha 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]mthong lags so/_/sna bo dag de ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru yin te/_'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru la longs spyod pa yin pas/_khyed cag kyang der song nas ma 
[\[174a.2\]]rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po nga las nu chas pa na ri rab kyi ngos logs na bkra zhing bkra ba'i ljon pa phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa dag rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yang gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/_
[\[174a.3\]]lha gnas bkra zhing bkra ba'i ljon pa phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa pha bi ci zhig yin/_lha de rnams ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi shing lags te/_'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi gos 'tshal lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[174a.4\]]po nga las nus thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_sna bo dag khyed kyis bkra zhing bkra ba'i ljon pa phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa dag mthong ngam/_lha mthong lags so/_/sna bo dag de rnams ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi gos kyi shing 
[\[174a.5\]]yin te/_'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi gos gyon pa yin gyis/_khyed kyang der son nas dpag bsam gyi shing gi gos gyon par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po nga las nu byang gi sgra mi snyan du song ste/_rgyal po nga las nu byang gi sgra mi snyan du 
[\[174a.6\]]'dug nas/_rgyal po nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba byas pa/_mthu chen po/_rdzu 'phrul chen pos rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu myong ba ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag 
[\[174a.7\]]mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por rang gi dpung gi tshogs rnams la rjes su bstan to/_/de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/yang rgyal po nga las nus gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/_bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/_lha ma mchis so/_/'on kyang lha sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha tshe ring ba/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_bde ba mang zhing gzhal med khang mthon po na yun ring du gnas pa dag mchis kyis/_kye ma lha sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la 
[\[174b.2\]]gzigs su bzhud cig_/de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/_bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_'khor 
[\[174b.3\]]lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/_bdag la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_
[\[174b.4\]]pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang /_bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du phab/_bdag shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du yang song ste/_lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang 
[\[174b.5\]]por bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rjes su bstan/_bdag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du yang song ste lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du rjes su bstan/_bdag 
[\[174b.6\]]byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du yang song ste lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su bstan na/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha tshe ring ba/_
[\[174b.7\]]kha dog dang ldan pa/_bde ba mang zhing gzhal med khang mthon po na yun ring du gnas pa dag cig yod ces grag gis/_ma la bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]'bum dang /_thabs cig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te chas so/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni gser gyi ri bo bdun gyis bskor ba yin pas/_de nas rgyal po nga las nu gser 
[\[175a.2\]]gyi ri bo mu khyud 'dzin la gnas te/_de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/ri bo mu khyud 'dzin nas gser gyi ri bo rnam par 'dud la 'dug ste/_de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos 
[\[175a.3\]]pa lon no/_/ri bo rnam par 'dud nas gser gyi ri bo rta rna la 'dug ste/_de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/ri bo rta rna nas gser gyi ri bo blta na sdug la 'dug ste/_de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa 
[\[175a.4\]]la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/ri bo blta na sdug nas gser gyi ri bo seng ldeng can la 'dug ste/_de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/ri bo seng ldeng can nas gser gyi ri bo gshol mda' 'dzin la 'dug ste/_
[\[175a.5\]]de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/ri bo gshol mda' 'dzin nas gser gyi ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin la 'dug ste/_de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no//_//bar sdom la/_
[\[175a.6\]]mu khyud 'dzin dang rnam par 'dud/_/de bzhin ri bo rta rna dang /_/blta na sdug dang seng ldeng can/_/gshol mda' 'dzin dang gnya' shing 'dzin/_/ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te chas pa na ri rab kyi bang rim de la drang srong lnga brgya po de rnams gnas te/_de 
[\[175a.7\]]rnams kyis rgyal po de 'ong ba mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po 'thab krol can 'di 'ong ngo /_/de na drang srong bzhin ngan zhes bya ba des skyor bar chu blugs te gtor bas dpung gi tshogs rnams thogs par gyur pa dang /_de'i mdun nas blon po rin po 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]che 'gro bas des drang srong de rnams la smras pa/_bram ze khro ba dor bar gyis/_/'di ni kun la 'grub pa yin/_/'di ni mi dbang nga las nu/_/bya gar de dag ma yin no/_/ji tsam na rgyal po nga las nu phyogs der phyin nas smras pa/_dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag_/
[\[175b.2\]]blon po rin po ches smras pa/_drang srong rnams kyis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_drang srong 'di rnams nang na ci zhig la dga'/_des smras pa/_lha ral pa la dga' lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di rnams ral pa byi nas bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig ces byas 
[\[175b.3\]]pa dang /_de nas de rnams kyi ral pa byi nas lag na mda' gzhu thogs te mdun du brgyug par brtsams pa dang /_bud med rin po ches rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha drang srong 'di rnams ni dka' thub can lags na 'di dag ci bgyi thong lags/_rgyal pos btang ba dang /_de 
[\[175b.4\]]rnams kyis slar yang brtson 'grus la gnas nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/rgyal po nga las nu yang dpung gi tshogs dang nam mkha' la 'phags te chas so/_/ri rab ri'i rgyal po dpag tshad brgyad khri ni 'og tu gser gyi sa gzhi la thug par 'dug go/_/dpag 
[\[175b.5\]]tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i steng du byung ste/_de ltar dpag tshad 'bum drug khri yod do/_/de'i ngos re re la yang dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/_de ni khor khor yug tu dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod do/_/rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin bzang po mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa yin no/_/
[\[175b.6\]]de'i steng na lha sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams gnas te/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma lnga po chu la gnas pa'i klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin lag na yol go thogs pa rnams dang /_phreng thogs rnams dang /_rtag tu myos rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams 
[\[175b.7\]]bkod pa la/_chu na gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po nga las nu'i dpung gi tshogs rnams bkag pa dang /_ji tsam na rgyal po nga las nu phyogs der phyin nas smras pa/_dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha chab na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis so/_/rgyal 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]pos smras pa/_bdag dud 'gro rnams dang g.yul 'gyed dam/_des smras pa/_chu la gnas pa'i klu 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_de rnams rgyal po nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro bar chas so/_/ji tsam na klu de rnams rgyal po 
[\[176a.2\]]nga las nu'i mdun nas rgyug cing /_lha lag na yol go thogs kyi drung du phyin pa dang /_de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'dir mi'i rgyal po 'ong ngo /_/de nas klu de rnams dang /_lha lag na yol go thogs rnams log 
[\[176a.3\]]nas yang dpung gi tshogs de thogs par byas so/_/ji tsam na rgyal po nga las nu 'ongs nas des smras pa/_dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag_/des smras pa/_lha lha lag na yol go thogs 'di rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs bkag lags so/_/rgyal po nga las nus smras pa/_
[\[176a.4\]]lha lag na yol go thogs 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig de nas de rnams mdun nas rab tu brgyugs te/_ji tsam na klu de rnams dang lhan cig lha phreng thogs rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang /_de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[176a.5\]]mi'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong ngo /_/de nas lha dang /_klu de rnams yang log nas dpung gi tshogs thogs par byas pa dang /_rgyal po phyogs der phyin nas des smras pa/_dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag des smras pa/_lha lha phreng thogs rnams kyis so/_/rgyal pos smras 
[\[176a.6\]]pa/_lha phreng thogs 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig_/de nas de rnams mdun nas brgyug par brtsams so/_/de rnams kyis brgyugs nas lha rtag tu myos rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang /_de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug_/
[\[176a.7\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_mi'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong ngo /_/de nas de rnams log nas yang dpung gi tshogs de thogs par byas pa dang /_rgyal po phyogs der phyin nas des smras pa/_dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag des smras pa/_lha lha rtag tu myos rnams kyis so/_/rgyal 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pos smras pa/_lha rtag tu myos 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig_/de nas de rnams mdun nas brgyugs so/_/de rnams kyis brgyugs nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang /_de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci ste 
[\[176b.2\]]rgyug_/mi'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi'i rnams kyis bsams pa/_sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin te de dgag par mi nus so snyam nas/_de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de rnams kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la 
[\[176b.3\]]'dir mi'i rgyal po nga las nu 'ong ngo zhes sbran to/_/sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa/_sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin pas de bzlog par mi bya'i mchod yon gyis bsu bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum 
[\[176b.4\]]pa'i lha de rnams kyis mchod yon gyis bsu'o/_/rgyal po nga las nu ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzeg pa na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba'i phreng ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthon po dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/_lha gnas tshal sngo zhing sngo ba'i phreng ba sprin spungs pa 
[\[176b.5\]]lta bu mthon po pha bi dag ci zhig yin/_lha de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bgyi ba lags te/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor cing ldan par de na rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_
[\[176b.6\]]dga' mgur spyod par bgyid do/_/lha yang der byon nas lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor cing ldan par rol bar mdzad/_dgyes par mdzad/_dgyes mgur spyad par mdzod cig rgyal po nga las nus thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_sna bo dag khyed cag 
[\[176b.7\]]gis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba'i phreng ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthon po dag mthong ngam/_lha mthong lags so/_/sna bo dag de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol ces bya ba yin te/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]tan lnga dang 'byor cing ldan par de na rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed kyis/_sna bo dag khyed cag kyang der phyin nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor cing ldan par rtse bar gyis/_dga' bar gyis dga' mgur spyad par gyis shig_/
[\[177a.2\]]yang rgyal po nga las nus ri rab kyi rtse na dkar zhing dkar ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthon po zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/_lha gnas dkar zhing dkar ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthon po pha bi ci zhig yin/_lha de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum 
[\[177a.3\]]pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang lags te/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi rnams der 'dus shing tshogs nas lha dang mi rnams kyi don sems par bgyid/_'jal bar bgyid/_nye bar rtog par bgyid de/_lha yang der bzhud par 
[\[177a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyal po nga las nus thos nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_sna bo dag khyed cag gis dkar zhing dkar ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthon po mthong ngam/_lha mthong lags so/_/sna bo dag de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yin 
[\[177a.5\]]te/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi rnams der 'dus shing tshogs nas lha dang mi rnams kyi don sems par byed/_'jal bar byed/_nye bar rtog par byed de/_sna bo dag khyed cag kyang der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sum bcu rtsa gsum 
[\[177a.6\]]pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba ni chu dang zheng du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod de/_kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad khri yod pa/_gser gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba ste/_ra ba de rnams kyi 'phang du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod do/_/ra ba de 
[\[177a.7\]]rnams la cog rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa dag btags so/_/skar khung kha yar lta ba dang /_mar lta ba dag kyang btod do/_/grong khyer blta na sdug gi nang gi sa'i phyogs ni bzang po/_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_bkra ba shin tu bkra ba/_tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra bar byas pa dper na ras bal gyi 'da' ba'am shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur 'jam pa/_shin du 'jam pa/_rkang pas mnan nems zhes byed la/_rkang pa bteg na bar zhes byed pa/_
[\[177b.2\]]lha'i me tog man dA ra'i phung po pus mo nub tsam bkram pa ste/_rlung langs pas me tog rnying pa rnams khyer la me tog sar pa rnams 'bab par byed do/_/blta na sdug gi grong khyer la sgo dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/_sgo re re na gnod sbyin gos sngon po can go cha bgos pa/_
[\[177b.3\]]mda' gzhu skyes skor thogs pa lnga brgya 'di ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gnas so/_/grong khyer blta na sdug gi srang gi srid du ni dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod la rgyar ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod de 
[\[177b.4\]]bzang po mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/_gser gyi dra bas bres pa/_de'i phyogs kun na rdzing bu rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/_rdzing bu de rnams pha gu rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas 
[\[177b.5\]]pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pas bskor to/_/rdzing bu de rnams kyi them skas rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa yin no/_/rdzing bu de rnams lan kan rnam pa 
[\[177b.6\]]bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pas bskor cing /_gser las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma dngul las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa'i lan 
[\[177b.7\]]kan gyi gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma gser las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma shel las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]kan gyi rten ma bai DUr+ya las byas pa yin no/_/rdzing bu de rnams chu sbrang rtsi ltar mngar zhing bsil bas gang la/_ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos gang zhing chu la gnas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs 
[\[178a.2\]]can rnams kyis snyan cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra skad 'byin par byed do/_/de'i phyogs kun na me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_dbu rgyan skye ba dag shin du dbyibs legs shing legs par skyes pa ni dper na phreng ba mkhan nam phreng ba mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas 
[\[178a.3\]]pa zhig gis rna rgyan du bya ba'i phyir me tog gi phreng ba legs par brgyus pa bzhin no/_/thang la gnas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams kyang snyan cing 'jebs pa'i sgra skad 'byin to/_/grong khyer blta na sdug na dpag bsam gyi gos kyi shing 
[\[178a.4\]]ljon pa rnam pa bzhi po sngon po dang /_ser po dang dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams las dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi po sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams te/_lha'am lha'i bu mo dag ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma 
[\[178a.5\]]thag tu de lta bu lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyan gyi shing rnam pa bzhi po rnams las rgyan rnam pa bzhi po lag pa'i rgyan dang /_rkang pa'i rgyan dang /_smad kyi rgyan dang /_snang bar bya ba'i rgyan no/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo dag ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag 
[\[178a.6\]]tu de lta bu lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa bzhi po pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /_sgra snyan rnams las lha'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i kha zas rnam 
[\[178a.7\]]pa bzhi po sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams las lha'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/khang pa dang /_khang pa rtseg ma dang /_bsil khang dang /_khyams dang /_skar khung dang /_mthongs khung 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]can bud med kyi tshogs rnams dang /_lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'du ba'i gnas dag yod de/_de na btung ba sbrang rtsi'i btung ba dang /_ma d+ha ba'i btung ba dang /_ka dam b+ha ra'i btung ba dang /_rol mo'i sgra skad rnams kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rtse bar byed/_dga' bar 
[\[178b.2\]]byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bar byed do/_/sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba srid du dpag tshad sum brgya/_rgyar dpag tshad sum brgya ste/_kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad dgu brgya 
[\[178b.3\]]yod pa/_bzang po/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_shel gyi rgyu las byung ba ste/_grong khyer de las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi gyen du 'phags so/_/der sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi stan bshams pa ni nye dbang po sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 
[\[178b.4\]]lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan dag so sor bshams so/_/rgyal po nga las nu'i stan ni stan de dag thams cad kyi mjug kho nar bshams so/_/de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mchod yon thogs te rgyal po nga las nu bsu'o/_/de na sems can bsod nams 
[\[178b.5\]]kyi rnam par smin pas dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de dag ni rim gyis nang du zhugs so/_/lhag ma rnams ni phyi rol na 'khod pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nus bsams pa/_stan bshams pa gang dag yin pa 'di rnams las stan tha ma gang yin pa 'di ni gdon mi za 
[\[178b.6\]]bar bdag gi stan yin no snyam nas/_de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan phyed bdag la bstabs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu/_rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal 
[\[178b.7\]]po nga las nu la stan phyed bstabs nas/_rgyal po nga las nu lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan gcig la 'dug pa na 'di lta ste srid du'am/_zheng du'am/_kha dog rgyas pa'am/_
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]smra dngags la khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med de/_gzhan du na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni mig mi 'dzums so/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa la brgya byin 
[\[179a.2\]]sum bcu rtsa drug shi 'phos pa lon no/_/yang de na lha rnams la lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa 'byung ste/_de la gal te lha ma yin rnams pham par gyur na ni lha ma yin de rnams grong khyer gyi sgo bcad nas ra ba'i kha bskor nas 'dug go/_/'on te lha rnams pham par gyur 
[\[179a.3\]]na ni lha de rnams kyang khang pa'i sgo rnams bcad nas ra ba'i kha bskor nas 'dug go/_/ji tsam na lha ma yin rnams dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas gcan rim pa lnga dral te lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du g.yul 'gyed du 'ongs pa dang /_gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[179a.4\]]kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/_kau shi ka mkhyen par mdzod cig_/lha ma yin rnams kyis gcan rim pa lnga dral te nye bar mchis kyis/_khyod kyi bgyi ba dang bshams pa gang lags pa de mdzod cig_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dpung gi 
[\[179a.5\]]tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bgos nas lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir spags pa rgyal po nga las nus mthong nas smras pa/_bzhugs shig bdag nyid mchi'o/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_de bzhin mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye 
[\[179a.6\]]ba brgyad 'bum dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas gzhu rgyud kyi sgra sbrengs so/_/lha ma yin rnams kyis de thos nas smras pa/_'di su'i gzhu rgyud kyi sgra yin/_de rnams kyis 'di ni rgyal po nga las nu'i gzhu rgyud kyi sgra yin no zhes thos so/_/thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par 
[\[179a.7\]]gyur to/_/ji tsam na rgyal po nga las nus spags pa dang /_chos nyid kyis lha rnams dang lha ma yin de rnams g.yul 'gyed pa'i shing rta dag nam mkha' la thad ka thad kar 'dug ste/_gang gi yang mthon dman med pa yin pa las rgyal po nga las nu'i ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi ltag 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'dug go/_/lha ma yin de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gi ltag na nam mkha' la spags te 'dug pa 'di su zhig yin/_de rnams kyis 'di ni mi'i rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya ba yin no zhes thos so/_/thos nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/_gang 
[\[179b.2\]]gi shing rta bdag cag gi ltag tu nam mkha' las 'gro ba'i sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas dbang che bar grags pa yin no snyam nas/_de rnams pham par gyur te 'jigs skrag cing bcom pas rgyab bstan nas lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas su zhugs so/_/rgyal po 
[\[179b.3\]]nga las nus smras pa/_gang rgyal/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal lags so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams pas ni bdag lhag go snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /_
[\[179b.4\]]rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba yang yod/_bdag la shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling yang yod/_bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po 
[\[179b.5\]]rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_btsun mo rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/_bdag la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa 
[\[179b.6\]]stong yang tshang bar yod/_bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang gser gyi char zhag bdun du bab/_bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du yang phyin/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du yang zhugs/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bdag la stan phyed bstabs 
[\[179b.7\]]kyis kye ma'o bdag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gnas 'di nas phyung la/_bdag kho nas lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bya'o snyam pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu 'byor pa de las yongs su nyams te/_'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]du 'ongs nas nad tshabs po che zhig gis thebs te sdug bsngal mi bzad pa 'chi ba la thug pa myong ba dang /_de nas rgyal po nga las nu'i blon po dang /_rtsis pa dang /_rgyal srid 'bul ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_gsang sngags kyis lhan cig 'tsho bar byed pa 
[\[180a.2\]]rnams rgyal po nga las nu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po nga las nu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha 'das nas yul 'khor gyi mi slad ma rnams shes ldan dag rgyal po nga las nus nongs pa'i dus kyi tshe ci zhig gsungs zhes 'dri na/_de skad du 'dri ba de dag la bdag cag gis 
[\[180a.3\]]ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi/_sna bo dag nga 'das nas gal te khyed cag la skye bo phyi ma rnams nye bar 'ongs nas de skad du 'dri bar byed na/_'dri ba de dag la khyed kyis lan 'di skad ces thob shig_/shes ldan dag rgyal po nga las nu ni rin po che sna bdun dang yang ldan/_mi'i 'byor pa rnam 
[\[180a.4\]]bzhis gling bzhir rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la yang dbang byed du bcug_/sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du yang song nas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga po dag gis ma ngoms bzhin du nongs so zer ro zhes gyis shig_/tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/_kAr ShA pa Na'i char 
[\[180a.5\]]bab kyang /_/'dod pa dag la ngoms pa med/_/mkhas pas 'dod pa mnog chung zhing /_/sdug bsngal mang por shes nas ni/_/lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang /_/dga' bar 'gyur ba med pa nyid/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/nyan thos sred pa zad la dga'/_/
[\[180a.6\]]gangs kyi ri dang mnyam pa yi/_/gser gyi ri bor gyur kyang ni/_/gcig gi nor du'ang des mi chog_/mkhas pas de ltar shes par bya/_/gang zhig gzhi 'dis sdug bsngal rtog pa de/_/'dod pa dag la gzhar yang ji ltar dga'/_/'jig rten nor dag zug rngur rtogs nas ni/_/
[\[180a.7\]]brtan pas de nyid gdul phyir bslab par bya/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar gang mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ngoms shing chog shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mi gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyung la/_mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]mi ngoms shing chog mi shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni ches mang bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po nga las nus gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin btang nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/'jig rten pha rol ya nga zhing /_/tshe thung bar ni shes byas nas/_/bsod nams dag ni bya ba ste/_/bsod 
[\[180b.2\]]nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/de bas bsod nams 'dod pa yis/_/sbyin pa tshul bzhin btang byas na/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/sbyin pa byas pa dga' bar 'gyur/_/ji tsam na grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis rgyal po nga las nu na ste shi la thug cing 'dug go zhes thos so/_/
[\[180b.3\]]thos nas kyang yang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag rgyal po nga las nu blta ba'i phyir nye bar song ba dang /_rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs rnams la 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs kyi gtam yang byas khyim na gnas pa'i nyes dmigs dang /_de bzhin du 'dod pa smad pa yang bshad de/_de 
[\[180b.4\]]thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag khyim gyi gnas spangs nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/_nags tshal du 'dug nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa spangs te/_de la mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skal ba mnyam par 
[\[180b.5\]]skyes so/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nus ji srid gzhon nu rtse ba'i sa na rtses pa dang /_ji srid rgyal tshab byas pa dang /_ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal srid chen po byas pa dang /_ji srid shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /_gser 
[\[180b.6\]]gyi ri bo bdun la gnas pa dang /_ji srid sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnas su song ste gnas pa de'i bar la brgya byin brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi shi 'phos pa lon no/_/rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi tshe'i tshad ni mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 
[\[180b.7\]]lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no/_/nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha rnams kyi lo stong ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin te/_de la mi'i ltar bgrang na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang drug khri yod do/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]po gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ste 'di skad ces/_kye ma'o bdag la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan phyed bstabs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed pa de'i tshe de'i dus kyi brgya byin ni dge slong 'od srung yin no/_/gang 
[\[181a.2\]]gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de/_ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gnas 'di nas phyung la/_bdag nyid lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bya'o/_/snyam pa de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[181a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te/_sems can shin tu dbang che bar grags pa la ngan sems bskyed pa des na 'byor pa de las nyams nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs te nad tshabs chen pos thebs shing 'chi ba la thug pa'i tshor ba mi bzad pa myong bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du 
[\[181a.4\]]sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po nga las nu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_gang yang ngas sems can de snyed cig la phan pa byas na/_des bla na med pa'i ye shes ma thob bo/_/'on kyang de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs 
[\[181a.5\]]tsam yin no/_/rgyal po the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyal po nga las nus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas sems bskyed ma thag tu dgung bdun du pho brang nang du gser gyi char bab lags/_rgyal 
[\[181a.6\]]po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi 
[\[181a.7\]]rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gnon ces bya ba byung ste/_de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu khyim phub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas so/_/yul de na chos lugs kyis bag mar btang nas/_ring po ma lon par bag rdzongs btab ste/_khyim 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]thab la gtong ba'i bag ma gang yin pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog gis brgyan nas khyim thab la gtong la/_khyim thab des kyang de khrid nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas tshong dpon gyi bu des rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog thogs nas bzhon pa la zhon te rang gi khyim du chas so/_/
[\[181b.2\]]de chas pa las re zhig cig na lam na tshur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon ljongs rgyu zhing byon to/_/des de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/_blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin du dad pa skyes so/_/de nas de dad pas brlan 
[\[181b.3\]]pa'i sems kyis bzhon pa las babs nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la gtor to/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon gyis me tog de dag ji ltar shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 
[\[181b.4\]]sha stag tu gyur nas/_gshegs na yang phyi bzhin 'ong zhing bzhugs na yang 'dug pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_de dad pa skyes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/_/'gro ba'i nang du rang byung sangs rgyas shog_/rgal nas sngon gyi rgyal bas 
[\[181b.5\]]ma bsgral ba'i/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams bdag gis sgrol gyur cig_/drang srong che kun zil gnon bcom ldan la/_/nga yis gser gyi me tog bzang gtor nas/_/go 'phang mchog 'di 'dod nas de yi tshe/_/nga yis smon lam rgya chen btab pa yi/_/bsod nams de nyid kyi 
[\[181b.6\]]ni rnam smin gyis/_/legs mthong chen po de yi grong khyer yang /_/gser las byas pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/_/pho brang rtswa can zhes ni bya bar gyur/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi bu de ni nga nyid yin no/_/gang yang ngas yang dag par 
[\[181b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la sems dad pa bskyed nas/_rin po che sna bzhi'i me tog gis gtor ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas nga'i pho brang gi nang du zhag bdun du gser gyi char bab bo/_/btsun pa rgyal po nga las nus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]smin pas/_gling bzhi pa rnams su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyis pa nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bar du mchis lags/_rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan 
[\[182a.2\]]pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ste/_de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan 
[\[182a.3\]]du byon to/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de na 'bru 'tshong ba'i tshong pa zhig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[182a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas lhag par dad pa skyes te/_de dad pa skyes nas sran mud ga la spar bas bcus te lhung bzed du blugs pa dang /_de las sran mud ga 'brum bu bzhi zhig lhung bzed du song ngo /_/'brum bu gcig ni lhung bzed kyi khar phog 
[\[182a.5\]]nas sa la lhung ngo /_/lhag ma rnams ni lhung bzed kyi nang du ma song ba nyid du sa la bo'o/_/de nas tshong pa de dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa/_sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/_/'gro ba'i nang du rang byung sangs rgyas shog_/rgal nas sngon gyi rgyal bas ma bsgral ba'i/_/skye bo'i 
[\[182a.6\]]tshogs rnams bdag gis sgrol gyur cig_/ces btab bo//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'bru 'tshong ba'i tshong pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas de na gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[182a.7\]]rgyas rnam par gzigs la dad pa skyes te/_sran mud ga la spar bas bcus nas lhung bzed du blugs pa dang /_de las sran mud ga 'brum bu bzhi zhig lhung bzed du song ngo /_/lhag ma rnams ni sa la bo'o/_/las de'i rnam par smin pas gling bzhi rnams su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]la dbang byas so/_/gang yang de na sran mud ga 'brum bu gcig gis lhung bzed kyi khar phog nas sa la lhung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bar du son to/_/rgyal po chen po gal te sran mud ga lhung bzed du blugs pa sa la ma lhung na las de'i 
[\[182b.2\]]rnam par smin pas lha dang mi rnams kyi bar la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'bru 'tshong ba'i tshong pa gang yin pa de ni nga las nu de nyid yin no/_/de ltar na rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can la bya ba byas pa ni 'bras 
[\[182b.3\]]bu dang phan yon shin tu chen por 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rnams la 
[\[182b.4\]]phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang /_mi rnams kyi 'byor pa bzhi dang ldan pa zhig byung 
[\[182b.5\]]ngo /_/rgyal po legs mthong chen po rin po che sna bdun po gang dag dang ldan zhe na/_'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_btsun mo rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che yin 
[\[182b.6\]]no/_/rgyal po legs mthong chen po mi rnams kyi 'byor pa bzhi po gang dag dang ldan zhe na/_tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa yin te/_de gzhon nu'i rtsed mos rtse ba la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/rgyal tshab byed pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/rgyal srid chen po byed pa la lo 
[\[182b.7\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/rgyal po legs mthong chen po tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen po 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]ni gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa yin te/_mi'i kha dog las ni 'das la lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa ste/_rgyal po legs mthong chen po gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa 
[\[183a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen po ni gnod pa chung zhing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te pho ba ha cang bsil ba ma yin zhing ha cang dro ba ma yin pa/_drod snyoms pa dang /_dus kun du bde ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_
[\[183a.3\]]'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po legs mthong chen po gnod pa chung zhing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen po ni grong mi 
[\[183a.4\]]dang yul mi rnams kyi snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin te/_dper na bu rnams la pha bzhin te/_rgyal po chen po dus gcig cig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba na shing rta sgyur ba la smras pa/_shing rta sgyur ba re zhig shing rta rim gyis dal bu dal bus sgyur 
[\[183a.5\]]cig_/ngas grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams la yun ring du blta'o/_/grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis kyang shing rta sgyur ba la smras pa/_shing rta sgyur ba re zhig shing rta rim gyis dal bu dal bus sgyur cig dang /_bdag cag kyang lha la yun ring du blta'o/_/rgyal po legs mthong chen po 
[\[183a.6\]]grong mi dang yul mi pa rnams kyi snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na grong mi dang yul mi rnams gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che mang po dag thogs nas rgyal po 
[\[183a.7\]]legs mthong chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i slad du bdag cag gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang la ba rin po che mang po 'di dag 'tshal te mchis lags na/_lha thugs brtse ba'i slad 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]du 'di dag bzhes su gsol/_sna bo dag nga'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pas mi 'dod do zhes smras nas len du ma btub bo/_/grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i slad du bdag cag gis 
[\[183b.2\]]gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che 'di dag 'tshal te mchis lags na/_lha thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes su gsol/_rgyal po legs mthong chen pos kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du grong mi dang yul mi rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sna bo 
[\[183b.3\]]dag nga'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pas mi 'dod do zhes smras nas len du ma btub bo/_/de nas grong mi dang yul mi rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis lha'i phyir gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che rab tu mang po sta gon byas la/_
[\[183b.4\]]de bdag cag gis blangs te slar so so'i gnas su 'dong ba ni bdag cag gi tshul ma yin pas/_ma la bdag cag gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i mdun du gser dang /_dngul gyi phung po cher spungs la/_mtha' gcig tu nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che bzhag nas/_'di dag 
[\[183b.5\]]ni lha khyod kyi dkor gyi rigs lags so zhes smras te mi lta bar 'dong ngo snyam nas/_de nas grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i mdun du rin po che dang /_gser phung po chen por spungs nas/_mtha' gcig tu nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che bzhag ste/_
[\[183b.6\]]'di dag ni lha khyod kyi dkor gyi rigs lags so zhes smras nas mi lta bar dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nor gyi rigs ni chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa yin gyis chos ma yin pas ni ma yin pas ma la bdag gis chos dang mthun pa'i 
[\[183b.7\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brtsig go snyam pa dang /_mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brtsig par spro'o zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po legs mthong chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsig pa la thugs kyi phrin las bskyung du gsol/_lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag gis brtsig par bgyi'o/_/sna bo dag kho bo'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi 
[\[184a.2\]]rigs yod pas mi dgos so zhes smras nas ma gnang ngo /_/de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i rkang pa la gtugs nas kha cig gis ni gos kyi mtha' nas bzung /_kha cig gis ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[184a.3\]]btud nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsig pa la thugs kyi phrin las bskyung du gsol/_lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag gis brtsig par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po legs mthong chen pos khams kyi 
[\[184a.4\]]rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas rang rang gi gnas su dong ste gser dang /_dngul mang po dang /_rin po che'i ka ba re re khyer nas/_rgyal 
[\[184a.5\]]po legs mthong chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag gis gang du ji tsam zhig brtsig lags/_grong pa dag khyed kyis de'i phyir rtswa can gyi shar phyogs su chos dang mthun pa'i 
[\[184a.6\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mchur dpag tshad gcig rgyar dpag tshad gcig pa zhig rtsigs shig_/de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rtswa can gyi shar phyogs su chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyar dpag tshad gcig_/mchur dpag tshad gcig pa zhig brtsigs te/_chos 
[\[184a.7\]]dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ka rten gyi gzhi rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa bres so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la ka ba rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_zhes bya 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]ba nas shel las byas pa'i bar dag btsugs so/_/gser las byas pa'i ka ba'i ka rten dang /_ka zhu dang /_bre phul dang /_gdung ni dngul las byas so/_/dngul las byas pa'i ni gser las byas so/_/bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i ni shel las byas so/_/shel las 
[\[184b.2\]]byas pa'i ka ba'i ka rten dang /_ka zhu dang /_bre phul dang /_gdung ni bai DUr+ya las byas so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la phyi tshe rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar dag bres so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la phyam rnam pa bzhi po gser las 
[\[184b.3\]]byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar bkye'o/_/chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la gdung [{]rings [,]ring [}]rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar bres so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la ba gam rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar btags so/_/chos 
[\[184b.4\]]dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la spang leb rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar gyis g.yogs so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la them skas rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas/_shel las byas pa'i bar brtsigs so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i 
[\[184b.5\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la lan kan rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar gyis bskor to/_/gser las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma ni dngul las byas so/_/dngul las byas pa'i ni gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_
[\[184b.6\]]lan kan gyi rten ma gser las byas so/_/shel las byas pa'i ni gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma bai DUr+ya las byas so/_/yang chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la khang pa rtseg ma brgyad khri bzhi stong brtsigs te/_khang pa rtseg ma rnam pa bzhi po gser las 
[\[184b.7\]]byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar rnams la/_gser las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg mar ni dngul las byas pa'i khri lhas ma can 'go na ka'i ras kyi gding ba can dang /_stan nang tshangs can gyi gding ba can dang /_za 'ug gi gding ba can dang /_ar mo nig gi gding ba can dang /_
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ka ling ka'i ras phran gyi gding ba can steng g.yogs dang bcas pa phyogs gnyis su sngas dmar po bcug pa'i bar dag bshams so/_/dngul las byas pa la ni gser las byas pa'o/_/bai DUr+ya las byas pa la ni shel las byas pa'o/_/shel las byas pa la ni bai DUr+ya 
[\[185a.2\]]las byas pa'i khri lhas ma can nas phyogs gnyis su sngas dmar po btsugs pa'i bar dag bshams so/_/gser las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg ma'i mdun du ni dngul las byas pa'i shing ta la lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu gser las byas pa sbrengs so/_/dngul las byas pa'i mdun 
[\[185a.3\]]du ni gser las byas pa'o/_/bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i mdun du ni shel las byas pa'o/_/shel las byas pa'i mdun du ni bai DUr+ya las byas pa lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu shel las byas pa sbrengs so/_/shing ta la de rnams rlung gis bskyod pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung 
[\[185a.4\]]ste/_dper na skyes bu mkhas pas sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yang dag par legs par bsgrags pa bzhin no/_/chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab la/_gser gyi dra ba dang gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka brgyus pas 
[\[185a.5\]]btags so/_/de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]bya ba thams cad zin par rig nas/_chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]mdun du chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing mchur dpag tshad gcig rgyar dpag tshad gcig pa zhig brkos te chos 
[\[185a.6\]]dang mthun pa'i rdzing bu pha gu rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pas brtsigs so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing la them skas rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar gyis brtsigs 
[\[185a.7\]]so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing la lan kan rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa'i nas shel las byas pa'i bar gyis bskor te/_gser las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma dngul las byas so/_/dngul las byas pa'i ni gser las 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]byas so/_/bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i ni shel las byas so/_/shel las byas pa'i gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma baiDUr+ya las byas so/_/chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing bu chu nas skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu 
[\[185b.2\]]da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_dri zhim pa dang /_dri ngad 'jam pa dang /_dus tshigs thams cad pa dang /_dus thams cad pa'i me tog skye bo thams cad la dgag pa med pa bskyed do/_/chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing gi 'gram gnyis su thang la skye ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_a 
[\[185b.3\]]ti mug ta ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_pa ta la dang /_pa ri ka sha dang /_ma li ka dang /_na bam li ka dang /_yid du 'ong dang /_yu ti ka dang /_d+hA nu ska ri dang /_dus tshigs thams cad pa dang /_dus thams cad pa'i me tog skye bo thams cad la dgag pa med pa dag bskyed do/_/chos 
[\[185b.4\]]dang mthun pa'i rdzing du gser gyi gcal bkram zhing tsan dan gyi chus bkang la gser gyi dra ba dang /_gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka brgyus pas bres so/_/de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing gi bya ba thams cad zin par rig nas/_chos dang mthun pa'i 
[\[185b.5\]]rdzing gi mdun du chos dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal mchur dpag tshad gcig rgyar dpag tshad gcig pa zhig btsugs te/_chos dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal du ta la rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i bar btsugs pa la/_gser las byas pa'i lo ma dang /_me tog 
[\[185b.6\]]dang /_'bras bu dngul las byas pa btsugs so/_/dngul las byas pa'i ni gser las byas so/_/gser las byas pa'i ni bai DUr+ya las byas so/_/bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu shel las byas pa btsugs so/_/yang shing ta la'i tshal de rnams 
[\[185b.7\]]rlung gis bskyod pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dper na skyes bu mkhas pas sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yang dag par legs par bsgrags pa bzhin no/_/chos dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal la lan kan rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]las byas pa dang /_rin po che las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pas bskor te/_gser las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer dang /_gdang bu dang /_lan kan gyi rten ma ni dngul las byas pas bskor to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/chos dang 
[\[186a.2\]]mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal na gser gyi gcal bkram zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab la/_gser gyi dra ba gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka brgyus pa bres so/_/de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing dang /_
[\[186a.3\]]chos dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal gyi bya ba thams cad zin par rig nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing dang chos 
[\[186a.4\]]dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal yang bgyis lags te/_lha da ni de'i dus la bab par dgongs shig_/de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di nyid du thog mar bdag kho na gnas pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_ma la 
[\[186a.5\]]bdag gis bdag gi yul na dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_tshul bzang por bkur ba gang dag gnas pa de dag chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]zan byin la/_re re la ras bcos bu sar pa zung re bskon no snyam nas/_de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen pos chos dang mthun pa'i 
[\[186a.6\]]khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya la zan byin te/_re re la yang ras bcos bu zung re bskon nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mkhas pas nor ni mang po dag_/rnyed nas bag med mi bya ste/_/tshul khrims ldan pa gang dag la/_/yon grub 'gyur ba rnams la sbyin/_/de ltar 
[\[186a.7\]]yid gzhungs dad pa can/_/ma chags sems kyis 'dir sbyin nas/_/mkhas pa 'jig rten gnod med pa/_/bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]che sna bdun dang /_mi rnams kyi 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/_mi rnams 
[\[186b.2\]]kyi 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa'am/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu 
[\[186b.3\]]tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba bram ze shing sA 
[\[186b.4\]]la chen po lta bu dus dpog ces bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_des bram ze rnams la sbyin pa 'di lta bu byin te/_glang po che gser gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la 
[\[186b.5\]]sbyin par byin no/_/rta gser gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/_brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/shing rta rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas 
[\[186b.6\]]pa dang /_shel las byas pa seng ge'i pags pas g.yogs pa/_gung lpags kyis g.yogs pa/_ar mo nig gis g.yogs pa/_rnam par rgyal byed kyi ba dan can brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/gser gyi snod dngul sil mas bkang ba brgyad 
[\[186b.7\]]khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/dngul gyi snod gser phyes bkang ba brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/khri rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa lhas ma can 'go 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]na ka'i ras bting ba/_stan nang tshangs can bting ba/_stan chen po bting ba/_ka ling ka'i gos kyis steng g.yogs pa/_steng g.yogs rtseg ma can/_phyogs gnyis su sngas dmar po bshams pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_ras zung rnam pa bzhi po 
[\[187a.2\]]ka shi ka'i ras phran dang /_zar ma'i ras phran dang /_du gu la'i ras phran dang /_ko tam pa'i ras phran zung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_ba gser gyi rwa can rmig pa dngul las byas pa/_be'u spu mthun dang bcas pa/_khar ba'i zo ba can/_ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa 
[\[187a.3\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_bu mo gser gyi dpung rgyan dang mgul rgyan thogs pa/_legs par brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin na zas dang /_skom dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_gzhib pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rgyal po 
[\[187a.4\]]chen po bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la de lta bu'i sbyin pa byin pa 'di bas ni gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin na sbyin pa de las sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/rgyal po chen po bram ze shing sA la 
[\[187a.5\]]chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu byin pa gang yin pa 'di dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa bas/_gang gis so so'i skye bo 'dzam bu'i tshal na 'dug pa gcig la zan byin na/_sbyin pa de 
[\[187a.6\]]bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu byin pa gang yin pa 'di dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa bas/_gang gis rgyun du zhugs 
[\[187a.7\]]pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig la zan byin na/_sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/de la sogs pa rgyas par thams cad las brtsams nas thams cad brjod par byas te/_mjug kho na bri bar bya'o/_/gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa bas/_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la zan byin na sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa bas/_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon 
[\[187b.2\]]sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig la byin na sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa bas/_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba gcig la byin na sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 
[\[187b.3\]]'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa bas gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig la byin na/_sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 
[\[187b.4\]]zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa bas/_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la sbyin na de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya bas gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig la byin na/_sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras 
[\[187b.5\]]bu ches che'o/_/gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya bas ni gang gis dgra bcom pa gcig la byin na/_sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa bas gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong
