[\[187b.6\]]gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba 'bul na/_sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis kun dga' ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug na de bas 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/_khri dang /_
[\[187b.7\]]khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang /_sngas dang /_gor bu dag phul na de bas 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris bcad de rjes su mthun pa'i mchod sbyin btsugs na de bas 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhing chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs na/_de bas 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/gang gis byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/_de bas 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/rgyal po 
[\[188a.2\]]chen po bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu byin pa gang yin pa 'di dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa 
[\[188a.3\]]brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya dang /_
[\[188a.4\]]gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya dang gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya dang /_gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga' ra ba 'bul ba dang /_gang gis kun dga' ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang 
[\[188a.5\]]rtsig tu bcug pa dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang /_sngas dang /_gor bu dag 'bul ba dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris bcad de rjes su mthun pa'i mchod sbyin 
[\[188a.6\]]'dzugs pa dang /_gang gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro/_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang /_gang gis byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rgyas pa bas/_gang zhig 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing zad par rjes 
[\[188a.7\]]su lta/_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta/_'gog par rjes su lta/_nges par 'byung bar rjes su lta zhing gnas na sbyin pa de bas 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]zad par rjes su lta ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya'o zhes rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog des 
[\[188b.2\]]bram ze rnams la sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sbyin pa byin pas bde bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pa byin pas 'jigs pa med/_/lha dang mi yi nang dag na/_/sbyin pa yis ni legs par mchod/_/de bas 'byor pa 'dod pa dang /_/dbang phyug dang ni 
[\[188b.3\]]lha yul dang /_/thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu ni/_/'jigs pa med par sbyin pa gtang /_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu 
[\[188b.4\]]dus dpog ces bya bar gyur te/_ngas de na bram ze rnams la de lta bu'i sbyin pa byin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa'am/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang sbyin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[188b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal 
[\[188b.6\]]po la nye can zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi snying du sdug pa'i grogs por gyur pa las de la bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med nas de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de bdag gi 'byor pa dang /_dbang phyug 'di 'dra na/_bu pho yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das na 
[\[188b.7\]]gdung rgyud 'chad par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mthong nas smras pa/_grogs po khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag gi 'byor pa dang dbang phyug 'di 'dra na bu pho yang 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]med bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das na gdung rgyud 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_grogs po kho bos khyod la sman zhig bskur gyis btsun mo rnams la lud cig dang des na khyod bu pho dang bu mo yod par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ri spos kyi ngad ldang la song 
[\[189a.2\]]nas sman blangs te rgyal po de la bskur ba dang /_rgyal pos btsun mo rnams la sman 'di 'thung shig ces bskur ba las/_rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa gnyid kyis log pa dang /_de dag gis de ma bslang bar sman 'thungs pas de dag thams cad sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig 
[\[189a.3\]]na btsun mo dam pa de langs nas des de rnams sems can dang ldan par mthong ste des smras pa/_khyed cag gis ci zhig byas na des na sems can dang ldan par gyur/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lhas kho mo cag la sman zhig btung ba'i phyir byin no/_/khyed cag gis ci'i phyir kho mo mi bslang bar btung /_
[\[189a.4\]]de lta mod kyi sman snod ci zhig nas khyer te 'ongs/_ku sha'i thum por bcug nas so/_/rtswa de gang na 'dug_/'o ni yin no/_/des ku sha bkrus nas 'thungs pa dang de yang sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de rnams zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang de dag thams cad las bus pa bcas so/_/
[\[189a.5\]]de'i btsun mo dam pa las ni bu pho mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa bzhin seng ge'i gdong lta bu tshan po che chen po'i tshan dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te ku sha zhes bya bar btags so/_/rgyal po de bu gzhan rnams mthong na ni dga' bar 'gyur la/_de ni mi 
[\[189a.6\]]sdug pas zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag thams cad rgyal po la nye can chen po 'dis thibs kyis mnan gyis/_de la rgyal srid las dbyung gis 'dong ngo zhes de rnams dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 'ongs 
[\[189a.7\]]nas de'i grong khyer bskor te 'dug go/_/rgyal po la nye can chen po ni de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprod ma phod nas de sgo rnams bcad de ra ba'i kha nas sbrengs te 'dug go/_/ku sha ma'i drung du song nas smras pa/_yum ci'i slad du sgo rnams bkum/_khyod kyi yab khams kyi rgyal phran dag 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]dang lhan cig g.yul sprod ma phod nas des sgo rnams bcad de 'dug pa yin no/_/yum bdag 'di dag dang lhan cig g.yul sprad kyis bdag la rgyal pos shing rta stsal du gsol/_bu khyod de'i snying du mi sdug cing zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur na/_de ji ga khyod la shing rta ster tam/_yum bzhud 
[\[189b.2\]]cig_/bzhud nas gzhon nu ku sha 'di dag dang lhan cig g.yul sprod par 'gyur gyis shing rta stsol cig ces gsungs shig_/de song nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gzhon nu'i mchid nas bdag 'di dag dang lhan cig g.yul sprad kyis shing rta stsol cig ces mchi'o/_/des de la shing rta byin 
[\[189b.3\]]pa dang /_de dong pa gnyis thogs nas shing rtar zhugs te 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_khams kyi rgyal phran 'di dag ni mthu dang ldan pa yin la gzhon nu ku sha bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/_
[\[189b.4\]]'di'i grogs bya'o snyam nas des de la dung dang /_'khor lo dang /_be con byin nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis khyod 'tsho bar gyis shig_/de sgo phye nas byung ste de nam dung 'bud pa de'i tshe dung gi sgras dpung rnams skrag nas kha cig ni sgra [(]das [,]des [)]'on par gyur to/_/kha cig ni rna ba 
[\[189b.5\]]bkag nas 'bros so/_/nam 'khor lo'am be con 'phangs pa de'i tshe de dag sa la 'gyel bar gyur to/_/des dmag gi nang du song nas dung bus pa na de dag thams cad kyi rna ba rdol bar gyur nas de rnams kyis skyes bu 'di ni srin po yin no/_/zhes byas nas bros so/_/des ril 
[\[189b.6\]]phab nas pha'i drung du song ste/_lha bdag gis rgyal po thams cad pham par bgyis te/_yul bsgrubs lags so/_/rgyal po la nye can chen pos thos nas mgu ste des bsams pa/_gzhon nu ku sha mthu dang ldan pa brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin na ci'i phyir bdag 
[\[189b.7\]]gis 'di la mi dga' ba bskyed snyam nas/_de de la dga' ba bskyed par brtsams so/_/des bu de rnams khyim phub nas ku sha'i chung ma yang bslang bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/_ku sha ma gtogs pa la bu mo sbyin no/_/rgyal po gzhan zhig gis 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]rgyal po gzhan gyi bu mo zhig bslangs te/_bag mar ma blangs pa'i bar der rgyal po la nye can chen pos bu gzhan gyi ched yin pa'i thabs shig gis bslangs nas bu mo de ku sha la byin nas rgyu skar dang /_nyi tshod dang /_yud tsam dag bstun te gzhon nu ku sha'i khyim phub bo/_/rgyal 
[\[190a.2\]]pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag sus kyang gzhon nu ku sha la me long ma bstan cig chur 'jug pa'i khrus ma yin pa'i khrus kyis khrus byos shig_/nyin par chung ma'i drung du ma gtong shig_/gzhon nu ku sha spun rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba chung ma des mthong nas des smras pa/_gzhon nu rnams kyi 
[\[190a.3\]]dbus na rtsed mo byed pa'i sha za pha bi su zhig yin de ni khyod kyi khyim thab yin no/_/ci kho mo'i khyim thab 'di 'dra ba zhig gam/_phyi zhig na yang des gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig chu na rtse ba'i bar dag mthong nas/_de bzhin du bdag gi khyim thab 'di 'dra ba zhig snyam ste des bsams pa/_mngon 
[\[190a.4\]]sum du bya'o snyam nas/_des me mar bus te phru bas bkab nas bzhag go/_/de yang chung ma'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /_des kyang bstan pa las mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa bzhin seng ge'i gdong 'dra ba zhig mthong nas des smras pa/_sha za sha za zhes byas nas bros so/_/
[\[190a.5\]]rgyal po la nye can chen po la ri 'or ba gzhan zhig log nas des gzhon nu ku sha song la ri 'or ba rnams phob shig ces btang nas/_de der song ba dang ku sha'i chung mas pha dang ma la khyed cag sa'i steng na skyes pa med dam ci na/_khyed kyis bdag sha za la sbyin/_gal te bdag bkum na de lta na legs/_
[\[190a.6\]]gal te ma bkum na ni kho mo rang 'chi'o/_/zhes spring ba dang /_de dag gis de khrid do/_/gzhon nu ku shas kyang ri 'or de phab ste 'ongs nas des ma la dris pa/_yum bdag gi mchis 'brang de gar mchis/_des smras pa/_pha mas khrid do/_/ci'i slad du/_khyod sha za yin snyam nas 
[\[190a.7\]]so/_/yum mchis la de dgug par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gyis shig_/de dung dang /_'khor lo dang /_be con khyer te der song ba las/_ji tsam na ri 'or gzhan zhig na skye bo'i tshogs chen po/_seng ges 'jigs pas sgo rnams bcad de phyogs su lta zhing 'khod pa dang /_gzhon 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]nu ku shas smras pa/_ci'i phyir de ltar 'dug_/seng ge'i 'jigs pas so/_/ci ste mi gsod/_mi nus mod/_gal te bdag gis bsad na/_bdag la ci sbyin/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyed do/_/gzhon nu ku shas seng ge'i drung du nye bar song nas dung bus pa dang de'i rna ba rdol te 
[\[190b.2\]]shi nas/_des de khyer te ri 'or du song nas shes ldan dag seng ge de ni 'di yin no/_/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyed khyer cig_/des smras pa/_khyed cag nyid kyi lag tu zhog la slar 'ongs na byin cig_/de ri 'or gang na chung ma de yod pa'i ri 'or der song nas me tog phreng rgyud 
[\[190b.3\]]mkhan zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod 'dra su zhig_/des smras pa/_me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu yin no/_/khyod kyi ming ci yin/_spong byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas des me tog phreng 
[\[190b.4\]]legs par brgyus pa dang /_me tog phreng rgyud mkhan des bu mo de la me tog phreng ba de byin no/_/des smras pa/_'di 'dra ba'i me tog phreng ba ni khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' yang ma brgyus na 'di la rgyu ci yod/_bdag gi slob mas brgyus so/_/khyod kyi slob ma de blta'o/_/des de der 
[\[190b.5\]]khrid pa dang /_des mthong nas des bsams pa/_sha za 'di gang nas 'ongs pa zhig snyam nas/_des sha za sha za zhes sgra phyung ste de bskrad pa las/_g.yos mkhan zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod su zhig_/kho bo g.yos mkhan gyi bu yin no/_/khyod kyi ming ci 
[\[190b.6\]]yin/_snod dri zhim zhes bya'o/_/des btso ba dang /_bsreg pa legs par byas pa dang /_g.yos mkhan des kyang bu mo de la btsos pa dang /_bsregs pa de bstabs so/_/des smras pa/_kye nang rje btso ba dang /_bsreg pa legs na sus g.yos/_bdag gi slob mas g.yos so/_/
[\[190b.7\]]khyod kyi slob ma de blta'o zhes bya ba nas de nas kyang bskrad do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_sman pa zhig gi drung du phyin pa las des smras pa khyod su zhig_/sman pa'i bu yin no/_/khyod kyi ming ci yin/_rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya'o/_/bu mo de klad nad kyis thebs par gyur pa dang /_sman pas 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gso ma nus nas sman pa sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_mkhan po ci'i phyir sems khong du chud/_rgyal po'i bu mo klad nad kyis thebs na kho bos gso bar ma nus so/_/bdag mchis la gso lags so zhes de song ba dang /_des mthong nas des 
[\[191a.2\]]smras pa/_sha za 'di gang nas 'ongs yang bsams pa gal te 'ga' zhig smras na/_sos par ma byas kyis/_gang gi tshe bdag sos par gyur pa de'i tshe smra'o snyam nas de sos par gyur nas/_sha za sha za zhes sgra phyung ste/_des de bskrad pa las blon po rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang /_khyod 
[\[191a.3\]]su zhig kho bo stong thub bo/_/de rnams kyis de drung du bzhag go/_/sngon dbang ba'i rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa des bdag gis sngon rgyal po'i bu mo thob pa gang yin pa de gzhon nu ku shas bor te rang gi khyim du song ngo zhes thos nas des rgyal po de la gal te re zhig kho bo la bu mo byin na ni de lta na legs/_
[\[191a.4\]]gal te ma byin na ni rgyal srid stor bar bya'o zhes spring ba dang /_des smras pa/_kho bo'i bu mo 'di ni rgyal po la nye can chen po'i bu gzhon nu ku sha la byin zin pas ji ltar gzhan la sbyin/_de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 'ongs nas rgyal po'i pho brang bskor te 'dug go/_/rgyal po de ni de dang lhan cig 
[\[191a.5\]]g.yul sprod ma phod nas des sgo dag bcad nas 'dug pa dang /_gzhon nu ku shas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir sgo rnams bcad/_de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang /_gzhon nu ku shas smras pa/_gal te kho bo la rgyal po'i sras mo byin na kho bos de dang lhan 
[\[191a.6\]]cig g.yul sprad do/_/de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo 'di ngas la nye can chen po'i bu la byin zin na ngas ji ltar 'di la sbyin/_da ltar gyi khrag khrug 'di yang bu mo kho na'i phyir yin no/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha su rgyal bar 'gyur gtol ma mchis 
[\[191a.7\]]kyis re zhig 'di de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprod du stsol cig dang /_de na skol gyis dus mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis shig_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_stong thub ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas gzhon nu ku shas mda' lnga brgya 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]shong ba'i dong pa gnyis thogs nas dung dang /_'khor lo dang /_be con khyer te byung nas des dung bus pa dang /_de rnams kyi rna ba rdol nas bros so/_/rgyal po'i bu mo des bsams pa/_gzhon nu ku sha 'di ni brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa chen po dang ldan pa yin na ci'i phyir bdag 
[\[191b.2\]]gis 'di la dga' bar mi bya snyam nas/_de de la dga' ba bskyed nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji skad zhal gyis bzhes pa de mdzod cig_/bu ngas khyod ku sha la byin no/_/des smras pa/_yab gzhon nu ku sha de ni 'di nyid lags so/_/bu gal te de lta na song shig ces des 
[\[191b.3\]]de la yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs byin nas bkur sti cher byas te btang ngo /_/de ri 'or der phyin nas de rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyed byin cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi khyer ba'i chu 
[\[191b.4\]]brug pa gang yin pa de lta bu byung ngo /_/de na ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na lug dag cig rgyu nas gzhon nu ku shas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lo ni drug bcu lon pa'i glang /_/glang chen gang du khyer gyur pa/_/der ni ba dang lug khyer bar/_/rjes su dpags nas shes par bya//_//
[\[191b.5\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/_gal te re zhig byin na ni de lta na legs/_gal te ma byin na rngams la gtug go/_/de rnams kyis de la byin nas de 'bab chu dang nye ba zhig tu btab ste/_dal bas khrus bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_de na des rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan 
[\[191b.6\]]mthong nas des bsams pa/_mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan zhing bzhin seng ge'i gdong dang 'dra ba yin te/_de nyid kyi phyir rgyal po'i bu mo 'di bdag la mi dga' ba yin gyis/_bdag 'dra ba ni gson na ci rung song la bdag 'chi'o snyam nas/_de nags thibs po zhig tu zhugs nas 
[\[191b.7\]]bdag nyid 'gag par brtsams pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin na/_gzugs bzang po dang mi ldan pas bdag nyid gsod par byed kyis/_de'i yid la re ba rdzogs par bya'o snyam nas brgya byin gyis/_
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]smras pa/_gzhon nu yi ma chad/_bdag nyid gsod par ma byed par gtsug gi nor bu 'di mgo la thogs shig dang yid la re ba rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas song ngo /_/gzhon nu ku sha khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_sgo srungs kyi mis 'di ni gzhon nu ku sha'i pho 
[\[192a.2\]]brang yin gyis ma 'jug shig ces bzlog go/_/des smras pa/_ku sha de ni nga yin no/_/de ni yid ma ches nas des gtsug gi nor bu phrol ba dang /_sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur nas de yid ches so/_/gzhon nu ku shas bsams pa/_'di nyid du 'dug go snyam nas des pha la yang mkhyen 
[\[192a.3\]]par mdzod cig_/'di nyid du mchis so zhes spring ba dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la gter bzhi'i 'byung khung bstan nas/_des grong khyer de rin po che sna bzhi las byed du bcug go/_/gzhon nu ku sha gnas pas ku sha can zhes bya bar grags so/_/de ni stobs kyi 'khor 
[\[192a.4\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ku sha zhes bya bar gyur te/_des grong khyer drug khrir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/_lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang por bram ze rnams la sbyin pa btang ste/_de bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[192a.5\]]mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lha dang mi yi nang dag tu/_/bdag gi 'byor pa mthong nas ni/_/gang gis phun sum 'thob pa yi/_/sbyin pa su zhig sbyin mi byed/_/gang gis skyes bu brgya phrag thibs mnan cing /_/ser sna dgra bor gyur pa zil mnan nas/_/'jig rten 
[\[192a.6\]]pha rol 'jigs pas sbyin gtong ste/_/bdag ni dpa' bo'i dpa' rab yin par sems/_/gang zhig lag na mtshon thogs g.yul ngor 'jug_/de ni dpa' bo min zhes thub rnams gsung /_/gang dag 'jigs pa med par sbyin gtong ba/_/de dag dpa' bo yin zhes kun mkhyen 
[\[192a.7\]]gsung /_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ku sha zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis grong khyer drug khrir sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na stobs kyi 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ku sha zhes bya ba der gyur te/_ngas de na grong khyer drug khrir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs nas sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas so/_/rgyal po chen po nga'i sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[192b.2\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[192b.3\]]'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyal po ku shas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/_mtshan mi sdug pa rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan zhing phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ku sha nyid 
[\[192b.4\]]kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas dge slong dag ku sha nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las 
[\[192b.5\]]byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_
[\[192b.6\]]skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or gzhan zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas te/_des bza' ba 
[\[192b.7\]]dang /_bca' ba rab tu mang po khyer te skyed mos tshal du song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]ro/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na skyed mos tshal der phyin pa khyim bdag des mthong nas des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 'di skrod cig_/de dag skrod ma phod pa dang /_/khyim bdag de nyid langs te bzung nas bskrad de/_
[\[193a.2\]]seng ge'i gdong can mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa khyod gar 'gro zhes kyang smras so/_/rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_nyon mongs 'di gtan du smas shing nyams na mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas steng gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba nas/_des bkur sti byas te zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te/_
[\[193a.3\]]ji tsam na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba gang yin pa de'i las de bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig_/gang yang bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang ba dang longs spyod che ba'i rigs 
[\[193a.4\]]su skye bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyim bdag gang yin pa de ku sha gzhon nu 'di nyid yin te/_de na 'dis rang sangs rgyas la ngag rtsub po'i las phyung bas las de'i rnam par smin pas mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan zhing bzhin seng ge'i gdong 'dra 
[\[193a.5\]]bar gyur to/_/gang yang bya ba byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag par 'gyur zhing 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren mar 'gyur/_gcig tu dkar ba 
[\[193a.6\]]rnams ni gcig tu dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_las gang dag gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_gcig tu dkar ba'i las rnams kho na la brtsal bar bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gzhan 
[\[193a.7\]]yang rgyal po chen po ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul ka ling ka zhes bya bar gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa zhes bya ba 'khor gdol pa brgya phrag du ma 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]dang /_'khor gdol pa stong phrag du ma dang /_gdol pa brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa/_byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang snying brtse ba zhig byung ste/_de'i yul du nam lo nyes byung ba de'i tshe bden pa gsol bas lhas char pa 'bebs pas lan 'ga' yang 
[\[193b.2\]]lo nyes 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/de'i tshe yul bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi phal po ches rab tu gang ba na rgyal 
[\[193b.3\]]srid byed du 'jug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis grong khyer bA rA Na sIr dril sgrog tu bcug pa/_bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer pa dag nyon cig_/ltas mkhan rnams 
[\[193b.4\]]kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes lung bstan gyis/_khyed cag las gang dag la dus de tsam gyi bza' ba yod pa de ni 'dug shig_/gang dag med pa de ni deng shig_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag mu ges dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes 
[\[193b.5\]]ldan dag rgyal pos yul rnams su 'di lta bu'i dril sgrog tu bcug na de ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_gang du dong /_de rnams kyis gdol pa'i yul na gdol pa'i rigs las byung ba'i drang srong zhig yod de/_de'i bden pa gsol bas lhas char 'bebs so zhes thos nas de nas lo bcu gnyis kyi 
[\[193b.6\]]bar gyi bza' ba med pa gang yin pa de rnams gdol pa'i yul du dong ba dang /_gdol pa'i rigs las byung ba'i drang srong gi bu gdol pa'i rgyal po des skye bo'i tshogs de'i bza' ba dang btung ba lo bcu gnyis su sbyar na mu ge rgyun chags kho nar byung ba nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po rnams la dris pa/_skye 
[\[193b.7\]]bo'i tshogs de gang du dong /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha yul ka ling ka na gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa zhes bgyi ba byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la phan pa/_'o byams pa zhig mchis te/_de'i bden pa gsol bas lhas char 'bebs pas der skye bo'i 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]tshogs chen po mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag mu ge chen po 'di ni mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma dang 'dra ba yin na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gdol pa'i yul gyi rgyal po gang lags pa de drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ngo zhes thos lags 
[\[194a.2\]]kyis/_de la gsol ba mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gdol pa'i yul du song nas drang srong de la gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa/_drang srong chen po bdag gi yul du mu ge chen po mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma dang 'dra ba byung na de la bden pa gsol ba'i rigs so/_/des bden pa gsol bar 
[\[194a.3\]]brtsams pa/_khyi 'tshed rigs las skyes pa yi/_/zhe sdang med cing 'tshe med pa/_/gdol pa phur bu gsum pa zhes/_/lha dang mi la grags pa yis/_/sems can kun la byams pa'i sems/_/skyon med rab tu bsgoms bdag gi/_/bden tshig des ni skye dgu 'di/_/klus ni 
[\[194a.4\]]tshim par byed gyur cig_/gang phyir skyes pa tshun chad nas/_/byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgoms pa/_/bden pa'i tshig des skye dgu dag_/klus ni tshim par byed gyur cig_/de nas bden pa gsol bas yul bA rA Na sIr lhas char phab nas mu ge rgyun chad cing lo legs par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[194a.5\]]bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de gdol pa'i yul nas bA rA Na sIr lhags so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa zhes bya ba byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can/_sems can thams cad la phan pa/_snying brtse ba can zhig byung ba de'i bden pa gsol bas 
[\[194a.6\]]lhas char phab nas mu ge rgyun chad cing lo legs par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa zhes bya ba byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_snying brtse ba can de'i 
[\[194a.7\]]bden pa gsol bas lhas char 'bebs pa de yin par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa'am/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul mi thi lar 
[\[194b.2\]]rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin 
[\[194b.3\]]po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che'o/_/de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa stong yang tshang bar yod cing /_de rgya mtsho la thug 
[\[194b.4\]]pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas so/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra mkhan gyi mi skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na skra mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/_/
[\[194b.5\]]kye nang rje khyod kyis gang gi tshe nga'i mgo las gshin rje'i pho nya skra dkar skyes pa mthong ba de'i tshe nga la sbron cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skra mkhan gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan to/_/dus gzhan zhig na skra mkhan gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na 
[\[194b.6\]]rgyal po lha chen po'i mgo las gshin rje'i pho nya skra dkar skyes pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yang rgyal po lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/dbu la gshin rje'i pho nya dbu skra dkar po skyes lags so/_/kye nang rje de'i phyir khyod kyis skra dkar de 
[\[194b.7\]]dag rim gyis dal bus dal bus phyung la nga'i lag par byin cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skra mkhan gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan nas skra skya bo de dag gser gyi smang tser gyis rim gyis dal bus dal bus phyung nas rgyal po lha chen po'i lag tu bzhag go/_/de nas 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]rgyal po lha chen pos skra skya bo de dag lag pa gnyis kyis brkyang nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag gi mgo las klad kyi skra/_/lang tsho 'phrog pa skyes pa ni/_/gshin rje'i pho nya byung gyur gyis/_/bdag ni rab 'byung dus la bab/_/bdag gis mi rnams kyi 
[\[195a.2\]]'dod pa ni spyad zin te/_lha rnams kyi 'dod pa btsal ba'i dus la bab kyis/_ma la bdag gis gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug la rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo shos pho nyas bkug nas 
[\[195a.3\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu shes par gyis shig_/nga'i mgo las gshin rje'i pho nya skra dkar skyes te/_ngas mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni spyad zin pas lha rnams kyi 'dod pa btsal ba'i dus la bab ste/_bu gzhon nu khyod la ngas rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po 'di gtad kyis/_
[\[195a.4\]]khyod kyis 'di la chos bzhin gyis bskyang bar bya'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/_/'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam 'dren par spyod na khyod kyis yul du gnas su ma gzhug cig_/bu gzhon nu khyod kyis kyang gang gi tshe mgo la gshin rje'i pho nya skra dkar skyes par mthong ba de'i 
[\[195a.5\]]tshe khyod kyis kyang gzhon nu thu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du chug la rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig_/ci nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya'i/_rgyun chad par mi bya zhing skyes bu tha shal du 
[\[195a.6\]]gyur par mi bya'o/_/bu gzhon nu 'ga' zhig skyes bu bzang po yod pa'i dus 'di lta bu la dge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi rgyun chad par mi byed pa yin/_de ni de rnams kyi skyes bu tha shal ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[195a.7\]]bu gzhon nu 'ga' zhig skyes bu bzang po yod pa'i dus 'di lta bu la dge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rjes su 'jug par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi rgyun chad par byed pa yin/_de ni de rnams kyi skyes bu tha shal yin no/_/de lta bas na nga khyod la de skad du ci 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya zhing /_rgyun 'chad par mi bya zhing skyes bu tha shal du gyur par mi bya'o zhes smra'o/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas yul bcom 
[\[195b.2\]]brlag 'di nyid kyi lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/rgyal po lha chen po'i gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug pa gang yin pa de yang rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir 
[\[195b.3\]]rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu dag skra mkhan gyi mis 'chos pa na zhes bya ba nas/_skyes bu tha shal du gyur par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos 
[\[195b.4\]]gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyod do/_/de ltar bu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha brgyud pas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos bdag 
[\[195b.5\]]nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lha dang mi yi nang dag tu/_/dbang phyug don du gnyer ba dang /_/dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa yis/_/ci nus kyis ni sbyin pa gtang /_/'jig rten na ni sbyin byed mchod/_/sbyin byed lha 
[\[195b.6\]]yi nang mchod de/_/bya yi 'bras ldan shing bzhin du/_/'byung po kun gyi skyabs 'os yin/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang gis dge ba'i lam nges pa de srol btod cing dge ba'i lam nges pa srol btod pa de la brten 
[\[195b.7\]]nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya bar gyur te/_nga nyid kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa de 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]srol btod cing dge ba'i lam nges pa srol btod pa de la brten nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[196a.2\]]thob bo snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer 
[\[196a.3\]]ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul mi thi la 'di nyid du de rnams kyi tha ma shos rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/_de btsun mo dang /_
[\[196a.4\]]gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams dang lhan cig tu chos spyod cing sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed pa/_bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so/_/de'i tshe lha rnams 
[\[196a.5\]]kyi dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gung la lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang du tshogs shing lhags pa rnams la bsngags pa rjod de/_grogs po dag lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi rnyed pa ni legs par rnyed de/_lus 'phags kyi mi de rnams kyi rgyal po mu 
[\[196a.6\]]khyud ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po yin te/_de btsun mo dang zhes bya ba nas lhan cig tu chos spyod cing tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/grogs po dag khyed cag rgyal po mu khyud lta 
[\[196a.7\]]bar 'dod dam/_kau shi ka mchog tu 'tshal lo/_/grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed cag sdod cig dang kho bos je rgyal po mu khyud brtag par bya'o/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dper na skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]las bskum pa tsam gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur te/_mi thi lar rgyal po mu khyud ldan gyi khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/mu khyud ldan khyod kyi rnyed pa ni legs par rnyed de/_gang 
[\[196b.2\]]gi phyir sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du tshogs shing 'dus pa rnams khyod kyi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing /_grogs po dag lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[196b.3\]]gong ma bzhin no/_/mu khyud khyod sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lta zhing 'gro 'dod dam/_kau shi ka bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la lta zhing mchi 'tshal lo/_/mu khyud khyod de'i phyir sdod cig_/kho bos je cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rta khyod la bskur gyis/_
[\[196b.4\]]der khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog shig_/rgyal po mu khyud kyis de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin las mnyan to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdu la smras pa/_ma la 
[\[196b.5\]]gdu khyod song la cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rta myur du chos la rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces/_mu khyud khyod la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyis der khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog shig ces 
[\[196b.6\]]byos shig_/kau shi ka khyod kyis gsungs pas shin du ma nongs so zhes kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin las mnyan nas myur du cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rta bcas te/_rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so/_/mu 
[\[196b.7\]]khyud khyod la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyis 'dir khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog shig ces mchi'o/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal po mu khyud cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rtar zhugs pa dang /_de nas kha lo sgyur 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]ba ma la gdus rgyal po mu khyud la smras pa/_khyod kyi shing rta gang nas drang /_gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba nas sam/_gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las 
[\[197a.2\]]dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba nas drang /_ma la gdu de'i phyir gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba yod pa dang /_gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa 
[\[197a.3\]]nyams su myong ba dag yod pa gnyis ka bltas/_de dag gang na ba de logs su shing rta drongs shig_/de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus rgyal po mu khyud kyis ci nas kyang gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyams 
[\[197a.4\]]su myong ba yod pa dang /_gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba yod pa gnyi ga mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal po mu khyud ldan gyi shing rta drangs so/_/rgyal po mu khyud sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du phyin 
[\[197a.5\]]nas rgyal po mu khyud lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang du zhugs pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la stan phyed bstabs nas rgyal po mu khyud dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyed la 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal po mu khyud dang lha 
[\[197a.6\]]rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyed la 'dug pa na khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med de/_gzhan du na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni mig mi 'dzums par zad do/_/de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun 
[\[197a.7\]]sum tshogs pa mthong nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dge las byas dang de bzhin du/_/mi dge'i las byas mthong nas ni/_/mi gang bag med byed pa de/_/skyes bu tha shal snying re rje/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mu khyud khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la dga' bar spyod cig_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas rtsed mo byos shig_/dga' bar spyod cig_/dga' mgur spyod cig_/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar snod dang shing 
[\[197b.2\]]rta dag_/brnyas pa re zhig dus yin ltar/_/de dang 'dra bar gnas 'di yang /_/dbang ni gzhan dag sgyur bas bdag_/'di nas mi thi lar song nas/_/dge ba mang po rnams bya zhing /_/bsod nams phun sum tshogs byas nas/_/de nas mtho ris 'ong bar bya/_/
[\[197b.3\]]de mi thi lar 'ongs nas sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang tshe rgyal rigs bram ze dang /_/rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gdol pa dang /_/kla klo phongs la byin pa yi/_/sbyin pa dam pa rnams kyis bsngags/_/mu 
[\[197b.4\]]ge'i tshe na sbyin byin zhing /_/skye bo dam pa tshim byas nas/_/ngan song rnams spangs 'di dang ni/_/mtho ris su yang bkur ba yin/_/phan yon 'di ni shes nas kyang /_/mkhas pa rnams kyis sbyin pa gtang /_/sbyin pa yis ni thar pa dang /_/dbang phyug lha 
[\[197b.5\]]gnas 'byor bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba gang gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan phyed dang /_lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bstabs 
[\[197b.6\]]nas/_des mi thi lar 'ongs te grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs nas sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba 
[\[197b.7\]]gang gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan phyed dang lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bstabs pa yin par gyur te/_nga nyid de nas mi thi lar song nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te sbyin 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas so/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[198a.2\]]pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/de'i 'og tu rgyal po kun dga' bo zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te/_de la bu gcig dang gnyis nas lnga'i bar dag btsas pa las de'i bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gang yin pa de'i 
[\[198a.3\]]gdong me long 'dra bas de'i ming me long gdong zhes bya bar grags so/_/de dag thams cad bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/gzhon nu me long gdong ni des pa dang shin tu dul ba yin no/_/de dag gzhan ni gtum pa/_gzu lums can/_rtsub pa yin no/_/de dag 
[\[198a.4\]]thams cad pha'i dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'dus na shes rab kyis cung zad kyang so sor rtogs pa med do/_/gzhon nu me long gdong ni dri ba zab mo zab mo dag la rang gi shes rab kyis dpyod par byed do/_/rgyal po kun dga' bo nad kyis thebs nas des bsams pa/_
[\[198a.5\]]gang rgyal srid byed du gzhug_/gal te bdag gis bu pho gong ma bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig rgyal po byed du bcug na de rnams gtum pa/_gzu lums can rtsub pa yin pas tshul ma yin pas yul mi rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzhon nu 
[\[198a.6\]]me long gdong rgyal srid byed du bcug na ni nye du rnams kyis da rgyal po 'dis sras thu bo rnams bzhag nas sras tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa ci'i tha tshig ces smod par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham mo snyam nas/_des rin po che gsum dang /_btsun mo'i 
[\[198a.7\]]'khor zhes byed pa dang /_shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug bzhag nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/_kye sna bo dag nga 'das na khyed cag gis gzhon nu rnams re re nas brtag par bya ste/_sus nor bu'i lham zung du bgos na 'tsham par 'gyur ba 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]dang /_seng ge'i khri la 'dug na mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang /_dbu rgyan mgo la thogs na mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor zhes byed pa dang /_shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug po nang gi gter dang /_phyi'i gter dang /_phyi nang gi 
[\[198b.2\]]gter dang /_shing gi rtse mo'i gter dang /_ri'i rtse mo'i gter dang /_chu 'gram gyi gter te/_su 'di dag thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa de nga 'das nas khyod cag gis chug shig ces smras nas/_bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po'i mtha' ni ltung 
[\[198b.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yin pas shi'o/_/blon po de rnams kyis gzhon nu phu bo shos la nor bu'i lham zung du bskon na ji ltar yang de dang mi 'tsham mo/_/seng ge'i khri la bzhag na g.yos so/_/dbu rgyan btags na rab tu g.yos so/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyis 
[\[198b.4\]]kyang zhes ma byas so/_/shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug smras na ma shes te/_nu bo phyi ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/gzhon nu me long gdong la nor bu'i lham zung du bskon na shin tu 'tsham par 'dug go/_/seng ge'i khri la 'dug na mi g.yo bar 'dug go/_/
[\[198b.5\]]dbu rgyan thogs na spyi gtsug rgyas par 'dug go/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyis kyang zhes byas pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_da dung shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug po nang gi gter dang /_phyi'i gter dang /_phyi nang gi gter dang /_shing gi rtse mo'i 
[\[198b.6\]]gter dang /_ri'i rtse mo'i gter dang /_chu 'gram gyi gter shes par bya dgos so/_/me long gdong gis bsams pa/_nang gi gter zhes bya ba nang gi gter ci zhe na/_them pa'i nang rol na yod pa'i gter yin no/_/phyi'i gter zhes bya ba phyi'i gter ci zhe na/_
[\[198b.7\]]phyi'i gter zhes bya ba ni them pa'i phyi rol na yod pa'i gter yin no/_/phyi nang gi gter zhes bya ba ci yin zhe na/_them pa'i 'og na yod pa'i gter yin no/_/shing gi rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ba shing gi rtse mo'i gter ci zhe na/_rgyal po de bzhugs pa'i shing de'i 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]grib mas nyi ma'i gung la gang du khyab pa de na yod pa'i gter yin no/_/ri'i rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ba ni rgyal po de rol pa'i rdzing de na khrus kyi rdo leb yod pa de'i 'og na yod pa'i gter yin no/_/chu 'gram gyi gter zhes bya ba ni khyim gyi chu gang du 'bab 
[\[199a.2\]]pa de'i stor khung gi mtha' na yod pa'i gter yin no/_/blon po de rnams kyis thams cad so sor brtags na de dag byung nas de rnams kyis de rgyal por dbang bskur te/_rgyal po me long gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan par gyur to/_/ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze dbyug 
[\[199a.3\]]gu can zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des khyim bdag cig las glang dag cig brnyas te zhing rmos nas glang de dag ded de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /_ji tsam na khyim bdag de dro la bab nas bram ze dbyug gu can gyis/_glang phug tu btang ba las sgo gzhan zhig nas 
[\[199a.4\]]byung ste song ngo /_/khyim bdag de zan zos nas langs na gang na yang glang mi snang nas des dbyug gu can bzung nas glang ga re/_des smras pa khyim du ma bcug gam/_khyod kyis kho bo'i glang phrogs kyis kho bo la glang slar byin cig_/des smras pa/_kho bos ma 
[\[199a.5\]]phrogs so/_/des smras pa/_rgyal po me long gdong 'di ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin gyis de'i drung du dong dang /_des don 'di sbyangs dpyad de bdag cag la rigs mi rigs ston par 'gyur ro zhes de gnyis chas pa dang /_mi zhig gis rta rgod ma zhig bros nas des 
[\[199a.6\]]dbyug gu can la smras pa/_rta rgod ma'o ni khog shig_/des smras pa/_ji ltar dgag_/ci nus pas so/_/des rdo ba zhig blangs te mgor bsnun pas de shi bar gyur to/_/mi des smras pa/_kho bo'i rta rgod ma khyod kyis bsad kyis kho bo la rta rgod ma gcig byin 
[\[199a.7\]]cig_/ci'i phyir rta rgod ma sbyin/_des smras pa tshur shog_/rgyal po me long gdong gi gan du dong dang /_des bdag cag gi zhal che sbyong bar 'gyur ro zhes de dag der dong ba dang /_dbyug gu can de 'bros par brtsams te/_des rtsig pa zhig gi kha nas bdag 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]nyid mchongs pa dang /_de'i shod na tha ga pa zhig thags 'thag cing 'dug pa de'i steng du lhung bas tha ga pa shi nas dbyug gu can yang tha ga pa'i chung mas bzung nas/_kho mo'i khyim thab khyod kyis bsad kyis kho mo'i khyim thab byin cig_/kho bos khyod kyi khyim thab 
[\[199b.2\]]ga las sbyin/_des smras pa/_tshur rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du dong dang /_des bdag cag gi zhal che gcod par 'gyur ro zhes de rnams chas pa dang /_lam gyi bar de na chu bo gting zab mo zhig yod pa de la shing mkhan zhig kha na ste'u thogs te phas tshur ra rgal 
[\[199b.3\]]ba de la dbyug gu can des smras pa/_chu che chung ji tsam/_ste'u btang ste smras pa/_chu gting zab bo/_/ste'u de chur lhung nas des dbyug gu can de bzung ste/_khyod kyis nga'i ste'u chur bskur ro/_/ngas ma bskur ro/_/tshur rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du dong dang /_
[\[199b.4\]]des bdag cag gi zhal che sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams ngal bas dbyug gu can khrid de chang 'tshong zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa dang /_chang 'tshong ma la khye'u zhig btsas pa des khye'u de gos kyis bkab ste bsnyal ba de la dbyug gu can 'dug go/_/des khye'u yod 
[\[199b.5\]]khye'u yod ces smras nas/_ji tsam na bltas na shi bar gyur nas des dbyug gu can de bzung nas/_khyod kyis kho mo'i bu bsad kyis kho mo'i bu byin cig_/des smras pa/_kho bos ni ma bsad na ci'i phyir kho bos khyod la bu sbyin/_des smras pa/_tshur 
[\[199b.6\]]rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du 'dong ngo zhes de rnams chas pa dang /_ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na shing skam la khwa zhig 'dug pa des dbyug gu can mthong nas smras pa/_gang du 'gro/_kho bo ni mi 'gro na 'di dag gis kho bo khrid do/_/gang du/_me long 
[\[199b.7\]]gdong gi drung du'o/_/'o na kho bo'i phrin yang khyer la rgyal po me long gdong la phyogs ga ge mo zhig na shing lo ma skams pa zhig mchis pa de la khwa zhig mchis te/_de'i mchid nas shing lo ma sngo zhing snum pa gzhan dag mchis bzhin du de la bdag dga' bar mi 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]'gyur gyi/_'di la bdag mchis na bde ba ci las gyur ces gyis shig_/de rnams chas pa las [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhig gis dbyug gu can mthong nas des smras pa/_dbyug gu can gang du 'gro/_kho bo ni gang du yang mi 'gro na 'di dag gis kho 
[\[200a.2\]]bo khrid do/_/gang du/_me long gdong gi drung du'o/_/kho bo'i phrin yang khyer la gnas gzhan dag na gsing ma dang rtswa sngon po dag mchis bzhin du bdag de dag la ma dad pa la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig_/de rnams chas pa dang ji tsam na sreg pa zhig gis mthong 
[\[200a.3\]]nas smras pa/_gang du 'dong zhes bya ba nas/_'o na kho bo'i phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_bdag phyogs gcig tu ni sreg pa'i skad 'byin la/_phyogs gzhan du ni skad gzhan 'byin pa/_'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis 
[\[200a.4\]]shig/_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_phyogs gzhan zhig na sbrul zhig gis mthong nas zhes bya ba nas 'o na kho bo'i phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_bdag phug nas ni bde bar 'byung la slar ni 
[\[200a.5\]]sdug bsngal gyis 'jug pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig_/sbrul zhig dang ne'u le gnyis phan tshun mi mthun zhing 'thab par byed pa zhes bya ba nas 'o na bdag cag gi phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_bdag cag nyin par gcig 
[\[200a.6\]]gis gcig mthong nas thab mo bgyid kyi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig_/bag sar gzhon nu ma zhig gis zhes bya ba nas des smras pa/_'o na bdag gi phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_gang gi tshe 
[\[200a.7\]]bdag pha'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe ni gyos po'i khyim 'tshal la/_gang gi tshe gyos po'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe na pha'i khyim 'tshal ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig_/de rnams chas nas rgyal po me long gdong gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas dbyug 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]gu can gyis rgyal po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/gzhan dag gis kyang rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te 'khod pa dang /_rgyal pos dbyug gu can la dris pa khyod ci la 'ongs lha bdag ni khrid do ci zhig gi phyir/_
[\[200b.2\]]dbyug gu can gyis khyim bdag dang ci zhig las rtsod pa de thams cad smras so/_/rgyal pos khyim bdag la dris pa/_khyod kyis glang mthong ngam mthong lags so/_/dbyug gu can khyod kyis glang phugs su bskrad dam/_lha bskrad lags so/_/rgyal pos 
[\[200b.3\]]smras pa/_gang gi phyir go bar ma byas pas dbyug gu can 'di'i lce chod cig_/gang gi phyir 'di yang glang ma btags pas mig phyung shig_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi glang stor/_rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi mig dbyung ba bas 
[\[200b.4\]]dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/_/mi des smras pa lha dbyug gu can 'dis bdag gi rta rgod ma zhig bkum mo/_/ji ltar bsad/_des rgyas par smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gang gi phyir ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du khog shig_/ces smras 
[\[200b.5\]]pas mi 'di'i lce chod cig_/gang gi phyir rdo bas mi snun par gzhan gyis dgag mi nus pa med pas dbyug gu can 'di yang lag pa chod cig_/mi des smras pa rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi rta rgod ma bkum/_rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas dbyug 
[\[200b.6\]]gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/_/tha ga pa'i chung mas rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_'di nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu khyer cig_/des smras pa rnam pa gcig tu ni 'dis bdag gi sdum thab bkum/_rnam pa gnyis su 'di sdum thab tu 'gyur ba bas dbyug gu 
[\[200b.7\]]can rgyal mi bsngo'o/_/shing mkhan gyis rgyas par smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa gang gi phyir ste'u chu'i dbus su bor nas tshig smras pas shing mkhan 'di lce chod cig_/dbyug gu can 'di yang chu'i gting zab par mthong bzhin du shing mkhan la 'dri 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bas mig dbyung ngo /_/shing mkhan gyis smras pa/_rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi ste'u stor/_rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/_/chang 'tshong mas rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_gang 
[\[201a.2\]]gi phyir 'dis bu thams cad kyi thams cad du gos kyis g.yogs nas bsnyal bas chang 'tshong ma 'di lag pa chod cig_/dbyug gu can yang ma brtags par gzhan gyi stan la 'dug pas 'di ni mig phyung shig des smras pa/_rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi bu bkum/_
[\[201a.3\]]rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi sug pa bkum pa bas dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/_/dbyug gu can gyis khwa'i than smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_dbyug gu can khwa de la khyod phyogs de na ri 'or cig yod pa'i grong gi bdag por gyur pa na shing skam po de'i drung na 
[\[201a.4\]]gter yod kyis de 'ga' zhig la byin te song shig dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes sgo shig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi than smras pa dang /_khyod kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]khyod de na shing yod pa de'i kha nas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag ste/_de zags pas rtswa dang gsing ma mngar por 
[\[201a.5\]]gyur pa la khyod za za ba sbrang ma de song zin gyis ro la chags par ma byed cig_/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes smros shig_/sreg pa'i than smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_gang du sreg pa de sreg pa'i skad 'byin pa'i phyogs de na gter med 
[\[201a.6\]]kyi/_gang du skad gzhan 'byin pa de na gter yod pas khyod kyis gter 'ga' zhig la ston la tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur na mi rung gis gzhan du song shig ces sgo shig_/des sbrul dang ne'u le'i than smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_de gnyis la 
[\[201a.7\]]khyed cag mir gyur pa na spun gnyis zhig tu skyes te/_de na gcig gis smras pa/_nor bgo'o cig shos ser snas zil gyis non pas ma bgos so/_/de la gcig ni lhag par chags par byas pas sbrul du skyes so/_/cig shos kyang nor la then te lhag 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]par chags par byas pas ne'u ler skyes so/_/de bas na khyed cag gis nor de dag dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze dag la byin la gnas de 'or cig dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes sgo shig sbrul gyi than smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis sbrul de la khyod ltogs shing 
[\[201b.2\]]nyam chung bar gyur pas ni phug nas bde bar phyir 'byung la/_kha zas phal mo che zos nas ni sdug bsngal bas phug tu 'jug pa yin gyis/_khyod kyis kha zas la ji tsam du spyad pa drod zin par byas na khyod bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes sgo shig_/bag sar 
[\[201b.3\]]gzhon nu ma'i than smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis bag sar gzhon nu ma de la khyod kyi pha'i khyim na 'grogs bshes shig gnas te/_gang gi tshe khyod gyos po'i khyim na 'dug pa de'i tshe ni 'grogs bshes de 'dod do/_/gang gi tshe pha'i khyim na gnas pa 
[\[201b.4\]]de'i tshe ni khyim thab 'dod de/_khyod tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur na mi rung gis gnas gcig thong la gcig legs par gzung bar byos shig ces sgo shig_/bag sar gzhon nu ma de dang sbrul gyis ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas so/_/sbrul dang 
[\[201b.5\]]ne'u le dag dang khwas ni nor dbyug gu can la byin no/_/lhag ma rnams kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin mnyan to/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_kye ma'o lha la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang mnga' ba lta/_rgyal po dga' ba dang mgu bas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnams 
[\[201b.6\]]su sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta ba'i mi dag bzhag go/_/de'i tshe mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ste/_des mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to/_/des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs 
[\[201b.7\]]pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_blo ldan chos dang mthun pa yin/_/nor rnyed bsags par mi bya ste/_/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yi/_/yon gnas la ni yon du dbul/_/dge sbyong bram ze des pa dang /_/phongs pa legs par tshim byas na/_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]shes rab can de lus zhig nas/_/lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_/mkhas pas de ltar shes byas nas/_/dad ldan chags pa med sems kyis/_/yon gnas rnams la byin pa ni/_/dpa' bo ser sna med pas bsngags/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[202a.2\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po me long gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa gang gis mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma'i kha zas sbyar ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po me long gdong 
[\[202a.3\]]zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa der gyur te/_ngas mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis 
[\[202a.4\]]de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod 
[\[202a.5\]]nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_des grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag 
[\[202a.6\]]mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas te/_des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lha dang mi yi nang dag tu/_/bdag gi 'byor pa mthong nas ni/_/gang gis phun sum 
[\[202a.7\]]'thob pa yi/_/sbyin pa su zhig sbyin mi byed/_/gang gis skyes bu brgya phrag thibs mnan cing /_/ser sna dgra bor gyur pa zil mnan nas/_/'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas sbyin gtong de/_/bdag ni dpa' bo'i dpa' rab yin par sems/_/gang zhig lag na 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]mtshon thogs g.yul ngor 'jug_/de ni dpa' bo min zhes thub rnams gsung /_/gang dag 'jigs pa med par sbyin gtong ba/_/de dag dpa' bo yin zhes kun mkhyen gsung /_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya 
[\[202b.2\]]ba gang gis grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta 
[\[202b.3\]]ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba der gyur te/_nga nyid kyis de na grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong 
[\[202b.4\]]phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas so/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[202b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[202b.6\]]phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul lnga len par rgyal po gnyis byung ste/_byang phyogs kyi lnga len dang lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'o/_/de la byang 
[\[202b.7\]]phyogs kyi lnga len pa nor can zhes bya ba grong khyer glang po'i khyim zhes bya ba na 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang /_lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang /_khrag khrug dang 'gyed pa dang chom rkun med pa nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa 'bras sA lu dang /_
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]bu ram shing dang ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa na chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa dang /_chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/grong khyer de na yang mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos gang 
[\[203a.2\]]ba/_ngang pa dang ngur pa dang bya kA raN+Da bas mdzes par byas pa yid du 'ong ba yod do/_/mtsho de na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba gnas te/_des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas sa gzhi lhag par lo thog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/yul yang 
[\[203a.3\]]bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu mod la/_'jig rten yang sbyin pa dang /_mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur dang ldan pas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang bkren pa dang phongs pa rnams la kha zas sbyin par byed do/_/lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ni chos ma yin pa la lhag par 
[\[203a.4\]]gnas pa/_gtum pa/_gzu lums can/_spro thung ba zhig pas chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed cing chad pa dang /_rdeg pa dang /_'tshog pa dang /_gsod pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_su mi 'dod dang /_khong sgril dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs 
[\[203a.5\]]kyis yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la rtag tu skrag par byed do/_/des chos ma yin pa la lhag par gnas pas des lha yang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par mi 'bebs so/_/des na skye bo'i tshogs de 'jigs pa dang /_yi chad pas rang gi srog la yang 
[\[203a.6\]]mi lta bar yul yongs su spangs te byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du dong nas gnas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chor ba'i tshul du byas nas yul rnams brtag pa'i phyir byung ba dang /_grong rdal dang grong 
[\[203a.7\]]khyer gang yin pa dag ni stongs par gyur cing /_skyed mos tshal dang lha khang rnams ni zhig ral du gyur par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir grong rdal dang grong khyer 'di stongs par gyur cing /_skyed mos tshal dang lha 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]khang rnams ni zhig ral du gyur/_skye bo'i tshogs de dag ni gang du dong /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po nor can gyi yul du mchis so/_/ci'i phyir/_lha mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/_shes ldan sbyin gyis smros 
[\[203b.2\]]shig_/de nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid bgyid pas de'i yul 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang lo legs pa skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang zhing 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_khrag khrug dang /_
[\[203b.3\]]'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun ma mchis la nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_'jig rten yang sbyin pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur dang ldan pas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang /_phongs 
[\[203b.4\]]pa rnams la kha zas stsol bar bgyid do/_/lha ni gtum pa gzu lums can/_spro thung bas chad pa dang /_rdeg pa dang 'tshog pa dang /_gsod pa dang 'dzin pa dang /_'ching ba dang su mi 'dod dang /_khong sgril dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs kyis yul mi rnams la rtag tu 
[\[203b.5\]]skrag par mdzad pas des na skye bo'i tshogs de 'jigs shing yi chad nas byang phyogs pa'i lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du mchis lags so/_/lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gis na skye bo'i tshogs de slar 'ongs nas grong rdal dang grong 
[\[203b.6\]]khyer 'di dag tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gal te byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid mdzad de/_byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang /_thugs brtse ba'i sems 
[\[203b.7\]]kyis yul bskyangs na ring po mi thogs par skye bo'i tshogs de slar mchis nas grong rdal dang grong khyer 'di rnams su gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas kyang byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byas te/_byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyang bar byas/_khyed kyis ci nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs de slar 'ongs nas grong rdal dang grong khyer 'di rnams su 
[\[204a.2\]]gnas par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig_/lha yon tan gzhan yang 'di lta bu mchis te/_grong khyer de na mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos gang ba/_ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_bya kA raN+Da bas mdzes par bgyis pa de na klu'i bu skye ba sna 
[\[204a.3\]]tshogs pa zhes bgyi ba zhig gnas te/_des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lo tog lhag par phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/des na sa gzhi lhag par lo tog dang ldan pas yul yang bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu mod lags so/_/rgyal pos 
[\[204a.4\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gis na klu'i bu de 'dir khugs par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/_lha rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang dag gis de khugs par 'gyur gyis/_de dag btsal du gsol de nas rgyal pos gser gyi thum po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 
[\[204a.5\]]la bcings nas yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/_gang gis byang phyogs lnga len pa'i yul nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khugs na de la gser gyi thum po 'di sbyin no/_/bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur sti bya'o/_/ji tsam na sbrul khas sdigs pa zhig blon 
[\[204a.6\]]po rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa/_bdag la gser gyi thum po 'di stsal na bdag gis klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa phrogs te khrid de mchi'o/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_'di khyer cig des smras pa/_khyed cag gang la yid ches shing yid brtan pa de'i lag 
[\[204a.7\]]tu bzhag la klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khrid de mchis nas 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin du gyis shig de nas sbrul khas sdigs pa des mi yid brtan du rung ba'i lag tu gser gyi thum po gtad nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song ngo /_/de nas des mtsho de'i kho ra 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]khor yug brtags na mtshan ma la mkhas pa zhig pas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa de ni phyogs 'di kho na nyid na 'dug go snyam nas/_de nas gtor ma dang yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_bdag la gtor ma dang yo byad rnams stsol cig dang 
[\[204b.2\]]zhag bdun gyi nyin par klu'i bu de phrogs te/_khrid de mchi'o/_/sbrul khas sdigs pa de yang des mthong nas de ni bdag 'phrog tu 'ongs te zhag bdun gyi nyin par bdag phrogs nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bdag gis myong bar 'gyur na ji ltar 
[\[204b.3\]]bya/_su la skyabs btsal snyam pa dang /_yang mtsho de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na rngon pa sran can dang spang leb can gnyis gnas te/_de gnyis mtsho de'i drung na gnas bcas nas gang dag skam la yod pa'i srog chags ri bong dang ldang sko ska dang /_phag la sogs 
[\[204b.4\]]pa mtsho de la 'thung du 'gro ba dang /_gang yang chu na yod pa nya dang ru sbal dang sbal pa la sogs pa bsad cing 'tsho bar byed pa las de na yang sran can ni shi'o/_/spang leb can ni gson no/_/klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pas bsams pa rngon pa spang leb can ma gtogs pa 
[\[204b.5\]]skyabs gzhan med do snyam nas/_de nas mi'i cha byad du byas te rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song nas smras pa/_kye nang rje rgyal po nor can gyi yul 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba zhes bya ba nas 'bras sA lu dang /_bu 
[\[204b.6\]]ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_su'i mthu las gyur pa ji ga khyod kyis shes sam/_des smras pa shes te rgyal po de chos dang ldan pas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed de byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems 
[\[204b.7\]]dang brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyangs pas so/_/des smras pa/_ji de 'ba' zhig gam gzhan gyis kyang yin rngon pas smras pa/_gzhan gyi yon tan zhig kyang yod de/_mtsho 'di na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba gnas te/_des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]phab nas lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/des na sa gzhi lhag par lo tog dang ldan pas yul yang bza' ba dang btung ba mod par gyur to/_/skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa gal te 'ga' zhig gis klu'i bu de yul 'di nas phrogs 
[\[205a.2\]]na klu'i bu de cir 'gyur/_rung bar mi 'gyur te/_de pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang yul mis phrogs na de la khyod kyis ji ltar bya/_srog dang dbral bar bya'o/_/khyod kyis klu'i bu de gang yin pa shes sam mi shes so de nga nyid 
[\[205a.3\]]yin na lho phyogs lnga len pa'i sbrul khas sdigs pa nga 'phrog par byed de/_de gtor ma dang yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'ong bar 'gyur te/_'ongs nas mtsho ngogs su seng ldeng gi phur pa grwa bzhir btsugs la tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bres te gsang sngags 
[\[205a.4\]]rjod par byed kyis/_de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu khyod mi mngon par 'dug la/_gang gi tshe des cho ga de lta bu byas par gyur pa de'i tshe mtsho'i nang gi chu khol zhing lud par 'gyur te nga yang 'byung gis de'i tshe khyod kyis sbrul khas sdigs de'i gnad du mdas snun la de ma thag 
[\[205a.5\]]tu drung du song ste gsang sngags slar sdus shig_/ma bsdus na khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor ro re zhes smros shig_/gal te des gsang sngags rnams ma bsdus par srog dang bral te shin ni kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings 
[\[205a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rngon pas smras pa/_gal te khyod gcig pu la phan thogs na yang de bzhin du kho bo kho nas bya na yul mtha' dag la phan na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_kho bos skyabs byas song shig_/de nas klu'i bu des de la dben pa'i phyogs shig bstan nas/_
[\[205a.7\]]ji tsam na rngon pa de zhag bdun gyi nyin par phyogs dben par bdag nyid gab ste 'dug pa dang /_sbrul khas sdigs pa de yang 'ongs nas gtor ma dang yo byad kyi cho ga bya bar rtsom ste/_de phyogs bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi btsugs/_tshon skud sna tshogs kyis 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]bres te gsang sngags brjod do/_/de nas chu de khol du cha ba dang rngon pas gnad du mdas bsnun nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste smras pa/_khyod kyis nged kyi yul na gnas pa'i klu'i bu gsang sngags kyis dbrog gam/_gsang sngags slar sdus shig ma bsdus na 
[\[205b.2\]]khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor ra re de nas sbrul khas sdigs pa sdug bsngal nyams su myong bas nyam thag cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas gsang sngags brtul ba dang /_rngon pas de ma thag tu de bsad do/_/de nas klu'i bu gsang sngags kyi zhags pas 
[\[205b.3\]]bcings pa las thar te mtsho nas byung nas rngon pa la 'khyud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni kho bo'i ma yin la khyod ni kho bo'i pha yin te/_'di ltar khyod la brten pas kho bo pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ma skyes so/_/tshur shog gnas su 'dong ngo zhes 
[\[205b.4\]]des de gnas su khrid de song nas bza' ba dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas te/_rin po che dag bstabs nas ma dang pha la smras pa/_yab yum 'di ni bdag gi snying du sdug pa skyabs dang gnyen du gyur pa lags te/_'di'i mthus bdag khyed dang lhan cig 
[\[205b.5\]]pa las bral bar ma gyur to/_/de dag gis kyang de la dam pa sbyin par byed de/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs byin nas des de rnams khyer te mtsho de nas byung ngo /_/mtsho de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa bya sna tshogs skad 
[\[205b.6\]]'byin pa zhig yod de/_de na drang srong byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_sems can rnams la sdug par 'dzin pa zhig gnas so/_/de nas rngon pa de drang srong de'i drung du dus gsum du 'gro bar rtsom zhing /_de la klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang lhan cig ji ltar gyur pa de dag 
[\[205b.7\]]thams cad rgyas par smras so/_/de nas drang srong des smras pa/_khyod la rin po che dang gser ci dgos/_de'i gnas na don yod pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa yod kyis de slongs shig_/de nas rngon pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa la chags pa skyes nas drang srong gi tshig mnyan te slar klu'i 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]gnas su song ba dang /_de nas ji tsam na klu'i khang pa'i sgo na don yod pa'i zhags pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'dod pa'i don yod pa'i zhags pa gang yin pa de ni 'di kho na yin no snyam nas klu'i gnas su zhugs so/_/de nas klu'i bu skye ba 
[\[206a.2\]]sna tshogs pa dang /_klu gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dag byas nas rin po che dag bstabs pa dang /_des smras pa/_kho bo la rin po che mi dgos kyi/_'on kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di kho bo la byin cig_/skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/_khyod 
[\[206a.3\]]la 'di ci dgos kho bo cag la ni dgos rab ste/_gang gi tshe nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa byas pa de'i tshe 'dis kho bo cag bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/rngon pas smras pa/_khyed cag la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnod pa lan 'ga' zhig 'byung ba na 'di dgos kyi/_kho bo la ni dus kun 
[\[206a.4\]]du dgos kyis gal te legs pa byas pa dang phan btags pa dran pa lta na byin cig_/klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa 'di snyam du sems te/_'dis bdag la phan cher btags kyis pha ma la brtags te sbyin no snyam nas des pha dang ma la brtags te zhags pa de byin no/_/de nas rngon 
[\[206a.5\]]pa des bdag thob pa bzhin du bde ba dang yid bde bas tshim nas/_don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te klu'i gnas nas byung nas rang gi khyim du song ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po nor can btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/
[\[206a.6\]]de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de bdag gi khyim du nor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags kyang bdag la bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das na bdag gi gdung rgyud 
[\[206a.7\]]'chad cing yul 'chor ba dang /_bdog pa ril yang rgyal po gzhan gyis dbang byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang de la dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_grogs po dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]thugs mi dgyes/_des skabs de de rnams la rgyas par smras pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rnams la gsol ba mdzod cig dang /_khyod la sras mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de bu med de bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang nor lha la sogs pa la 
[\[206b.2\]]gsol ba 'debs shing /_lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dag dang bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /_sum mdo'i lha dag dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang chos mthun pa dag dang /_rtag tu rjes su 
[\[206b.3\]]'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/_de ni de lta bu ma yin te/_gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 
[\[206b.4\]]bzhin du bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na pha dang ma dag chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar 
[\[206b.5\]]gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/_gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/_bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig btsun mo dam pa de'i mngal du zhugs so/_/
[\[206b.6\]]bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal du zhugs 
[\[206b.7\]]pa de yang shes pa dang /_khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la gal te bu mo yin na/_dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug go/_/de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyo la smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pa las na nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_de yang yid dga' zhing dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas 'di skad ces/_kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod 
[\[207a.2\]]pa bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /_kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /_kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa dang /_kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par sgrub pa dang /_bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa 
[\[207a.3\]]dag la nyung ngu'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas nas 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bsngo ba byed par gyur cig_/ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do/_/de la sems can zhugs par 
[\[207a.4\]]rig nas 'di lta ste mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang ha cang mi skyur ba dang ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang ha cang mi 
[\[207a.5\]]mngar ba dang ha cang mi tsha ba dang /_ha cang mi bska ba dang /_kha ba dang skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang /_bska ba spangs pa'i zas dag dang do shal dang se mo do dang /_rgyan gyis bklubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /_khri nas 
[\[207a.6\]]khrir dang khri'u nas khri'ur dang /_shod kyis gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /_des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par nyam bag tu bzhag go/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa gsal ba gser gyi mdog 
[\[207a.7\]]'dra ba/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma 'jar pa/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de btsas pa na kun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rnga brdungs pa rgyal pos thos nas 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]smras pa/_de ci zhig yin/_btsun mo rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_khyod kyi sras po zhig bltam mo/_/de nas rgyal pos grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal te byi dor byas nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_
[\[207b.2\]]rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng /_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams/_me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram ste/_bsgo ba dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang /_phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin cig_/btson thams cad khye shig_/de'i phyir 
[\[207b.3\]]nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_khye'u 'di rgyal po nor can gyi sras lags pas khye'u'i ming nor [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gdags so zhes de'i ming nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[207b.4\]]zhes bya bar btags so/_/khye'u nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/_de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar
