[\[207b.5\]]dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste zhes bya ba nas/_brtag pa brgyad dang dbye 
[\[207b.6\]]ba dang /_bklag pa la mkhas pa dang /_spyod pa gsal bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ljongs kyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/_sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di mngon par rgyal bar byas te 
[\[207b.7\]]gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas zhes bya ba nas/_gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_de'i phas chung ma gsum po chen ma dang 'bring ma dang /_chun ma dag bzhag cing gnas pa'i khang pa rnam pa gsum po dgun gyi 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dang /_dpyid kyi dang dbyar gyi rnams brtsigs nas/_skyed mos tshal rnam pa gsum po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang dbyar gyi dag btsugs so/_/de nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la skyes pa med par song nas sil snyan rnams 
[\[208a.2\]]kyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rngon pa spang leb can [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshol zhing de dang de dag tu rgyu ba na ri bo gzhan zhig la phyin pa dang /_des ri bo de'i shod na drang srong gi bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[208a.3\]]bya sna tshogs rgyu ba de na mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos yog pa/_ngang pa dang /_bya kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngur pas mdzes pa de mthong nas de bsti gnas der 'khyam par brtsams pa las/_ji tsam na drang srong skra dang /_kha spu dang /_sen mo dang /_spu rnams ring 
[\[208a.4\]]ba/_lus rlung dang tsha bas gdungs pa/_shing gos gyon pa zhig shing gi drung du gnas bcas te rtswa'i spyil bu na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas dris pa/_legs ldan phyogs 'dir khyod bzhugs nas yun ji srid cig lags 
[\[208a.5\]]lo bzhi bcu lon no/_/khyod kyis yun de srid cig tu phyogs 'dir lon na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' lta gzigs pa'am gsan pa lta mchis sam/_drang srong zhi ba'i bdag nyid des dal bu dal bus smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis mtsho 'di mthong ngam/_legs 
[\[208a.6\]]ldan mthong lags so/_/'di ni tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing zhes bya ste/_ut+pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos gang ba/_bya sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyis bsten pa/_kha ba dang dngul dang ba mo'i mdog lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba/_shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog gis bskor ba'i chu'i 
[\[208a.7\]]rdzing 'dir tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bya ba mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas mgo khrus dang bsku mnye sna tshogs dang 'ongs nas khrus byed do/_/de khrus byed pa'i tshe bro gar dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgra snyan pas bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]rnams kyang yid 'phrog par byed do/_/kho bo yang de'i sgra thos nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba chen pos zhag bdun 'da' bar byed de/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di mthong ngo /_/de nas rngon pa spang leb can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis klu las don 
[\[208b.2\]]yod pa'i zhags pa thob pa stes te/_de mi'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma la gdab bo snyam nas/_des dus gzhan zhig na tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te mtsho 'gram dang nye bar me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo ma tshang tshing zhig tu 'khras nas gcig tu bsgrim 
[\[208b.3\]]pas bya ra byed cing 'dug go/_/ci tsam na yid 'phrog ma mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/_de 'dra ba'i 'byor pa nyid kyis tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing du khrus kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_rngon pa spang leb can gyis de ma thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa btab pa las/_des 
[\[208b.4\]]mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma zin to/_/don yod pa'i zhags pas zin nas mtsho'i nang na mchong rgal zhing 'jigs pa'i sgra yang phyung ba dang /_mi'am ci mo'i tshogs lhag mas de thos nas phan tshun brgyugs te mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma la brtag par brtsams pa las bzung 
[\[208b.5\]]bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skrag nas bros so/_/rngon pa des mchog tu gzugs bzang mo blta na sdug pa de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gzung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs pa dang /_des smras pa/_ma rabs khyod ni nga la ma reg shig_/khyod kyi 'di ni thog tu bab ma yin/_/
[\[208b.6\]]nga ni gzugs bzang rgyal gyi 'os yin pas/_/'dzin pa legs par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/rngon pas smras pa gal te khyod ma bzung na 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa kho mo mi 'bros kyis gal te yid mi ches na 'di'i mthus kho mo steng gi nam mkha' la 'gros gtsug 
[\[208b.7\]]gi nor bu 'di zung shig_/rngon pas smras pa su shes des de la gtsug gi nor bu byin nas smras pa/_gtsug gi nor bu 'di su'i lag pa na gnas pa de'i dbang du kho mo 'gyur ro/_/de nas rngon pas nor bu de blangs te zhags pas bcings bzhin du khrid de song ngo /_/de'i tshe 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chor du chas pa dang /_rngon pa des gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la/_'di yang mchog tu gzugs bzang 
[\[209a.2\]]mo blta na sdug pa yin te/_gal te 'di mthong na btsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du bdag nyid kyis dbul lo snyam nas/_de nas de zhags pas bcings bzhin rgyal bu gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gang na ba der khrid de song nas phyin pa 
[\[209a.3\]]dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha bdag gis bud med rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal te mchis na bzhes su gsol/_rgyal bu gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma gzugs bzang mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/_kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan 
[\[209a.4\]]pa/_yon tan thams cad 'dus pa/_bud med kyi mtshan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis brgyan pa/_yul gyi mi bas bzang ba/_nu ma gser gyi bum pa dang ru sbal ltar rgyas zhing rlo ba dang /_mkhrang zhing mkhregs pas shin tu legs par zlum pa ldem pa/_mig mthon mthing la 
[\[209a.5\]]rtsa dmar zhing dkyus ring la pad ma gzhon nu 'dra ba/_sna'i gzangs ring zhing mtho ba/_ma mchu byi ru dang nor bu dang rin po che dang /_bim pa'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/_'gram pa ma rnyongs shing yongs su rgyas pa/_mkhur tshos lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thig le can/_
[\[209a.6\]]smin ma rim gyis mdzes shing 'jar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/_dpung pa zla ba nya ba dri ma med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba/_lto gnyer ma zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam rnyong ba/_nu ma'i g.yur gyis ro stod bags kyis 'dud la/_dku shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs 
[\[209a.7\]]shin tu mdzes pa/_lag pa chu shing gi snying po 'dra ba brla byin gyis phra bar zlum pas mdzes pa/_rtsa shin tu mi mngon zhing gya gyu med pas yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/_nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang mgul gdub dang rkang gdub dang gdu bu dang do shal dang /_se mo do'i sgras 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]'gying zhing 'gro ba/_skra gnag la 'jam pa/_bde sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan cing gser gyi 'og pag can/_lto phyang nge ba do shal mang po dpyangs pa/_mdog gser btsom ltar bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu gzhon nu 'dod chags kyi zhags pa chu zla dri ma 
[\[209b.2\]]med cing gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhin lta bur gzung dka' ba/_klung chu rlabs dang bcas pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs par dka' ba/_nam mkha' lding dang rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar 'gro ba/_shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur myur du 'gyur ba/_spre'u ltar sa gcig na mi 'dug pas 
[\[209b.3\]]g.yo zhing tsab yab can gyis ni dam du zin/_'dod chags kyi mda' rtag tu nyon mongs pa bsten pa goms pa'i 'dod chags kyi bde ba ro myong ba la brkam pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa las mi zlogs pa/_bzang mo la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis 
[\[209b.4\]]shin tu dri ma can du byas pa/_phrad par 'dod pas shin tu dbyung mi bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni snying po la phog ste/_me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel te smras pa/_dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'gyu ba ltar/_/bzhin 
[\[209b.5\]]ras zla ba 'dra de nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ste/_/de la chags pa'i 'dod pa steg tshol las byung ba'i/_/'dod chags mda' yis de yi sems la phog/_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa/_de nas rgyal bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]yid 'phrog ma khrid 
[\[209b.6\]]de glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song nas rngon pa de la yang grong khyer mchog cig byin no/_/de nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir dong nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de yid 'phrog ma'i 
[\[209b.7\]]gzugs dang na tshod dang bsnyen bkur brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar phrogs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'ongs pa las de las gcig ni rgyal po la rten 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]bcas so/_/gnyis pa ni gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la'o/_/rgyal po la rten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal pos mdun na 'don du bcug ste longs spyod kyi skal ba yang byin no/_/gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gang yin pa de la ni des longs spyod kyi skal ba tsam zhig 
[\[210a.2\]]byin pa dang /_smras pa/_gzhon nu gang gi tshe yab 'das nas khyod rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe bdag la ci zhig bgyi/_gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_ji ltar khyod kyi grogs po bram ze nga'i yab kyi mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du khyod kyang nga'i mdun na 'don du gzhug go 
[\[210a.3\]]zhes byas pa'i gtam de gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis kyang rgyal srid mi 'thob pa de ltar bya na mdun na 'don du gzhug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po de'i yul 
[\[210a.4\]]du ri 'or ba zhig sdo bar gyur nas rgyal pos de 'bebs su dmag kha chen cig btang ba las de bcom/_rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar log go/_/de bzhin du kha chen bdun gyi bar btang ba las de rnams kyang bcom/_rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar lhags 
[\[210a.5\]]so/_/rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha ci'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu skyed par mdzad/_gang yang lha'i yul na mtshon gyis 'tsho ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gsol/_bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/_gzhon nu nor 
[\[210a.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gsad pa'i thabs bya ba'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas des rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha de lta bus na de bab par rngo mi thog go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ji ltar bya nga nyid kho na 'gro'am/_mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_ci'i slad du lha nyid gshegs/_gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[210a.7\]]'di ni dar la bab cing mthu rtsal snyems pa dang ldan pa lags pas dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du bya'o zhes de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas bsgo ba/_gzhon nu dmag dang lhan cig tu deng la ri 'or ba rnams phob shig_/lha 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rgyal po las mnyan nas/_btsun mo rnams kyi gan du song ste yid 'phrog ma mthong ba dang de thams cad brjed par gyur to/_/de nas yang rgyal pos bsgo ba dang yang mthong ma thag tu thams cad brjed par gyur to/_/de nas mdun na 
[\[210b.2\]]'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni yid 'phrog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi rngo mi thog gis/_dmag bsdogs la gzhon nu btsun mo rnams kyi nang nas byung ba dang ci nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung du mi mchi bar thal byung gtang bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos 
[\[210b.3\]]blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs sta gon gyis shig_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas dpung gi tshogs glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung phun sum tshogs pa 'tshog chas go mtshon rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta gon byas 
[\[210b.4\]]so/_/de nas gzhon nu phyir byung ba dang bsgo ba/_gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs sta gon byas kyis song shig_/des smras pa/_lha yid 'phrog ma la bltas te mchi bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu thogs par 'gyur gyis ma lta shig_/yab gal te de lta na ma la bltas te 
[\[210b.5\]]mchi'o/_/gzhon nu ma la ni ltos shig_/des yid 'phrog ma'i gtsug gi nor bu khyer nas ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_yum bdag ri 'or ba rnams 'bebs su mchi lags kyis/_gtsug gi nor bu 'di khyod kyis shin tu dben par sbos la yid 'phrog 
[\[210b.6\]]ma 'gum pa la thug pa ma lags pa ji ltar gyur kyang ma stsal cig ces des de skad ma la bsgo nas mchi phyag byas te dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis yul 'das nas ri 'or de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du btab ste 'dug 
[\[210b.7\]]go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /_'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /_'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /_'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lam de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi 'dun sar chas so/_/de lam de nas chas 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]pa na nam mkha'i lam la thogs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis lam 'di nas lan mang po zhig tu song na bdag gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur na gang gis na da ltar thogs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod snyam pa las/_des gzhon nu 
[\[211a.2\]]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_dmag la chas pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i grogs byas te ri 'or ba 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab bo snyam du bsams nas/_
[\[211a.3\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa/_lnga len tshur shog_/khyod kyis gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ri 'or ba rnams dang g.yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par ma bya bar phob shig_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[211a.4\]]zhes rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas lha'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa shing ta la'i tshad tsam gyi skyes pa dang /_ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang /_glang po che'i tshad tsam gyi rta dang /_gzhal med khang gi tshad tsam gyi shing rta rnams sprul to/_/de nas ral gri dang /_tho 
[\[211a.5\]]ba dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mdung dang /_'khor lo dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' dang /_dgra sta la sogs te mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs pa chen po ston cing /_lnga len mthu chen po'i tshogs rnams dang 
[\[211a.6\]]ri 'or du phyin pa dang /_glang po che dang rta dang shing rta'i sgra dang /_sil dkrol gyi sgra sna tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang gi mthus ra ba dag ral bar gyur to/_/de nas ri 'or na gnas pa de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs de dang ra ba dag ral ba mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar 
[\[211a.7\]]skyes te dris pa/_dpung gi tshogs 'di gang nas 'ongs/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_myur du sgo phye shig_/gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di'i mjug nas 'ong ste dpung gi tshogs 'di ni de'i yin no/_/gal te myur du ma phye na thams cad rmeg med par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis/_bdag cag 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]rgyal la mi ldog ste/_/gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min/_/rgyal po zho shas 'tsho rnams kyis/_/bdag cag 'jigs shing skrag gyur mod/_/ces smras nas de rnams kyis sgo phye ste/_de nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas bum pa gang ba dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu 
[\[211b.2\]]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bsu'o/_/des kyang dbugs phyung nas de rnams 'drang ba las sna bo bskos te dpya thang bcad/_gte'u yang bzung ngo /_/de nas ri 'or ba de rnams cham du phab nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]slar log go/_/rgyal po nor can gyis de nyid kyi nub mo'i rmi lam na bya rgod cig 
[\[211b.3\]]'ongs te rgyal po'i lto dral nas rgyu ma gzangs te grong khyer de thams cad kyi mtha' bskor ba dang rin po che sna bdun khyim du 'ongs par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas de nas rgyal po 'jigs skrag mi dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed nas myur ba myur bar langs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 
[\[211b.4\]]'gram pa la gtad de gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las de nam nangs nas rmi lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa dang /_des bsams pa/_lha rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba ni 
[\[211b.5\]]gdon mi za bar gzhon nus ri 'or ba rnams pham par byas kyis log pa zhig tu bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa/_lha khyod kyis rmang lam du gzigs pa ni bzang ba ma lags te/_gdon ma 'tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_sku tshe'i bar chad du 
[\[211b.6\]]'gyur lags so/_/'on kyang 'di bzlog pa'i thabs mchis te/_de yang bram ze rnams kyis gsang tshig las mthong ngo /_/bzlog pa'i thabs de ci yin/_lha skyed mos tshal du rdzing dbyibs legs pa tshad la bab pa bgyis la/_de nas rdo thal gyis byugs te/_
[\[211b.7\]]legs par bstar la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la de nas lhas khrus la gshegs pa na rdzing de la them skas gcig las 'jug par bgyi'o/_/gcig las zhugs nas gnyis pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/_/gnyis pa las zhugs nas gsum pa la 'dzeg 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]par bgyi'o/_/gsum pa las zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/_/de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs lces ba ldags la mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyi bdug pas bdug go/_/de ltar na lha'i dngos 
[\[212a.2\]]sdig 'byang zhing yun ring por rgyal srid skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de dag thams cad ni nus na 'di ltar mi ma yin pa'i tshil 'di ni shin tu dkon no/_/mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_lha mod pa gang lags pa de dkon lags sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de ji 
[\[212a.3\]]lta bu zhig yin/_mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_lha yid 'phrog ma 'di mi ma lags pa ma lags sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_mdun na 'don 'di la gzhon nu'i srog 'dug gis de skad ma smra shig_/des smras pa/_lha khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' gtang ste/_/grong rdal phyir ni khyim gtang ngo /_/
[\[212a.4\]]yul ljongs phyir ni grong rdal te/_/bdag gi phyir ni sa gtang ngo /_/zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam/_rgyal po bdag nyid brtan gyur nas/_/gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni/_/gzhan zhig stsal bar spyod grang gis/_/yid 'phrog 'di ni dgum par mdzod/_/bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa 
[\[212a.5\]]ni mi byed pa ci yang med pas des khas blangs so/_/de nas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya bar brtsams te/_rdzing brkos nas rdo thal gyis byugs shing legs par bstar nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo rnams kyi khrag sogs pa la zhugs so/_/sbyor ba de nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]btsun mo'i 
[\[212a.6\]]skye bos shes nas de rnams dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_bdag cag lang tsho la bab cing gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/_da ni bdag cag dang gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]yongs su dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag yid 
[\[212a.7\]]'phrog mas mthong nas dris pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir lhag par dga'/_ji tsam na gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog ma la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ma gang na ba der song ste rkang 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]pa gnyis la gtugs nas snying rje rje skad du sgra gcom chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_gal te de lta na legs par rtogs shig_/bdag gis kyang brtag go/_/yid 'phrog mas brtags nas yang smras pa dang /_des brtags na yang bden par mthong nas/_
[\[212b.2\]]de nas des gtsug gi nor bu de dang gos shig yid 'phrog ma la byin nas smras pa/_bu khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro shig_/de lta na kho mo la kha mchu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la chas te khrag gis gang ba'i rdzing bur zhugs 
[\[212b.3\]]nas byung ba dang /_de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la bram ze rnams kyi lces bldags so/_/ji tsam na mi'am ci mo khrid de shog ces bsgo ba dang /_de ma thag kho nar yid 'phrog ma nam mkha' la 'phags te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag ni reg dang phrad pa dang /_/bdag ni bgad 
[\[212b.4\]]dang rtses pa las/_/ban glang mo btags thar ba ltar/_/de ni bdag mo 'gro bar bya/_/rgyal pos kyang nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba mthong nas de skrag ste mdun na 'don la smras pa/_gang gi phyir 'bad par bya ba de ma grub par mi'am ci yid 'phrog ma bros so/_/mdun na 'don 
[\[212b.5\]]gyis smras pa/_lha da ni don grub ste dngos sdig dang bral lags so/_/de nas yid 'phrog ma nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba na 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yang bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni drang srong des bstan pa las gyur gyi/_gal te des ma bstan na ni bdag bzung 
[\[212b.6\]]zhing 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba zhig_/de lta bas na re zhig drang srong de'i drung du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de de'i bsti gnas su song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas drang srong la smras pa/_drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas bdag bzung ste mchis nas mi'i reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar 
[\[212b.7\]]chad du cung zhig gis ma gyur to/_/de bas gsol ba ni gal te brgya zhig la gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag tshol zhing mchis na de la bdag gi sor gdub stsol la 'di skad kyang gsung ba'i rigs so/_/gzhon nu lam yang bgrod par dka' ste nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]bzhud cig_/gal te bzlog kyang mchis su ma btub na de la lam bstan pa'i rigs kyis/_gzhon nu yid 'phrog mas bstan pa byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis so/_/de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mo/_/de dag rgal ba'i pha 
[\[213a.2\]]rol na yang gsum mchis so/_/de dag rgal ba dang ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so/_/de'i byang phyogs na ni ri bo phur pa'i rtse mchis so/_/de nas lam chu sgra can dang /_seng ldeng can dang /_rgyud gcig pa dang /_rdo rje can dang /_'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang /_phur 
[\[213a.3\]]pa'i dbyibs dang /_sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang /_mi g.yo ba dang /_rab grol te/_ri bo de dag khyod kyis rgol cig_/de la ri bo seng ldeng can dang /_rgyud gcig pa dang /_phur pa'i dbyibs la ni phug nas 'jug_/rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/_thabs 'di dag 
[\[213a.4\]]gis ri bo de rnams rgal bar bgyi'o/_/'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang /_lug lta bu dang /_skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o/_/phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/_de ni zho shas gzhom par bgyi'o/_/
[\[213a.5\]]gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig_/phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/_/bdag gi slad du gzhu bdungs la/_/mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis/_/gang nas lug gnyis phan tshun nas/_/rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni/_/de gnyis rwa re bcag mdzod dang /_/lam ni rnyed par 'gyur 
[\[213a.6\]]lags so/_/'jigs pa che skyed mtshon thogs pa'i/_/lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/_/de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang /_/lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/_/srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig_/kha 'dzums gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/_/de tshe de yi 'phral 
[\[213a.7\]]ba la/_phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/_/de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil/_/drug bcu'i khru can la khyod mchongs/_/skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing /_/mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/_/gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag_/gzhu bkang ste ni gsad mdzod la/_/
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi/_/chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig_/nang ga phye ma lab gdungs dang /_/sna tshogs ngud mo dgod pa dang /_/sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung /_/nang ga na ni srin mo khro/_/phye ma lab na mi ma yin/_/gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang /_/sna tshogs can na 'dod 
[\[213b.2\]]sgyur gzugs/_/ngud mor mi'am ci yi bran/_/dgod pa na ni mi'am ci'o/_/mna' ma sbrul can sbrul mang na/_/'od ma can klung shal ma li/_/nang ga la ni brtan par bya/_/phye ma lab la rtul phod bya/_/gdungs par 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo /_/sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/_/dud 
[\[213b.3\]]mo can du yid bde bas/_/dgod byed du mi smra ba yi/_/sbyor bas kun du rgal bar mdzod/_/sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi/_/sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/_/klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi/_/sbyor bas kun du rgal bar mdzod/_/chu bo rnams rgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na 
[\[213b.4\]]gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te gzhom par mdzod cig_/de nas ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so zhes gsungs shig_/drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas de skad ces smras nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te de nas song ngo /_/ji tsam na gzhon nu nor 
[\[213b.5\]{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ri 'or de phab nas skyes khyer te glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs so zhes rgyal pos thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/_/de nas gzhon nu ngal sos nas pha'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang /_rgyal pos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas 
[\[213b.6\]]smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod bde bar 'ongs sam/_lha khyod kyi bka' drin gyis ri 'or ba phab ste gte'u bzung /_sna bo bskos lags te/_dpya dang skyes kyang 'di dag lags kyis phyag mdzod du gzhug tu gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu legs par byas kyis bzhes so/_/
[\[213b.7\]]de nas gzhon nus pha la phyag byas nas chas pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu skyes la lhan cig kho nar longs spyad kyis 'dug shig_/lha bdag gis yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas yun ring zhig lags pas mchi lags so/_/gzhon nu deng 'gro ba shol la sang song 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]shig_/de gal gyis 'chu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab nges par deng nyid bdag mchi lags so/_/rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas gzhon nu rang gi khyim du song na btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dpal gyis stong par mthong nas de sems khong du 
[\[214a.2\]]chud bzhin du zhugs na/_yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas snying stor te phan tshun du rgyu zhing yid 'phrog ma yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra phyung ngo /_/ji tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas btsun mo de rnams kyis gtam rlung la bskur ba dang /_de'i snying la zug rngus zug pas yang nas yang du 
[\[214a.3\]]dris pa las/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/de mya ngan gyis yid blong bar gyur to/_/bud med de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas bud med shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/_des pha snying rje med cing 
[\[214a.4\]]byas pa chud gson pa thos nas ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/_yum/_yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cing /_/gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi/_/yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/_/bdag gi yid 'phrog gang du mchis/_/yid kyis rab tu brgyug 
[\[214a.5\]]snyam na'ang /_/bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs/_/de dang bral bar gyur pa yis/_/snying ni shin tu gdungs pa nyid/_/bdag gi yid du mchi zhing yid 'phrog la/_/yid du 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi/_/yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdungs pa yi/_/bdag gi sdug 
[\[214a.6\]]bsngal 'di ni gang nas mchis/_/des smras pa/_bu yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo /_/yum ji ltar gyur/_des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang /_des pha snying rje med cing byas pa mi gzo ba yin no zhes smras nas yang 
[\[214a.7\]]smras pa/_yum gang du mchis/_shul ni gang nas/_des smras pa/_gang du yid 'phrog song ba yi/_/lam de ri dang drang srong dang /_/seng ge dag gis rtag bsten cing /_/chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin/_/de yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi bzad par 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]nyam thag cing snying rje rje skad du bla zhing smre sngags 'don pa/_yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur pa'i/_/yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/_/zhes bya ba nas bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'ongs zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas mas smras pa/_bu btsun mo'i 
[\[214b.2\]]'khor 'di na de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bud med dag yod na ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/_gzhon nus smras pa/_yum de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/_des de dbugs phyung yang 'on kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs nas de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal bar 
[\[214b.3\]]brtsams te de'i blo skyes pa/_gang kho na las thob pa de nyid la re zhig dri'o snyam nas/_des rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song ste dris pa/_khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas rnyed/_des smras pa/_ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong zhig gnas te/_de'i bsti gnas na tshangs 
[\[214b.4\]]pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te/_der khrus la zhugs pa las drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do/_/des bsams pa/_da ni drang srong gi drung du song dang de las khungs phyin par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/rgyal pos gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma dang bral bas shin tu yid blong ba'i 
[\[214b.5\]]gtam de thos so/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod yid blong du ci yod/_da ni de bas khyad par 'phags pa'i chung ma sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_yab bdag ni de ma lags pa'i mchis 'brang gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thog lags so/_/rgyal pos de la lan du ma 
[\[214b.6\]]smras kyang ma zlogs so/_/de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang ra ba'i khar ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu srung ma dag bkod do/_/de nas gzhon nu ni mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to/_/lnga po 'di dag ni mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi phal 
[\[214b.7\]]cher mi nyal te/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa bud med la chags pas sems bcings pa dang /_bud med skyes pa la chags pa dang /_srog chags ngur pa dang /_chom rkun pa'i ra bgo dang /_dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/de nas 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gzhon nu 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag sgo nas song na rgyal po'i sgo srungs kyi srung ma gtum po dag yod de/_de rnams kyis bdag chad pas gcod pa'am/_srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur gyis/_ci nas kyang ma la bdag srung ma med pa'i lam 
[\[215a.2\]]nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_de mtshan mo langs te ut+pa la sngon po'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa'i phreng ba rgyal mtshan la btags nas gang na srung ma'i mi med pa de nas babs pa na zla ba shar to/_/de nas des zla ba la bltas nas yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu 
[\[215a.3\]]dag 'don par byed de/_zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal byed kye/_/khyod ni snar ma'i mig tu sdug pa ded dpon bzang /_/ci ga bdag gi sdug pa ut+pa la lta bu'i mig_/yid 'phrog ces bgyi khyod kyis sa stengs gzigs lags sam/_/zhes smras nas/_sngon gyi dga' 
[\[215a.4\]]ba nyams su myong ba dran zhing song ba las [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo zhig mthong nas de la yang smras pa/_kye ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo khyod rtswa chu lo ma za/_/khyod ni legs gyur bder spyod bdag ni rngon pa min/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo ltar mig dkyus ring bas gzugs bzang ba/_/bdag gi yid 'phrog ces 
[\[215a.5\]]bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/_/de de nas song ste phyogs gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang /_tshal me tog dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs spyod pa mthong nas de nas bung ba zhig la smras pa/_sbrang rtsi'i bung ba ri bo mthon ting lta bu'i mchog_/smyug ma'i 
[\[215a.6\]]sbubs dang pad ma dag la gnas 'cha' ba/_/skra yi tshogs ring kha dog bung ba ltar gnag pa/_/bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/_/phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang sbrul zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_kye ma'o sbrul gnag shing lo lta 
[\[215a.7\]]bur lce g.yo zhing /_/mig dang kha yi nang nas dud pa'i tshogs 'byin pa/_/khyod kyi gdug pa'i me dang 'dod chags mer mi mtshungs/_/bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/_/de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu son pa dang /_tshal gzhan zhig na khu 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]byug sgra 'byin pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khu byug de la yang smras pa/_kye ma khu byug tshal mchog ljon shing la gnas pa/_/'dab chags tshogs kyi rgyal po bud med yid 'phrog pa/_/ut+pal sngon po lta bur dri med mdzes pa'i mig_/bdag gi yid 'phrog 
[\[215b.2\]]ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/_/phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang /_shing mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba me tog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong nas/_ming gi rnam grangs bkra shis zhes brjod pa/_/ljon pa rnams kyi rgyal po cher gyur la/_/yid 'phrog mya ngan gyis ni blong 
[\[215b.3\]]ba dag_/thal mo sbyor na khyod kyis mya ngan songs/_/de de ltar yid blong bzhin rim gyis drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin nas des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas smras pa/_bzod 'phags gos su shing shun dang ni g.yang gzhi mnabs/_/rtsa ba 
[\[215b.4\]]myu gu skyu ru bil ba ka pid gsol/_/drang srong mgos btud phyag 'tshal bdag gi yid 'phrog ma/_/khyod kyis gzigs sam khyod ni bdag la myur du gsungs/_/de nas drang srong des gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la byon pa legs so zhes byas pa dang /_stan bting ba bya ba la sogs 
[\[215b.5\]]pa sngar bya ba'i yang dag par dga' ba byas nas smras pa/_smin ma 'jam pa'i smin mtshungs mthon mthing bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/_/bzhin ras zla ba nya 'dra ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong /_/dpon khyod bag rkyang bzhugs 
[\[215b.6\]]te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna tshogs gsol bar mdzod cig dang /_/slad kyis bde blag byon 'gyur 'di la bdag gi yid la the tshom yong ma mchis/_/smin ma bzang mos 'di skad tshig smras te/_/gzhon nu khyod la sred pas bdag mi bde/_/nags khrod gnas pa'ang sdug bsngal 
[\[215b.7\]]chen po ste/_/gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag mthong ngo /_/des sor gdub rgyan 'di byin nas smras pa/_lam yang la bgrod dka' bas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar log shig_/gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tu ma btub na de la lam bstan pa'i rigs so/_/
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]des yang 'di skad ces bstan te/_byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum yod do/_/de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum/_de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum yod de/_de dag rgal ba dang ri'i rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba yod de/_phyogs de 
[\[216a.2\]]nas sman 'di dag blang bar bya ste/_'di lta ste shin tu 'o ma 'dzag ces bya ba'i sman yod de/_de mar las btsos nas btung bar bya'o/_/des na skom pa dang bkres pa med cing dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/spre'u zhig kyang bkri bar bya/_gsang sngags dag 
[\[216a.3\]]kyang bslab par bya/_gzhu mda' dang chas pa dang /_nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang /_dug gsod pa sman dug sel dang /_lcags kyi phur pa gsum dang /_pi bang yang bcang bar bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na ri bo phur pa'i rtse yod do/_/de nas lam chu sgra can dang /_
[\[216a.4\]]seng ldeng can dang /_rgyud gcig pa dang /_rdo rje can dang /_'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang /_phur pa'i dbyibs dang /_sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang /_mi g.yo ba dang /_rab grol lo/_/khyod kyis ri de dag rgal dgos te/_de la ri bo seng ldeng can la ni phug nas 'jug_/
[\[216a.5\]]rgyud gcig pa dang /_phur pa'i dbyibs la yang phug nas 'jug_/rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/_thabs 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams rgal bar bya'o/_/'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang /_lug lta bu dang /_skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag gzhom 
[\[216a.6\]]par bya'o/_/phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/_de ni zho shas gzhom par bya'o/_/gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig_/phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/_/bdag gi slad du gzhu bdungs la/_/mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis/_/
[\[216a.7\]]gang la lug gnyis phan tshun nas/_/rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni/_/de gnyis rwa re bcag mdzod dang /_/lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/_/'jigs pa che skyed mtshon thogs pa'i/_/lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/_/de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang /_/
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/_/srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig_/kha 'dzums gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/_/de tshe de yi 'phral ba la/_/phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/_/de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil/_/drug bcu'i khru can la khyod mchongs/_/
[\[216b.2\]]skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing /_/mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/_/gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag_/gzhu bkang ste ni gsang mdzod la/_/chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi/_/chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig_/nang ga phye ma lab gdungs dang /_/sna tshogs ngud mo dgod pa dang /_/
[\[216b.3\]]sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung /_/nang ga na ni srin mo khro/_/phye ma lab na mi ma yin/_/gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang /_/sna tshogs can na 'dod sgyur gzugs/_/ngud mor mi 'am ci yi bran/_/dgod pa na ni mi'am ci'i/_/mna' ma sbrul can sbrul mang na/_/'od ma can 
[\[216b.4\]]klung shal ma li/_/nang ga na ni brtan par bya/_/phye ma leb la rtul phod bya/_/gdungs par 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo /_/sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/_/ngud mo can du yid bde bas/_/dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i/_/sbyor bas kun du rgal bar mdzod/_/sbrul can du ni 
[\[216b.5\]]sbrul dug gi/_/sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/_/klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi/_/sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/_/chu bo rnams rgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te gzhom par mdzod cig_/de nas ni mi'am 
[\[216b.6\]]ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so zhes gsungs shig_/de nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ji skad bstan pa'i sman dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo /_/de nas 
[\[216b.7\]]des spre'u ma gtogs par ji skad bstan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas/_de nas de rnams khyer te yang drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang /_des de la spre'u byin nas smras pa/_gzhon nu 'bad pa 'dis ci bya/_yid 'phrog ma 'dis ci zhig dgos/_khyod gcig 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]pu grogs med pa lus gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyis thong /_gzhon nus smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag ni gdon mi za bar mchi'o/_/ci'i slad du zhe na/_mkha' la zla ba rgyu ba grogs shig ga las mchis/_/mche ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i 
[\[217a.2\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gtso bo dang /_/me yis nags sreg pa na grogs shig ga las mchis/_/bdag lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal/_/kye ci rgya mtsho che chur 'jug par mi bgyi'am/_/ci lags sbrul gyis zin ces gso bar mi bgyi'am/_/sems can spungs 
[\[217a.3\]]can gyis bsten brtson 'grus cher brtsams te/_/gal te 'bad de ma rung 'di la nyes pa med/_/de nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yid 'phrog mas bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis ri dang /_chu bo dang /_phug dang g.yangs la sogs par sman dang /_gsang 
[\[217a.4\]]sngags dang /_sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang /_gzhon nus grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa skyed mos tshal gyi tshal me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pas mdzes par byas pa/_bya sna 
[\[217a.5\]]tshogs kyis bsten pa/_rdzing bu dang /_mtshe'u ring po dang /_gru bzhi dang /_mi'am ci mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la mi'am ci mo rnams chu len du 'ongs pa mthong nas/_des gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]de rnams la smras pa/_chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya/_de 
[\[217a.6\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis/_de mi'i lag tu son par gyur pas de'i mi'i dri bshal ba lags so/_/gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dris pa/_ci bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig 
[\[217a.7\]]tu de'i steng nas ldugs sam/_'on te rim gyis/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_rim gyis so/_/des bsams pa thabs 'di bzang ste/_sor gdub kyi rgya 'di bum pa gcig gi nang du gzhug go snyam nas/_des mi'am ci mo gcig gi bum par ma tshor bar bcug 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]nas mi 'am ci mo de la smras pa/_khyod kyi bum pa 'dis thog mar yid 'phrog ma la khrus byos shig_/des bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas des bum pa de thog mar yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor blugs pa las ji tsam na 
[\[217b.2\]]sor gdub kyi rgya pang du lhung ba dang yid 'phrog mas de 'phrigs so/_/de nas mi 'am ci mo la dris pa/_'dir mi 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs sam/_des smras pa/_mchis so/_/song la de dben pa zhig tu zhog shig_/des de nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/_/de nas 
[\[217b.3\]]yid 'phrog mas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_yab gal te bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de mchis na de la khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/_des smras pa/_de mi yin te cir yang mi mkho bas ngas de dum bu brgyar byas la phyogs bzhir gtor te 
[\[217b.4\]]gtang ngo /_/yid 'phrog mas smras pa/_yab mir gyur pas 'dir ga la mchi/_bdag nyid de skad mchi bar bas so/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/_de nas kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/_gal te gzhon nu de 'ongs 
[\[217b.5\]]na ngas khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la nor dang yo byad mang po dang /_mi 'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no/_/de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas 
[\[217b.6\]]mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/_de nas de bgam par 
[\[217b.7\]]'dod nas gser gyi sdong po bdun dang /_shing ta la bdun dang /_rnga bo che bdun dang /_phag bdun btsugs so/_/gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni byang chub sems dpa' yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]yin no/_/lha rnams kyang de dag la bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang /_glu dang pi bang dang /_khar rnga dang /_shin tu sgra snyan dang /_pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /_rdza rnga la sogs pa 
[\[218a.2\]]lha rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni kun nas 'bud cing mi'am ci stong phrag du mas ni yongs su bskor nas/_ral gri ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba thogs te/_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mthong bar gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song 
[\[218a.3\]]nas chu shing la gcod pa bzhin du sdong po de dum bu dum bur gcad par brtsams te/_de nas de til gyi 'bru tsam du brlags so/_/mdas ni shing rta la bdun dang /_rnga bdun dang /_phag bdun gtsang mar phyung ste/_ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo bar gnas so/_/de nas nam mkha' 
[\[218a.4\]]la gnas pa'i lha dang /_mi'am ci brgya stong phrag du mas a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po phyung ngo /_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong zhing thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/de nas mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma 
[\[218a.5\]]bzhag ste/_gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la smras pa/_gzhon nu tshur yid 'phrog ma ngo shes par gyis shig_/de nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/_ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la/_/kho bo'i sdug 
[\[218a.6\]]pa yid 'phrog yin zhe na/_/bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nar ni/_/yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog_/de nas de ma thag tu gom pas song ba dang /_mi'am ci rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[218a.7\]]pha rol gnon pa shin tu tshogs pa lags te/_yid 'phrog ma dang thab rir bab lags na/_ci'i slad du 'di la tho btsam/_'di la yid 'phrog ma stsol cig_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i tshogs rnams kyis rjes su bsngags pa dang /_mi'am 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ci rnams kyi 'dun pas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la rje bkur sti chen po byas nas yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung /_gser gyi bya ma bum lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]drung du song ste smras pa/_gzhon nu 
[\[218b.2\]]yid 'phrog ma 'di mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/_kho bos khyod kyi chung ma'i phyir byin gyis/_mi rnams ni ngo mi rtag pa yin gyis/_ji ltar yang 'di ma dor cig_/yab bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las 
[\[218b.3\]]mnyan nas mi'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig skyes pa med par sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mya 
[\[218b.4\]]ngan gyis gdungs par gyur nas yid 'phrog ma la smras pa pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis non par gyur to/_/de nas yid 'phrog mas de ltar gyur pa dag pha la rgyas par smras so/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu dang lhan cig song la mi rnams ni slu bar byed 
[\[218b.5\]]pa yin gyis/_khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_gser la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te btang nas de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha'i lam la mi'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na rim 
[\[218b.6\]]gyis glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin no/_/de nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_dar gyi chun 'phyang dpyangs rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por 
[\[218b.7\]]dag bshams/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste/_dga' dga' ltar byas so/_/de nas gzhon nu mi'i gtso bo stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du zhugs so/_/de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]bsos nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag khyer te pha'i drung du song nas rgyal po'i stan gyi glo zhig tu 'dug ste/_mi'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba dang 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras so/_/de nas rgyal po nor can gyis 'di ni shin tu stobs dang /_
[\[219a.2\]]brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa can no zhes bya bar rig nas rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/_/gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]bsams pa/_gang bdag yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tshogs pa dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa 
[\[219a.3\]]'di ni sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin gyis/_ma la da yang bdag gis sbyin pa dag ni btang /_bsod nams dag ni bya'o snyam nas/_des glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[219a.4\]]gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rgyal po nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ngas gang yid 'phrog ma'i phyir stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[219a.5\]]pha rol gnon pa bstan nas/_lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa des ngas bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi/_'on kyang sbyin pa de dang /_brtson 'grus de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs 
[\[219a.6\]]tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer na 
[\[219a.7\]]rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'gyed pa rnams 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba nas/_chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[219b.2\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang po/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_
[\[219b.3\]]dpung pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas/_gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can/_bdag la phan pa dang /_
[\[219b.4\]]gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu rnams la byams pa/_thams cad sbyin pa/_thams cad gtong ba/_chags pa med par gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no/_/de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos nas 
[\[219b.5\]]dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ongs te thams cad kyang yid la re ba rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo /_/de nas re zhig cig na byang chub sems dpas shing rta nor bu dang gser dang dngul dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_in+d+ra 
[\[219b.6\]]nI las 'bar bar byas pa/_tsan dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/_seng ge dang stag dang gung gi pags pas g.yogs pa/_rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa/_gser dang dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs 
[\[219b.7\]]nas grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo /_/de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/yang smras pa/_khyod ni 'jig rten 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]thams cad du/_/thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/_/bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di/_/khyod kyis sbyin pa gtang ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te snying 
[\[220a.2\]]dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta byin nas smras pa/_bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/_/mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang /_/de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/_/btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/_//
[\[220a.3\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa/_de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba me tog kun da dang /_ku mu da dang /_kha ba dang /_dngul dang /_sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gnas shing rkang lag legs par gnas 
[\[220a.4\]]pa/_glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/_rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/_mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 
[\[220a.5\]]bzhin du sos ka'i dus la bab pas shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing /_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang /_de nas phyir rgol bas sbad pa'i 
[\[220a.6\]]bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras nas yang smras pa/_lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/_/khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/_/khyod kyi glang po'i mchog 
[\[220a.7\]]'di ni/_/bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po'i mchog de byin nas smras pa/_
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/_/mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang /_/de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/_/btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog_/rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyis khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 
[\[220b.2\]]'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas sbad pa'i bram ze rnams la byin no zhes thos so/_/thos nas rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin tu khros 'khrugs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug ste smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song shig_/de nas gzhon 
[\[220b.3\]]nu thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang /_bsams pa/_bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad par byas pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas glang po che de yang btang ste/_de bas khyim na gnas pas ni/_/ci nus par ni 
[\[220b.4\]]sbyin pa btang /_/dka' thub nags su brten nas ni/_/nges par mchog dag bya ba yin/_/bslangs na mi sbyin zhes bya ba/_/tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyis/_/de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te/_/dka' thub nags su rab tu 'gro/_/byang chub sems dpas de ltar snying la 
[\[220b.5\]]mna' mtho bcad nas chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste de dag rgyas par smras so/_/de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te de lta na bdag kyang dka' thub 
[\[220b.6\]]kyi nags gnas su mchi ste/_bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thog lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_nam mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang /_/ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang /_/pad ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa dag_/bud 
[\[220b.7\]]med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no/_/khyod ni bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]shin tu skyid pa yin dka' thub kyi nags na ni rtswa dang lo ma bting bar ni nyal rtsa ba dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu ni za/_rtswa dUr ba dang /_zug rdo dang /_rtswa dang /_tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu/_yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni brten/_bdag nyid skye bo 
[\[221a.2\]]thams cad la ni bsten dgos/_glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad dgos la/_de na yang nga gdon mi za bar ci nus kyi sbyin pa gtong ste/_de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so/_/de bas na re zhig da dung yang legs par soms shig_/
[\[221a.3\]]rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag rngo ci thog gis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de khyod kyis dran par byos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/_
[\[221a.4\]]yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal/_/nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/_/bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchi lags kyis/_/mi yi dbang po'i phyag mdzod stongs mi 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis 
[\[221a.5\]]brnangs te skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/_bu sbyin pa'i blo 'or la 'dug shig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_sa ni ri dang bcas par yang /_/gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yang /_/sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las/_/sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/_/zhes smras 
[\[221a.6\]]nas song ngo /_/de nas bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/_grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin song ngo /_/de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de 
[\[221a.7\]]yang thos/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas mi zhig la dris pa/_kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po cho nges 'debs pa 'di ci las gyur/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci mi shes sam/_'di ltar mi yi dbang pos nyid kyi sras po mche ba 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bzang /_/brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di ni spyugs/_/de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chas pa la/_/pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 
[\[221b.2\]]'khor gyi mi rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag slar deng shig slar deng shig_/'di ltar shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/_gnyen pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa 
[\[221b.3\]]ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med de/_/mdza' ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur bsams nas/_/khyod kyis sa stengs 'bad pa thams 
[\[221b.4\]]cad kyis/_/zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan par gyis/_/de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/_kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum 
[\[221b.5\]]brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/_khyod kyis shing rta mchog 'di bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so/_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas tshig brlangs pos bram ze de la smras pa/_e ma'o nags na'ang mi dbang sras 
[\[221b.6\]]la slong ba gang /_/bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo/_/mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/_/'di la 'dir ni snying rje cig mi skye 'am/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyags sbyin 
[\[221b.7\]]gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/_/kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa stengs byang chub 'thob/_/sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob/_/
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas yang rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/_bram ze ser sna'i dri ma sel byed pa/_/shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir/_/bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i/_/
[\[222a.2\]]zag med chos kyi shing rta che skor shog_/de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu nag po phrag pa la khyer/_rgyags sbyin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang rim 
[\[222a.3\]]gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to/_/de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so/_/ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang /_bram ze zhig thams 
[\[222a.4\]]cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas/_/spa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/_/de yi don du bus pa gnyis/_/khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras 
[\[222a.5\]]pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa gtong ba la cung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang /_de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/_kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'i 
[\[222a.6\]]zhes thos na 'di ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/_khyed ni kun ster snying rje yi/_/bdag nyid can du sa stengs grags/_/ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/_/khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[222a.7\]]sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze de la smras pa/_kye bram ze chen po/_rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang /_/lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na/_/rang gi bu ni btang ba la/_/bdag blo gzhan du gyur ci smos/_/bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/_bdag gis 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i/_/bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs nas/_/ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/_/'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/_/gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas/_/bus pa btang la bdag min zhes/_/kha cig bdag la phyar 'ong gis/_/
[\[222b.2\]]bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/_/de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/_kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/_sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/_srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/_
[\[222b.3\]]sbyin pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur stis spos kyi glang po che lta bu/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa/_skye bo bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_ltogs pa yongs su sdud pa/_thams cad kyi re ba yongs su 
[\[222b.4\]]rdzogs par byed pa/_mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am/_lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa'am/_mthong ba don med pa'am/_re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin 
[\[222b.5\]]te/_khyod kyi med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtang ba'i rigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chu gter gos su gyon zhing 
[\[222b.6\]]gza' mig mtshungs med pa/_/ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/_/grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang /_/mche [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram 
[\[222b.7\]]ze'i tshig de thos nas bu la chags pa'i blong bas 'di dag sems par byed de/_gal te re zhig bu gnyis po/_/bram zer byin na bu dang ni/_/bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag_/bdag dang rgyags byin gyis thob 'gyur/_/'on kyang 'di la ma byin na/_/brtul 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]zhugs las kyang nyams 'gyur zhing /_/bram ze 'di ni tshi chad de/_/ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro/_/nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i/_/mya ngan sa stengs bdag gis blang /_/de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa/_/zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams 
[\[223a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par gtong bar chad nas smras pa/_kye kho bos dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi/_/rgya mtsho chen po so sor 'jigs byed pa/_/gting mi dpogs par rab tu 
[\[223a.3\]]bying ba dag_/pha rol rgal phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'/_/zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can/_/ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/_/mchi ma rlan chus mig ni gang gyur pa'i/_/byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin/_/yang smras pa/_bu 'di byin pa'i 
[\[223a.4\]]'bras bu ni/_/rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas/_/des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/_/'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya/_/bus pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas sa g.yos pa des tshal de na gnas pa'i dka' thub 
[\[223a.5\]]can rnams sngangs nas phan tshun smras pa/_sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa/_/'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin/_/gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba/_/shin tu gsal bar shes par bya/_/de na gnas 'jog dang rus gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la 
[\[223a.6\]]mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/_gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du 'ong ba/_mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis 
[\[223a.7\]]nyam thag pa yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir spangs te/_des nas g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]la gtugs te smras pa/_yab cig yum ni ma mchis par/_/khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa/_/re zhig de ni mthong gyur nas/_/de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngo zum 
[\[223b.2\]]gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/_bu dag_/nga yi snying du mi sdug min/_/snying brtse snying rje med min te/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin/_/ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog_/zhi ba rang 
[\[223b.3\]]gis thob nas ni/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i/_/rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo/_/de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang /_sma 
[\[223b.4\]]bab pa'i tshig gis dal gyis smras pa/_gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na/_/ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi phrin/_/khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces/_/yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol/_/yab gzhan yang /_byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs pa 
[\[223b.5\]]bgyis pa gang /_/gal te la lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa'am/_/gus par mnyan nas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa/_/de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_/de skad ces smras nas pha la phyag 'tshal te 
[\[223b.6\]]lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bla ma la smra bar yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying 
[\[223b.7\]]blong nas yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab ste dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so/_/byis pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lha stong phrag du ma yang 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bar snang la ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra 'byin cing /_e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che/_/bus pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang /_/gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa/_/de yi nges pa rmad cig go/_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te 
[\[224a.2\]]bsti gnas logs su chas pa las sa che thang du g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang /_lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thar bar bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar 
[\[224a.3\]]chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang /_rgyags sbyin mas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/_kho mo'i 'di bkag nas ni ci ste 'dug_/
[\[224a.4\]]ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo nges she na/_/lam las bzur ste myur du 'gro bar gyis/_gzhan yang /_khyod kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i chung ma la/_/bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/_/btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyis/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal mos bdag gi lam 
[\[224a.5\]]phye shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha seng ge'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo /_/de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas yud tsam zhig bsams pa/_ji ltar bar snang la ngud mo'i sgra grag pa dang /_
[\[224a.6\]]ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i lha rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grag pa las na gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas smras pa/_ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang /_/ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang /_/ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las/_/
[\[224a.7\]]bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/_/ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa las/_/bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang /_/ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las/_/bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/_/zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]gnas su zhugs te mi dga' bzhin bltas na bu gnyis ma mthong nas/_de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar nas bsti gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/_phyogs 'di na ni gzhon nu nag po sring mo dang lhan cig [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu dang rtag tu rtse rtse/_'di ni de gnyis 
[\[224b.2\]]kyi sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/_'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha spyad yin na de gnyis mi snang na/_gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi_/lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal lta srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re zhing /_bu mthong bar 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras 
[\[224b.3\]]bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo gnyis gang du mchis/_thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/_kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig_/re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur 
[\[224b.4\]]nas/_/bus pa de gnyis de la byin/_/de dag rjes su yi rang rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyags sbyin ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo mda' dug can gyis phog pa bzhin du sa la sgyel nas nya chu'i gnas nas phyung ba bzhin du ni 'gre ldog par byed/_krung krung bu stor ba 
[\[224b.5\]]bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du ngu /_ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs 'don cing smras pa/_pad ma gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can/_/lag pa pad ma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can/_/bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba/_/'gro ba gang du song 
[\[224b.6\]]nas sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bu ltar drang zhing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na/_/de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur/_/gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur/_/mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni/_/snying 
[\[224b.7\]]rjes ngu ba shin tu sdug bsngal ba/_/de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas/_/skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho/_/de gnyis bdag gis pang nas bskyed bskyed pa/_/zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za/_/bzod dang gnam pas bla ma brtag dka' ba/_/
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/_/de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang /_/rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lums spangs pa las/_/skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas/_/bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/_/skom zhing bkres 
[\[225a.2\]]pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs nas/_/de gnyis su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni/_/de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su gzir/_/bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/_/srog chags sdug pa brgya dang 
[\[225a.3\]]bral ba yi/_/sdig las shin tu mi bzad 'dir byas pa/_/des na ba be'u med bzhin cho nges 'debs/_/bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang /_/sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa/_/bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po/_/bran du gyur pa 
[\[225a.4\]]las ni thar bar shog_/rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas snying du sdug nas 'khyud de smras pa/_bus pas ril ba chung ngus chu bcus pa/_/lo ma rnams las chu 
[\[225a.5\]]thigs 'dzag pa yi/_/ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin/_/bus pa nu zho ma blud lta bur ngu /_/yang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal 
[\[225a.6\]]bus smras pa/_de yi ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang /_/nags su sa tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang /_/bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no/_/de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der 
[\[225a.7\]]rjes bcad pa dang /_bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyi rjes drang por ma byung gi gya gyus gang bar mthong nas lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/_ji ltar 'then pa'i rjes byung dang /_/la lar myur du song ba las/_/brdegs te khrid par gdon mi za/_/
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog_/mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer/_/ma mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du mig kyang rig rig ste/_/rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de de ltar 
[\[225b.2\]]smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/_kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis/_/btang ba ma yin sdang bas min/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/gtang bar 
[\[225b.3\]]dka' ba'i bu de btang /_/mchog tu gtang dka' bdag nyid dang /_/bu nor chung ma rnams btang nas/_/sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du/_/byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brten gtang dka' ba'i/_/bus pa de 
[\[225b.4\]]gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang /_/bdag dang chung ma bzhon dang nor yang btang byas te/_/kun la thams cad gtang ba'i blo gros nga la yod/_/de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis/_/
[\[225b.5\]]khyod blo gzhan du ma gyur cig_/gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed na/_/dogs pa med par bdag stsol cig_/gzhan yang /_dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi phyir/_/sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi/_/don de myur du thob nas ni/_/srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod/_/
[\[225b.6\]]de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rgyags sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung ba dang /_shin tu bya dka' bar rig nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te steng gi nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags 
[\[225b.7\]]nas snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal bar byas te/_nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can/_/longs spyod la chags snying gi zhags pa bu yis bcings 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]pa'i nang na yang /_/khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' ba bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas/_/nges par go 'phang ba de dang zhi ba dri med dka' ba med par 'thob/_/de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[226a.2\]]po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/_'di gcig pu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang ngo snyam nas/_de nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_yan lag 
[\[226a.3\]]kun bzang khyim thab las/_/'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba/_/rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di/_/bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol/_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze la smras pa/_ngo tsha med cing brkam pa khyod/_/'di na bram ze tha shal te/_/
[\[226a.4\]]khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing /_/dam chos dga' ba nga 'dod dam/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis rgyags sbyin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang /_de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_bdag ni 
[\[226a.5\]]bdag la g.yar ngan med/_/de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags/_/gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes/_/de ltar khyod slad g.yar ngan bgyid/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/_go 'phang mi zad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag la/_/sa 
[\[226a.6\]]stengs 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos/_/khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs/_/bdag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas 'theng /_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid rab tu dga' bas bsams pa dang /_sbyin pa 
[\[226a.7\]]'di ni nags tshal 'dir/_/bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/_/rgyags sbyin 'di yang yongs btang nas/_/yongs su gzung ba med par 'gyur/_/snyam du rig nas rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste/_bram ze de la smras pa/_bdag gi mchis 'brang sdug pa 'di/_/
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan/_/ya rabs tshul can snyan par smra/_/bram ze'i mchog khyod bzhes su gsol/_/de nas mche ba bzang po yi/_/chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang /_/chu la gru ni ji lta bar/_/sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g.yos/_/de nas rgyags 
[\[226b.2\]]sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/_khyo dang bu dang bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzangs pas sgra ngar ngar por 'gags bzhin 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la/_/ci 'dra ba yi las ngan byas/_/de nas ba be'u shi ba 
[\[226b.3\]]bzhin/_/skye bo med pa'i nags na ngu /_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te/_rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/_skal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi/_/bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya 
[\[226b.4\]]byin lha min 'joms byed de/_/khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis/_/bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis/_/de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_spyan stong 
[\[226b.5\]]ldan pa bdag gi bu/_/bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing /_/mes po'i drung du phyin par yang /_/sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod/_/de skad ces smras nas yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste rgyags sbyin ma lag 
[\[226b.6\]]pa g.yon pa nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di/_/g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas/_/khyod kyis su la'ang ma sbyin cig_/bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u 
[\[226b.7\]]dang bu mo khyer ba de ji ltar grong khyer gzhan zhig yin no snyam nas grong khyer de nyid du song ste bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams pa de lta bur rmongs par byas so/_/ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha/_khyod kyi dpon po nag po dang /_/dra ba 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]can dang de gnyis ni/_/bram ze shin tu ma rungs pas/_/grong khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis/_/de skad thos nas rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/_gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig_/blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang grong khyer pa rnams myur du 
[\[227a.2\]]rgyal po'i mdun du nye bar lhags so/_/ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang /_mi'i dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo gos med cing /_/lus rbeg dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni/_/mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te/_/
[\[227a.3\]]pho brang 'khor mi blon tshogs bud med dag kyang ngu bar gyur/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_gang zhig nags na gnas na yang /_/sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid/_/mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ni myur du 'dir/_/chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis/_/de nas lha 
[\[227a.4\]]rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shi ba dang /_bram ze dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams lhan cig tu bsti gnas der song nas byang chub sems 
[\[227a.5\]]dpa' la gsol ba btab ste rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go/_/de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to/_/des dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_
[\[227a.6\]]zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_byang chub don du gnyer ba yis/_/rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang /_/'jigs pa med par sbyin pa gtang /_/gser dang dngul 
[\[227a.7\]]dang ba lang dang /_/rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang /_/de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/_/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin/_/chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/mi yis dag pa thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas bsod nams 
[\[227b.2\]]dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/_nga nyid kyis de na dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_zho shas 
[\[227b.3\]]'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas so/_/rgyal po chen po nga'i sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[227b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[227b.5\]]sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer du rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_de 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_khrag 
[\[227b.6\]]khrug dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun dang /_nad rab tu zhi ba/_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang phun sum tshogs pa/_bu gcig pa la byams pa bzhin du rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/_chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/des rigs mnyam 
[\[227b.7\]]pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_pags pa'i mdog gser 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]'dra ba/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_dpung pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba zhig btsas te/_de'i nye du rnams 'dus nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/shes ldan dag gzhon nu 'di ni rgyal po thams cad bshes 
[\[228a.2\]]gnyen gyi bu yin pas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so/_/zhes gzhon nu thams cad sgrol du ming btags nas/_ma ma brgyad la gtad de zhes bya ba nas/_gnas lnga rnams la byang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de gang ci slong ba de thams cad 
[\[228a.3\]]slong ba po dag la sbyin par byed pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags so/_/khams kyi rgyal phran gyi bu mo rgyags sbyin ma zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de de'i ched du bslangs nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/_de de dang lhan 
[\[228a.4\]]cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na khye'u zhig btsas pa dang /_de'i ming nag po zhes bya bar btags so/_/yang de dang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/_de'i ming
