[\[228a.5\]]dra ba can zhes bya bar btags so/_/rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i mthus khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed do/_/des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/_bu bdag cag gis gang cung zad 
[\[228a.6\]]khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de dag thams cad kyang glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis khyod thams cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan ni zhog shig_/khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis smras pa/_gang gi mthus na bdag cag thams 
[\[228a.7\]]cad rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'dis zil gyis mnan/_kha cig gis smras pa/_rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/de'i mthus bdag cag 'dis zil gyis mnan to/_/de dag gis smras 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pa/_gang gis na glang po'i mchog de dgug pa'i thabs bzang po lta ci yod/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de mi sbyin pa'am mi gtong ba ci yang ma mchis te/_de ci slong ba de thams cad sbyin 
[\[228b.2\]]pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags kyis/_bram ze dag cig mngags dang de rnams kyis bslangs na khugs par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis bram ze dag bkug nas smras pa/_bram ze dag deng la thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal 
[\[228b.3\]]na/_thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba las glang po'i mchog slongs shig_/de dag mngags nas thams cad kyi grong rdal du dong ngo /_/gzhon nu thams cad sgrol glang po'i mchog me tog kun da dang /_ku mu da dang /_kha ba dang /_dngul dang /_sprin dkar po'i mdog lta bu mche 
[\[228b.4\]]ba drug pa/_bdun legs par gnas pa/_glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/_rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/_mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang /_grogs po dang g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi 
[\[228b.5\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du grong khyer nas byung nas skyed mos tshal logs su song ngo /_/de nas mngags pa de dag gis gzhon nu thams cad sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/yang smras pa/_lha min lhar 
[\[228b.6\]]bcas 'jig rten du/_/khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/_/khyod kyis glang po mchog 'di ni/_/bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las babs nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_
[\[228b.7\]]rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bram ze de dag la glang po'i mchog de bstan nas smras pa/_ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng /_/bram ze rnams la glang chen btang /_/de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/_/btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog_/blon po rnams 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]kyis rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la smras pa/_lha khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bgyi ba phyir rgol bas mngags pa la stsal to/_/rgyal pos thos nas shin tu khros 'khrugs te bsgo ba/_shes ldan 
[\[229a.2\]]dag deng la thams cad sgrol khrid de shog shig_/de rnams kyis de khrid de 'ongs pa dang /_rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis thams cad sgrol la smras pa/_gzhon nu kho bos khyod la gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de thams cad ni 
[\[229a.3\]]glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis/_khyod thams cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog 'di ni zhog shig_/ces snga mo zhig tu ma bsgo'am/_ci'i phyir khyod kyis glang po'i mchog yongs su btang /_des mnyan nas smras pa/_yab bslangs na ji ltar mi stsal/_ci ji 
[\[229a.4\]]snyed bslangs pa de thams cad sbyin nam/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyim na gnas pa'i skyes bu yis/_/ci rigs par ni sbyin pa gtang /_/'on te nags su song na ni/_/nges pa yi ni mchog bya'o/_/yab gal te sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag bgyir ma 
[\[229a.5\]]mchis na dka' thub kyi nags su brten par bgyi'o/_/gzhon nu de bzhin du gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/_rgyags sbyin ma bdag ni dka' thub kyi nags su gnas kyis/_khyod khyim na bag yod par gnos shig_/des smras 
[\[229a.6\]]pa/_rje'i sras dang thabs cig dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par bgyi'o/_/rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa la dga' bas gal te khyod 'ga' zhig slong na byin par 'gyur ro/_/rje'i sras gal te khyod kyis btang na stsal du gsol/_byang chub 
[\[229a.7\]]sems dpas smras pa/_khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di dran par byos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/_yab gcig bdag gis sbyin slad glang chen btang /_/nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyis/_/mi dbang khyod kyi phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/_/de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i blong bas mchi mas brnangs nas smras pa/_bu sbyin pa dang dka' thub kyi nags kyi blo gros 'di zlog shig_/byang chub sems dpas smras 
[\[229b.2\]]pa/_sa ni ri dang bcas par yang /_/gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi/_/sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las/_/sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/_/zhes smras nas song ste/_byang chub sems dpa' bu dang bu mo dang /_chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta mchog gi nang du zhugs nas 
[\[229b.3\]]dka' thub kyi nags su chas so/_/de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/_/thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/_/
[\[229b.4\]]bram ze dag la shing rta 'di/_/khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze de dag la shing rta'i mchog de bstan 
[\[229b.5\]]nas smras pa/_ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng /_/bram ze rnams la shing rta btang /_/de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/_/btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta la zhon nas rgyags sbyin ma dang lhan cig dong ba dang /_de nas bram ze 
[\[229b.6\]]rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/_/thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/_/bram ze rnams la rta 'di ni/_/khyod kyis 
[\[229b.7\]]sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol rta de las babs nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze de rnams la rta de bstan nas smras pa/_ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng /_/bram 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]ze rnams la rta btang ba/_/de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/_/btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpas ni nag po khrid/_rgyags sbyin mas ni dra ba can khrid de rkang pas dong nas byang chub sems dpas gangs ri'i sul me tog dang /_
[\[230a.2\]]'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu song ste byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gtan byed do/_/rgyags sbyin ma ni 'bras bus bsnyen bkur byed do/_/ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_
[\[230a.3\]]dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa ngan to re zhes sgra 'byin pas de'i ming ngan to re ngan to re zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze rig 
[\[230a.4\]]byed bzhi shes pa zhig gnas pa des rig mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na bu mo gzugs bzang mo/_mdzes ma/_blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te bsrings bskyed nas chen mor 
[\[230a.5\]]gyur pa dang /_bram ze des bdag gi bu mo 'di byad gzugs sam/_rigs sam/_bzo'am/_nor gyi phyir ni su la yang mi sbyin no/_/'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig yod na/_bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas so/_/de nas ngan 
[\[230a.6\]]to re gsang tshig don du gnyer zhing gsang tshig tshol ba bram ze de'i gan du song ste phyin pa dang smras pa/_mkhan po'i zhabs la bkur sti bgyid par 'tshal lags so/_/ci'i phyir rig byed bklag pa'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin du gyis shig_/de de las rig byed bklag par 
[\[230a.7\]]brtsams pa las de yid gzhungs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin pas des ring po ma lon par rig byed rnam pa bzhi la byang bar gyur to/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_bdag gis dam bcas pa ni bdag gi bu mo 'di rigs sam zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/_bram ze'i khye'u 'dis 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]bdag las rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa yin na mtshan ma ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa ste/_gal te 'dis bu mo ma 'dod na ni legs so snyam nas des de la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u bdag gis bu mo 'di byad gzugs sam/_rigs sam/_bzo 'am/_nor gyi phyir su 
[\[230b.2\]]la yang mi sbyin te/_'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig yod na/_bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa las bdag las khyod kyis rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa las khyod la bu mo 'di chung mar sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_bkra 
[\[230b.3\]]shis par gyur cig_/blang bar bgyi'o zhes des de la dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar btang nas smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u chung ma khrid la rang gi khyim du song shig_/des chung ma de khrid de rang gi khyim du song ba dang /_/des de la smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag ni shin tu 
[\[230b.4\]]gzhon pas las bgyid rngo mi thog gis bdag la bkol ba stsol cig_/des de la smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo la bkol ba ga la mchis/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras thams cad ces bgyi ba'i grong rdal na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bgyi ba de'i sras thams 
[\[230b.5\]]cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de gang cung zad ci slong ba de thams cad stsol gyis/_de la bdag gi bkol ba slongs shig_/bzang mo gal te de lta na lhan cig tu 'dong ngo /_/de nas ngan to re thams cad kyi grong rdal du phyin nas dris pa/_gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang na/_de dag gis 
[\[230b.6\]]smras pa/_dka' thub kyi nags na gnas so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa/_de nas ngan to re chung ma dang lhan cig dka' thub kyi nags su song ba dang /_de'i tshe rgyags sbyin ma me tog dang 'bras bu'i phyir song ngo /_/de nas bram 
[\[230b.7\]]ze ngan to re rgyags sbyin ma me tog dang /_'bras bu'i phyir song ba dang /_thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/_chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa/_/ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/_/grong khyer grong rdal bcas 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]pa'i sa la bcal byas kyang /_/mche [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin/_/bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas/_/spa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/_/khyod kyis rjes su brtse bgyis te/_/bdag la bkol ba stsal ba'i rigs/_/
[\[231a.2\]]kho bo la bkol ba ga la yod/_de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na nag po dang dra ba can rtse zhing 'dug pa dang /_des smras pa/_bus pa gzhon nu 'o ni dag byin cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' bu sdug pa yongs su gtong ba la yud tsam zhig sems 
[\[231a.3\]]par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/_kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu kho bos khyod thams cad gtong ba'o/_/zhes thos nas de'i phyir kho bo khyod la slong na/_'di la khyod kyis dpyad du ci zhig yod/_snying rje yi ni bdag nyid khyod/_/thams cad gtong 
[\[231a.4\]]bar sa stengs grags/_/ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/_/khyod kyis sa stengs bya ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang /_/bdag gis res 'ga'ang ma dpyad na/_/rang gi 
[\[231a.5\]]bu ni gtong ba la/_/bdag blo gzhan 'gyur smos ci dgos/_/bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/_bdag gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i/_/bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na/_/ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/_/'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/_/gzhon nu shin tu brtse med 
[\[231a.6\]]pas/_/bus pa btang la bdag min zhes/_/kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gis/_/bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/_/de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/_sa 'di thams cad du 
[\[231a.7\]]yon tan grags pa/_srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/_sbyin pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur stis spos kyi glang po lta bu/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_glo bur ba dang /_skye bo bla ma la mchod pa/_bkren pa dang /_mgon med pa 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]dang /_phongs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/_thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am/_lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa'am/_mthong ba don med pa'am/_re ba dang yun ring po nas 
[\[231b.2\]]brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/_khyod kyi med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo yid la re ba kun du rtog pa'i rta btab na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_gtang 
[\[231b.3\]]ba'i rigs so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bram ze gal te de lta na yongs su gtang ngo /_/bus pa gzhon nu dag gtang ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 
[\[231b.4\]]bsams pa/_rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas/_seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang /_de nas rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/_/khyod ni ci 
[\[231b.5\]]ste lam bkag 'dug par byed/_/gal te bdag ni mi 'phyo bden zhe na/_/lam las bzur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/_/khyod kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i chung ma la/_/bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/_/btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyis/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i 
[\[231b.6\]]chung mas bdag lam phye/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal mo de lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo /_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma bsti gnas gang na ba der song ba dang /_nag po dang /_dra ba can gang na yang ma mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste smras pa/_
[\[231b.7\]]rje'i sras bus pa gzhon nu gnyis gang na mchis/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig_/re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur na/_/bus pa de gnyis de la byin/_/de dag rjes su yi rang rigs/_/de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /_de la chu mang pos btab nas 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]brtas te smras pa/_rje'i sras bus pa gzhon nu dka' thub kyi nags nas bskrun pa bde ba'i bdag nyid can de dag khyod kyis ci'i slad du yongs su spang /_de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus las bla gos phud de rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/_cing de gnyis la byams 
[\[232a.2\]]pa med snyam mam/_nga'i ba spu'i khung thams cad nas gas te khrag byung ba la ltos/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas gal te 'ga' zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma blangs te de la byin na g.yog byed pa med par 
[\[232a.3\]]'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi cha byad du sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/_grogs po g.yog byin cig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag la g.yog ga la yod/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_rgyags sbyin ma byin 
[\[232a.4\]]cig_/byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma'i gdong du brtag par brtsams pa dang /_rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te khyod kyis bdag btang na stsal du gsol/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bram ze khyod 
[\[232a.5\]]la byin no/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha byad du 'dug nas smras pa/_drang srong bdag gi rgyags sbyin ma 'di khyod la bcol gyis/_khyod kyis su la yang ma sbyin cig_/rgyags sbyin mas brgya byin gyi rkang pa gnyis la 
[\[232a.6\]]mgo bos gtugs te smras pa/_kau shi ka ci nas kyang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis bran nyid du mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bus pa gzhon nu 
[\[232a.7\]]khyer ba'i bram ze ji ltar thams cad kyi grong rdal du 'tshong bar brtsams pa de ltar rmongs par byas so/_/de gnyis rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ste smras pa/_bus pa nag po dang /_dra ba can ni bram ze zhig tshong 'dus na 'tshong zhing mchis 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]lags so/_/des bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la khrid de shog shig_/de gnyis khrid de 'ongs pa dang /_rgyal pos srang la bcal te mnyam du gser gyis blus so/_/rgyal po des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gang zhig khye'u dang bu mo yang yongs su gtong bar byed pa de 
[\[232b.2\]]la gzhan yongs su gtong bar mi bya ba ci yod/_gzhon nu de khug shig dang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug go/_/blon po rnams kyis de dka' thub kyi nags nas bkug ste/_de rgyal po'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas des grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas 
[\[232b.3\]]kyi khang pa brtsigs nas lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas te de bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_byang chub bsod 
[\[232b.4\]]nams don gnyer bas/_/dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang /_/dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la/_/'jigs pa med par sbyin pa byin/_/gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang /_/rta dang nor bu rgyan rnams dang /_/de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/_/tshul khrims ldan pa 
[\[232b.5\]]rnams la sbyin/_/chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/mi yis dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis bu dang chung ma yongs 
[\[232b.6\]]su btang ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/_ngas de na bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ngo /_/rgyal po chen po ngas bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ba des bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[232b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang zhes bya ba nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed do zhes bya 
[\[233a.2\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ji tsam na ltas mkhan dag gis bA rA Na sIr lo bcu gnyis su char pa mi 'bab bo zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer pa dag nyon cig_/ltas mkhan 
[\[233a.3\]]dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyis/_khyod cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis su bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa de rnams ni 'dug shig_/gzhan rnams ni bza' ba dang btung ba mod pa'i yul du dengs shig_/lo legs par gyur pa dang slar yang shog shig_/
[\[233a.4\]]de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/_/des mngan bkug ste smras pa/_kye nang rje 
[\[233a.5\]]bang ba na bdag 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas pa lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/_'on te med des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'dug go/_/skye bo'i tshogs gzhan ni bza' ba dang btung ba mod pa'i yul du dong ngo /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[233a.6\]]'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas ji tsam na bA rA Na sI'i phyogs gcig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so/_/phyogs gzhan 
[\[233a.7\]]zhig tu yang rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_khyim bdag 'dum byed gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_khyim bdag 'dum byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod kyis 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms 'bul nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag re zhig mngan la rmas te bgyi'o/_/des mngan bkug ste smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags 
[\[233b.2\]]thub pa yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so/_/ji tsam na phyi dro'i dus su rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po gzhan yang lhags nas khyim bdag 'dum byed la khyim bdag rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po 'di dag la khyod kyis lo 
[\[233b.3\]]bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms dbul bar nus sam zhes bslangs pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag la g.yar gyis blangs lags na yang bslang ci 'tshal/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la/_bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no/_/des smras 
[\[233b.4\]]pa/_'phags pa dag gal te de lta na re zhig mngan la rmas te bgyi'o/_/des mngan bkug ste smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/de nas khyim bdag des 
[\[233b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs nas zhus pa/_khyed cag gi dus gang lags/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gung tshigs ma yol ba'o/_/de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag kyang bskos/_dus tshod brjod 
[\[233b.6\]]pa dag kyang bskos te/_des nyi ma re re zhing rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug go/_/mu ge de yang lo bstud ma kho nar bar ye ma chad nas/_de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/_'phags pa dag lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ram/_char 'bebs 
[\[233b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis sa bon stsal tam/_thob shig_/de dag gis sa bon btab bo/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa 'jig rten na yon gnas gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni rang sangs rgyas 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]rnams yin la/_sbyin bdag gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni khyim bdag 'dum byed yin gyis/_bdag gis 'di dag gi grogs bya'o snyam nas/_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang po chen po'i char phab pa dang /_lo tog de rnams ku bar 
[\[234a.2\]]skyes so/_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gi lo thog bskrun pa gang lags pa de dag ku bar skyes par gyur na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_ma bcad par skrun cig_/de rnams kyis 
[\[234a.3\]]bskrun pa las me tog dang 'bras bu rdza ma'i tshad tsam chags so/_/de nas de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas de dag la rgyas par smras pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_ma bcad cig dang /_rang nyid smin nas gas par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na de rnams smin nas gas pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[234a.4\]]sa bon ji lta bu btab pa de'i de kho na lta bu sha stag gis gang bar gyur to/_/de nas mu ge rgyun chad de lo legs par gyur nas yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /_srog chags gang dag mu ges 'jigs skrag nas dong ba rnams kyang yul bA rA Na sIr 'ongs so/_/
[\[234a.5\]]de nas mu ge rgyun chad de lo legs par gyur nas khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis de na rang sangs rgyas stong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sna tshogs dang /_tshod ma ro dang ldan pa rnams kyis tshim par byas te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_blo ldan mkhas pas nor dang ni/_/
[\[234a.6\]]dad pa shes rab rnyed nas ni/_/skyes bu de yis rtag par yang /_/'dod chags bral la yon dbul lo/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan pa'i/_/brtan rnams gang gis bshos gsol ba/_de yi rigs ni bde bar 'phel/_/de 
[\[234a.7\]]ltas tshul khrims phun tshogs pa'i/_/yon gnas dag la yon phul na/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/bde ba dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya bar gyur pa gang gis mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na rang sangs 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rgyas stong la bsod snyoms sbyar cing de'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya ba der gyur te/_nga nyid kyis de na mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na 
[\[234b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms sbyar bas nga'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas so/_/rgyal po chen po nga'i sbyin pa'am/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i sbyin 
[\[234b.3\]]pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no//_//sdom la/_sprin shugs dbang po sbrul mgo gnyis/_/de bzhin chu sreg ne tso dang /_/ston mo ru sbal sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/ded dpon tshogs su bsdus pa yin/_/
[\[234b.4\]]rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs 
[\[234b.5\]]te/_rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod nas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste/_gcig la gcig phan thogs par mngon pa med kyis/_ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa 
[\[234b.6\]]rkyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o zhes de ltar chas bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rkyal gyi cha spyad kha cig gis ni shing shal ma li'i spang leb/_kha cig gis ni ras sgye nang tshangs can/_kha cig gis ni ku ba brgyus pa/_
[\[234b.7\]]kha cig gis ni ra rkyal khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/_/de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang /_chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go/_/gru bo che bshig pa dang /_de rnams rkyal pa re re la zhon te chu ji lta ba bzhin du khyer te dong ba las/_de 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/_des lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang /_de na bud med gzugs bzang mo/_mdzes ma blta na sdug pa dag yod de/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo bo dag tshur 
[\[235a.2\]]spyon bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag tshur spyon/_bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang /_khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang /_gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang /_gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang /_mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang /_skyabs 
[\[235a.3\]]ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /_rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig_/'di dag ni khyod kyi zas kyi khang pa dang /_skom gyi khang pa dang /_gos kyi khang pa dang /_gnas mal gyi khang pa dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[235a.4\]]tshal dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_gser dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_dung dang /_
[\[235a.5\]]g.yas su 'khyil pa dag lags kyis khyed tshur spyon/_bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/_dga' bar bgyi/_dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/_/khyed cag las su yang smyos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig_/de dag bud med de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' 
[\[235a.6\]]bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de dag de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu pho dang /_bu mo dag btsas so/_/de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhig 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir bud 
[\[235a.7\]]med de dag gis lho phyogs kyi lam lhag par bsrung bar sems/_ma la bdag gis bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal du gnyid log par rig nas bags kyis dal bus dal bus mal nas babs la lho phyogs kyi lam du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de de ltar nges par byas nas 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de gnyid kyis log par rig nas bags kyis dal bus dal bus mal nas babs te ral gri rnon po mchan du thogs nas lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang /_des de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra kyi hud ma/_kyi hud pha/_kyi hud sring 
[\[235b.2\]]mo/_kyi hud spun/_kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/_'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces sgra 'byin pa dag thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'jigs par gyur/_rmongs par gyur/_skyi bung zhes byed par gyur to/_/da nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can des 'jigs 
[\[235b.3\]]pa dang /_skyi bung zhes byed de shin tu legs par bsal nas lho phyogs kyi lam de kho na'i rjes su song ba dang /_des de na lcags mkhar chen po mtho zhing rgya che ba zhig mthong nas/_des grong khyer de'i mtha' khor khor yug tu bskor na/_ci nas kyang sgo cung zad cig rnyed grang snyam nas/_
[\[235b.4\]]des grong khyer de'i mtha' khor khor yug tu bskor ba dang /_chung ngu na byi la'am sbrul 'dzul ba'i sgo tsam yang ma rnyed do/_/de na shing shi ri sha zhes bya ba sbom la ring ba zhig mthong nas/_de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis shing shi ri sha de la bags kyis dal bus dal bus 
[\[235b.5\]]'dzegs nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag ci'i phyir kyi hud ma/_kyi hud pha/_kyi hud sring mo/_kyi hud spun/_kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/_'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces shin tu smre sngags 'don/_de rnams 
[\[235b.6\]]kyis smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te/_rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod pa las bdag cag 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta 
[\[235b.7\]]ste/_gcig la gcig phan 'dogs par mngon pa med kyis/_ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rkyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te/_rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o zhes de nas chas bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa rkyal gyi cha spyad kha cig gis ni shing shal ma li'i spang leb/_kha cig gis ni ras sgye nang tshangs can/_kha cig gis ni ku ba brgyus pa/_kha cig gis ni ra rkyal khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/_/bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa 
[\[236a.2\]]dang /_chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru bo che bshig go/_/gru bo che bshig nas bdag cag rkyal pa re re la zhon te/_chu ji lta ba bzhin khyer te dong ba las/_bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/_des bdag cag lho phyogs kyi 
[\[236a.3\]]'gram du khyer ba dang /_de na bud med gzugs bzang mo/_mdzes ma/_blta na sdug pa dag yod de/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo bo dag tshur spyon/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag tshur spyon/_bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang /_khyim thab ma mchis 
[\[236a.4\]]pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang /_gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang /_gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang /_mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang /_skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /_rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig_/'di dag ni khyed kyi zas 
[\[236a.5\]]kyi khang pa dang /_skom gyi khang pa dang /_gos kyi khang pa dang /_gnas mal gyi khang pa dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/_nor bu dang /_
[\[236a.6\]]mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_gser dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_dung g.yas su 'khyil pa dag lags kyis khyed tshur spyon/_bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/_dga' bar 
[\[236a.7\]]bgyi/_dga' mgur spyad par bgyi/_khyed cag las su yang smyos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig_/bdag cag bud med de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_bdag cag de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u dang bu mo dag btsas te/_ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun gzhan rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i gru bo che zhig go zhes ma thos pa de srid du bud med de dag dang bdag cag lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur 
[\[236b.2\]]spyod par byed pa las/_gang gi tshe bud med rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po gzhan dag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang /_chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go zhes thos nas/_de nas bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs te/_kha cig ni zos so/_/
[\[236b.3\]]skyas pa za bar byed pa na lhag rol skra'am/_spu'am/_sen mo'am/_so lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par za bar byed do/_/de rnams za bar byed pa na khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la lhung ba gang dag yod na yang de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mo rnams kyis brud de sa dang bcas 
[\[236b.4\]]par khar 'jug par byed do/_/bdag cag kha cig ni lcags kyi mkhar 'dir bcug go/_/kye nang rje 'di dag ni mi'i bud med ma yin te/_srin mo yin gyis 'di dag las bdag nyid srungs shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye bo'i 
[\[236b.5\]]tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang gis na khyed cag dang bdag cag legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs 'ga' ci yod/_de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye nang rje re zhig bdag cag gang gis na legs pa dang /_bde bar 
[\[236b.6\]]'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs ni cung zad kyang kho bo cag la med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di las rgal te 'bros so snyam du bsams na/_de'i nyis gyur ram de'i sum gyur gyis mthon por 
[\[236b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gal te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du/_kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di'i glo phug ste 'bros so snyam du bsams na/_de'i nyis gyur ram/_de'i sum gyur gyis zheng du skye bar 'gyur te/_de ltar re zhig bdag cag legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs bdag cag la med do/_/'on kyang gang gis na khyod cag ni slar legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod de/_'di na bdag cag gi bar snang la rgyu ba'i lha rnams kye ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun 
[\[237a.2\]]rnams gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la byang phyogs kyi gseb lam gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu za ba bde ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa/_mgo 'phang bstod de pha rol du 'gro ba ni su yod/_su ni pha rol 
[\[237a.3\]]du bkri/_su ni 'dzam bu'i gling du legs pa dang /_bde bar phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par mi 'gro ba ni byis pa'o zhes sgra 'byin pa thos kyis/_khyod de'i drung du deng la 'di skad ces bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o/_/bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/_bdag cag pha 
[\[237a.4\]]rol du bkri zhing legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smros shig_/de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa shin tu legs par bzung ste chub par byas nas/_bags kyis dal bus dal bus shing shi ri sha las 
[\[237a.5\]]babs nas g.yas phyogs kyi lam de nyid du song ste/_bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal na gnyid kyis log par rig nas bags kyis dal bus dal bus nyal lo/_/de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /_nang par sngar langs nas 'dzam 
[\[237a.6\]]bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag re zhig gang na skyed mos tshal dben pa yod pa zhig tu shog shig dang /_kho bos khyod cag dang lhan cig gsang ste gleng 
[\[237a.7\]]dgos pa cung zhig yod kyis/_khyed su yang smyos kyang khye'u'am bu mo ni khrid de ma 'ong shig_/shes ldan dag de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po rnams kyis mnyan to/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po rnams skyed mos tshal 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rab tu dben pa gang na ba der dong ba dang /_de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed glengs pa de dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po rnams la rgyas par smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras te/_'di dag ni bud med 
[\[237b.2\]]ma yin te/_'di dag srin mo yin gyis/_shes ldan dag 'di las bdag nyid bsrung bar gyis shig_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po rnams de bzhin du gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la byang phyogs kyi gseb lam gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ma rmos ma btab 
[\[237b.3\]]pa'i 'bras sA lu za ba bde ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa mgo 'phang bstod de pha rol du 'gro ba ni su zhig yod/_su ni pha rol du bkri/_su ni legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par song 
[\[237b.4\]]ba dang /_tshong pa rta rdzi'i rigs shig gis rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ni pha bi yin te/_pha bi'i drung du 
[\[237b.5\]]dong la 'di skad ces bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o/_/bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/_bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing bdag cag legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra'o/_/de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis don mthun rab tu 
[\[237b.6\]]mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag bdag gis ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa'i don go ba ltar na 'di ni bdag cag gis rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi drung du dong nas 'di skad ces/_bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o/_/bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/_
[\[237b.7\]]bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing bdag cag legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra ba'i dus la bab pa ma yin no/_/'on kyang gang gi tshe rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas/_su 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ni legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de ni bdag cag rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi drung du dong la 'di skad ces bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o/_/bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/_bdag cag pha rol 
[\[238a.2\]]du bkri zhing bdag cag legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra ba'i dus la bab pa yin no/_/de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas/_su ni legs pa dang /_bde 
[\[238a.3\]]bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[238a.4\]]nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o/_/bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/_bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing bdag cag legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol/_de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi 
[\[238a.5\]]shugs can gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po la legs par rab tu gtams shing rjes su bstan pa/_shes ldan dag bud med de dag lhag par gzugs bzang ba/_lhag par mdzes pa/_lhag par blta na sdug par byas nas khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de 'ong zhing /_
[\[238a.6\]]de rnams 'di skad ces/_jo bo dag tshur spyon/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag tshur spyon zhes bya ba nas/_bdag cag dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyi/_dga' bar bgyi/_dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/'on te khyod cag la 'ga' zhig gis cung zad 
[\[238a.7\]]smras te/_bdag cag mi dgos na rang rang gi bu dag khrid de deng shig ces zer ba de la khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gi chung ma'am/_bu pho 'am/_bu mo 'am/_bdag gi zas kyi khang pa'am/_skom gyi khang pa'am/_gos kyi khang pa'am/_gnas 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]mal gyi khang pa'am/_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba'am/_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang zhes bya ba nas/_dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin 
[\[238b.2\]]du sems phan chad de dag kho'i ro stod dam rgyab la zhon yang shing tog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad pa bzhin du lhung bar 'gyur zhing /_bud med de rnams 'ongs nas za bar 'gyur te/_de dag skyes pa za bar byed pa na khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la lhung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sor 
[\[238b.3\]]mo'i rtse mos sa dang bcas te brud nas khar 'jug go/_/khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gi chung ma'am/_bu'am/_bu mo'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du mi sems na de rnams kho bo'i spu'i rtse mo'i bye ba'i cha la rten kyang ltung 
[\[238b.4\]]bar mi 'gyur te/_de dag legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa rab tu mang po la legs par rab tu gtams shing rjes su bstan nas rgyab smad do/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong 
[\[238b.5\]]pa rab tu mang pos rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la kha cig ni ro stod du/_kha cig ni rgyab tu/_kha cig ni gnya' bar ro/_/kha cig ni mjug ma la 'jus so/_/de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[238b.6\]]yang dag par bskyed nas de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ba dang /_de nas bud med lhag par gzugs bzang ba/_lhag par mdzes pa/_lhag par blta na sdug pa rnams kyis khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de lhags nas 'di skad ces jo bo dag tshur spyon/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 
[\[238b.7\]]tshur spyon zhes bya ba nas bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/_dga' bar bgyi/_dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'on te khyed cag la 'ga' zhig cung zad smras te/_kho mo cag mi dgos na rang rang gi khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de deng 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]shig ces smra ba de la gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gi chung ma 'am/_bu pho 'am/_bu mo 'am/_bdag gi zas kyi khang pa'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems pa de dag ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi ro stod dang 
[\[239a.2\]]rgyab tu zhon yang shing tog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad pa bzhin du de nas slar lhung bar gyur pa dang /_bud med de rnams de dag gi drung du dong ste phyin nas za bar byed de/_skyes pa rnams za bar byed pa na lhag ma lus pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste skra 'am zhes bya ba nas/_sa dang 'dren mar brud de 
[\[239a.3\]]khar 'jug par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gi chung ma 'am/_bdag gi bu pho 'am/_bdag gi bu mo zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de ltar mi sems pa de rnams ni 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs 
[\[239a.4\]]can gyi spu'i rtse mo'i cha shas la 'jus pa yang legs pa dang /_bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang dag 'di snyam du bdag ni mig yin no/_/mig ni bdag gi yin no/_/bdag ni rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang /_lus dang /_yid yin no/_/
[\[239a.5\]]yid ni bdag gi yin no/_/bdag ni gzugs yin no/_/gzugs ni bdag gi yin no/_/bdag ni sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_bdag ni chos yin no/_/chos ni bdag gi yin no/_/bdag ni sa'i khams yin no/_/sa'i khams ni bdag gi yin no/_/
[\[239a.6\]]bdag ni chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gi yin no/_/bdag ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no/_/gzugs kyi phung po ni bdag gi 
[\[239a.7\]]yin no/_/bdag ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin no/_/rnam par shes pa ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems na/_de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/_/srin mo'i nang du tshong pa bzhin/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]po gang dag 'di snyam du bdag ni mig yin no/_/mig ni bdag gi yin no zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni bdag gi yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de ltar mi sems na/_de rnams bde ba 'thob 'gyur te/_/sprin gyi shugs kyis tshong pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas bstan la blun 
[\[239b.2\]]po'am/_/gang dag dad par mi byed pa/_/de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/_/srin mo'i nang du tshong pa bzhin/_/shes rab can gyi mi gang dag_/sangs rgyas bstan la dad byed pa/_/bde bar pha rol 'gro 'gyur te/_/sprin gyi shugs kyis tshong pa bzhin/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam 
[\[239b.3\]]du sems/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe ngas sems can rnams la phan pa byas 
[\[239b.4\]]pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa de ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang 
[\[239b.5\]]ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul bA rA Na sI dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can la 'o byams pa 
[\[239b.6\]]zhig gnas so/_/de'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na khyim bdag zhing pa gnyis shig zhing rmed pa las de gnyis phan tshun rtsod pa byung bar gyur te/_de na gcig khros pa dang /_cig shos kyang slar khros so/_/gcig gis brgyab pa dang /_cig shos kyis kyang 
[\[239b.7\]]slar brgyab bo/_/de gnyis ka yang drang srong gi drung du dong nas drang srong de la gcig gis dpang btsugs pa dang /_cig shos kyis kyang btsugs so/_/de gnyis rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /_rgyal pos de gnyis la smras pa/_khyed gnyis la dpang su yod/_
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]gcig gis smras pa/_lha bdag gi dpang drang srong lags so/_/cig shos kyis smras pa/_bdag gi dpang yang de kho na lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos drang srong bos te dris pa/_drang srong chen po 'di gnyis sngar gang gi nyes/_drang srong gis smras pa/_lha gal te 
[\[240a.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal che bcad na/_de lta na bdag gis dpang bgyi'i gzhan du ni ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas drang srong gis smras pa/_lha gcig khros pa dang cig shos kyang slar khros so/_/gcig gis brgyab pa dang cig 
[\[240a.3\]]shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'o na gnyis ka chad pas gcad do/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_lha khyod la bdag gis slar lha gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal che bcad na de lta na bdag gis dbang bgyi'i gzhan du na ma lags so zhes ma 
[\[240a.4\]]gsol tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_drang srong chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhal che ji ltar gcod/_drang srong gis smras pa/_lha 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni gnod pa las zlog cing phan pa la sbyor bar bgyid do/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_gnyis ka deng la da phyin chad de 
[\[240a.5\]]ltar ma byed cig_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong du gyur pa gang gi chos bzhin gyis dpang de byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na zhes bya ba nas nga nyid kyi chos bzhin gyis dpang de byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin 
[\[240a.6\]]du'o/_/rgyal po chen po ngas chos bzhin gyi dpang byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs so snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang chos bzhin gyis dpang byas pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no 
[\[240a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang nas sems can mang po rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba na nags tshang tshing zhig na seng ge ral pa can zhig gnas so/_/lam de nas don mthun lnga brgya tsam dong nas/_de dag gi ca co'i sgras dus bskul bas sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya ba zhig glo bur du langs nas des don mthun tshong dpon dang bcas pa 
[\[240b.2\]]bskor ba dang /_de rnams skrag nas sgra 'byin cing zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang lus ngan dang /_dbang phyug la sogs pa lha rnams la gsol ba btab pa dang /_de nas seng ges sgra de thos so/_/thos nas kyang phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_ji tsam na sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya 
[\[240b.3\]]bas don mthun lnga brgya tsam bskor ba mthong ngo /_/de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na glang po'i phru gu zhig kyang rgyu zhing 'dug pa dang /_de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_grogs po sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya bas don mthun lnga brgya bskor na de rnams kyi don gyi phyir rang gi srog yongs 
[\[240b.4\]]su gtang bar khyod spro 'am/_ji lta bu zhig tu bya bdag gi rkang pa khyod kyi klad par bzhag la thal mos sbrul chen po la bsnun dang bdag gi rkang pa brten pa'i shugs kyis ni khyod 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/thal lcag gis ni sbrul lo/_/sbrul chen po'i kha chus reg pas ni bdag kyang 'chi bar 
[\[240b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/glang po che'i phru gus de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs nas seng ges glang po che'i phru gu'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas thal mos sbrul chen po la bsnun pa dang /_seng ges rkang pa brten pa'i shugs kyis ni glang po che'i phru gu shi thal mos kyang sbrul chen po shi/_
[\[240b.6\]]sbrul chen po'i kha chus kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ste 'gro ba gsum char yang ngo /_/don mthun gyi tshogs chas pa dang lha zhig gis smras pa/_bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpas khyod kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang nas skyabs byas kyis re zhig 
[\[240b.7\]]de'i lus la mchod par byos la phyir dengs shig_/de nas de rnams kyis de'i rus pa bsregs te rus pa la mchod pa byas so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge zhes bya ba nas/_ngas don mthun lnga brgya po de dag sbrul chen po las rang gi srog 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]btang nas thar bar byas so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste zhes bya ba nas/_ngas sems can rnams 
[\[241a.2\]]rjes su bzung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gsod pa la yang byams 
[\[241a.3\]]pa bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba nags khrod cig na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na bya mgo gnyis la sems tha dad pa zhig tu gyur te/_de la gcig ni chos can zhes bya'o/_/cig shos ni chos min zhes bya'o/_/
[\[241a.4\]]ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na chos can gyis bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu zhig zos so/_/chos min gyis ni dug gi 'bras bu zhig zos pa las gnyis ka yang dug gi mthus kun du myos par gyur nas phan tshun rtsod par brtsams pa dang /_gcig gis log par smon lam btab pa/_khyod 
[\[241a.5\]]kyi skye ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gsod pa dang /_phyir rgol ba dang dgra bor gyur cig ces byas so/_/cig shos kyis kyang smras pa/_bdag ni khyod la thams cad du byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems su gyur cig ces byas so/_/rgyal po 
[\[241a.6\]]chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/chos min ni lha sbyin yin no/_/rgyal po chen po nga'i byams pa'i sems des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i 
[\[241a.7\]]byams pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi skyabs byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba chu gling zhig gi 'gram na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na chu sreg rnams kyi nang du skyes nas chu sreg lnga brgya'i dpon 
[\[241b.2\]]por gyur to/_/ji tsam na chu sreg rgan po zhig chu sreg de rnams kyi sgo nga dang phru gu rnams thabs kyis sngar zos nas dal bus dal bus 'chag cing res 'ga' bya ba med pa na rkang pa gcig bskum nas 'dug go/_/de nas chu sreg de rnams bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[241b.3\]]gyis gdungs nas dpon po'i drung du song ste ris mthun pa'i skad gnyug mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_de nas dpon pos rang gi khyu rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bar mthong nas chu gling kun nas byul bar brtsams pa dang /_chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis 
[\[241b.4\]]rnam par ltung bar 'gyur gyi sems kyis ni ma yin pas/_des chu sreg rgan po de dal bus dal bus 'chag cing phyogs gcig tu song nas rkang pa gcig bteg ste gnas pa mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpas 'phrigs pa 'di ni rang gi rigs kyi phyir rgol ba rang bzhin ngan pa 
[\[241b.5\]]yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag gi sgo nga phru gu dang /_/rus chags rnams kyang zos nas ni/_/rkang pa gcig btsugs 'dug pa de/_/kye ma khyod kyi brtul zhugs yin/_/kha cig smra ba yang bden te/_/gom pa dal bus 'dor byed cing /_/
[\[241b.6\]]dal bus dal bus smra ba dang /_/gnya' ba gyur gyur byed pa ni/_/de ni ngan g.yo'i mtshan nyid yin/_/des bsams pa/_dpon po 'dis ni bdag gi rgyus shes so snyam du rig nas de nyid la skyabs su song ngo /_/de nas dpon pos smras pa/_khu gu nam chu sreg gi tshogs 
[\[241b.7\]]rnams 'khrugs par ma gyur pa de'i bar du khyod kyi sems bde bar gyis shig_/de nas chu sreg rgan po de bros nas chu sreg de rnams bde bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na chu sreg gi dpon por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chu sreg gi dpon po der gyur te/_rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni bla na med pa 
[\[242a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba na 
[\[242a.3\]]nags tshang tshing zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na ne tso mi skad smra ba zhig tu gyur to/_/de'i tshe yul bA rA Na sIr rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de nas ne tso des nyin re zhing rgyal po de'i khang 
[\[242a.4\]]pa'i pu shu'i steng na yib cing rgyal po chen po chos ma yin pas rgyal srid ma mdzad cig ces smra'o/_/rgyal po de de dang lhan cig gcugs par gyur pa dang /_de nas des rgyal po de dka' thub kyi gnas lnga la rab tu bzhag nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed pa la zhugs 
[\[242a.5\]]nas/_des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin no/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na ne tsor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ne tso mi skad smra ba de yin par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ngas 
[\[242a.6\]]sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam yin no/_/
[\[242a.7\]]rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gsod pa la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul ka shi zhes bya ba na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed de/_
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]de rtag tu lus 'phags kyi yul 'dod pa kho na'i phyir lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang mi mthun par gyur to/_/lus 'phags kyi rgyal po ni de bas khyad zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan yang yul de mi 'dod pas rtag tu de la byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_snying 
[\[242b.2\]]brtse bas gnas so/_/'on kyang de srid pas 'khol bas yul de kho na 'dod pa'i phyir de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir chas so/_/de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos thos nas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum 
[\[242b.3\]]gyi lam bstar du bcug ste/_grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang gseg ma dang /_gyo mo bsal nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng /_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po ni dpyangs/_dri zhim po'i pog por ni bshams/_tsan dan gyi chu'i chag chag gis btab cing me tog sil ma sna tshogs 
[\[242b.4\]]kyis dga' dga' ltar byas nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba rab tu mang po dag sta gon byas te grong mi dang blon po rnams stsur bkye nas mgu bar 'gyur ba brgya phrag dag spring ba thos pa dang /_rgyal po tshangs sbyin kun nas dkris pa dang bral te de nas bsams pa/_lus 'phags 
[\[242b.5\]]kyi rgyal po la so sor yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig byas te slar ldog go snyam du bsams nas/_lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /_lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bkur sti chen pos bsu nas nang du khrid de/_kha zas bsod pa rnams 
[\[242b.6\]]kyis tshim par byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal dbang bdag la bzod par mdzod/_/khyod la bdag ni rtag tu 'dud/_/bdag ni grogs por gyur lags na/_/khyod kyis bdag la brtse bar mdzod/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bzod 
[\[242b.7\]]pa yi ni gzhu bdungs nas/_/khro dang nga rgyal 'joms pa yi/_/yon tan ldan pa'i mda' gcig gis/_/khyod kyis bdag cag ril bcom mo/_/de nas de gnyis phan tshun yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang rang gi yul du song ngo /_/lus 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]'phags kyi yul mi rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na lus 'phags kyi rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de yin 
[\[243a.2\]]par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ngas yid kyi dregs pa bcom pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i yid kyi dregs pa bcom pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas 
[\[243a.3\]]tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi don chen po byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba byang chub sems 
[\[243a.4\]]dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa ni rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gyi dpon po zhig tu gyur to/_/ji tsam na ded dpon 'khor lnga brgya pa nor tshol ba zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las ji tsam na gru de chu srin nya'i rigs kyis bshig nas tshul ma 
[\[243a.5\]]yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/de nas ru sbal des tshong pa lnga brgya rgyab tu bskyon nas rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gyi dpon por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga 
[\[243a.6\]]nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gyi dpon po der gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba de ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[243a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]po chen po sngon byung ba lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya byung ba las de na sde can dang /_sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba spun gnyis shig blon po'i gtso bo byed pa las sde can gyis sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la rtag tu klan ka tshol zhing gnod pa bya ba la zhugs so/_/sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni de la rtag 
[\[243b.2\]]tu phan par bya ba la zhugs so/_/rgyal po'i blon po dang grong mi rnams kyis kyang sde [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ched du sde can dang sdums byas kyang /_gnas skabs thams cad du gnod pa byed pa las ldog tu ma btub bo/_/de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos mang po zhig spyos nas yul nas 
[\[243b.3\]]bskrad do/_/de bA rA Na sIr song nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po'i gtso bor bcug go/_/de dus gzhan zhig na long bar gyur to zhes nu bo sde [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]thos nas rgyal po la gsol ba byas te bA rA Na sIr song nas mig phye ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[243b.4\]]'di lta bu gang gis na mthus phu bo long bar bya ba'i rigs na/_snying rje dang ldan pa 'dis de'i mig phye'o/_/zhes sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sems dga' bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po'i gtso bo sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na zhes bya ba 
[\[243b.5\]]nas/_'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir 
[\[243b.6\]]sems can rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba tshong khang zhig na ded dpon gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis shing rta lnga brgya dang nyo tshong la dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs pa dang de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag dgon pa'i 
[\[243b.7\]]nang nas 'dong ba rnams 'di lta ste/_gcig la gcig phan thogs par mngon pa med kyis/_ma la bdag cag gis shing rta pa'i 'gron pa rabs gnyis su bcad la dgon pa'i lam du 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/_de gnyis kyis shing rta pa'i 'gron pa rabs gnyis su bcad nas/_/
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so/_/de la ded dpon gcig ni shing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam gyi mgo na 'dug go/_/ded dpon cig shos ni shing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so/_/ded dpon gyi mi tshong pa'i mdun nas 'gro bas skyes bu nag po mig 
[\[244a.2\]]che la dmar ba bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/_'khor lo rdzab kyis yog pa/_gos rlan pa skra gsher ba me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/_mgo 'dren dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i lam du lhas char 
[\[244a.3\]]phab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam kye nang rje bden te/_dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa mang du bskyed kyis/_shes ldan dag rtswa dang chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par 'or cig_/khyed cag rtswa dang chu sar pa la longs spyod dang bde ba dang legs 
[\[244a.4\]]par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ded dpon gyi mi 'gron pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_'gron pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig_/kho bo tshong pa rnams kyi mdun nas 'gro ba na 'di na skyes bu nag 
[\[244a.5\]]po mig che la dmar ba bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/_'khor lo rdzab kyis yog pa gos rlan pa/_skra gsher ba me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/_mgo 'dren dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i 
[\[244a.6\]]lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang /_de 'di skad ces kye nang rje bden te/_dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa bskyed kyis/_shes ldan dag rtswa dang chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par 'or cig_/khyed cag rtswa dang 
[\[244a.7\]]chu sar pa la longs spyod dang bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro zhes zer gyis/_bdag cag gi khal rnams ma dub par rtswa dang chu bor la bdag cag rtswa dang chu sar pa la longs spyad nas bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]lhag ma yang rtol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis [(]rtsa [,]rtswa [)]dang chu rnying pa bor te dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon yang rtswa dang chu sar pa ma rnyed do/_/zhag gnyis dang gsum dang bdun gyi bar du song yang rtswa dang chu sar pa ma rnyed do/_/de nas 'gron pas zhag bdun lon pa dang 
[\[244b.2\]]gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag go/_/de nas ded dpon cig shos 'di snyam du sems te/_tshong pa dag dong nas deng du zhag bdun lon no snyam du bsams nas dgon pa'i lam der zhugs pa las/_ded dpon gyi mi tshong pa'i mdun nas 'gro bas skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar 
[\[244b.3\]]ba/_bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa 'khor lo rdzab kyis yog pa gos rlon pa skra gsher ba/_me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/_mgo 'dren dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa 
[\[244b.4\]]dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam/_kye nang rje bden te dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa mang du bskyed kyis/_shes ldan dag rtswa dang chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma bya bar 'or cig_/khyed cag rtswa dang chu sar pa la longs spyod dang bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol 
[\[244b.5\]]ba lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ded dpon gyi mi de 'gron pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_'gron pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig_/kho bo tshong pa'i mdun nas 'gro ba na 'dir skyes bu nag po zhes bya ba nas/_mgo 'dren dang dkyus ma dag 
[\[244b.6\]]dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_'di skad ces kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang /_de 'di skad ces kye nang rje bden te/_dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas zhes bya ba nas 
[\[244b.7\]]rtol bar 'gyur ro zhes zer zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o/_/shes ldan dag re zhig bdag cag gis ji srid rtswa dang chu sar pa ma rnyed kyi bar du rtswa dang chu rnying pa mi dor ro/_/de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon na yang rtswa dang chu sar pa ma rnyed do/_/zhag gnyis dang gsum dang bdun gyi bar du song yang rtswa 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]dang chu sar pa ma rnyed pa las/_ded dpon gyi mis mdun na 'gron pa gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces kye ma'o ded dpon gyi mi ni bus pa ste/_des 'gron pa tshul ma yin pas kha btag gis med do zhes smras so/_/de ni bde ba dang 
[\[245a.2\]]legs par dgon pa'i lam rtol bar gyur te/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon phyi ma shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang 
[\[245a.3\]]ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//_//sdom la/_mche ba drug dang ri bong dang /_/pha dang ma dang chu skyes dag_/tshal tshig glang po klu dang ni/_/
[\[245a.4\]]yul 'khor skyong la sogs pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba nags tshang tshing ri dang 
[\[245a.5\]]'bab chu mang pos gang ba/_rtswa sngon po dang gel ba dang shing sA la dang pa la shas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa zhig tu gyur to/_/de'i chung ma bal glang mo bzang mo zhes bya 
[\[245a.6\]]ba bal glang mo thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu byung ba de dang de lhan cig khyu las gar te phyogs gzhan zhig tu dga' mgur rgyu zhing gnas pa na/_ji tsam na bal glang mo mchog mchog tu yid 'phrog ma gzhan zhig yid la'ang mi bsam pa las glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug 
[\[245a.7\]]pa'i drung du phyin to/_/de nas de yang mkhas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig pas glang po che de ji ltar de la chags pa'i sems dang 'brel pas de 'gro na yang phyi bzhin 'brang /_'dug na yang 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas bal glang mo bzang 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]mo phrag dog gi skyon gyis mi bzod pa skyes nas bal glang mo de la yang klan ka tshol bar gyur/_glang po che mche ba drug pa la yang shin tu tshig pa za'o/_/gnas skabs thams cad du nam yang glags ma rnyed pa de'i tshe smon lam log par gdab par brtsams pa/_gang du glang po 
[\[245b.2\]]che byas pa chud gzon pa 'di'i srog gcod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas des ri kha nas bdag nyid mchongs te shi ba las lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes nas zla ba dgu 'das nas bu mo zhig btsas te bskyed bsrings nas 
[\[245b.3\]]chen mor gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bag mar gtang ran pa de'i tshe yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin la byin te/_des btsun mo dam par byas so/_/des tshe rabs snga ma'i sha khon yod pas bya ra ba rnams kyis glang po che mche ba drug pa bya ras sod par byed du bcug ste/_de nas des 
[\[245b.4\]]rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa/_lho phyogs che ge mo zhig na glang po che mche ba drug pa mchis zhes mchi na de'i mche ba bdag la 'tshal ba zhig mchis kyi lhas grong mi rnams la bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas rgyal pos yul thams cad na gnas pa'i rngon pa rnams bkug ste 
[\[245b.5\]]bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la phyogs che ge mo zhig na glang po che mche ba drug pa zhig 'dug pa de'i mche ba dgos kyis myur du khyer te shog shig_/lha bka' bzhin du 'tshal zhes rngon pa de rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan to/_/de nas rngon pa de rnams kyi sde dpon 
[\[245b.6\]]gang yin pa des rngon pa de rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rang rang gi las la 'bod cing 'dug shig dang /_kho bo kho na 'gro'o zhes des gtor ma'i cho ga byas go bgos mda' dug can lag na thogs gzhu bdungs te glang po che tshol zhing song ba las phyogs der 
[\[245b.7\]]phyin pa dang /_des de khyu las gar te chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur rgyu zhing bag brkyang ste 'dug pa mthong ngo smras pa/_ut+pal pad mo bdo ba'i chu ldan yul phyogs su/_/glang chen dam pa me tog kun da zla ba dang /_/ba yi 'o ma dang ni ba mo'i mdog can de/_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gangs ri brtsegs pa 'gro ba lta bur de yis mthong /_/glang chen mchog gi dbang po zla ba 'dra ba de'i/_/mche ba drug po zla ba'i 'od zer ltar spa ba/_/pad ma dkar po'i phung chen gyen du 'phags pa la/_/pad ma'i rtsa lag dri med sdug cig rten ko lta/_/
[\[246a.2\]]de nas rngon pa de lus la gos ngur smrig bgos/_mda' gzhu mchan du bcug nas 'khri zhing tshang tshing gi nang nas 'jab cing gom pa brtan te dal bus nye bar song ba dang /_de nas bal glang mo des rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas des khyim thab de la smras pa/_lha tshur spyon mi 
[\[246a.3\]]zhig mchi yis gzhan du bzhud do des smras pa/_mi ci 'dra ba zhig des smras pa/_gos ngur smrig can zhig go/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_gal te de lta yin te ci ste de la ngur smrig yod na bag ma tsha zhig_/ngur smrig las ni mi dge ba mi 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[246a.4\]]na/_'di ni snying rje'i bdag nyid byams pa'i yid ldan pa/_/gzhan gsod dga' ba spangs pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/_zla bas sim pa 'ba' zhig byed kyi gdung min ltar/_/'di las 'jigs pa mi 'byung 'di las zhi ba 'thob/_/de nas bal glang mo de dang byang chub 
[\[246a.5\]]sems dpa' de yang bag tsha ba med par rgyu bar brtsams pa las/_de nas rngon pa des tshang tshing gi nang du zhugs nas mda' dug can gyis gnad du bsnun to/_/de nas bal glang mo des byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_lha ci da chos gos can las bsnyengs pa byung ngam ma byung /_byang 
[\[246a.6\]]chub sems dpas smras pa/_/snying gi gdug pa ma byed ma byed cig_/nyes 'di thub pa'i na bza' 'di'i min gyi/_/nyes 'di nyon mongs dbang du song ba yi/_/sems ldan snying rje rnam par spangs pa yin/_/skye bo ma rmongs sems can rtog pa can/_/su yis gser gyis 
[\[246a.7\]]g.yogs pa'i lcags la ni/_/mi rnams slu bar byed ces bsams nas su/_/gser de lcags dang 'dra ba nyid du lta/_/'di yi mda' dang gzhu dang yid gdug pa/_/gang yin de ni gdug pa nyid du shes/_/ngur smrig mchog tu zhi ba 'di yang ni/_/rtag tu zhi ba nyid du blo 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]yis rtogs/_/de nas bal glang mo de mi bzod pa skyes nas khyim thab la smras pa/_bdag ni tshig 'di dag gis bde bar bskrun pa khyod gsod pa btang snyoms su bgyid rngo mi thog pas bdag gis 'di'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams sprug g.yeng dbug gsher gzhom par bgyi'o/_/
[\[246b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dzum phyung nas smras pa/_e ma'o nyon mongs pa'i 'byung po gso ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma'i mngon par zhen pa rung ba ma yin no/_/ci 'di yang mi shes sam/_'byung po'i gdon gyis thebs pa sems rmongs pa/_/nad med pa des 
[\[246b.3\]]sman pa mi bkur te/_/de la sman pa gnod par mi byed kyi/_/'byung po de nyid zil gyis mnan nas 'joms/_/de bzhin nyon mongs gdon gyis thebs pa yi/_/skye bo sems rmongs 'di ni sdig rab byed/_/de la bdag shes nyon mongs gnod byed kyi/_/nyon 
[\[246b.4\]]mongs pa yis pham byas rnams la min/_/lhan cig spyod ma bdag gis byang chub thob nas srid gsum 'di/_/grags pas kun bkang nyon mongs g.yon can dran 'dul brtan pa dang /_drang po 'joms byed phyer brlags bcad dang btag cing bskam pa dang /_/rab tu bskam 
[\[246b.5\]]pas ring por mi thogs shin du tshar gcad bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rnams kyis bal glang mo de snying rtsa bri bar byas pas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas glang po che'i tshogs de byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas 
[\[246b.6\]]bsams pa glang po che 'di dag gis 'di nyid du rngon pa 'di la gnod pa bskyed na mi rung ngo snyam mo/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi sems kyis ni ma yin pas de rngon pa de'i mdun du song nas 
[\[246b.7\]]mi'i skad kyis ma 'jigs shig ces smras te dbugs phyung nas brang 'og tu sbas te 'dug go/_/glang po che de rnams kyang snyad cig btags nas phyogs de nas gzhan du btang ngo /_/glang po che rnams dong ba dang des rngon pa la smras pa/_kye nang rje shes par gyis 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]shig_/glang po che rnams dong gis da ni rang gi dgos pa byos shig_/rngon pas bsams pa/_bdag 'dra ba'i mi ni tha shal yin te/_bdag la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba 'dis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag gis dad pa bskyed do snyam nas des 
[\[247a.2\]]skad phyung ste ngus pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kye nang rje ci'i phyir ngu /_rngon pas smras pa brgyab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi dga' nas bsams pa/_ma la bdag gis 'di skyabs byas pa'i tshe gnod par gyur pa'am/_bal glang mo 
[\[247a.3\]]'dis bdag gsod pa la mi bzod pa skyes pas 'di la mi dga' ba cung zad cig byas par ma gyur tam snyam nas rngon pa de la smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod su zhig gis brgyab/_de nas rngon pa de mig mchi ma'i dba' rlabs kyis gang bzhin du smras pa/_glang chen dbang 
[\[247a.4\]]po khyod kyi ni/_/lus la bdag gi mda' yis brgyab/_/khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi mdas/_/bdag gi sems la brgyab par gyur/_/dug can mda' yis phog pa yi/_/lus rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_/yon tan gyi ni mdas phog pa'i/_/mi mkhas 
[\[247a.5\]]rnams ni skye mi 'gyur/_/gshed ma la yang snying rje ba/_/'di 'dra gang la yod gyur pa/_/yon tan rgya mtsho khyod kyi ni/_/yon tan deng brjod su yis nus/_/mdor na bdag ni mi snyam pa'i/_/blo yang bdag la mi 'byung gi/_/bdag lus yon tan gyis stod 
[\[247a.6\]]pa/_/'di la tshig pa za ba skyes/_/mi yi sha tshugs ldan yang bdag_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba yin/_/glang chen mchog khyod dud 'gro yi/_/skye gnas sha tshugs 'chang yang mi/_/sha tshugs tsam gyis dud 'gro 'am/_/mir yang brtsi ba ma yin gyi/_/
[\[247a.7\]]gang la yon tan nyer dmigs pa/_/de ni mi zhes bya bar dran/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_/yon tan gyis stod par byed pa'i tshig gis gtam gyi bar chad byed pa thong la don ci zhig gi phyir khyod kyis nga la mdas bsnun pa myur du smros shig_/des smras pa/_
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]rgyal po'i nan tur gyis bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di byas te/_khyod las dgos pa zhig yod do/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_gal te de lta na dal bus thong la/_lag pa gnyis ni myur rkyong la/_/ci 'dod pa ni blang bar gyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247b.2\]]rnams la ni/_/mi gtong cung zad med pas long /_/bdag gi sha 'di bcad nas khyer ba'am/_/mche ba rnams kyang 'dod par byed la rag_/'di ni gzhan la brtse ba'i phyir bskyed pas/_/lus 'di la ni ji ltar dga' bar gyis/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer 
[\[247b.3\]]'jug nus kyang /_/'khor ba bgrod dka' bdag ni zhugs pa gang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa/_/gzhan la brtse ba de yi rgyu yin no/_/de nas rngon pa de ngo tsha ba skyes kyang rgyal po'i nan tur la bsams nas smras pa/_khyod kyi mche ba rnams 
[\[247b.4\]]dgos lags so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_dal gyis phyung la khyer cig des smras pa/_khyod nyid kyis thugs bag mdzod cig_/bdag ni khyod kyi mche ba 'byin mi phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_/khyod kyi 
[\[247b.5\]]mche ba rnams phyung na/_/byams pa'i me yis nges bsregs nas/_/bdag gi lag gnyis mi ltung ngam/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_gal te de lta na nga nyid kyis phyung la sbyin no zhes de nas des mche ba rtsa ba shin tu ring du zug pa dag phyung ba dang bdag nyid 
[\[247b.6\]]chen po de las khrag byung ste/_de mthong nas gzhan dag gi dper byas pa/_mche ba bton pa las byung khrag gis mthong ka kun nas gshos pa de/_/me tog ku mu da bkram mdog lta bu yi lus de dpal ldan rnam par mdzes/_/ri steng kha bas khebs pa'i ri 
[\[247b.7\]]bo 'od zer mdzes dang ldan gyur pa'i/_/rtse mo tshon rtsi btsag gis kha bsgyur chu yis gsab gseb gtor ba bzhin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid spro bsring ba'i phyir smras pa/_snying khyod da ni brtan par gnos shig rmongs su ci zhig yod/_/phongs 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]par gyur dang mgon med 'jig rten la yang blta bar gyis/_/khyod ni skye bo 'chi ba'i dbang du song ba rnams kyi mgon/_/de ltas 'dir ni de ring zhum par bya ba'i cha ma yin/_/bar skabs der nam mkha'i ngos kyang ya mtshan gyis yi rangs pa'i lha 
[\[248a.2\]]rnams kyis gang /_ya mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byung ngo /_/de nas lha zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i las shin tu dka' ba spyod pa de mthong nas smras pa/_grogs po bdag nyid chen po'i gnas gang yin pa 'di ni ya mtshan che ste/_mche ba rnams ni phyung ba yi/_/
[\[248a.3\]]tshor bas nyam thag gyur kyang de/_/lhag pa'i bsam dang ldan pa'i sems/_/byang chub las kyang mi ldog go/_/de nas lha gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/_mche ba phyung ba las byung ba'i/_/sdug bsngal rang gis myong yang de'i/_/snying rje dmyal ba la 
[\[248a.4\]]gnas pa'i/_/sems can rnams la mngon 'phel ba/_/gang dag yin pa de yi sems/_/byang chub las ldog ga la 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas mche ba de dag phyung nas rang nyid thogs te cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas rngon pa mi dga' ba 
[\[248a.5\]]skyes te/_ci 'dis rang gi mche ba de dag bzung nas sbyin par gtong mi 'dod dam snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i bsam pa shes nas me tog kun da lta bu'i sna mngon du brkyang nas grogs po bag ma tsha zhig ces smras te/_ku mu da dang zla ba dang /_/
