[\[248a.6\]]pad ma'i rtsa 'dra mche ba'i mchog_/drug po 'di dag khyod sbyin zhes/_/bdag gis bzung gis bde bar 'dug_/skad cig tsam zhig sdod cig dang /_/len pa po dang nye bar ni/_/de yi bar du sdug bsngal gyis/_/gdungs pa'i yid rab dang bar bya/_/
[\[248a.7\]]gal te khyod ni ci ste bdag brtags nas/_/khyod kyis sems ni rab tu dang bar bya/_/bdag ni gsod 'khu g.yon can ngo tsha med/_/de la go bar gyis shig snyam sems na/_/khyod kyis nyes spyad gdug dang gzhu gdug pa/_/de dang mda' rnon khyad du bsad 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]nas ni/_/ngur smrig 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyur pa de/_/mthong nas yid ni rab tu dang bar bya/_/sbyin pa kha cig len pa las 'dag ste/_/de bzhin gzhan ni sbyin pa po las 'dag_/de yi phyir ni 'dir ni rang sems las/_/yon gyi dag pa yang dag bskyed par 'bad/_/
[\[248b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan yin no snyam nas ngur smrig de nyid la rtog cing sems rab tu dang bar byas te/_mche ba de rnams rang gi lag nas byin nas smras pa/_dug can mda' yis phog nas bdag gi snying la ni/_/mi dga' 
[\[248b.3\]]cung zad ma gyur bden pa gang yin pa'i/_/bden pa de yis yang dag byang chub mchog thob nas/_/'gro ba nyam thag sdug bsngal dag las yongs thar bya/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug par gyur pa de 
[\[248b.4\]]gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa zhes bya bar gyur te/_rgyal po chen po de na ngas byams pa'i sems nye bar bsgrubs pa dang /_bya dka' ba'i sbyin pa yongs su btang bas 
[\[248b.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i byams pa'i sems dang gtang dka' ba'i sbyin pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[248b.6\]]gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir ri bong du gyur pa na drang srong la bdag nyid kyi sha byin pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa na ri khrod chu mig dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba phun 
[\[248b.7\]]sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po can 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dang chu spyod pa/_g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon pa/_me'i sbyin sreg byed pa zhig gnas so/_/drang srong de'i grogs po ri bong mi'i skad du smra ba zhig yod de/_de nyin par drang srong gi 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]drung du song nas son pa dang phyag byas te gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par mgu bar byed pas de gnyis pha dang bu kho na bzhin du sdug pas gnas par gyur to/_/ji tsam dus 'das pa dang than chen byung ste/_des 'bab chu dang klung rnams chu chung 
[\[249a.2\]]bar gyur cing shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bur mi ldan par gyur to/_/de nas drang srong de bsti gnas de na kha zas dang bral bas lhag par dga' bar ma gyur nas/_des g.yang gzhi dang shing shun rnams bsdu bar brtsams so/_/de nas ri bong gis de de lta bu la zhugs 
[\[249a.3\]]pa mthong nas dris pa/_drang srong chen po gang du bzhud/_drang srong gis smras pa/_grong 'dab tu song la der bcos pa'i bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho bar bya'o/_/de nas des drang srong gi tshig thos nas gdung ba skyes te pha ma dang bral ba 'dra bar sems shing rkang pa 
[\[249a.4\]]gnyis la gtugs nas drang srong de la smras pa/_bdag ma dor cig_/gzhan yang khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa du mas dkrugs pha lags la/_dgon pa na gnas pa ni yon tan du ma phun sum tshogs pa lags so/_/des lan du ma smras na yang ldog tu ma btub 
[\[249a.5\]]nas de nas ri bong gis smras pa/_gal te des na 'on kyang khyod re zhig deng la gzhes la ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du sang bzhud cig_/de nas drang srong de 'di snyam du sems te/_'dis de ring nges par bdag kha zas la mgron du 'bod par 'dod de/_'di ltar dud 
[\[249a.6\]]'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags 'di dag ni sogs pa la brtson pa yin no snyam nas des de la khas blangs so/_/de nas me'i spyad pa byas nas kha zas kyi dus la bab pa dang ri bong song nas/_drang srong de la bskor ba byas te bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa/_
[\[249a.7\]]drang srong chen po bdag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pas blang ba dang dor ba ma 'tshal nas khyod la nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa bdag la bzod par mdzod cig_/ces smras nas de ma thag tu me'i nang du mchongs so/_/de nas drang srong de mi dga' ba skyes te ngom 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]zum gnag la mchi ma zag cing bu sdug pa gcig pu la bya ba bzhin du 'khyud nas smras pa/_bu 'di ci zhig byed par brtsams/_ri bong gis smras pa/_drang srong chen po dgon par dgyes par mdzod la bdag gi shas nyin zhag gcig gi 'tsho ba mdzod cig_/gzhan 
[\[249b.2\]]yang /_nags su skyes pa'i ri bong la ni til dag dang /_/mon sran sde'u dang 'bras thug chen po ci ma mchis/_/bdag gi lus ni zhugs su legs par bsgral ba 'di/_/'di ru gsol la deng la dka' thub nags su bzhugs par mdzod/_/de nas drang 
[\[249b.3\]]srong des ri bong gi tshig thos nas mi dga' ba skyes te smras pa/_gal te de lta na khyod dga' ba ltar ci byung ba byung /_'di nyid du srog dor bar bya ste grong gi mthar mi 'gro'o/_/ri bong gis tshig de thos nas yid dga' bar gyur te mgo bstod nas nam mkha'i ngos 
[\[249b.4\]]logs su bltas te gsol ba 'debs par zhugs shing smras pa/_dgon pa la ni gnas bcas te/_/bdag nyid dben pa la dga' na/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de yis su/_/dbang chen lha yis char phob shig_/ces smras pa'i mod la byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang po 
[\[249b.5\]]chen po'i gnas g.yos par gyur to/_/lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas ci las gyur bltas na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin nas/_ji tsam na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang phyug chen po'i char phab ste/_des bsti gnas 
[\[249b.6\]]de slar rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/de nas drang srong des dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri bong la brten nas de na gnas te mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas drang srong 
[\[249b.7\]]gis smras pa/_kye ri bong bya dka' ba'i brtson 'grus 'di dang /_snying rje 'di lta bus ci zhig don du gnyer/_des smras pa/_'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang ma grol ba rnams 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]dgrol ba dang dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de nas drang srong des tshig 'di thos nas ri bong la smras pa/_gang gi tshe 
[\[250a.2\]]khyed sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang dgongs shig_/ri bong gis smras pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid de'i tshe de'i 
[\[250a.3\]]dus na ri bong der gyur te/_rgyal po chen po de na ngas bya dka' ba bdag nyid yongs su btang bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang rkyen tsam 
[\[250a.4\]]dang tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir pha dang ma long ba phrag pas khyer ba gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal 
[\[250a.5\]]po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab [(]du [,]tu [)]zhi bar gyur pa/_'bras 
[\[250a.6\]]dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa la chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed do/_/de'i mdun na 'don gyi bram ze de'i bu ljang gu zhes bya ba rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol du phyin pa/_dad pa bzang 
[\[250a.7\]]ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje can/_pha dang ma la sri zhu byed pa yod de bu ni gcig pu der zad la pha dang ma de dag kyang rgas nas mig nyams te mdongs la thug pa dang /_de nas de'i pha mas rgyal 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]po tshangs sbyin la gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ljang gu 'di mdun na 'don du dbang bskur du gsol/_bdag cag dka' thub kyi nags su mchi lags so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis ljang gu la smras pa/_ljang gu khyod mdun na 'don gyis shig des 
[\[250b.2\]]smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag mdun na 'don pa mi 'tshal te/_bdag ni rgas pa/_nyam chung ba/_dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi rim gro 'tshal ba lags so/_/de nas ljang gus khyim na gnas pa dang /_mdun na 'don mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du spangs 
[\[250b.3\]]nas pha ma'i grogs su nags na gnas so/_/de nang par sngar langs nas pha dang ma gnyis la so shing dang chu gtsang mas bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lha la me'i sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin byas nas phyis 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i phyir nags khrod du 'jug go/_/
[\[250b.4\]]de nas 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_chu bsil ba khyer te pha ma la byin nas de'i 'og tu phyogs gcig tu song nas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te rim pa de lta bus dus 'da' bar byed do/_/ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la nang par sngar langs te pha dang ma'i 
[\[250b.5\]]rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas gsol te rmi lam du yang mthong ba rig par byed cing smras pa/_bdag gi g.yar lam sbrul nag pos/_/bdag lus shin tu zos pa dang /_/bdag ni zhags pa nag po yis/_/bcings nas lho phyogs khrid pa rmis/_/
[\[250b.6\]]g.yar lam 'jigs byed mthong bdag gi/_/snying la dogs pa deng bdag la/_/bla ma dang bral shin tu ni/_/mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur snyam bgyid/_/ji tsam na pha ma de gnyis kyi dbugs phyung nas nyi ma la kha bltas te 'dug nas bden pas gsol 
[\[250b.7\]]ba btab ste ril ba khyer nas chu len du song ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chor du chas te dka' thub kyi nags der zhugs pa dang /_rgyal po de sgra grags par phog pa zhig ste/_des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi sgra lta bu zhig thos nas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste mda' 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]'phangs pas ljang gu'i snying gar phog par gyur to/_/de nas mdas gnad du phog pas sa la 'gyel kyang de rang gi sdug bsngal khyad du bsad nas pha ma kho na'i mya ngan byed cing smras pa/_mda' gcig bsnun pas bdag dang ni/_/dbang po nyams 
[\[251a.2\]]par gyur pa yi/_/pha dang de bzhin ma dag dang /_/bdag cag skye bo gsum bsad do/_/de nas rgyal pos de thos nas 'ongs te dris pa/_ci ste nga'i mda' gcig bsnun pas skye bo gsum bsad/_de nas ljang gu snying rje rje skad du ngus nas rgyal po la smras pa/_
[\[251a.3\]]bdag bas ches ni nyam chung ba'i/_/pha ma yang ni ldongs par gyur/_/bdag kyang mda' yis bsnun pas na/_/skye bo gsum ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag la sngangs nas ljang gu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[251a.4\]]ngas nyes pa byas te ma shes nas mda' 'phangs kyis nga la dmod pa 'dor du mi gzhug par pha ma la gsol ba bya ba'i rigs so/_/de nas ljang gus gus pa dang bcas pas rgyal po dbugs 'byin par byed de/_rgyal po chen po bdag dang nye bar mchis pa rnams la 
[\[251a.5\]]dbang zhig mchis na snying rje can dang /_skye bo la byams pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol la lta ba lags pas dmod pas ma bsnyengs shig_/yang smras pa/_bdag gi bla ma gang na bar/_/ril ba 'di ni snoms mdzod cig_/de dag gi ni rkang bkru ba/_/
[\[251a.6\]]tha ma 'di ni lags par 'gyur/_/bdag gi tshig gis rkang pa la phyag mdzod la 'di skad ring por mi thogs par mthar ni gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs shig_/de nas rgyal po rang kho nas ril ba khyer te nags khrod du chas pa dang /_de'i 
[\[251a.7\]]tshe phyogs bzhir mi ma yin pa che thang du 'khrugs par gyur to/_/de nas long ba de gnyis gcig la gcig smras pa/_ljang gu 'di ni mtsho'i 'gram du ring mo zhig lon no/_/de nas de'i mas smras pa/_da ltar kho mo'i ljang gu de/_/pad ma ut+pal gang ba'i mtsho/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ngang pa sgra snyan 'byin pa na/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lhan cig rtse bar byed/_/de nas rgyal pos drung du phyin pa dang /_de'i rting sgra las drang srong de dag gis smras pa/_snying du sdug cing mthong dga' ba/_/ljang gu ci ste nang du 'jug_/pha ma nyam chung bkres pa yis/_/nyam 
[\[251b.2\]]thag pa la ci zhig gtse/_/de yid mi dga' nas snying rje rje skad du smras pa/_kho bo ni ljang gu ma yin gyi kho bo rgyal po tshangs sbyin no/_/byon pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am/_/gdan 'di la ni bzhugs shig dang /_/ljang gu chab dang 'bras bu dag_/thogs nas 
[\[251b.3\]]de'u re 'dir mchi'o/_/mi dbang ljang gu zhes bgyi ba/_/yon tan rnams ldan rang bzhin byams/_/de yi byams pa'i stobs kyis 'dir/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang ni bya rnams gnas/_/de nas rgyal pos drang srong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas mchi ma zag cing 
[\[251b.4\]]skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/_ljang gu ni nags tshal 'di'i nang du snying la mdas phog ste srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus shing 'dug go/_/ril ba chus bkang ba 'di ni des bskur te/_'dis khyed gnyis kyi rkang pa'i khrus tha ma mdzod cig_/de gnyis 
[\[251b.5\]]kyis thos nas brgyal te sa'i steng du 'gyel to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis chus gtor nas bslang ba dang /_de gnyis snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don pa/_rgyal po chen po de gum pas bdag cag kyang 'gum du bas so/_/de lta mod kyi de phyogs 
[\[251b.6\]]gang na mchis pa der bdag cag khrid cig dang ci nas bu de ma gum pa la reg par bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal pos khyo shug gnyis ka khrid de phyogs der phyin pa dang /_de yang srog gi lhag ma chung zhig lus nas de nas de'i pha mas ljang gu'i lus la kun du byugs 
[\[251b.7\]]nas smras pa/_sdug pa 'di ni su yis bsgyel/_/ljon shing dam pa su yis bcad/_/de nas rgyal pos rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_kho bos sdig pa'i las kyis su/_/nags tshal nang nas rgyu ba na/_/khyed cag gi ni bu gcig pa/_/
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]'di ni mda' yis bsnun par gyur/_/de nas de'i pha ma dag snying rje rje skad du smre zhing bden pas gsol ba byed pa/_bu khyod kyis ni pha ma la/_/bsnyen bkur lha la me yi ni/_/sbyin sreg byas pa'i bden pa gang /_/des ni dug kyang zhi bar 
[\[252a.2\]]shog_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas g.yos par gyur nas des g.yos pa 'di ci las gyur ces brtags na/_bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' gnad du mdas phog ste dug gis glongs pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ba mthong 
[\[252a.3\]]ngo /_/de nas gnas nas babs nas bdud rtsis btab ste pha ma'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po'i mthu gang yin pa dang zug rngu phyung ba gang yin pa des rma yang rub dug gi shugs de yang zhi nas ljang gu sdug bsngal de las yongs 
[\[252a.4\]]su thar nas yun ring por pha dang ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na ljang gu zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de nga nyid yin te/_rgyal po chen po ngas pha ma 
[\[252a.5\]]gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin 
[\[252a.6\]]no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa/_rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de nyon cig_/'jig rten chos kyi 'du shes kyis pha ma dag smyung ba la 'jog par byed/_mer 
[\[252a.7\]]'jug pa dang /_chur 'jug par byed pa dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de ngas thams cad kyi thams cad du bcad do/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer pa'i phyir nyan thos du ma mngon par shes pa lnga la 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]bkod pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang pa/_
[\[252b.2\]]'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi ba/_'bras dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/rgyal 
[\[252b.3\]]po tshangs sbyin de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/rdzing ni tshangs ldan zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i khyad par la gsol 
[\[252b.4\]]ba 'debs shing /_'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /_tshal gyi lha dag dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /_sum mdo'i lha dag dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos mthun pa dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang 
[\[252b.5\]]ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod do/_/de ni de ltar ma yin te/_gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste dper na 'khor 
[\[252b.6\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las ma'i mngal du bu 'chags par 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na/_pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /_ma yang rung zhing 
[\[252b.7\]]zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas pa ste/_gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i sems can zhig sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos te btsun mo tshangs ldan ma'i mngal du zhugs so/_/bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par gyur 
[\[253a.2\]]pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang /_khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten 
[\[253a.3\]]cing 'dug la/_gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o/_/de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyim thab la smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis 
[\[253a.4\]]dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /_kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /_kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /_bgo skal la spyod 
[\[253a.5\]]pa dang /_kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par sgrub pa dang /_bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu 'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis 
[\[253a.6\]]yon sngo ba byed par gyur cig ces ched du rjod par byed do/_/de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /_sman pas bcas 
[\[253a.7\]]pa'i kha zas ha cang mi grang ba dang /_ha cang mi dro ba dang /_ha cang mi kha ba dang /_ha cang mi skyur ba dang /_ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang /_ha cang mi mngar ba dang /_ha cang mi tsha ba dang /_ha cang mi bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_rgyan gyis bklubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /_khri nas khrir dang /_khri'u nas khri'ur rgyu zhing shod kyis gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /_des 
[\[253b.2\]]sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du bcug go/_/de nas btsun mo tshangs ldan ma dus gzhan zhig na 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/_kye ma'o lhas grong khyer gyi shar sgor/_sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas shing /_
[\[253b.3\]]lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_dbus dang /_sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas la btson thams cad thar bar byas kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan ma 
[\[253b.4\]]las mnyan nas/_grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas so/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs kyi sgo dang /_grong khyer gyi dbus dang /_sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas nas btson thams 
[\[253b.5\]]cad thar bar byas so/_/gzhan yang btsun mo tshangs ldan ma 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/_kye ma'o bdag lha dang thabs cig gru bo che'i lding khang du zhugs te tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_
[\[253b.6\]]de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan ma las mnyan nas btsun mo tshangs ldan ma dang thabs cig tu gru bo che'i lding khang du zhugs nas tshangs ldan gyi rdzing na rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las de gru de nyid du khye'u gzugs bzang 
[\[253b.7\]]po blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/_pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/_lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_skye ba dran pa zhig btsas so/_/de btsas pa na de'i nye du dag 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]lhags shing 'dus nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/_khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes de'i ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di ni chu'i nang du btsas pa yin pas khye'u chu skyes zhes bya bar btags so/_/
[\[254a.2\]]gzhon nu chu skyes ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/_/de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi 
[\[254a.3\]]nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/_gang nas shi 'phos snyam na sems can dmyal ba nas so/_/
[\[254a.4\]]las ci zhig byas na/_des na sems can dmyal bar skyes snyam na/_rgyal tshab lo drug bcu byas pas so/_/da lta gang du skyes snyam na/_mi'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te/_gal te slar yang rgyal srid byas na slar yang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur 
[\[254a.5\]]bas ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang thabs shig bya'o snyam nas des 'phye bor rdzus te 'dug go/_/gang gi nyi ma la gzhon nu chu skyes btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par blon po lnga brgya'i bu yang btsas so/_/de nas nyin re zhing gzhon nu rnams rgyal po tshangs sbyin blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/de 
[\[254a.6\]]nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de rnams mchong ba dang rgyug nus par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te gzhon nu chu skyes 'phye bor ma gyur na de yang da tsam mchong ba dang rgyug nus par gyur pa zhig 'on kyang bdag gis 'di 'phye bor gyur pa 
[\[254a.7\]]bzhin rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag go snyam mo/_/de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po 'di ni don med pa la gtsigs cher 'dzin pas ma la bdag lkugs pa nyid du rdzu'o snyam nas des thabs bya bar lkugs pa nyid du rdzus te 'dug go/_/de nas dus 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de rnams smra shes par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te gzhon nu chu skyes lkugs par ma gyur dang /_de yang da tsam smra shes par gyur pa zhig snyam mo de'i ming gzhon nu chu skyes bya ba de nub par gyur cing /_gzhon nu 
[\[254b.2\]]lkugs 'phye gzhon nu lkugs 'phye zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes 
[\[254b.3\]]shing bzhugs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_da ltar rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di 'dra ba thob na bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med pas nga shi na gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur la/_bu gcig yod pa gang yin pa de yang lkugs shing 'phye bor gyur na da nga nyid ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 
[\[254b.4\]]'gyur/_blon po dag gis sman pa rnams bsdus te sman pa rnams kyis bltas nas smras pa/_lha gzhon nu 'di ni dbang po gsal zhing 'di la nad kyi rigs cung zad kyang ma mchis par mthong na/_'on kyang skrag pa zhig mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma 
[\[254b.5\]]pa bkug nas gsang ste bsgo ba/_nga'i gzhon nu lkugs 'phye skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i mngon sum du spong gis khyed cag gis ma gsad cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing 
[\[254b.6\]]rtar bcug ste/_bA rA Na sI'i dbus thog thag khrid pa dang /_de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes bA rA Na sI 'byor cing rgyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci bA rA Na sI 'di stong pa yin nam/_'on te gnas pa zhig yod/_gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu 
[\[254b.7\]]lkugs 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/_lha gzhon nu 'dis ni 'di skad kyi tshig smras so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye pang du blangs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/su zhig gsad/_su zhig gtag_/su zhig srog dang dbral/_su la ci zhig sbyin/_
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]de skad ces smras na gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/_/yang rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma pa rnams la smras pa/_ngas gzhon nu yongs su spangs so/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug nas 
[\[255a.2\]]bA rA Na sI'i dbus thog thag khrid pa dang gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes mi ro zhig mi bzhis khyer ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ci shi ba nyid shi'am 'on te gson po shi_/gshed ma rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal po la phul nas lha gzhon nu 'dis 
[\[255a.3\]]ni 'di skad kyi tshig smras so/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis yang gzhon nu pang du blangs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/su zhig gsad/_su zhig gtag_/su zhig srog dang dbral/_su la ci zhig sbyin/_de skad ces smras na gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/_/yang rgyal po tshangs 
[\[255a.4\]]sbyin gyis gshed ma pa rnams la smras pa/_ngas gzhon nu yongs su spangs so/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu zha bo lkugs pa shing rtar bcug nas/_bA rA Na sI'i dbus thog thag drangs pa dang /_gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes 'bras kyi 
[\[255a.5\]]phung po chen po zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'bras kyi phung po chen po 'di gal te dang po nyid nas ma zos dang drung zug par 'gyur ba zhig_/gshed ma pa rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu zha bo lkugs pa rgyal po la phul nas lha gzhon nu 'dis ni 'di 
[\[255a.6\]]skad kyi tshig smras so/_/slar yang rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye pang du blangs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/su zhig gsad/_su zhig gtag_/su zhig srog dang dbral/_su la ci zhig sbyin/_de skad ces smras na gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/_/yang 
[\[255a.7\]]rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma pa rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas gzhon nu yongs su spangs kyis deng la myur du gzhon nu tshal gyi nang du dong rkos te chug shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug nas dur 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]khrod chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang der brko bar brtsams so/_/de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kha lo sgyur khyod ci yi phyir/_/dong ni myur du rko byed pa'i/_/dong de ci bya zhes dri yis/_/myur du nga la smra bar gyis/_/kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/_
[\[255b.2\]]rgyal po'i sras po btsas pa ni/_/zha bo lkugs pa smra mi shes/_/des 'di tshal khrod myur du ni/_/dong rkos chug ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag ni gdug pa/_lag dmar ba/_gsod pa dang /_gcod pa la chags pa/_
[\[255b.3\]]gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/_pha rol gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin no snyam nas/_de 'jigs shing brgya la na 'di dag gis bdag gsad par 'gyur ro/_/snyam du rig nas gshed ma pa rnams la smras pa/_lhas gal te bdag la mchog cig gnang na bdag rkang gis grong 
[\[255b.4\]]khyer du 'jug cing tshig kyang smra'o/_/gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po'i drung du song nas rgyas par smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te gzhon nu rgyal srid 'dod na yang ngas de yang gzhon nu la sbyin bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin yid dga' zhing /_yid 
[\[255b.5\]]dga' nas/_blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams myur du sol la pog gi dud pa dang phye mas 'khrigs par byos te rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng la/_me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma khrom shig ces 
[\[255b.6\]]bsgo'o/_/sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis 'grub la/_lha rnams dang /_rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed ma thag tu thams cad 'grub ces bya bas lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_
[\[255b.7\]]gyo mo rnams bsal cing /_pog gi dud pa dang phye mas 'khrigs par byas nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/_me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkram mo/_/gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug pa na ya mtshan skyes pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]kyang 'dus so/_/de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes rkang gis grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mi dbang bdag ni lkugs 'phye dang /_/
[\[256a.2\]]blun po blo mi ldan ma lags/_/rnam par gsal bar bgyid pa yi/_/tshig gis gsal bar bgyid pa lags/_/mi dbang bdag ni lkugs 'phye dang /_/blun po blo mi ldan ma lags/_/dbang po rnams ni tshang ba dang /_/gsal ba dag dang ldan pa lags/_/rgyal pos 
[\[256a.3\]]smras pa/_bu ci'i phyir tshig mi 'byin cing rkang gis mi 'gro/_lha de'i slad nas gson cig_/bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dran/_/lo ni drug bcu'i bar dag tu/_/mi yi nang du rigs brgyud pa'i/_/rgyal tshab bdag gis bgyis pa gang /_/lo ni drug khri'i bar dag 
[\[256a.4\]]tu/_/dmyal ba'i nang du mi bzad smin/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_/drag po 'jigs byed de dran nas/_/dmyal bar yang mchi mi rung bas/_/rgyal srid la ni mngon mi dga'/_/yab gcig gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_/da ni rab tu dbyung bar bgyi/_/
[\[256a.5\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_bu drang srong rnams kyis gang dka' thub cung zad ci byas pa dang /_mchod sbyin dang sbyin sreg ci byas pa de dag thams cad ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin na khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs pa spangs te rab tu 'byung /_de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i 
[\[256a.6\]]tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kim pa'i 'bras bu 'dra ba yi/_/'dod pa rnams la spyod mi 'tshal/_/bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro lta bu'i/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu bde ba gang ci nyams su myong ba de thams cad rgyal srid kyi yin na/_ci'i 
[\[256a.7\]]phyir khyod rgyal srid kyi bde ba spangs te rab tu 'byung /_gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang las sdug bsngal rab 'byung ba'i/_/bde de bde'o snyam mi bgyid/_/gang las bde ba rab skye ba'i/_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal snyam mi bgyid/_/yab 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gcig bdag la gnang bar mdzod/_/dka' thub nags su mchi bar bgyi/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu re zhig khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi pog gi dud pa dang phye mas 'khrigs pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs bkram par mal 'jam po steng g.yogs bzang po can bshams la gang nas kyang 
[\[256b.2\]]'jigs pa med par ni nyal/_rol mo'i sgra snyan pas ni sad/_gos 'jam po ni bgo/_zas zhim po ni za/_btung ba zhim po ni btung bar bya'o/_/dgon par ni rab tu byung bas rtag tu shing drung du rtswa'i gding ba dang /_lo ma'i gding ba la 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems kyis 
[\[256b.3\]]gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig nyal/_ce spyang gi sgras ni sad/_g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun gyi gos ni gyon/_rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu ni za/_chu dron po dang /_chu rnyog pa can gyi btung ba ni btung dgos na khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung /_de 
[\[256b.4\]]nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nags na shing shun g.yang gzhi gyon zhing 'bras bu za/_/gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig 'dug pa bla'i/_/mkhas pa 'jig rten pha rol dag gis 'jigs pa yis/_/rgyal srid phyir ni gsod dang 
[\[256b.5\]]rdeg dang 'ching mi rung /_/yab gcig bdag la gnang bar mdzod/_/dka' thub nags su mchi bar bgyi/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu re zhig nga'i the tshom gsum po 'di dag chod cig dang de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu 'byung ba mi dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang khyod kyis bA rA Na 
[\[256b.6\]]sI'i 'byor cing rgyas pa mthong nas/_bA rA Na sI 'di ci stong pa yin nam/_'on te gnas pa zhig yod ces smras pa/_de khyod kyis ci zhig las bsams te smras/_lha de'i slad du gson cig_/lhas bdag nongs pa ma mchis par 'gum par bka' stsal pa/_'gas kyang 
[\[256b.7\]]gzhon nu 'di ci'i phyir gsad ces chos kyi tshig ma smras pa de las bsams te bdag gis smras lags so/_/bzang ngo /_/gang khyod kyis mi ro mthong nas ci 'di shi ba nyid shi'am/_'on te gson po shi zhes smras pa de ci las bsams te smras/_lha de'i slad du 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]gson cig_/gang zhig nyes par bgyid pa'i las bgyid bgyid nas gum pa de ni gum pa nyid gum pa lags la gang zhig legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid bgyid pa de gum pa de ni gson pa gum pa lags pa de las bsams nas bdag gis smras lags so/_/bzang 
[\[257a.2\]]ngo /_/gang khyod kyis 'bras kyi phung po chen po mthong nas/_'bras kyi phung po chen po 'di dang po nyid nas ma zos dang drung zug par 'gyur ba zhig ces smras pa de ci las bsams te smras/_lha de'i slad du gson cig_/zhing pa 'di rnams kyis 'bras bun blangs te 'tshal nas las 
[\[257a.3\]]bgyid cing /_de dag lo thog smin nas 'bras kyi phung po chen po bcer nas bu lon pa rnams la 'jal te/_de ltar na de dag gi drung de ni snga nas 'tshal ba nyid lags so/_/de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis mi nyid thob la de thob nas dge ba'i las kyi lam mi sogs na de lta na de'i 
[\[257a.4\]]sngon gyi dge ba de rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de rgyun chad na bde 'gro las nyams shing ngan 'gror gnas par 'gyur ba de las bsams nas bdag gis smras lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos bu'i tshig thos nas mchi mas brnangs bzhin bu la 'khyud de smras pa/_brtul 
[\[257a.5\]]zhugs nges long rang gi chos spyod cig_/bdag kyang khyod kyi slob mar khas blang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rab tu ma byung na cir 'gyur/_lha rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/khyod cag gi bu rnams 
[\[257a.6\]]cir 'gyur/_lha de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/_/de rab tu 'byung na khyed cag gi bu rnams ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_lha bka' ci stsal du bas so/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas zhig yod de/_de na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can 
[\[257a.7\]]snying brtse ba/_sems can thams cad la'o byams pa zhig gnas so/_/de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'khor lnga brgya dang 'byor pa chen pos drang srong de las rab tu byung nas des de la gdams ngag byin te/_des 'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba dang /_brtson 'grus drag pos mngon 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes drang srong de'i ro dri sna tshogs kyi shing phung por spungs nas/_bsregs te mchod pa dang bkur sti cher byas so/_/gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes bram 
[\[257b.2\]]ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de rnams la gdams ngag byin nas/_de rnams kyis 'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba dang /_brtson 'grus drag pos mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i 
[\[257b.3\]]tshe de'i dus kyi gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs pa yongs su spangs te/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa byas pa dang /_rgyal srid 
[\[257b.4\]]spangs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[257b.5\]]po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya'i tshogs me'i 'jigs pa las thar par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nags tshal stug po ri dang chu dang /_rtswa sngon po 
[\[257b.6\]]dang /_gel pa dang /_shing sA la dang pa la sha rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig gi tshal gseb na bya'i tshogs chen po zhig gnas so/_/tshal stug po de na yang shing gnyis phan tshun 'drud pas me byung bar gyur to/_/de na bya'i tshogs gang dag 'phur nus pa 
[\[257b.7\]]de dag ni dong ngo /_/'phur mi nus pa gang yin pa dang /_sgo nga rnams ni de nyid du bor ro/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sreg pa zhig tu skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpas me chen po sreg cing rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de sems 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]can de rnams la snying brtse ba chen po skyes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa 'di rnams kyi don la brtson par ma byas na bdag gson te yang ci rung /_bdag gis sems can rnams 
[\[258a.2\]]'khor ba las ji ltar bsgral bar bya snyam du bsams nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'dab ma chus gsher bar byas nas me'i phung po'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas 'dab ma sprug cing tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di dag 'dab ma yod mod kyi/_/'di dag 'phur 
[\[258a.3\]]bar mi nus so/_/'di dag rkang pa yod mod kyi/_/'di dag 'gro bar mi nus so/_/'di dag pha ma 'phur te dong /_/me ni ma g.yo bar 'dug shig_/byams pa shin tu bsgoms pa yi/_/bden pa'i tshig ni gang yin pa/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de yis su/_/
[\[258a.4\]]me ni ma g.yo bar 'dug shig_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan par byed pa de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mi dga' bar gyur te/_'dis bdag nyid yongs su btang bas de rnams la phan pa ci zhig nus/_gzhan 
[\[258a.5\]]yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di sems can rnams la phan pa byed pa la skyo bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis char chen po rab tu phab pas me de rab tu zhi bar gyur te/_des na sems 
[\[258a.6\]]can de thams cad me'i 'jigs pa las thar bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sreg pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de yin no/_/rgyal po chen po des na nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas sems can la 
[\[258a.7\]]phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas te blon po lnga brgya rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed do/_/de'i blon po lnga brgya tsam yod pa las 
[\[258b.2\]]khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis blon po lnga brgya po de rnams kha phyung ba'i gleng gzhi de dag rgyal pos thos nas/_rgyal po de yang chos dang ldan pa snying brtse ba can/_chos 'dod pa/_skye bo la 'o byams pa/_bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan par zhugs pa zhig 
[\[258b.3\]]pas des bsams pa/_'di dag bsad de ci rung snyam nas des de rnams spyugs te/_de rnams smyags bcad de dong ba las bye gling zhig la phyin to/_/de na de rnams skom pas nyen nas phan tshun brtags na chu gang na yang ma mthong nas/_de rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu sgra 
[\[258b.4\]]phyung ba dang /_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glang po che rnams kyi nang du yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa glang po che sa srung gi bu'i sha tshugs lta bu zhig tu skyes pa de'i bsod nams kyi mthus ri sul dag me tog dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs shing rdzing dang /_mtshe'u dang /_
[\[258b.5\]]chu 'bab pa dang ldan no/_/glang po che'i gtso bo des thag ring po na gnas bzhin du tshor nas des sna chus bkang nas brgyugs te/_des blon po de rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang dbugs phyung nas chus de rnams kyi kha bshal te rgyab tu zhon nas ri sul der btsud de/_'bras bu 
[\[258b.6\]]dang /_rtsa ba dang /_chus tshim par byas shing lam gyis dub pa bsal nas/_de nas des de rnams la smras pa/_ri sul 'di'i pha rol ngos na glang po che'i gtso bo'i ro zhig yod kyis/_de'i rgyu lto khrus te chus khong la rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu dag bsdus te deng shig 
[\[258b.7\]]dang /_de ltar na 'brog 'di rtol bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bstan nas de nas glang po che'i gtso bo de ri de la 'dzegs nas sems bskyed smon lam btab pa/_ji ltar bdag gis sdug bsngal nyam nga ba 'di las yongs su bskyab pa dang /_'brog 'di las rtol 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]ba'i thabs bstan pa dang /_'di dag gi don du rang gi srog phangs pa yongs su btang ba de bzhin du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bdag gis 'di dag nyid 'khor ba'i dgon pa las sgrol bar 
[\[259a.2\]]gyur cig_/ces smras nas glang po che des lag pa gnyis kyis sna brdzes nas bdag nyid ri de'i kha nas mchongs pa dang /_glang po che'i gtso bo lus chen po lhung ma thag tu mod la shi bar gyur to/_/blon po de rnams kyis btsal ba na mthong ste de rnams gnas der song nas/_
[\[259a.3\]]de rnams kyis glang po che gtso bo de mthong ba dang /_gcig la gcig smras pa/_glang po che'i gtso bo gang gis bdag cag gi srog byin pa de ni yang 'di yin te/_gal te de'i steng du lag la bzhag na ji ltar bdag cag gi lag pa sa la lhung bar mi 'gyur/_de nas gnas gtsang 
[\[259a.4\]]ma'i lha rnams kyis bdag nyid chen po 'dis gang gi don du srog yongs su btang ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas blon po de rnams kyis glang po che gtso bo de'i rgyu lto phyung nas bkrus te chus bkang nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer nas 
[\[259a.5\]]glang po che gtso bo de'i ro la mchod pa byas te 'brog de rtol nas phyis smon lam btab pa/_ji ltar bdag nyid chen po 'dis/_bdag cag rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang ba dang /_bdag cag 'brog 'di las yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin 
[\[259a.6\]]du bdag nyid chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bdag cag 'khor ba'i 'brog chen po las yongs su thar bar byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[259a.7\]]ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che gtso bo gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas bdag nyid yongs su btang ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang ngas bdag nyid 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]yongs su btang ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir srog chags stong phrag mang po la rang gi shas 
[\[259b.2\]]tshim par byas kyang nga'i sems nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na klu gzhon nu tsam pa skyes zhes bya ba dad pa bzang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can de tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan 
[\[259b.3\]]pa'i gso sbyong blangs te gnas gsal bar lus chen por byas nas lus btang ste gnas shing 'jig rten na 'gro ba dang gnas pa la cung zad kyang gnod pa mi byed do/_/lo nyes byung nas las la mi lta ba'i mi gnag rdzi dang /_phyugs rdzi dang /_shing thun dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba 
[\[259b.4\]]dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha las bcad cing bcad cing bza' bar brtsams te/_de nas ngas dus mang por rang gi shas tshim par byas na yang nga'i sems ma nyams so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi klu gzhon nu 
[\[259b.5\]]tsam pa skyes gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas rang gi sha yongs su btang ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_
[\[259b.6\]]rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba mtsho chen po ma dros pa na ngang pa rnams 
[\[259b.7\]]kyi sde dpon yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de la bu gnyis yod de/_gang ba dang /_bzhin rgyas zhes bya ste/_phu bo ni gang ba'o/_/nu bo ni bzhin rgyas so/_/gang ba ni gtum pa/_gzu lums can/_brlang ba zhig pas rgyun kho nar ngang pa 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]rnams la sdigs par byed de/_kha cig la sgro 'byin/_kha [(]cag [,]cig [)]la ni sder mos rma 'byin te/_de lta bu dang /_gnod pa gzhan yang brgya phrag dag byas nas ngang pa rnams ngang pa'i sde dpon yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song nas nyi ma re re zhing yang go bar byed pa 
[\[260a.2\]]dang /_des bsams pa/_gang ba ni gtum pa/_gzu lums can/_brlang ba yin te/_gal te 'di rgyal tshab tu bcug na bdag 'das pa dang 'dis ngang pa'i khyu bshig par 'gyur gyis de la thabs zhig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/_des gang ba dang /_bzhin rgyas 
[\[260a.3\]]gnyig bkug ste smras pa/_'bab chu'i dngo dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u rnams bltas te nga'i drung du thog mar su 'ongs pa de ngas ngang pa rnams kyi sde dpon du gzhug go/_/de gnyis phan tshun 'gran pas 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang dong ba las de gnyis kyis 'bab chu'i dngo 
[\[260a.4\]]dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u rnams phan tshun du bltas nas de gnyis rim gyis bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du phyin to/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba 
[\[260a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_bA rA Na sI'i skyed mos tshal na de'i rdzing tshangs ldan zhes bya ba mtsho bas khyad par du 'phags par zab pa zhig yod de/_de las chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed cing phyogs bzhi 'khor bar yang me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing stong 
[\[260a.6\]]phrag du ma dag bskrun nas/_de ut+pa_la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos khebs la shing rnam pa du mas stug por brgyan nas bya rnam pa mang po dag skad 'byin to/_/de'i 'byor pa de mthong nas gang ba ngang pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te 
[\[260a.7\]]babs nas ci dgar rgyu zhing des rtse bar brtsams so/_/bzhin rgyas la yang rang gi khyus smras pa/_khyod kyang bobs la rtsed mo mdzod/_des smras pa/_re zhig rgyal srid je blangs la/_de nas phyis 'ongs te rtse bar bya'o/_/zhes des myur ba myur bar song nas 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]rgyal srid blangs te/_de nas ngang pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas bA rA Na sIr lhags te tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du babs nas rtse bar brtsams te/_de de lta bu'i bag yod pas gnas pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te/_e ma_'o ngang pa'i sde dpon mchog 
[\[260b.2\]]tu blta na sdug pa'i gzugs can gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_tshangs ldan gyi rdzing gi rgyan du gyur cing chu na rgyu ba'i bya thams cad gzugs mdzes pas zil gyis mnan te 'jig rten dga' ba skyed cing ci dga' mgur gnas so/_/de bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[260b.3\]]thams cad kyis thos nas tshangs ldan gyi rdzing gi mtha' yongs su bskor te/_de bag rkyong zhing gnas pa dang /_gzugs mdzes pa la lta zhing gnas so/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la rig par byas pa lha ngang pa'i sde dpon zhig ga zhig gcig nas mchis nas de 
[\[260b.4\]]tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang babs te chu na rgyu ba'i bya thams cad gzugs mdzes pas zil gyis mnan nas 'jig rten dga' ba skyed cing bag brkyang ste gnas shing mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de ltar gyur na bya ba rnams 
[\[260b.5\]]khug shig_/de rnams kyis bkug nas rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag tshangs ldan gyi mtsho na bya mchog tu gzugs mdzes pa blta na sdug pa ngang pa'i sde dpon zhig ga zhig gcig nas 'ongs so zhes thos kyis/_khyed cag gis de gcig pu ma snad par rnyis zung 
[\[260b.6\]]la nga'i drung du khyer te sheg shig_/des de rnyi mchog tu 'jam pos rma ma byung bar bzung ba dang /_des tshigs su bcad de smras/_bdag ni dam por rnyis bzung bas/_/mi yi dbang song byar med kyis/_/ci nas ngang pa'i khyu dag ni/_/myur du ma dros 'deng 
[\[260b.7\]]bar gyis/_/ngang pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba ni bros so/_/de nas gcig pu rnyis bzung bas mya ngan gyis non cing gnas pa de bya pa rnams kyis mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes te rgyal pos 'jigs nas/_ma snad pa dang /_ma shi bar de dag gis ngang pa'i 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]sde dpon de khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ngo /_/cig shos de yang ma bzung bzhin du chags pa'i rnyis bcings pas rang nyid song ngo /_/ngang pa'i sde dpon rgyal po la phul ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag cig shos 'di ci ste khyer te 'ongs/_
[\[261a.2\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis ni 'di ma bzung na 'on kyang rang nyid mchis lags so/_/rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te dad pa chen po skyes so/_/de nas rgyal pos ngang pa'i sde dpon seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag go/_/de nas ngang pa'i sde dpon gyis mi'i 
[\[261a.3\]]skad kyis gang thos nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du dril sgrogs su chug la/_nga'i yul na chu na rgyu 
[\[261a.4\]]ba'i srog chags rnams sus kyang ma bsad cig_/de rnams kyis dril sgrogs su bcug nas su yang chu na rgyu ba'i srog chags ma gsod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ngang pa'i sde 
[\[261a.5\]]dpon bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de na ngas sems can de snyed la phan pa byas so/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang ngas 
[\[261a.6\]]sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa 
[\[261a.7\]]byas te dge ba la btsud pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ston pa mig mdzes zhes bya ba phyi rol pa'i mu stegs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung ste/_ston pa mig mdzes kyi nyan thos brgya phrag du ma 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dang /_stong phrag du ma dang /_brgya stong phrag du ma byung ngo /_/ston pa mig mdzes nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa ni shin tu zad par 'gyur ba ma yin/_shin tu dri ma med par 'gyur ba ma yin/_shin du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_tshangs 
[\[261b.2\]]pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam pa'i bar yin no/_/ston pa mig mdzes kyi nyan thos thams cad kyi thams cad du bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms nas 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spangs te/_de la 
[\[261b.3\]]lan mang du gnas shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/thams cad kyi thams cad du ma yin pa gang yin pa gang dag yin pa de las kha cig ni 'phrul dgar ro/_/kha cig ni dga' ldan du 'o/_/kha cig ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_
[\[261b.4\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas ston pa mig mdzes 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[261b.5\]]gal te bdag nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig 'gro ba mnyam pa dang /_skye ba mnyam pa dang /_tshe phyi ma mnyam pa ni 'os pa ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis gong du bsam gtan gnyis pa byams pas bsgom par bya'o snyam nas/_des bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgoms 
[\[261b.6\]]pas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa mig mdzes zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa mig mdzes zhes bya ba phyi 
[\[261b.7\]]rol pa'i mu stegs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba de yin par gyur to/_/nga nyid kyi nyan thos brgya phrag du ma dang /_stong phrag du ma dang /_brgya stong phrag du ma byung bar gyur pa'i nyan thos rnams la nga nyid kyis shin tu zad par 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]'gyur ba ma yin/_shin tu dri ma med par 'gyur ba ma yin/_shin tu tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam pa'i bar gyi chos bshad do/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_ngas sems 
[\[262a.2\]]can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[262a.3\]]po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ston pa lkugs 'phye zhes bya ba phyi rol pa'i mu stegs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_'dod 
[\[262a.4\]]pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya slob par byed do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na ston pa lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u 'di rnams kyis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du 
[\[262a.5\]]ma byas snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di rnams g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_blugs gzar gyi snod lhag pa 'chang zhing /_tshod rngad dang /_ut+pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson 
[\[262a.6\]]par gnas pa las gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas ston pa lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bram ze'i khye'u rnams la nan thur zhig ma byas na dbral bar dka'o snyam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdul ba la mkhas pa ni bla na med pa yin 
[\[262a.7\]]pas/_de nas ston pa lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag zla ba gsum po 'di dag la kho bo nang du yang dag 'jog 'dod kyis/_kho bo la 'bras bu dang rtsa ba stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang /_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]pa de nyid ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u su yang ma 'ong shig_/bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis kyang khrims su bcas pa/_bdag cag las dbyar gyi nang logs su rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang /_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid 
[\[262b.2\]]ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u su yang mkhan po lta zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/bdag cag las dbyar gyi nang logs su rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang /_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par gang zhig mkhan po lta zhing 
[\[262b.3\]]song bar gyur na de ni bdag cag gis nyes pa can du brtsi'o zhes byas nas/_ston pa lkugs 'phye zla ba gsum po de la nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa dang /_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang /_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid ma 
[\[262b.4\]]gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u su yang de'i drung du mi 'gro'o/_/ston pa lkugs 'phyes rgyang ring po kho na nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'ongs pa legs so tshur/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]khyod dang kho bo ni mtshungs te/_khyod 
[\[262b.5\]]kyang zas lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog la/_kho bo yang lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog na/_'di na kha cig ni de lta ma yin te/_ha kyang tshod rngad dang /_ut+pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de 
[\[262b.6\]]rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_gdon mi za bar mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/_'di ltar mkhan po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang lhan cig smra bar byed do snyam du bsams nas/_ston pa lkugs 'phye gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_ston pa'i 
[\[262b.7\]]rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas ston pa lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_gdon mi za bar mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/_'di 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ltar mkhan po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang lhan cig smra bar byed do snyam du bsams nas/_ston pa lkugs 'phye ni gang gi phyir [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang lhan cig smra bar byed kyi/_mi rnams dang ni ma yin no/_/zhes smras nas stan las langs te dong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[263a.2\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can zhig ston pa lkugs 'phye gang na ba der song ba dang /_ston pa lkugs 'phyes rgyang ring po kho na nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can khyod 'ongs pa 
[\[263a.3\]]legs so tshur/_khyod dang kho bo ni mtshungs te/_khyod kyang g.yang gzhi gcig thogs/_kho bo yang g.yang gzhi gcig thogs/_khyod kyang ril ba dang /_dbyug gu dang /_blugs gzar gyi snod re re thogs/_kho bo yang re re thogs/_khyod kyang bsod 
[\[263a.4\]]snyoms lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog la/_kho bo yang bsod snyoms lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog na/_'di na kha cig ni de lta ma yin te/_g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba dang /_blugs gzar gyi 
[\[263a.5\]]snod lhag pa 'chang zhing /_ha cang tshod rngad dang /_khre rgod dang /_ut+pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar mkhan po 'dod chen che ba la ni rnam par smod la/_'dod chen chung ba la bstod 
[\[263a.6\]]pas don gyis na mkhan pos bdag cag la nan tur byas kyis/_ma la bdag cag gi g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba dang /_blugs gzar gyi snod lhag pa chu bo rtag 'bab kyi nang du bor la mkhan po gang na ba der 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis 
[\[263a.7\]]g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba dang /_blugs gzar gyi snod lhag ma rnams chu bo rtag 'bab kyi nang du bor nas rgyud gtsang ba dang /_spyod pa gzhung bzhin du byas nas ston pa lkugs 'phye gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ston pa lkugs 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/ston pa lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang khams dang /_rang bzhin shes nas/_ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 
[\[263b.2\]]de dag gis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ston pa lkugs 'phye gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas 
[\[263b.3\]]pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan 
[\[263b.4\]]yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba'i mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par gyur to/_/mi rnams 
[\[263b.5\]]kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid 'byor par gyur cing zhes bya ba rgyas par ji skad chos ldan gyi mdo las 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/ji tsam na mi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa rnams la lus kyi gnod pa 'di lta bu byung ste/_'di lta ste grang ba dang /_tsha ba 
[\[263b.6\]]dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_za ba dang rga ba'o/_/mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na rgyal po byed ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/_rgyal po byed ldan gyi skyed mos tshal gyi gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas 
[\[263b.7\]]zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas kyi drung na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/_/de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud gcig pu dben par song nas sems la sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/_mi rnams ni tshe thung la tshe phyi mar 'gro dgos te/_skyes pa la mi 'chi ba med pas dge ba bya zhing tshangs par spyod pa spyad dgos na/_'on kyang da 
[\[264a.2\]]ltar mi 'di dag ni 'di lta ste don spyad pa dang /_bsod nams spyad pa dang dge ba spyad pa la sems las chung ngu sems las chung ngur gnas par byed kyis/_ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim 
[\[264a.3\]]med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/'di na kho bo gcig pu zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas 
[\[264a.4\]]par sbyar ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/_kye mkhan po bdag cag gis gang cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni shes ldan mkhan po la brten nas lags pas gal te shes ldan 
[\[264a.5\]]mkhan po skra dang kha spu bregs zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung na bdag cag kyang shes ldan mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus la dbab par shes par gyis shig_/de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu 
[\[264a.6\]]rtsibs kyi mu khyud skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de rnams kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas 
[\[264a.7\]]bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa lnga spangs nas zhes bya ba nas rgyas par byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba dang /_rgyas par snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi bar du 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]brjod par bya ste/_/btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de nas 
[\[264b.2\]]bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi ming bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba'i ming gang yin pa nub par gyur cing /_ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar grags so/_/de nas 
[\[264b.3\]]ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag mi rnams ni tshe thung ba/_nyon mongs pa/_ring po mi thogs pa yin la/_de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/_/dper na rtswa'i rtse mo la chags pa'i zil ba ni nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 
[\[264b.4\]]myur du ltung zhing ring por mi gnas so/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang zil pa dang 'dra bar ring por mi thogs pa nyon mongs pa yin la de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/_/dper na chu la ri mo mkhan gyis ri mo bris pa ni myur du 'jig cing ring 
[\[264b.5\]]por mi gnas so/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang chu'i ri mo bzhin du ring por mi gnas pa nyon mongs pa yin la de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/_/dper na chu la dbyug pas khram btab pa ni myur du 'jig cing ring por mi gnas 
[\[264b.6\]]so/_/de bzhin du tshe yang dbyug pas bris pa lta bu yin no/_/dper na khor yug chur bor ba ni myur du 'byin zhing ring por mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du tshe yang khor yug lta bu yin no/_/dper na rdo rje chur bor ba ni myur du 'byin zhing ring por mi gnas so/_/
[\[264b.7\]]de bzhin du tshe yang rdo rje chur bor ba lta bu yin no/_/dper na dbyug pa gnam du 'phangs pa ni myur du ltung zhing ring por mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du tshe yang dbyug pa gnam du 'phangs pa lta bu yin no/_/dper na thags bcas pa ji tsam btags pa de tsam du 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]btag par bya ba rting la thug par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du srog kyang btag par bya ba rting la thug pa lta bu yin no/_/dper na gsad par khrid pa'i phyugs ni gom re bor zhing gsad pa la nye ba yin no/_/de bzhin du tshe yang gsad pa'i phyugs lta 
[\[265a.2\]]bu yin no/_/dper na gsad par khrid pa'i mi ni gom re bor zhing gsad pa la nye ba yin no/_/de bzhin du tshe yang gsad pa'i mi lta bu yin no/_/dper na sha'i kham tshad cig zangs chu mang po'i nang du bcug ste 'og nas me sbar na myur du gor bar 'gyur zhing ring por 
[\[265a.3\]]mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du tshe yang sha'i kham tshad lta bu yin no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu pa/_dper na ri las 'bab pa'i chu bo gting zab pa/_shugs drag pa/_thag ring por 'bab pa shing rtsi ded par byed pa ni nyin zhag de dag 'das 
[\[265a.4\]]shing skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam de dag 'das na chu'i gnas pa dang 'jig pa mi mngon no/_/de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang chu bo'i rgyun lta bu ste/_ring por mi thogs pa/_nyon mongs pa yin la de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/_/bram 
[\[265a.5\]]ze'i khye'u dag bdag ni byams pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/_rgyas par snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag tshur khyed kyis kyang byams pa dang ldan 
[\[265a.6\]]pa'i sems dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyi bar gyis gnas par gyis shig_/rgyal po chen po ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud de de tsam du tshe ring /_de tsam du ring du gnas/_de tsam gyis tshe'i mthar thug pa yang re zhig 
[\[265a.7\]]dge slong dag la mi rnams ni tshe thung ba/_ring por mi thogs pa/_nyon mongs pa yin la/_de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos ston to/_/rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[265b.2\]]chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/ston pa mig mdzes ji lta ba bram ze'i bu 'joms byed dang /_glang po 
[\[265b.3\]]skyong yang de dang 'dra'o/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen por gyur nas sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin 
[\[265b.4\]]pa de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po phyogs bdag ces bya ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po phyogs bdag gi bu gzhon nu rdul phran zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/rgyal po phyogs bdag la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu gnag lhas skyes zhes bya 
[\[265b.5\]]zhig yod de/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu gnag lhas skyes kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bya ba mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa/_gzhung dang mthun par dpyod pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_'di ltar de'i pha bram ze 
[\[265b.6\]]gnag lhas skyes zhing las kyi mtha' gang yin pa de rnams bram ze'i khye'u me gso la 'dri zhing byed do/_/don du bya ba'i don nges par brtag pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang bram ze'i khye'u me gso la dris nas byed kyi ma dris par ni ma yin no/_/gzhon nu rdul 
[\[265b.7\]]phran dang /_rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gi grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_ne'u zla yang yin no/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po phyogs bdag rtse bar 'dod pa'am/_dga' bar 'dod pa'am/_dga' mgur spyod 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe des dgos pa 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]thams cad dang /_las su bya ba thams cad bram ze gnag lhas skyes la slar btang nas steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la skyes pa med par song ste rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas 
[\[266a.2\]]dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi'o/_/de shi ba na rgyal po phyogs bdag shin du sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas/_kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag che thang du dmas par gyur to/_/kyi hud bram ze gnag 
[\[266a.3\]]lhas skyes shi bas bdag shin du che thang du dmas par gyur to zhes zer ro/_/de nas gzhon nu rdul phran rgyal po phyogs bdag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po phyogs bdag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha ci'i slad du bram ze gnag lhas skyes 
[\[266a.4\]]gum pas shin du sdug bsngal zhing thugs la gcags par gyur te sdug bsngal zhing thugs la gcags pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar mdzad/_gzhon nu kho bo gang gi tshe rtse bar 'dod pa'am/_dga' bar 'dod pa'am/_dga' mgur spyod 'dod par gyur 
[\[266a.5\]]pa de'i tshe kho bo'i dgos pa thams cad dang las su bya ba thams cad bram ze gnag lhas skyes la slar btang nas steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na skyes pa med par song nas rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/
[\[266a.6\]]da ni kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/_kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag che thang du dmas par gyur to/_/kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag shin tu che thang du dmas par gyur to snyam mo/_/lha bram ze gnag lhas skyes gum pas shin tu 
[\[266a.7\]]sdug bsngal zhing thugs mi dgyes par gyur te/_sdug bsngal zhing thugs mi dgyes pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar ma mdzad cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lha bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bgyi ba mkhas pa gsal ba/_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]yid gzhungs pa/_gzhung dang mthun par dpyod pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa zhig mchis te/_'di ltar de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis las kyi mtha' bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bram ze'i khye'u me gso la dris nas bgyis kyi ma dris pas ni ma lags 
[\[266b.2\]]so/_/don du bgyi ba'i don nges par brtag pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bram ze'i khye'u me gso la dris nas bgyis kyi ma dris par ni ma lags so/_/lha de lta lags pas pha gnag lhas skyes kyi las thabs su dbang bskur du gsol/_/de nas rgyal po phyogs 
[\[266b.3\]]bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u me gso pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod ngas deng phyin chad nas pha gnag lhas skyes kyi las thabs su bcug go/_/bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u me gsos mnyan to/_/de nas bram ze'i 
[\[266b.4\]]khye'u me gso de pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes byed byed pa'i zhing blas kyi mtha' gang yin pa de rnams kyang byed do/_/de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes don du bya ba'i don nges par rtog rtog pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de nges par rtog go/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u me gso'i 
[\[266b.5\]]ming bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing bram ze gnag lhas skyes bram ze gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan 
[\[266b.6\]]dag tshur khyed gzhon nu rdul phran gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang /_gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang /_tshe spel ba dag byos la/_gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de bzhin du bdag cag kyang bde zhing /_ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug 
[\[266b.7\]]bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/_rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_ne'u zla yin gyis/_rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das nas yab kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]bzhag na/_ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod ces gyis shig_/mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gis bram ze gnag lhas skyes las mnyan nas gzhon nu rdul 
[\[267a.2\]]phran gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing /_ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag 
[\[267a.3\]]sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/_rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_ne'u zla lags kyis/_rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs 
[\[267a.4\]]spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig_/de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu rdul phran gyis mnyan to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po phyogs bdag dus las 'das te shi bar gyur nas blon po'i tshogs rnams dang /_sna chen po la gtogs 
[\[267a.5\]]pa rnams dang /_rgyal khrims 'don pa rnams dang /_gsang tshig gis lhan cig 'tsho ba rnams kyis gzhon nu rdul phran pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag cing /_de rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i phyir dbang bskur ro/_/de nas gzhon nu rdul 
[\[267a.6\]]phran gyi ming gzhon nu rdul phran zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub cing /_rgyal po rdul phran zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis bram ze gnag lhas skyes pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan pos nga'i yab la ji 
[\[267a.7\]]ltar rjes su ston pa de ltar nga la da phyin chad rjes su bstan par bya bar soms shig_/bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis mnyan to/_/de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug pho nyas bkug 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag khyed cag rgyal po rdul phran gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang /_rgyal po rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe spel bdag byos la 'di skad ces lha lha gzhon nur gyur pa na bdag cag spyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad ces ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de bzhin 
[\[267b.2\]]du bdag cag bde zhing /_ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/_rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_ne'u zla lags kyis/_rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das te yab kyi rgyal srid 
[\[267b.3\]]kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig ces gsol pa dgongs sam zhes smros shig_/gal te 'di skad ces ngas dran no zer na/_lha da ni de'i dus la bab lags so zhes smros shig_/'on te de 'di skad ces sa chen po 
[\[267b.4\]]nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'ged pa su zhig yod ces zer na/_lha gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig_/mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gis bram ze gnag lhas skyes las 
[\[267b.5\]]mnyan nas/_rgyal po rdul phran gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas rgyal po rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha lha sngon gzhon nur gyur pa na bdag cag spyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad ces ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de bzhin 
[\[267b.6\]]du bdag cag bde zhing /_ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/_bdag cag rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_ne'u zla lags kyis/_rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das te yab 
[\[267b.7\]]kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig ces gsol pa dgongs lags sam/_shes ldan dag ngas dran no/_/lha da ni de'i dus la bab lags so/_/'o na sa chen po nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'ged pa su zhig yod/_lha gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan ma mchis so/_/de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis bram ze gnag lhas skyes pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen po 'di nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i 
[\[268a.2\]]dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'ged nus sam/_lha legs par ra rngo thog go/_/de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po rdul phran las mnyan nas dkyil dang dkyil na yul 'khor bu chung dang 'khor bu chung yod pa gang yin pa de dag rgyal po rdul phran gyi ris su bcad pa dang /_des 
[\[268a.3\]]rgyal po rdul phran yi rangs par gyur to/_/bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis kho bo'i ris ji lta bu zhig tu bcad na/_da lta dper na mkhas pa gsal ba bye brag shes pas byas pa lta bur gyur te zhes yi rangs pa yang go bar byas so/_/yul 'khor bu chung gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag rgyal po'i 
[\[268a.4\]]'khor rgyal rigs drug gi ris su bcad pa dang /_des rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug kyang yi rangs par gyur te/_bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis ji lta bu zhig tu bgos na/_ji ltar mkhas pa gsal ba bye brag shes pas byas pa bzhin du kho bo cag gis yun ring po nas bsams 
[\[268a.5\]]bsams pa'i yul de dag da kho bo cag gi ris su bcad ces yi rangs pa yang go bar byas so/_/de nas rgyal po'i zham ring rgyal rigs drug gis bram ze gnag lhas skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po rgyal po rdul phran la ji ltar rjes su ston pa de bzhin du deng slan chad bdag 
[\[268a.6\]]cag la yang khyod kyis rjes su bstan par dgongs su gsol/_de bzhin du bya'o zhes bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis mnyan to/_/de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes rgyal po rdul phran dang /_rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_bram ze shing 
[\[268a.7\]]sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la rjes su ston to/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/_/'dul sbyong mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]pa dang /_ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang /_gzhu 'dzin pa dang /_zhabs 'bring byed pa dang /_go re long byed pa dang /_bro gar len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rtul phod pa dpa' ba rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sems srung ba dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus byed pa du ma 
[\[268b.2\]]la yang rjes su ston par byed do/_/de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi ming bram ze gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba'i ming gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing /_bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes bram ze 
[\[268b.3\]]rnams kyis ni tshangs par bkur ro/_/rgyal pos ni lhar bkur ro/_/grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis ni rgyal por bkur ro/_/bram ze rnams kyis ni 'di snyam du shes te/_bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/_tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas 
[\[268b.4\]]mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/_/rgyal po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis kyang 'di snyam du shes te/_bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam shes shing /_tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/_tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag 
[\[268b.5\]]rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag da ltar bram ze rnams kyis ni tshangs par bkur/_rgyal pos ni lhar bkur/_grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis ni rgyal po bkur/_bram ze rnams ni 'di snyam du shes te/_
[\[268b.6\]]bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/_tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/_/rgyal po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis kyang 'di snyam du shes te/_bram ze chen po gnag lhas 
[\[268b.7\]]skyes ni tshangs pa'i lam shes shing tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/_tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/_/bdag gis ni tshangs pa'i lam yang mi shes/_bdag ni tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]gnas pa yang ma yin na/_bdag gis bdag gi pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes las bram ze gang zhig dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas na de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes thos kyis/_ma la bdag gis dbyar zla ba bzhi dag
