[\[269a.2\]]la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan zhig btsal du gsol/_bdag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam 
[\[269a.3\]]gtan gyis gnas par 'tshal lo/_/mkhan po dag de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig_/rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_thabs 
[\[269a.4\]]rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa/_shes ldan dag re zhig ma g.yeng bar bag yod par khyim na 'khod cig_/bdag ni dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do/_/rje'i sras da de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga 
[\[269a.5\]]brgya po dag la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag re zhig ji skad thos pa dang /_ji skad bstan pa dang /_ji ltar kun chub par byas pa'i rig pa dag zung shig_/lhogs shig_/bdag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do/_/mkhan 
[\[269a.6\]]po da de'i dus la bab lags so/_/'dul sbyong mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta pa dang /_ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang /_gzhu 'dzin pa dang /_zhabs 'bring byed pa dang /_go re long byed pa dang /_bro gar len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu 
[\[269a.7\]]rtul phod pa dpa' ba rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sems srung ba dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/_shes ldan dag re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan tshol cig_/kho bo ni dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]'dod do/_/mkhan po da de'i dus la bab lags so/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shig brtsigs nas/_dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas pa las de'i drung du tshangs pa ma 'ongs so/_/
[\[269b.2\]]de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis dbyar gyi zla ba bzhir zhag gcig gis ma lon pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes las dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas na/_de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[269b.3\]]thos na bdag gi drung du ni tshangs pa ma 'ongs so snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis 
[\[269b.4\]]tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing /_bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'ongs so/_/de'i tshe tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i kha dog gi mthus khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/bram ze chen 
[\[269b.5\]]po gnag lhas skyes kyis nam gyi cha smad la bab pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di 'dra ba yi kha dog ni/_/bdag gis ma mthong ma thos na/_/gzugs bzang kha dog ldan pa yi/_/
[\[269b.6\]]grogs po khyod ni su zhig yin/_/gang la lhar bcas tshangs ris dang /_/de bzhin ris ni gzhan dag gis/_/gzhon nur rab shes de lta bur/_/gnag lhas skyes kyis nga shes byos/_/tshangs pa khyod la 'dud bgyid cing /_/bkur sti yang ni bgyid lags kyis/_/bdag gi tshig 
[\[269b.7\]]rnams gsan mdzod la/_/myur du gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/gnag lhas skyes pa khyod kyis ni/_/smras pa'i tshig de gzung bar byas/_/tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang /_/phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/_/yid la bsams pa de dag ni/_/bram ze nga la dris shig dang /_/dris 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]pa de dang de dag ni/_/nga yis khyod la gtan la dbab/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/_re zhig bdag gis mthong ba'i chos kyi don gyis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis thob kyis/_ma la bdag gis tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams te 
[\[270a.2\]]dri bar bya'o snyam nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_blo la bsdogs pa'i yid gnyis the tshom dag_/tshangs pa kun bged gzhon nu la 'dri ba/_/gang du gnas shing gang la bslab byas na/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mi 'chi 'thob par 'gyur/_/bram ze mi yi nang na nga'o snyam 
[\[270a.3\]]spangs shing /_/gcig pur gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang /_/dri nga med cing 'khrig las chags bral ba/_/'di la gnas shing 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_/mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'chi med 'thob/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/_tshangs pas 
[\[270a.4\]]bshad pa/_bram ze mi yi nang na nga'o snyam spangs shing /_/zhes bya ba 'di'i don yang bdag gis kun shes/_tshangs pas bshad pa/_gcig pur gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang /_/zhes bya ba 'di'i don yang bdag gis kun shes na/_tshangs pas bshad pa/_dri nga med cing 'khrig las 
[\[270a.5\]]chags bral ba/_/zhes bya ba 'di'i don bdag gis mi shes so snyam du bsams nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_tshangs pa mi'i nang dri nga gang zhig lags/_/'jig rten kun ni ngogs kyis 'bab chu ltar/_/gang gis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can/_/tshangs pa 'thob 
[\[270a.6\]]'gyur lam ni mi shes pa'o/_/khro dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang khon dang rnam 'tshe dang /_/'jungs dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal mi bzod dang /_/chags dang zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang /_/phrag dog ser sna dag dang 'tshig pa ste/_/de dag bram ze mi'i nang dri nga yin/_/'jig rten kun na ngogs 
[\[270a.7\]]kyis 'bab chu ltar/_/de yis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can/_/tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes so/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/_ji skad du bdag gis tshangs pas smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na/_khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ji 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa sal gyis dag pa/_ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa rnam par byung ba spyad pa 'di ni sla ba ma yin pas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/
[\[270b.2\]]de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_tshangs par skye bar bya ba'i phyir/_/'di la 'bad pa brtan par gyis/_/chos 'di dag pa g.yung drung yin/_/zhes smras nas tshangs pa mi 
[\[270b.3\]]mjed kyi bdag po de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag 'das nas rgyal po rdul phran bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs 
[\[270b.4\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_rgyal po rdul phran la bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/sa bdag rgyal chen rdul phran khyod/_/bdag gi tshig ni gsan par mdzod/_/gnag lhas skyes bdag mi spro yis/_/rgyal srid nyid kyis bskyang du gsol/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[270b.5\]]po rdul phran gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod kyi 'dod pa mi chog pa/_/gang yin de yang khyod la bskang /_/khyod la 'tshe ba de bsad kyis/_/gnag lhas skyes kyis bdag ma spang /_/rgyal po bdag 'dod mi chog min/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'ang ma mchis te/_/mi ma 
[\[270b.6\]]yin pa'i tshig thos nas/_/khyim gyi gzhi la mi spro'o/_/gang las thos nas bram ze khyod/_/'dir ni bdag dang 'dod spong ba/_/mi ma yin pa de ci 'dra/_/dri yis de ni bdag la smros/_/snying rje yi ni gnas pa yis/_/rab dben bsam gtan byed pa na/_/de nas tshangs pa 
[\[270b.7\]]mdun du 'ongs/_/tha dad phyogs ni snang bar byas/_/bdag gis de yi tshig thos nas/_/khyim gyi gzhi la mi spro'o/_/bram ze gang du 'gro ba der/_/kho bo yang ni 'gro bya zhing /_/khyod kyi nyan thos 'gyur bar bgyis/_/gnag lhas skyes khyod ston pa mdzod/_/gang la so so'i skye bo 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]rnams/_/chags pa'i 'dod pa de dag spongs/_/'dod pa rnams la mi lta zhing /_/bden pa'i chos la gnas par mdzod/_/tshangs par skye bar bgyi slad du/_/nor bu dag pa bai DUr+ya/_/ji ltar ma bcos dri med lta'i/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/mkhan 
[\[271a.2\]]po da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 
[\[271a.3\]]'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/_mkhan po lo bdun du gzhes shig dang /_lo bdun 'das nas bdag cag bu dang /_spun dang /_gzhan dag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bkod nas mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo /_/shes ldan dag lo bdun lta ha cang yang thogs 
[\[271a.4\]]ches so/_/gzhan yang 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba/_longs spyod rnams ni myos par 'gyur ba/_srog 'chad pa ni shes par dka' ba yin pas lo bdun 'das na yang shes ldan dag rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas re zhig kho bo rab tu 'byung ngo /_/mkhan po lo drug 
[\[271a.5\]]gam/_lnga 'am/_bzhi 'am/_gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_gcig gam/_zla ba bdun nam/_drug gam/_lnga 'am/_bzhi 'am/_gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_gcig gam/_zhag bdun zhig gzhes shig dang /_zhag bdun 'das nas bdag cag bu dang /_spun dang /_gzhan 
[\[271a.6\]]dag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bkod nas mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/shes ldan dag zhag bdun lta ring po yang mi thogs na/_'on kyang 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba/_longs spyod rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba/_srog 'chad pa shes par dka' ba 
[\[271a.7\]]yin pas zhag bdun 'das na yang shes ldan dag rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas re zhig bdag rab tu 'byung ngo /_/mkhan po da de'i dus mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_bram ze shing sA la chen 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]po lta bu bdun dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed rje'i sras 
[\[271b.2\]]bdag cag btsun mo bgyi ba'i dus na ni btsun mo/_grogs bgyi ba'i dus na ni grogs lags pas rje'i sras gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/_rje'i sras rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung 
[\[271b.3\]]bar bgyi'o/_/shes ldan dag da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab 
[\[271b.4\]]tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/_mkhan po bdag cag gang cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po las brten te lags kyis/_gal te mkhan po skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/_mkhan po rab 
[\[271b.5\]]tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/shes ldan dag da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig_/'dul sbyong mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta pa dang /_ral gri'i 'dzin stangs mkhan dang /_gzhu 'dzin pa dang /_zhabs 
[\[271b.6\]]'bring byed pa dang /_go re long byed pa dang /_bro gar len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sems srung ba dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag ni zhes bya ba nas/_skra dang kha spu 
[\[271b.7\]]bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/shes ldan dag de'i dus la dbab par shes par gyis shig_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes skra dang /_kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/rgyal po rdul phran yang 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang /_'khor stong phrag du ma dang /_'khor brgya stong phrag du ma 
[\[272a.2\]]dang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo /_/rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_bram ze shing 
[\[272a.3\]]sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /_thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu yang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung 
[\[272a.4\]]ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam yang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo /_/glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta pa dang /_ral gri 'dzin stangs pa dang /_gzhu 'dzin pa 
[\[272a.5\]]dang /_zhabs 'bring byed pa dang /_go re long byed pa dang /_bro gar len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sems srung ba dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus byed pa rnams kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bram 
[\[272a.6\]]ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo /_/bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes de ltar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/_shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa/_gnod par byed pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa/_mya ngan 
[\[272a.7\]]las mi 'da' bar byed pa rnams spangs nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/_khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang 'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya 
[\[272b.2\]]chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur 
[\[272b.3\]]pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang 'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad btang 
[\[272b.4\]]snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi ming bram ze chen 
[\[272b.5\]]po gnag lhas skyes/_bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba'i ming gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing /_ston pa gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang /_'khor stong phrag du ma dang /_'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_
[\[272b.6\]]grong rdal nas grong rdal dang /_grong khyer nas grong khyer du ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/de'i tshe skyes pa'am bud med dag las nyes pa 'ga' byung na ston pa gnag lhas skyes phyogs gang na 'dug pa'i phyogs de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal 
[\[272b.7\]]lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes ched du brjod pa/_lan gsum brjod do/_/mdun na 'don bdun byung ba gang yin pa ni/_ral gris 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'tsho dang tshangs sbyin dang /_/sna tshogs za dang de bzhin sa/_/rdul can yul 'khor skyong gnyis gnyis/_/de tshe skye bo de bdun byung /_/ka ling ka na mche ba'i khyim/_/rdo [{]mangs [,]mang [}]na ni skem byed de/_/srung byed na ni ma he ldan/_/ang gar tsam pa ris su bcad/_/lus 
[\[273a.2\]]'phags na ni mi thi la/_/stang zil can na ma rungs pa/_/bA rA Na sIr ka shi ste/_/gnag lhas skyes kyis ris bcad de'o/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ston pa gnag lhas skyes gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la 
[\[273a.3\]]phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /_rkyen tsam dang /_tshogs tsam yin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang 
[\[273a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thog mar thugs gang du bskyed lags/_rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po 'od ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i yul du glang po rin po che me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar dkar ba/_yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_
[\[273a.5\]]blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhas pa des pa khyod kyis glang po che dam pa 'di myur du legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po 
[\[273a.6\]]che 'dul mkhan mkhas pas rgyal po 'od ldan las mnyan nas glang po che dam pa de 'dul bar byed de/_de dul bar rig nas rgyal po 'od ldan la phul te/_lha'i glang po che dam pa ni dul lags pas lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas rgyal po 'od ldan 
[\[273a.7\]]glang po che dam pa de la zhon te glang po'i 'dul mkhan yang gong du zhon nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chor du song ngo /_/ji tsam na glang po che des nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas des dri de'i rjes bzhin du brgyugs so/_/de nas rgyal po glang po che rlung ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba dang /_glang po che'i 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]'dul mkhan la smras pa/_kye glang po 'dul mkhan nam mkha' 'gul ba 'dra zhing phyogs kun myur du 'du bar 'gro ba 'dra/_/sa ni mtha' dag 'khor lo bzhin 'khor shing rnams mkha' la 'khor ba 'dra/_/glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu 'di rgyug mthong nas ni/_/ri bo 'di 
[\[273b.2\]]rgyug snyam nas ri rnams gya tsom myur du rgyug pa 'dra/_/kye glang po che 'dul mkhan glang po che'i dbang po thul cig thul cig_/glang chen dbang po tshar gcad par/_/bzang po rab tu 'bad par gyis/_/glang chen gnye'u rengs khyer ba yis/_/kho bo cir 'gyur gtol med khyer/_/glang po che 
[\[273b.3\]]'dul bas smras pa/_lha drang srong dam pas smras pa'i gsang sngags bzlas bgyi zhing /_/'di la lcags kyus tshar bcad 'bad pa yang bgyi na/_/'chi bar nges pa rnams kyi tshe yis sman bzhin du/_/glang po 'di ni bdag stobs zil gyis mnan nas mchi/_/mi yi dbang po 
[\[273b.4\]]lcags kyu 'am/_/zhags pa 'am yang na lcag gis kyang /_/'dod chags gnye'u rengs khyer ba'i sems/_/tshar gcad nus pa ma lags so/_/'dod chags sems kyi zug rngu ni/_/ji zhig ltar na skye 'gyur te/_/tshul 'ga' zhig gis rgyas 'gyur la/_/'ga' 
[\[273b.5\]]zhig gis kyang zhi bar 'gyur/_/gang gi tshe glang po'i 'dul mkhan des glang po che dam pa de gnas thams cad du bzlog par ma nus pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po la smras pa/_lha glang po che 'di ni 'khrul gyis shing gi yal ga la 'jus mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan 
[\[273b.6\]]shing gi yal ga la 'jus te 'dug go/_/de nas di'u shi ba las thar te bde bar gyur nas rgyal pos 'dul mkhan la smras pa/_khyod kyis glang po che dam pa ma dul bar nga la phul lo/_/des smras pa/_lha 'di bdag gis shin tu dul bar bgyis te/_'on kyang nags kyi bal 
[\[273b.7\]]glang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan du ma btub lags so/_/lha de lta lags mod kyi dpyad dran nas ring po mi thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas glang po che de myos pa dang bral bar gyur nas zhag bdun lon pa dang dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]glang po che 'dul mkhan gyis rings pa rings par rgyal po la smras pa/_lha glang po che de ni mchis lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis ni 'di ma thul to/_/lha thul lags so/_/ci mngon/_lha'i spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o zhes des lcags kyi thu lum 
[\[274a.2\]]so mal du tshos par bsregs pa zhig dpyad kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams so/_/de nas des bag tsha ba med pas blang bar brtsams pa dang glang po 'dul mkhan gyis smras pa/_lha len du ni btub na 'on kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kye mkhas pa de ltar 
[\[274a.3\]]shin tu dul ba 'dis bdag cag g.yengs pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_lha bdag gis sngar lus thul gyi sems ni ma lags so zhes ma gsol tam/_bdag ni lus 'dul ba lags kyi/_sems 'dul ba ni ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sems 'dul ba 'ga' 
[\[274a.4\]]yod par khyod kyis mthong ngam/_thos sam/_de lhas bskul nas smras pa/_lha lus 'dul ba dang sems 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchis so/_/'dod pa'i rgyus byung nyes gzhom phyir/_/mang po brtson par byed mod kyi/_/mi nus par ni shes nas 
[\[274a.5\]]kyang /_/brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog par byed/_/de dang der ni de lta bu'i/_/'bad pa rnam pa mang byas kyang /_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags nags tshal gyi/_/rtsa nas phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa gzhom par 'dod pa ni/_/kha cig yul rnams spong bar byed/_/de gzhom 
[\[274a.6\]]'dod pa gzhan dag ni/_/dga' bzhin dbang po tshim par byed/_/lha dang lha min mi dang seng ge stag dang sbrul dag dang /_/srin bu bye ba phye ma leb dang 'jig rten 'di dag kun/_/'dod pa'i zhags pa shin tu phra mo rnams kyis yid bcings nas/_/srid 'gro thibs po 'dir ni 'khor 
[\[274a.7\]]lo bzhin du shin tu 'khor/_/bdag ni sna tshogs thabs kyis 'di lta bu/_/gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i glang po 'dul/_/rgyal po gzugs can ma lags phra sems ni/_/drang srong chab klung 'tshal bas ma thul to/_/glang chen 'dul ba gzugs med phra ba'i sems/_/drang 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]srong chu klung za bas ma thul na/_/gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te/_/mi yi 'jig rten dag na yod dam kye/_/gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te/_/lhan gcig mi yi 'jig rten na mchis te/_/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che/_/nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' 
[\[274b.2\]]bo stobs ldan pa/_/de dang gang dag de 'drar rjes 'brang ba/_/de'i dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brtson 'grus dang stobs thos nas sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas te bla na med pa yang 
[\[274b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su/_/'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/_/sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba/_/skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya/_/bdag gis skye dgu legs bskyangs 
[\[274b.4\]]las byung ba'am/_/btang ba las byung bsod nams yod pa gang /_/des ni sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dag_/'dod pa'i rims nad las rab thar bar bya/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po 'od ldan du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid de 
[\[274b.5\]]yin te/_ngas der thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lags/_rgyal 
[\[274b.6\]]po chen po sngon byung ba yangs pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/_yangs pa'i grong khyer du rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i tshe ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de'i mchog 
[\[274b.7\]]zung dang bzang po zung ni shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu zhes bya'o/_/rim gro byed pa ni dge slong kun dga' bo zhes bya'o/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon pa dang /_
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]de rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs nas des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od las mar dang /_til mar dang /_bu ram chu khyer te shog shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[275a.2\]]bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yangs pa'i 'od shes par gyis shig bcom ldan 'das rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs te/_de la mar dang /_til mar dang 
[\[275a.3\]]bu ram chu dgos so/_/de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas mar dang /_til mar dang /_bu ram chu khyer te bu dang lhan cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_mar dang /_til mar gyis 
[\[275a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku khrus byas te/_bu ram chu'i btung ba gsol to/_/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzod cing 'tsho bar gyur to/_/de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab 
[\[275a.5\]]par brtsams pa/_bdag kyang rab tu sbyin pa 'di yis shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/_/yon tan rigs dang rus dag mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gyur cing /_/bdag gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar gyi nyam thag 'chi ba yi/_/pha rol zhi ba rgya chen 'jigs pa med pa sgrol bar shog_/de'i 
[\[275a.6\]]bus kyang smon lam btab pa/_bdag kyang las 'dis na gzugs med pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro byed par gyur cig_/ces byas so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang yin pa de ni nga 
[\[275a.7\]]nyid yin te/_der ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lo/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bu gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i slad du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/_rgyal po chen po re zhig grangs med pa dang po la/_sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/_'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/_/
[\[275b.2\]]de'i bar bdun khri lnga stong gi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni ngas mchod do/_/grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi/_/rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir/_/nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/_/rgyal po chen po grangs med pa gnyis pa la ni/_
[\[275b.3\]]sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nas ni/_/dbang po'i rgyal mtshan thub pa'i bar/_/bdun khri drug stong dag gi ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/_/grangs med gnyis po tshang bar ni/_/rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/_/skye ba de dang de dag tu/_/nga la skyo ba'i 
[\[275b.4\]]sems med do/_/grangs med pa gsum pa la yang /_/sangs rgyas legs mdzad nas bzung ste/_/sangs rgyas 'od srung bar dag tu/_/bdun khri bdun stong nga yis mchod/_/grangs med gsum po de la ni/_/rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/_/byang chub phyir ni spyod pa 
[\[275b.5\]]na/_/de tshe nga la skyo sems med/_/nga ni byang chub sems dpa' na/_/sangs rgyas mchog ni de dag mchod/_/'jig rten 'dren pa de kun gyis/_/nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan/_/ngas ni sngon bsams gang yin pa/_/nga ni smon lam thams cad rdzogs/_/ngas 
[\[275b.6\]]ni sangs rgyas khur bor te/_/sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_
[\[275b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zhus pa/_'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/_/thub pa khyod kyi byang chub thugs/_/thog mar gang du bskyed pa dag_/skal ldan chen po 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bdag la gsungs/_/khyod sngon byang chub spyod pa na/_/sangs rgyas ji snyed dus gang du/_/ji lta bur ni bsnyen bkur mdzad/_/mi mchog de ni bdag la gsungs/_/kun dga' bo yi tshig gsan nas/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'gro la thugs 
[\[276a.2\]]rje mdzad nas su/_/thub pas byang chub spyod pa gsungs/_/sangs rgyas 'dod chags bral thos shing /_/glang po dregs pa'i shas chen dang /_/'jig rten sdug bsngal gyur mthong nas/_/ngas ni byang chub sems bskyed do/_/mi dbang 'od ldan gyur pa na/_/ngas ni byang chub 
[\[276a.3\]]'dod pa'i phyir/_/ngas ni brtan por dam bcas te/_/skyon med pa yi sbyin pa btang /_/nga ni rdza mkhan gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas shAkya thub mthong nas/_/byang chub phyir ni thog mar ngas/_/mar dang til mar gyis mchod do/_/sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/_/tshong dpon bu mor 
[\[276a.4\]]gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas kauN+Di n+ya mthong nas/_/ngas ni mar me'i sbyin pa byas/_/sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thul ba'i/_/nga sngon sde snod gsum pa las/_/dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa la/_/dge 'dun la ni bud med smras/_/tshig gi nyes byas byung bas na/_/mod la bud 
[\[276a.5\]]med nyid du gyur/_/slar yang sems dad byas pas ni/_/skyes pa nyid ni thob par gyur/_/sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/_/nga ni rgyal po'i sras gyur tshe/_/gcen po rin chen gtsug tor la/_/mar me'i sbyin pas mchod byas shing /_/ngas ni zla gsum drug bcu ru/_/bde 
[\[276a.6\]]mdzad kyi ni zhabs 'bring byas/_/ngas ni mya ngan 'das pa de'i/_/mchod rten la ni nor kun phul/_/nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/_/sgra snyan dbyangs la zla gsum mchod/_/de yi mchod rten mthon po ni/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig rtsig tu bcug_/nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/_/sangs 
[\[276a.7\]]rgyas dpal 'byung mthong nas dga'/_/legs par thal sbyar de nas yang /_/mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas/_/nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na/_/bstan bcos du ma 'jigs med tshe/_/sangs rgyas phan par bzhed mdzad pa/_/nga yi stan la spyan drangs so/_/sngon ni dka' thub 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]ldan pa yi/_/drang srong chos la gnas gyur tshe/_/sangs rgyas kauN+Di n+ya mthong nas/_/ngas ni ri bo'i kha nas mchongs/_/drang srong gyur na'ang yid dga' bas/_/sangs rgyas blta na sdug mthong nas/_/rtsa ba dang ni 'bras bu'i phyir/_/bsti gnas bzhugs pa 
[\[276b.2\]]ngas spyan drangs/_/'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/_/drang srong gyur tshe bkur sti byas/_/shing shun yid du 'ong ba yis/_/ngas ni mi yi mchog bkab bo/_/nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/_/yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung spangs nas/_/byang chub 'dod pa'i ched du ngas/_/
[\[276b.3\]]yul 'khor skyong gi zhabs 'bring byas/_/sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/_/'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/_/bdun khri dang ni lnga stong gi/_/sangs rgyas rnams la nga yis mchod/_/grangs med gcig ni 'ongs pa yi/_/rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/_/byang chub phyir ni spyod 
[\[276b.4\]]pa na/_/de tshe nga la skyo sems med/_/grangs med pa dang po'o/_/bram ze khye'u gyur de yi tshe/_/'od dang grags par ldan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong nas/_/ut+pal sngon po bdun gyis mchod/_/nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/_/dka' thub spyod ces bya 
[\[276b.5\]]ba yi/_/sangs rgyas mtshan mnga' mthong nas ni/_/mi mchog la ni bla res mchod/_/rgyal por gyur tshe mun 'joms pa'i/_/skal chen la ni rin po che/_/sna tshogs bkra ba'i rol mo yi/_/mchod pa dag gis bzhengs gsol to/_/kun dga' mi dbang nga gyur pas/_/seng 
[\[276b.6\]]ge seng ge'i rtsal mnga' la/_/rin chen yu ba can gdugs kyis/_/mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas/_/rgyal por gyur tshe grong khyer ni/_/stong phrag drug bcu rnams su yang /_/mi yi nyi ma bde mdzad ni/_/spyan drangs nas ni mchod pa byas/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mi dbang 
[\[276b.7\]]la/_/bsro gang las dang de bzhin du/_/a gar nag po'i dri dag gis/_/bram zer gyur tshe zhabs 'bring byas/_/grong khyer rgyal srid 'phel bar ni/_/bram ze'i sangs rgyas sum bcu po/_/gtsug tor can zhes 'jig rten grags/_/rgyal por gyur tshe mchod pa byas/_/
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]grong khyer 'bras 'phel dag tu ni/_/sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga la/_/nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/_/tshangs par spyad pas mchod pa byas/_/grong khyer dga' ba de nyid du/_/nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa'i tshe/_/sangs rgyas gtsug tor 'jig rten grags/_/gtsug 
[\[277a.2\]]lag khang gis mchod pa byas/_/tshong dpon gyur tshe rgyal ba drug_/mchod phyir glang chen rta gser dang /_/bud med rnams dang nor bu yi/_/rgyan gyis skyed mos tshal byas so/_/rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis/_/grong khyer yid 'ong de nyid du/_/byang chub don du gnyer 
[\[277a.3\]]ba ngas/_/gtsug tor can la skra bregs so/_/kun dga' bram zer gyur pa na/_/thub chen ma 'gags de la ni/_/byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas/_/'bras bu mchog gis mchod pa byas/_/tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/_/'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/_/nor bu 
[\[277a.4\]]rin chen gyis mchod cing /_/gtsug lag khang ni nyams [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mchod/_/ded dpon du ni gyur pa na/_/byang chub shing gi drung na ni/_/sangs rgyas legs 'khrungs bzhugs mthong nas/_/thog mar bsod snyoms la spyan drangs/_/nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/_/
[\[277a.5\]]byang chub shing drung thub pa ni/_/'jig rten dga' mdzad blo bzang mthong /_/'khor ni stong dang rab tu byung /_/nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas tsan dan 'od dpag med/_/chu 'jam dang ni til mar dang /_/bu ram la ni spyan drangs so/_/kun dga' rgyal por 
[\[277a.6\]]gyur pa na/_/tshangs sbyin grags pa chen po pa/_/'dren pa la ni zhal zas dang /_/thams cad sbyin pas mchod pa byas/_/bram zer yang ni gyur pa na/_/thugs rje chen po 'od zer can/_/thub pa rkang gnyis mchog mthong nas/_/smra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mchod do/_/
[\[277a.7\]]rgyal por gyur nas sangs rgyas ni/_/don dam gzigs pa grong mchog tu/_/'jug pa de la ta la yi/_/lo ma'i bsil yab mchod pa byas/_/nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/_/'jig rten gsal mdzad sangs rgyas ni/_/shAkya thub la me tog gi/_/sil ma sna tshogs dri sbyar 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]mchod/_/grong khyer mchog tu mthor 'phags pa'i/_/mi mchog 'jug par mthong nas ni/_/rol mo rnams kyi sgra dag dang /_/me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas/_/rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis/_/sangs rgyas dam pa zhes bya ba/_/srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba la/_/thog mar 
[\[277b.2\]]shing rta dag gis bstabs/_/nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/_/gtso bo'i ched du lam bstan cing /_/dpag tshad brgya ni gang bar yang /_/me tog khang brtsegs mchod pa byas/_/sangs rgyas dgra zhi mdzad pa ni/_/grong khyer gshegs zhes ngas thos nas/_/lam ni rgyal mtshan 
[\[277b.3\]]yongs bkang ste/_/rgyal po'i 'byor pas bsu ba byas/_/nga ni mnyan par gyur pa na/_/shing rta'i yan lag chu 'gram du/_/byon pa ngas ni mthong nas ni/_/thub pa chu yi rgyun las bsgral/_/ded dpon gyur tshe dad pa yis/_/shing rta skal ldan chen po ni/_/ngas ni gru zam 
[\[277b.4\]]btags nas kyang /_/mtsho chen las ni bsgral ba byas/_/nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/_/rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas ni/_/tshangs la tsan dan sa mchog gi/_/ka bar ldan pa'i khang pas mchod/_/rgyal por gyur tshe sangs rgyas ni/_/bcom ldan tshangs pa'i tshe mchod cing /_/
[\[277b.5\]]snam sbyar rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas ni/_/ngas ni yams kyi nad zhi byas/_/tsan dan ldan la char med tshe/_/rgyal po lta bu'i sku khrus byas/_/de tshe lhas ni char phab pas/_/skye bo rnams ni skyabs su dong /_/nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan zla ba la/_/mchod 
[\[277b.6\]]nas ngas ni byams bsgoms pas/_/bdud kyis btang ba'i yams nad zhi/_/mi yi dbang por sngon gyur tshe/_/ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ba la/_/cho 'phrul phyir ni gsol ba btab/_/rgyal po dag tu gyur pa na/_/rin chen ri bo 'od chen 
[\[277b.7\]]ldan/_/'khor ni brgya stong phrag mang po/_/mthong nas lo lngar mchod pa byas/_/bram zer gyur tshe dad pa yis/_/sangs rgyas don kun sgrub pa ni/_/mtshan dang ldan pa mthong nas kyang /_/ngas ni bstod pa lnga brgya byas/_/bram zer gyur tshe yid dga' bas/_/sangs rgyas dbang po rgyal 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]mtshan mthong /_/ngas ni thal mo [(]lags [,]legs [)]sbyar te/_/dam pa stsol ba'i 'os zhes gsol/_/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa nas/_/thub pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bar/_/bdun khri dang ni drug stong gi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/_/grangs med gnyis 
[\[278a.2\]]pa tshang bar ni/_/rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/_/byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/_/de tshe nga la skyo sems med/_/grangs med pa gnyis pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bde mdzad dam pa la/_/rgyal por gyur tshe mchod byas te/_/mya ngan 'das nas mchod rten brtsigs/_/rgyal srid rab tu zhi 
[\[278a.3\]]bar byas/_/rgyal por gyur tshe dad pas ni/_/sangs rgyas gang po re skong la/_/tshul dang 'dra bar mchod byas te/_/chos kyi rgyal po zhes bsgrags so/_/sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la/_/tshong dpon gyur tshe legs par ni/_/rim gro byas shing mi mchog la/_/de bzhin 
[\[278a.4\]]gser gyi me tog gtor/_/nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/_/thub chen grong mchog gshegs de la/_/gser gyi dra bas mchod pa byas/_/nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/_/pad ma dam pa dpa' chen po/_/rgyal por grags pa'i grong mchog tu/_/
[\[278a.5\]]dngul gyi me tog sil mas gtor/_/nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas grags mchog slob ma yi/_/dge 'dun gyis ni mdun bltas pa/_/mthong nas mi mchog gnas kyis mchod/_/nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/_/legs gsung byang chub shing drung du/_/bzhugs pa 
[\[278a.6\]]ngas mthong glang po rta/_/shing rta dpung bu chung gis bsrungs/_/sangs rgyas dri med thub chen la/_/tshong dpon gyur tshe bsro gang dang /_/mchod rten las dang mar mes ni/_/de yi tshe na rnam par mchod/_/sangs rgyas sad mdzad rdo leb steng /_/snyoms par zhugs pa mthong nas 
[\[278a.7\]]ni/_/dad pas rol mo'i sgra kun dang /_/rgyal po'i 'byor pas bzhengs gsol to/_/tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/_/'jig rten dga' mdzad dgra thul la/_/sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na/_/lam ni sna tshogs brgyan pas mchod/_/tshong dpon gyur tshe yid dga' bas/_/
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]gnas 'jog gshegs pa thos nas ni/_/skyed mos tshal ni brgyan byas nas/_/ngas ni gtsug lag khang brtsigs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan skar 'od la/_/byang chub 'dod pas dad pas ngas/_/rgyal po'i mdzod ni thams cad nas/_/nor bu rin chen rnams kyis mchod/_/
[\[278b.2\]]nga ni rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/_/tog gis bdud rnams bcom nas ni/_/chos kyi rgyal srid bsgrags pa na/_/ngas ni rgyal mtshan kho na btsugs/_/b+ha ra dwa dza blo ldan pa/_/bram ze mya ngan 'das pa la/_/rgyal po ngas ni ril ba dang /_/dbyug gu gtsug lag khang chen byas/_/nga 
[\[278b.3\]]ni ded dpon gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa don gzigs pa/_/gser dang nor bu mu tig dang /_/dri yi snying po rnams kyis mchod/_/sangs rgyas don kun sgrub pa ni/_/sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na/_/rgyal por gyur tshe dpung dag gi/_/tshogs kun gyis ni mchod pa byas/_/
[\[278b.4\]]sangs rgyas don dam gzigs pa ni/_/grong khyer dam par gshegs pa na/_/rgyal por gyur tshe rol mo dang /_/me tog kun gyis mchod pa byas/_/nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas skar rgyal rkang gnyis mchog_/dri yi snying po de bzhin du/_/rtsa ba'i dri rnams rab tu gtor/_/rin 
[\[278b.5\]]chen bkra ba'i phug na yang /_/sangs rgyas skar rgyal la ni ngas/_/de tshe tshigs bcad gcig bstod pas/_/bskal pa dgu ni phyir bsnyil to/_/'bru 'tshong du ni gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnam gzigs la/_/de tshe byang chub spyod pa'i phyir/_/mud ga spar gang phul bas mchod/_/
[\[278b.6\]]tshong dpon gyur tshe ngas mchod pa/_/sangs rgyas mchog ni gtsug tor can/_/thub pa nyan thos tshogs bcas pa/_/zhal zas kyis ni zla gsum mchod/_/tshong dpon du ni gyur pa'i tshe/_/'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad skyob/_/skal chen nyan thos bcas pa la/_/zhal zas kyis 
[\[278b.7\]]ni gus par mchod/_/tshong dpon gyur tshe dad pa yis/_/sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa ni/_/bdog pa kun la spyan drangs nas/_/tshangs par spyod phyir blo gros bskyed/_/tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/_/yang dag sangs rgyas gser thub la/_/gtsug lag khang brtsigs dad pa yis/_/khyim 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]med par ni rab tu byung /_/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i tshe/_/dga' skyong gi ni tshig thos nas/_/'od srung rkang gnyis mchog las ni/_/rab tu 'byung ba'i blo bskyed do/_/byams pa drang srong gyur pa na/_/rgyal por gyur nas rim gro byas/_/byas pa gzo ba rjes 
[\[279a.2\]]dran nas/_/des ni nga la slar mchod do/_/gang yang sangs rgyas bde mdzad nas/_/sangs rgyas 'od srung bar du ni/_/ngas ni bdun khri bdun stong gi_/rgyal ba rnams ni mchod pa byas/_/grangs med gsum po tshang bar ni/_/rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/_/sngon ni byang chub spyod 
[\[279a.3\]]pa na/_/nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/_/nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/_/sangs rgyas mchog ni de rnams mchod/_/nga ni de dag thams cad kyis/_/'jig rten mdun du lung bstan to/_/ngas ni sngon bsams gang yin pa/_/nga yi smon lam thams cad rdzogs/_/ngas ni sangs 
[\[279a.4\]]rgyas khur bor te/_/sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung /_/shi bi'i rgyal por nga gyur tshe/_/sbyin pa dag ni thams cad btang /_/nga ni dus dpog gyur pa'i tshe/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/_/rgya mtsho'i tshong par gyur pa na/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin don du/_/srog chags 
[\[279a.5\]]rnams ni ma btang zhing /_/ngas ni rang gi srog btang ngo /_/nga sngon drang srong gyur pa na/_/bzod pa'i pha rol rdzogs bya'i phyir/_/yan lag rnams ni gtubs pa yis/_/nga yi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs/_/mi ma yin mo'i skyes rabs dang /_/de bzhin rgya mtsho bskams pa 
[\[279a.6\]]dang /_/de bzhin bdag ni bden dga' ba'i/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/_/sman chen blon por gyur pa dang /_/gnag lhas skyes su nga gyur tshe/_/shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas/_/de bzhin rnga bo che yang bsgrags/_/bram ze rab 'bar gyur pa na/_/ral par 
[\[279a.7\]]'dab chags tshang bcas kyang /_/bsam gtan las ni ma langs par/_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin brtson byas/_/snying rje yongs su bsgoms byas shing /_/pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs pas/_/khur lci ba ni ngas bor te/_/dam bcas pa yang rdzogs par byas/_/nga 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dang sangs rgyas gang phrad nas/_/mchod pa byas pa'i mi mchog ni/_/de kun mya ngan 'das par gshegs/_/nga ni byang chub la bzhag go/_/rgyal po 'od ldan dbang po nas/_/thub pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bar/_/sems can bye ba phrag stong ni/_/srid pa'i mtsho 
[\[279b.2\]]las bsgral ba byas/_/'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas te lha mir bcas/_/'jig rten 'di ni bsgral ba dang /_/sgrol bar mdzad pa smos ci dgos/_/ngas ni 'jig rten don gyi phyir/_/mya ngan 'das na'ang chos kyi gru/_/brtan pa dag ni 
[\[279b.3\]]bca' byas te/_/brgya stong phrag ni bsgral bar bya/_/mi gang sangs rgyas skyabs song zhing /_/mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas la/_/bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu de/_/'jig rten dag ni skyid de ba/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal la/_/bya ba cung zad byed na'ang de/_/
[\[279b.4\]]mtho ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni/_/bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/_/yang dag ji bzhin 'di thos nas/_/dge ba bungs ni bskyed de bya/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams sa re/_/sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so//_//
[\[279b.5\]]sangs rgyas 'od ldan dang /_shAkya thub pa dang /_kauN+Di n+ya dang /_'jig rten 'dren dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub dang /_rin chen gtsug tor dang /_bde mdzad dang /_sgra snyan dang /_dpal 'byung dang /_phan bzhed dang /_kauN+Di n+ya dang /_blta na sdug dang /_
[\[279b.6\]]spyan mdzes dang /_yul 'khor skyong dang /_mar me mdzad dang /_dka' thub mdzad dang /_mun sel dang /_bde mdzad dang /_dbang chen dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_spyan mdzes dang /_legs 'khrungs dang /_yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_
[\[279b.7\]]tsan dan dang /_tshangs sbyin dang /_'od zer can dang /_don dam gzigs dang /_shAkya thub pa dang /_mthor 'phags dang /_dam pa dang /_gtso bo dang /_dgra zhi mdzad dang /_shing rta'i yan lag dang /_skal ldan shing rta dang /_tshangs pa dang /_tshangs pa'i tshe dang /_
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]tsan dan dang /_dbang po dang /_dbang po dul dang /_rin chen ri bo dang /_don thams cad sgrub pa dang /_tha ma dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_bzod pa mdzad dang /_rdzogs ldan dang /_thams cad zil gnon dang /_rin chen gtsug phud dang /_pad ma 
[\[280a.2\]]dam pa dang /_grags pa dam pa dang /_gsung snyan dang /_dri ma med dang /_sad mdzad dang /_dgra thul dang /_gnas 'jog dang /_skar 'od dang /_tog dang /_drang srong dang /_b+ha ra dwa dza dang /_don gzigs dang /_don dam gzigs dang /_don thams cad gzigs 
[\[280a.3\]]dang /_rgyal dang /_skar rgyal dang /_rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log par dad sel dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_shAkya thub pa dang /_tha ma byams pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[280a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du ste/_de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rab tu mang po 
[\[280a.5\]]rtog khang du lhags shing 'dus par gyur nas skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/_shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig_/sngon ni bdag cag la rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang /_tshong pa dang /_tshong 
[\[280a.6\]]dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed par byas pas gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyang rnyed pa las/_da ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba la bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_
[\[280a.7\]]rjed par byed/_mchod par byed ces bya ba nas sman dang yo byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/des na da ltar bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad na/_de la da bdag cag gis ji ltar bya/_de nas kha cig gis smras pa/_tshangs par spyod 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa skyon yin pas de la skyon 'di gdags so/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_ji lta bu zhig bya/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gi nang na kun du rgyu gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de la sring mo dag tshur dge sbyong gau ta ma la skur 
[\[280b.2\]]pa thob cig ces spro bar bya'o/_/bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gang yin/_bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi yin no/_/de la spro ba bskyed do zhes de rnams kyis de pho nyas bkug ste smras pa/_sring mo shes par gyis shig_/sngon ni bdag 
[\[280b.3\]]cag gis bkur sti dang zhes bya ba nas nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/da ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas 'jig rten de la bkur sti byed pas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par gyur na/_
[\[280b.4\]]khyod kyis yal bar dor ram/_bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag gis de la ji ltar bgyi lags/_sring mo khyod kyis nye du rnams kyi ched du dge sbyong gau ta ma la kho mo dang lhan cig tu mi tshangs par spyad do zhes khyod skur pa 'debs par spro 'am de 
[\[280b.5\]]lta na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti sngon gyi bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze'i bu mo kun du rgyu rtswa mis gzhan mu stegs can dang /_kun du rgyu rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma la ni skur pa 'debs 
[\[280b.6\]]par bdag mi spro'o/_/sring mo khyod ji tsam du dge slong gau ta ma la skur pa 'debs par mi spro ba de tsam du bdag cag dang gtam 'dre bar mi bya/_phebs par smra bar mi bya/_blta bar mi bya/_rnam par blta bar mi bya zhing khyod gnas thams cad du 'dug tu mi gzhug ste/_
[\[280b.7\]]'gyod pa de nyid kyis dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do/_/bud med ni shes rab chung ba yin pas de skrag nas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_sring mo tshur khyod rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgyun 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]du song la dus tha gi tsam lon nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skur pa thob shig_/de nyi ma re re zhing langs te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/ji tsam na lto la snod cig bcings nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 
[\[281a.2\]]brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun du rgyu rtswa mi rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_
[\[281a.3\]]'od pa bzhin tu nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mi bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gsol pa/_bdag ni 'di ru sbrum bgyis nas/_/chags par 'gyur 
[\[281a.4\]]zhing dga' 'gyur ba/_/snyan cing 'jebs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/_/da lta chos ni gsung mdzad dam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang dag min pa smra ba dmyal bar 'gro/_/bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis gsol pa/_gang gis byas nas ma byas zhes 
[\[281a.5\]]smra'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dman pa'i chos can mi ni de gnyi ga_/pha rol dag tu 'dra bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi 'di ni bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 
[\[281a.6\]]'dun la yun ring mo nas mtho 'tsham par byed do snyam du bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la lhung bar byas so/_/de nas bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi skyengs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo /_/de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[281a.7\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchid kyang bka' stsal/_gang du thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa yang lung bstan/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal lags pas ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma dros par mchis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la cang 
[\[281b.2\]]mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar mdzad pa ni bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_ji srid sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang /_sems can 'gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[281b.3\]]chub tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad btul ba dang /_nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig tu bstan pa dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_sku tshe'i lnga cha btang ba dang /_mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa dang /_grong khyer 
[\[281b.4\]]gsal bar lha las gshegs pa bstan pa dang yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bkod pa dang /_mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/
[\[281b.5\]]don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig mtsho chen po ma dros par sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa gang na bar 'dong /_der rang rang gi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung 
[\[281b.6\]]bstan par bya'o/_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te mtsho chen po ma dros par gshegs 
[\[281b.7\]]so/_/gnod sbyin gtum po mi bzad gnas pa yid 'ong zhing /_/me tog sna tshogs shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa/_/de las rgya mtsho dug can dag tu 'gro ba yi/_/chu bo chen po bzhi po 'di dag phyogs bzhir 'bab/_/gang gA sin d+hu de bzhin pa k+Shu dang /_/si ta de 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]la rdzu 'phrul stobs thob pa/_/ma gtogs mi rnams kyis ni mi bgrod pa/_/der ni thub pa dge 'dun bcas par bzhugs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/_chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[282a.2\]]thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur yan chad kyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur bas/_de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bsams pa/_ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/_mtsho 
[\[282a.3\]]chen po ma dros par las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed par mthong ngo /_/de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa/_sdong po ni rin po che/_ge sar ni rdo rje las byas pa/_pad ma stong phrag 
[\[282a.4\]]du mas yongs su bskor ba zhig sprul pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la pad ma'i snying po de la bzhugs so/_/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang pad ma gzhan rnams kyi snying po la 'khod do/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la snam sbyar 'drub 
[\[282a.5\]]bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu sod la rab tu byung ba'i zla bo khrid de shog shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar gyur cing bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 
[\[282a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ston pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mtsho chen po ma dros pa na sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas khyod la gzhes kyis tshur shog 'dong /_des smras pa/_
[\[282a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po re zhig snam sbyar drubs la de nas phyis 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_grogs bya'o/_/de bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo lnga char gyis drub par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'o na lta drub zin du zad mod/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te khyod mi 'gro na mthus bkur bar bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ske rags rgya cang phrol nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu can 
[\[282b.2\]]rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/_re zhig khyod kyis 'di khyer la de nas phyis kho bo khyer cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_'di ni mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas gal te 'di khyer bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di 
[\[282b.3\]]yod do snyam nas des de bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i spyil btags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang /_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'gul bar gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_'dis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang khyer bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis ri'i 
[\[282b.4\]]rgyal po ri rab la gdags so snyam nas/_des de ri'i rgyal po ri rab la btags pa las/_yang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dag kyang g.yos par gyur/_ma dros pa yang kun nas 'khrugs shing dge slong 
[\[282b.5\]]gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang ldeg par gyur nas pad ma'i snying po la 'dug bzhin du de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ci'i slad du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dga' bo dang nye 
[\[282b.6\]]dga' bo gnyis g.yos pa ma yin te/_'on kyang nyan thos chen po gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di yang khyer bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi pad ma'i sdong po la gdags so snyam 
[\[282b.7\]]nas/_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi pad ma'i sdong po la btags pas ma 'gul bar 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe de'i rdzu 'phrul la rdzu 'phrul gyis rdugs pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba byas zin gyis 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]tshur shog 'dong /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po song shig dang kho bo 'ong ngo zhes byas nas ji srid tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ma phyin pa de'i bar du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sngar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te pad ma'i snying po la 
[\[283a.2\]]'dug pa dang /_de'i 'og tu tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po phyin pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'ongs sam/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo 'ongs so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[283a.3\]]zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/_'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da 
[\[283a.4\]]lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung ngo /_/de dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir yul dbus nas yul nas can zhes bya bar song ngo /_/de de na 
[\[283a.5\]]'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las/_des de ngal ba'i rim gro bar 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig byas nas btang ngo /_/des de'i rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas 'dug go/_/de nas des song shig ces smras na/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des bsams pa/_
[\[283a.6\]]gdon ma zos par 'di bdag dang dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir btang ngo snyam nas/_des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pa las ji tsam na zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por gyur to/_/de skyengs nas bsams pa/_bdag gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas kyis/_ma la bdag gis ni 'di rgyal po 
[\[283a.7\]]'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par bya'o snyam nas/_des sgo'i ngos logs la rang gi gzugs brnyan 'gegs pa zhig bris te/_sgo phag tu yib nas 'dug go/_/de ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de las thal ba dang /_de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis bsams 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa/_ring zhig lon na ci'i phyir de sgor ma byung snyam du bsams nas der song ba las ji tsam na 'gegs te shi ba mthong ngo /_/des bsams pa/_ci'i phyir 'dis bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas snyam pa las des 'khrul 'khor zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por 'dug pa mthong 
[\[283b.2\]]nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag nyid skyengs pas 'gegs so snyam mo/_/yul nas can gyi kun du spyod pa ni gang su'i khyim yang rung der mi glo bur ba shi na ji srid rgyal po la mi mthol ba de srid du des de la rim gro mi byed do/_/de nas de rgyal po'i drung du song ste mthol ba/_lha yul dbus 
[\[283b.3\]]nas ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig mchis te/_de bdag gi sdum par gnas pa las/_de la bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig bgyis te btang ba dang /_des de lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pas shing gi phung por mchis pa dang /_de skyengs 
[\[283b.4\]]nas bdag nyid 'gegs lags na/_lha de la g.yar snga 'brim pa zhig gtang du gsol/_de nas bdag gis rim gro bgyi lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la g.yar snga rims shig_/de rnams dong nas de mthong ngo /_/des bsams pa/_bdag 
[\[283b.5\]]gis ji ltar zung nga las dbab par bya snyam mo/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_'geg thag chod sta re khyer te thag pa gcod par brtsams pa las ji tsam na rtsig pa yin par mthong nas/_de nas 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to/_/de de ltar skyengs par gyur pa dang /_
[\[283b.6\]]ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon de sgo lkog nas phyung ste smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod kyis ni kho bo gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas te/_khyod ni rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni 
[\[283b.7\]]dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so/_/da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or gzhan zhig na ri mo mkhan gyi slob 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]dpon gnyis shig byung ba las rtsod par gyur te/_gcig gis smras pa/_nga ni bzo legs par shes so/_/cig shos kyis smras pa/_nga ni de bas kyang lhag par legs par shes so/_/de gnyis phan tshun 'gran par gyur nas rgyal po'i drung du dong ste de'i rkang pa 
[\[284a.2\]]gnyis la gtugs te gcig gis smras pa/_lha bdag ni bzo legs par 'tshal to/_/cig shos kyis kyang smras pa/_lha bdag ni de bas kyang lhag par legs par 'tshal to/_/rgyal pos de gnyis la sgo khang bstan nas khyed gnyis gang mkhas ni ngas mi shes mod kyi/_'on 
[\[284a.3\]]kyang gcig gis ni rtsig ngos gcig la bris la/_cig shos kyis kyang gcig la bris shig dang /_de lta na khyed cag gnyis gang bzo legs par shes pa ngas legs par shes par 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis kyi bar yol bas bcad nas ri mo bri bar brtsams te/_de la gcig 
[\[284a.4\]]gis ni zla ba drug gis ri mo'i las zin to/_/cig shos kyis ni zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar to/_/ri mo'i las zin pa gang yin pa de rgyal po'i drung du song ste son pa dang /_smras pa/_lha bdag gi ri mo'i las bgyis lags na spya nga brim du gsol/_de nas rgyal po blon po dang lhan cig 
[\[284a.5\]]sgor byung nas mthong ba dang /_ri mo'i las mkhas so zhes shin tu mgu'o/_/cig shos kyis kyang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_da bdag gi ri mo'i las la gzigs su gsol/_des bar chad kyi yol ba bshus dang /_gcig gi gzugs brnyan de la shar ba rgyal 
[\[284a.6\]]pos mthong nas ri mo'i las la lhag par 'di mkhas so zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so/_/de nas des slar yol bas bar bcad nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha 'di ni ri mo'i las ma lags te/_'on kyang rtsig ngos bstar ba lags so/_/de nas rgyal po je ya mtshan 
[\[284a.7\]]skyes nas smras pa/_'di ni bzo la lhag par mkhas pa yin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_gang gis zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar ba de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no/_/gang gis zla ba drug tu ri mo'i las byas pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong maud gal gyi 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bu 'di nyid de yin te/_de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so/_/da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di pham par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong dung dang /_bris pa zhes bya ba 
[\[284b.2\]]gnyis shig nye bar rten cing gnas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lhas char phab pas rdzab tu gyur te/_dung dred de rdzab tu rdeg 'chos nas ril ba chag par gyur to/_/de nas des dmod pa bor ba/_rang bzhin ngan pa khyod kyis da phan chad lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par 
[\[284b.3\]]gyur cig ces byas so/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas/_de nas de rnams de'i drung du song ste gsol ba btab pa/_drang srong chen po de ltar ma mdzad cig_/des smras pa/_bdag gis rang bzhin ngan pa bzod par mi nus te/_bdag gi dmod 
[\[284b.4\]]pas bcom pa des lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang /_skye bo'i tshogs des bris pa la gsol ba btab nas des gsol ba byas te lhas char phab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong dung gang yin pa de ni 
[\[284b.5\]]dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bris pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu yin te/_de na yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas pa de nyon cig_/bris pas dgos pa 'ga' zhig 
[\[284b.6\]]gi phyir dung gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa las dung gi rkang pa gnyis kyis ral pa mnan pa dang bris pas smras pa/_nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe khyod kyi spyi bo gas par gyur cig_/dung gis smras pa/_de ltar na nyi ma 'char bar ma gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_'jig rten du nam sros 
[\[284b.7\]]par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gis dung la gsol ba btab pa/_drang srong chen po de lta bu ma mdzad cig_/des smras pa/_nyi ma shar bar gyur na gdon mi za bar bdag gi mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/bris pas de la smras pa/_gal te de lta na 'ji 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pa las byas pa'i mgo zhig byos shig_/ji tsam na 'ji ba las dung gi mgo zhig byas pa las nyi ma shar ba dang gas par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_dung gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no/_/bris pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA 
[\[285a.2\]]ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin te/_de na yang 'dis pham par byas so/_/gzhan yang ji ltar pham par byas pa de nyon cig_/yul dbus su ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung nas ba so 'bras tsam bre'u chung gang khyer nas yul nas can du song ste/_de ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 
[\[285a.3\]]gi khyim du zhugs na de yang stong par 'dug nas de'i chung ma la smras pa/_grogs po'i chung ma 'bras bre'u chung gang po 'di tshos la byin cig ces de bzhag ste song ngo /_/des btso bar brtsams pa las shing zad par gyur kyang ma tshos so/_/de nas de'i khyim thab 'ongs nas smras pa/_bzang 
[\[285a.4\]]mo 'di ci zhig yin/_des rgyas par smras pa dang /_des de brtags pa las ba so 'bras tsam she dag tu mthong nas des de la co dri bar smras pa/_bzang mo 'di tshwa chu yin gyis/_chu bzang po gzhan zhig khyer te 'ongs dang /_des 'bras 'di tshos par 'gyur ro/_/des ba so mkhan gyi 
[\[285a.5\]]slob dpon la chu bzang po zhig khyer te shog shig ces smras so/_/des de la smras nas/_des phyogs gzhan zhig tu rdzing bu zhig bris te/_der khyi ro bam ba zhig kyang bris so/_/de nas ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon de bum pa khyer nas rdzing bu yin no snyam nas phyogs der phyin te/_khyi ro bam 
[\[285a.6\]]pa mthong ba dang /_des sna bkab nas brtag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na de'i chu snod de chag nas ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no/_/ri mo mkhan gyi slob 
[\[285a.7\]]dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin no/_/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes pa'i bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thob pa gang dag yin pa de 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]dag gi ming yang dge slong shA ri'i bus mi shes so/_/dge slong shA ri'i bus thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge slong maud gal gyi bus mi shes so/_/dge slong maud gal gyi bus thob pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang nyan thos gzhan rnams kyis mi shes te/_/dge slong maud 
[\[285b.2\]]gal gyi bu bas dge slong shA ri'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che mod kyi/_des mang du gnas pa la dgongs nas ngas rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu'i le'u'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_
[\[285b.3\]]smras pa/_de ni der song sngon nas spyad pa dang /_/rjes mthun tshig dag shin tu sgrogs pa na/_/gang zhig byas pas 'bras bu che myong ba/_/chung ngu gcig pu de ni myur dran nas/_/ji ltar seng ge ri yi phug gnas pa/_/'jigs pa med par spyod yul 'gro ba ltar/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i nyan thos 
[\[285b.4\]]'od srung de/_/sngon gyi gnas nas spyad pa sgrogs byed pa/_/zag med tha ba med pa rnam grol sems/_/nyon mongs med par gnas pa skyon med yid/_/de la chos mchog yod par yid ches nas/_/de yi chos la yid kyis smon byas te/_/rang sangs rgyas la bdag gis yon du ni/_/khre rgod bre'u chung gang 
[\[285b.5\]]zhig rab phul bas/_/de 'dra ba dang kun du phrad gyur ces/_/smon pas sgra mi snyan du skyes pa ni/_/las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis/_/lus can bdag gir 'dzin med tshe ring ba/_/khyad par 'gro zhing spyod pa mi dman pa/_/sgra mi snyan du lan stong skyes par gyur/_/las de gcig pu nyid 
[\[285b.6\]]kyi 'bras bu yis/_/lan stong sum bcu rtsa gsum par skyes te/_/me tog phreng rgyan byug pa sna tshogs dang /_/mthu chen lus mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur/_/de nas 'phos bdag sgra mi snyan du skyes/_/slar yang lha dge dga' bar byed pa dang /_/sems kyi smon lam dbang gis slar yang 
[\[285b.7\]]bdag_/mi ni dge ba rnams kyi nang du skyes/_/las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bus bdag_/bram ze sA la chen po'i rigs skyes te/_/nor mang skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bkur/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga don mi gnyer yang /_/bdag gis ston pa lan 'ga'ang ma mthong zhing /_/
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]mtshungs med nyan thos bdag gis ma mthong nas/_/bdag gi seng ras tshem gyon 'jig rten na/_/dgra bcom rnams la phyag 'tshal rab tu byung /_/bdag ni de ltar rab tu byung ba dang /_/rgyal ba bu [{]mangs [,]mang [}]mchod rten na bzhugs mthong /_/thub zhabs phyag 'tshal 
[\[286a.2\]]bcom ldan bdag gi ston/_/bdag ni khyod kyi nyan thos gyur ces gsol/_/'od srung ji skad smras bzhin byas te 'dir/_/khyod ston nga yin nga yi nyan thos khyod/_/gal te sdug bsngal kun las thar 'dod na/_/khyod kyis snyan par bshad pa'i chos snyan nyon/_/gang yang bdag la 
[\[286a.3\]]skyes mchog skyob pa ni/_/thugs rje chen po yis ni chos bshad pa/_/bsam gtan bzhi stobs dbang po byang chub kyi/_/yan lag lam gyi yan lag rnam par thar/_/de dag bsgom pa bdag gis dga' mgur thob/_/zag pa zad cing lus kyi tha ma bzung /_/lus kyi tha ma 'dzin 
[\[286a.4\]]pa rdul med pa/_/drang po 'di dag dang ni bdag gir phrad/_/de bzhin gshegs rgyal phun sum tshogs pa gsung /_/tshul khrims ldan pa gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur/_/bdag gi yid la ci dang ci bsams pa/_/thams cad grub ste srid pa'i tha ma 'di/_/bdag gi skye ba zad cing 'ching 
[\[286a.5\]]ba dang /_/srid pa kun nas langs pa nyid bcad de/_/bdag ni chos rgyal thugs las skyes pa'i sras/_/nyon mongs tshogs rnams zad pas mya ngan 'da'/_/bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis/_/sbyangs la gnas pa mchog tu bstan/_/zag pa med cing nyes pa bsal/_/go 'phang mi 
[\[286a.6\]]g.yo bdag gis 'thob/_/gnas brtan 'od srung de lta bur/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/'od srung gi le'u ste dang po'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_de nas dge slong 
[\[286a.7\]]gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus las ci zhig byas na las de'i rnam par smin pas shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur des smras pa/_bdag gis dgon par rang sangs rgyas/_/drang srong 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]dge sbyong zhir gyur pa/_/skal dang ldan pa chos gos ni/_/de tshe rnying pa gyon pa mthong /_/de la bdag gis sems dad pas/_/bang brgyugs nas kyang chos gos ni/_/drubs shing kha bsgyur de bzhin du/_/de la yang dang yang du gtugs/_/de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/de ni bar snang la 
[\[286b.2\]]'phags nas/_/rang gi gzi brjid kyis 'bar zhing /_/de nas mkha' la gshegs par gyur/_/bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/ji ltar bdag ni 'di 'dra bar/_/dbang rnon shes rab cher shog ces/_/de lta bur ni smon lam btab/_/bdag ni phyug po'i rigs su'am/_/ma rabs 
[\[286b.3\]]dag tu mi skye bar/_/bar ma'i rigs su skye 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu rab 'byung mang bar shog_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag_/bdag ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang /_/mi yi rnyed pa thob nas ni/_/khyim med par ni rab tu byung /_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/_/
[\[286b.4\]]rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/btsun pa bdag gis zla phyed kyis/_/'gro ba'i pha rol phyin pa thob/_/dge 
[\[286b.5\]]slong dge 'dun gud bzhugs nas/_/ston pas bdag ni mngon sum du/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rjes skor ba/_/shes rab can gyi gtso bor bstan/_/shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/shA ri'i bu'i le'u 
[\[286b.6\]]ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_da ni khyod kyis kyang rang gi 
[\[286b.7\]]las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan maud gal gyi bu chen pos dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag sngon drang srong gyur pa'i tshe/_/nags mtha'i dgon par gnas pa na/_/der ni skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas/_/bdag la rab byung 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]gsol ba 'debs/_/bdag gis brgyugs nas de yi skra/_/bregs nas kyang ni chos gos dag_/kha dog bsgyur nas de la byin/_/de yid dga' gyur de yi tshe/_/phyogs gcig tu ni nyer song nas/_/skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas des/_/rang byang chub ni reg gyur te/_/de 
[\[287a.2\]]nas mkha' la song bar gyur/_/bdag gis dad bskyed nyer song nas/_/de nas thal mo legs sbyar te/_/de na rdzu 'phrul mchog gsol zhing /_/smon lam gdab pa byas pa ni/_/drang srong che 'di ci 'dra ba'i/_/bdag gi rdzu 'phrul de 'drar shog_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis na/_/gang dang gang 
[\[287a.3\]]du skyes par ni/_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/bdag gi srid pa tha ma ni/_/mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/_/
[\[287a.4\]]mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thob/_/thams cad gzigs pas rdzu 'phrul can/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/_/dge ba chung ngu byas pa ni/_/bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/mi dge ba yi las gang yin/_/bdag gis lung bstan mnyan par 
[\[287a.5\]]gyis/_/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni/_/bdag ni tshong dpon khye'u gyur nas/_/khyim gyi phyi rol rtse rtse nas/_/zan gyi phyir yang zhugs pa las/_/de na pha ma gnyis ka ni/_/dben par 'dug pa bdag gis mthong /_/de gnyis mthong bas bdag brdegs shing /_/skyengs pas kyang ni spyo ba 
[\[287a.6\]]byas/_/pha dang ma ni gnyis ka la/_/yid kyis nyes pa byas pa ni/_/gang tshe chen por gyur pa na/_/'dam bu bcom pa bzhin bsad snyam/_/bdag gi yid kyis nyes byas kyi/_/lus kyis byas pa ma yin na'ang /_/bdag ni dmyal ba thig nag tu/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad nyams su myong /_/de yi 
[\[287a.7\]]las kyi lhag ma yis/_/bdag gi srid pa tha ma 'dir/_/mu stegs gzhan gyi dge sbyong gis/_/'dam bu bcom bzhin bdag gtog 'gyur/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal de nyid kyis/_/shi bar 'gyur te de nas ni/_/las rnams kyi ni lhag ma yang /_/tha ma zad par 'gyur ba yin/_/de bas pha dang ma dag la/_/
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]sems ni rab tu dad par bya/_/sems dad pa yi rgyu yis ni/_/sems can 'gro ba bzang por 'gro/_/de ltar gnas brtan pang nas skyes/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/pang nas skyes kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//
[\[287b.2\]]de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan tshe dang ldan pa pang nas skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_da ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[287b.3\]]ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa/_dge 'dun kun dgar bdag son na/_/khyams de'i phyag dar mthong nas ni/_/bdag gis phyags ma blangs nas su/_/de tshe dga' bas phyag dar byas/_/de nas bdag gis sems dad pas/_/khyams 
[\[287b.4\]]de gtsang mar mthong nas ni/_/ji ltar khyams de gtsang ba ltar/_/nyon mongs med par gyur cig smras/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/bdag gi gzugs ni bzang ba dang /_/blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur/_/de yi las kyi lhag mas ni/_/bdag gi lus ni tha 
[\[287b.5\]]ma la/_/bdag gi pha dang ma gnyis kyis/_/bdag ming mdzes ldan kho nar btags/_/mdzes ldan bdag ni btsas gyur te/_/gang tshe gnyen tshogs mdun phyin pa/_/de tshe gnyen ni thams cad kyis/_/mgu zhing yid dga' bkur sti byas/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes 
[\[287b.6\]]par byas/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gi nyon mongs med gyur ces/_/smon lam btab pa gang yin pa/_/bya ba byas te nyon mongs med/_/dgra bcom zag pa med pa yin/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad kyang /_/ka shi'i gos kyis phyags pa bas/_/
[\[287b.7\]]gang gis 'dod chags bral ba yi/_/drang srong 'chag sa gcig phyags pa'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling na drang srong gi/_/'chag sa thams cad phyags pa bas/_/gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi/_/re lde tsam dag phyags pa'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling na dge 'dun gyi/_/kun dga' ra ba kun phyags pas/_/
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]gang gis rgyal ba'i mchod rten ni/_/khru gang tsam zhig phyags pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis ni gang rtogs pa'i/_/khyad par de dag shes byas nas/_/bder gshegs mchod rten phyags nas ni/_/sems kyang rab tu dang bar gyis/_/de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/yon tan mang po shes pa 
[\[288a.2\]]yis/_/mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byos/_/'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/_/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/_/gang byas dran pa 'di lags te/_/de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang /_/'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong /_/de bas rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/mchod pa dag ni bzang po gyis/_/btsun pa 
[\[288a.3\]]'di ni bsod nams zhing /_/dam pa bla na med pa yin/_/rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la/_/sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i/_/yon ni chung ngur 'gyur ma yin/_/de ltar gnas brtan mdzes ldan gyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 
[\[288a.4\]]'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/mdzes ldan gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog tshe dang ldan pa mdzes 
[\[288a.5\]]ldan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_da ni tshe dang ldan pas kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/sna ma'i me tog rna rgyan byas/_/mgo la me tog phreng bcings nas/_/ne'u zla rnams kyis yongs bskor te/_/skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su byung /_/de na thub pa chen po pa/_/rnam par 
[\[288a.6\]]gzigs kyi mchod rten la/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen thams cad nas/_/legs par mchod pa bdag gis mthong /_/de nas ne'u zla rnams khrid nas/_/rang rang gi ni phreng ba kun/_/sems ni dad par byas nas su/_/mchod rten de la gdags pa byas/_/de na bdag gis de dag dang /_/skye bo mang 
[\[288a.7\]]po gzhan mthong nas/_/sna ma rna ba las bkrol te/_/de tshe mchod rten gdags pa byas/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/bsod nams byas pa mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/me tog gcig ni btang bas na/_/lo ni bye ba brgya phrag tu/_/bdag gis lha yi yongs spyad nas/_/de yi lhag mas mya ngan 'das/_/btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi/_/yon tan phal cher 'tshal gyur na/_/sems ni shin tu dad pa yis/_/
[\[288b.2\]]phyir zhing bsnyen bkur bgyis pa zhig_/de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/yon tan mang po shes pa yis/_/mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byos/_/'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/_/rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la/_/sems ni rab tu dang byas 
[\[288b.3\]]pa'i/_/yon ni chung bar 'gyur ma yin/_/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/_/gang byas dran pa 'di lags te/_/de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang /_/'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/yang srid skye ba zad pa dang /_/nyon mongs bcom nas bsil gyur pa'i/_/
[\[288b.4\]]bdag ni dgra bcom mya ngan 'das/_/bdag ni yang srid nyal ba dang /_/'khor ba gang du'ang nyal ma yin/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/'di yin len pa med par 'gyur/_/de nyid kyi ni rgyu yis bdag_/sna ma'i me tog ming 'di btags/_/sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing /_/srid pa'i mtsho 
[\[288b.5\]]las rgal bar gyur/_/de ltar gnas brtan sna ma ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/sna ma'i me tog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di 
[\[288b.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_/tshe dang ldan pas kyang da ni rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas ci zhig byas na las des bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams 
[\[288b.7\]]kyi mchog tu bstan/_des smras pa/_rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la/_/rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/_/bdag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi/_/gnas khang gcig cig brtsigs nas ni/_/bdag gis gnas khang de yi gzhir/_/ras phran rnams kyis sa gzhi g.yogs/_/sems dga' ba 
[\[289a\]]
