[\[289a.1\]]dang yid bde bas/_/de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byas te/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog zhi ba/_/rga med go 'phang reg par shog_/bdag gi bsod nams des ni bdag_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/bskal pa dgu bcur lha dang ni/_/
[\[289a.2\]]mi rnams su ni 'khor bar gyur/_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/_/tsam par tshong dpon mchog gi yang /_/bu gcig par ni bdag skyes so/_/bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang /_/pha yis thos nas 'dun gyur pa/_/gzhon nu la ni bdag gis nor/_/bye ba nyi shu sbyin par bya/_/bdag gi rkang 
[\[289a.3\]]mthil gnyi ga'i spu/_/shin tu phra zhing mnyen pa dang /_/reg na bde zhing 'jam pa yi/_/shing bal 'dab lta'i sor bzhi skyes/_/'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcu dang /_/bskal pa gcig 'di lhag par ni/_/sa gzhi gding bas ma g.yogs par/_/rkang pa 'jog ni ma myong ngo /_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/
[\[289a.4\]]ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/thams cad gzigs pas brtson 'grus can/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/_/zag med nyes pa spangs pa yi/_/go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob/_/gnas brtan bye 
[\[289a.5\]]ba nyi shu pa/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/de ltar ma dros mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/bye ba nyi shu pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang 
[\[289a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/des smras pa/_'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcur ni/_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha rnams dang ni mir skyes te/_/bdag gis 
[\[289a.7\]]ngan 'gro mi shes so/_/bdag gis dge ba mi shes te/_/phan tshun zla ba ltas 'ba' zhig gis/_/rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni/_/mthong nas de tshe bsnyen bkur byas/_/'gron bu drug bcu rnams kyis ni/_/dri dang phreng ba byug nyos te/_/mchod rten la ni gdags byas pas/_/bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur/_/dge ba chung ngu byas pa ni/_/
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/gal te rdzogs sangs shes gyur la/_/mchod rten de la bdag gis su/_/bkur sti byas par gyur na ni/_/legs pa mang byed 'gyur ba zhig_/de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/yon tan 
[\[289b.2\]]mang po shes pa yis/_/mchod rten bkur sti byos shig dang /_/'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/_/thams cad gzigs pas mang thos dang /_/sna tshogs gtam dang dge ba yi/_/spobs ldan tshigs bcad byed pa ni/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/_/de ltar gnas brtan ngag dbang ni/_/dge 
[\[289b.3\]]slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/ngag dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwa dza 
[\[289b.4\]]bsod snyoms len tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len gyis smras pa/_bdag ni tshong dpon bur gyur nas/_/pha yi khyim na dbang byed tshe/_/bdag gis pha ni 
[\[289b.5\]]yid bsrungs shing /_/ma la log pa mi mthun byas/_/pha dang sring mo spun dang ni/_/bran dang las byed rnams la yang /_/zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang /_/ma la spyo ba byas nas su/_/bdag ni ser snas zil non pas/_/ma la zas ni ma byin par/_/khros pas tshig tu smras pa ni/_/zas su rdo ba 
[\[289b.6\]]zo shig byas/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/rab tu tsha dang thig nag gi/_/dmyal bar lan mang lhung nas ni/_/sdug bsngal mi nyung thob par gyur/_/dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas/_/mi yi srid pa thob pa na/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/bdag ni rdo ba za bar gyur/_/skye ba de dang de dag 
[\[289b.7\]]tu/_/bdag gis rdo ba mang zos shing /_/de bzhin bkres skom sdug bsngal gyis/_/bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi srid thob pa 'di yin te/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/_/
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/thams cad gzigs pas seng ge yi/_/sgra sgrogs pa yi mchog tu bstan/_/bdag gis nyon mongs thams cad spangs/_/nyon mongs bral bas zag pa med/_/da dung du yang btsun pa dag_/de ltar rdzu 'phrul thob 
[\[290a.2\]]gyur kyang /_/phug na bdag gi zas mchis pa/_/rdo ba nyid du gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa ni/_/gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/_/las rnams chud mi za bas na/_/de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong /_/b+ha ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/de ltar ma dros 
[\[290a.3\]]mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/b+ha ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwa dza bsod snyoms 
[\[290a.4\]]len gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/_/tshong dpon bu phor gyur nas ni/_/bdag ni nor dang 
[\[290a.5\]]'bru mang zhing /_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis bkur ba dang /_/rgyal po dang ni grong mi dang /_/gsang tshig brjod pa rnams kyis bkur/_/blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang /_/dar la bab pa gzugs kyis rgyags/_/de nas bdag ni shing rtar zhugs/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis mdun byas nas/_/'dod pa kun dang 
[\[290a.6\]]ldan gyur cing /_/skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su byung /_/skyed mos tshal der dge sbyong ni/_/dbang po legs par bsdams pa dang /_/dbang po zhi bas rgyu byed pa/_/chos gos rnying pa can zhig mthong /_/dge sbyong de mthong bdag gis ni/_/yid mi bde ba skyes gyur te/_/de skyon med kyang mi sdug nas/_/smad 
[\[290a.7\]]cing spyo ba byas pa ni/_/kha dog ngan cing 'jigs par snang /_/mdze can lus ni lus rma can/_/sha bri ngan cing rtsa 'thon pa/_/rab tu byung 'di su yi yin/_/ngag gi nyes pa spyad pa dang /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/_/dmyal ba rnams su skyes par gyur/_/
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag_/kha dog ngan cing sdug bsngal ldan/_/mdze can lus ni lus rma can/_/sha bri ngan cing rtsa 'thon gyur/_/lag na gyo mo thogs shing rgyu/_/sha na'i ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon/_/phyag dar phung po'i steng na nyal/_/gnas med mgon med skyob pa med/_/zas kyi 
[\[290b.2\]]ched du sprang ba dang /_/gang dang gang du song na yang /_/dbyug pa can gyis phyir bzlog cing /_/de dag bdag la smod par byed/_/de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa der/_/bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/_/bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/sems can kun gyis bdag 
[\[290b.3\]]gi ming /_/nyes 'ongs pa zhes smad pa byas/_/kun gyi yid du mi 'ong bas/_/de tshe smad pa byed par 'gyur/_/bdag gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun gyis byas/_/skye bo'i tshogs ni chen po la/_/dam pa'i gnas ni ston pa mthong /_/skye bo'i tshogs de mthong nas ni/_/
[\[290b.4\]]ji tsam 'dod pa'i zas dang skom/_/rnyed par gyur na stes snyam nas/_/myur du brgyugs te phyin pa dang /_/skye bo'i tshogs ni chos kyi phyir/_/'dug pa de ni mthong nas kyang /_/zas sbyin pa ni med do zhes/_/bdag ni re chad slar log go/_/de nas thub pa thugs rje can/_/mgon pos bdag la 
[\[290b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_/'ongs pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am/_/stan 'di la ni khyod 'dug shig_/bdag ni dga' ba thob gyur nas/_/thal mo legs sbyar de'i 'og tu/_/ston pa'i zhabs la phyag byas nas/_/phyogs gcig tu ni bdag 'dug go/_/de nas ston pa thugs rje can/_/gau tam rjes su 
[\[290b.6\]]thugs brtse bas/_/rim pa bzhin gyi gtam gsungs pas/_/bdag ni bden pa mthong bar bgyis/_/bden pa mthong nas thub chen la/_/de nas bdag gis rab 'byung gsol/_/gau tam thugs rje chen pos bdag_/rjes su brtse bas rab tu phyung /_/'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa yis/_/bdag ming legs 
[\[290b.7\]]'ongs zhes btags shing /_/me yi khams la snyoms 'jug pa/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/_/de ltar gnas brtan legs 'ongs kyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/legs 'ongs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis kyang da rang gi 
[\[291a.2\]]las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_grong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni/_/tshong dpon phyug por gyur pa na/_/de ni mu ge byung gyur nas/_/drang srong rnams ni gso skal dgos/_/de na bdag gi gso 
[\[291a.3\]]skal du/_/skal dang ldan pa'i rang sangs rgyas/_/zag pa med pa'i bsil gyur pa'i/_/drang srong mdzes pa gcig cig byon/_/sems ni ser sna'i skyon can gyis/_/bdag gis sdig pa bsams pa ni/_/da lta'i dus su dge sbyong 'di/_/lo bdun du ni su zhig gso/_/khyi yi gcin ni 
[\[291a.4\]]bskol ba yis/_/de nas 'bras kyi chan btsos te/_/de na drang srong za ru bcug_/de tshe de ni 'chi dus byas/_/sdig pa'i las ni de byas pas/_/bsdus gzhom dang ni ngu 'bod dang /_/de bzhin tsha ba rab tsha ba'i/_/dmyal ba rnams su yun ring btsos/_/dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos 
[\[291a.5\]]bdag_/mi yi srid pa thob na yang /_/nad bu can la gzhan dbang dang /_/sdug bsngal gyis ni bdag dus byas/_/de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa na/_/mi sdug nad dang mi bzang pas/_/rtag tu bdag ni dus byas so/_/bdag gi skye ba'i tha ma ni/_/mi yi srid thob 'di 
[\[291a.6\]]yin te/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/btsun pa da ltar na yang bdag_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing zag 
[\[291a.7\]]med kyang /_/nad bu can la 'gre ldog pa/_/de lta bus ni bdag 'tsho'o/_/de ltar gnas brtan dga' yod kyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/ma 'gags pa'i grogs po dga' yod kyi le'u ste 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]bcu pa'o//_//sdom ni/_/'od srung shA ri'i bu dang ni/_/maud gal bu dang mdzes ldan dang /_/sna ma gro bzhin ngag dbang dang /_/bsod snyoms legs 'ongs dga' yod do/_/de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[291b.2\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_bdag sngon 
[\[291b.3\]]dgon pa'i drang srong gyur/_/grong du bsod snyoms phyir song na/_/rnam par sngos shing bam pa yis/_/bud med kyi ni ro zhig mthong /_/bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag byas te/_/skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas ni/_/rtse gcig shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/_/der ni mi sdug 
[\[291b.4\]]bsgom pa byas/_/bdag 'dug pa las de yi lto/_/rdol nas 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ba/_/thos par gyur nas bdag kyang ni/_/ting nge 'dzin las langs par gyur/_/de yi lto na yod pa yi/_/ngan skyugs dang ni khrag dang ni/_/rul pa'i dri dang mi gtsang ba/_/kun nas rab tu 
[\[291b.5\]]'dzag pa mthong /_/rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dang /_/snying dang de bzhin glo ba la/_/srin bu brgya phrag za byed nas/_/slar yang sems ni mnyam par bzhag_/de ci 'dra bar 'di de 'dra/_/'di ci 'dra bar de de 'drar/_/phyi yi ro ni mthong gyur nas/_/rang gi lus la gtod par 
[\[291b.6\]]byed/_/de nas ting 'dzin las langs nas/_/bsti gnas su ni slar log ste/_/de tshe bsod snyoms ma spyad de/_/zas kyang bza' ba ma byas so/_/gang tshe bdag kyang grong khyer du/_/zas kyi ched du zhugs pa na/_/yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs mthong nas/_/de la mi gtsang bsgom 
[\[291b.7\]]byas pa/_/de yi ro ni ci 'dra bar/_/gzugs gtogs de kun de 'dra ste/_/khong pa mi gtsang bas gang ba/_/thams cad smad pa yin no zhes/_/de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms pas/_/bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshad med pa/_/bzhi po legs par 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]bsgoms byas pas/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/_/tshangs pa yi ni 'jig rten skyes/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten shi 'phos bdag_/bA rA Na sI'i grong du skyes/_/tshong dpon mchog gi bu gcig par/_/dpal ldan bdag nyid der skyes te/_/kun la sdug 
[\[292a.2\]]cing yid 'ong ba/_/mthar phyin gnas ni thob par gyur/_/bdag ni nyin mo yongs rgyu zhing /_/mtshan mo dag ni nyal bar byed/_/myur bar de nas langs pa na/_/de na bud med mang po dag_/rdza rnga dang ni rnga chen dang /_/khar rnga pi bang sngas bcug nas/_/sgren mor bla rdol byed pa 
[\[292a.3\]]dang /_/lag brkyang nas ni gnyid log mthong /_/de nas bdag gi sngon gyi rgyu/_/mthu chen po ni skyes par gyur/_/bdag la de nas bud med la/_/dur khrod mi gtsang 'du shes byung /_/de nas skyo bar gyur nas ni/_/bdag gis sngangs pa'i tshig smras pa/_/grogs po bdag ni 
[\[292a.4\]]gtses gyur te/_/kun nas 'tshe bas reg par gyur/_/de nas mal nas langs nas ni/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas ni shod du babs/_/lhas ni rjes su snying brtse bas/_/bdag gi sgo ni rnam par phye/_/grong khyer nas ni mngon byung nas/_/'bab chu'i ngogs su nye bar song /_/bdag gis pha rol 
[\[292a.5\]]'gram na ni/_/dge sbyong dbang po bsdams pa mthong /_/bdag gis dge sbyong de mthong nas/_/sgra gsang stod de smras pa ni/_/dge sbyong bdag ni gtses gyur te/_/grogs po bdag la 'tshe bas reg_/de nas ston pas bdag la yang /_/de tshe bdud rtsi'i tshig gsungs pa/_/gzhon nu ma 'jigs 
[\[292a.6\]]khyod tshur shog_/'dir ni khyod la 'tshe ba med/_/bdag gis nor bu'i lham phud de/_/'bab chu yi ni ngogs rgal nas/_/sangs rgyas gang zag zla med pa/_/thugs rje can gyi spyan sngar song /_/de nas bdag skom thugs chud nas/_/gang zag zla med ston pa des/_/snyan pa'i 
[\[292a.7\]]chos ni bka' stsal pa/_/de ni so sor bdag gis rtogs/_/de nas bdag gis bden mthong nas/_/thub chen rab 'byung gsol ba btab/_/gau tam thugs rje chen po yis/_/thugs brtse ba yis rab tu phyung /_/mtshan gcig lon nas de nas ni/_/nyi ma 'char ka tsam na 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]ni/_/bdag gi zag pa kun zad cing /_/bdag ni bsil gyur mya ngan 'das/_/de ltar gnas brtan grags pa ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig 
[\[292b.2\]]pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed tshe dang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu 
[\[292b.3\]]ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/_/ston pa 'od srung mya ngan 'das/_/rgyal po kr-i kIs rin chen las/_/byas pa'i mchod rten chen po brtsigs/_/rgyal po kr-i kI grags ldan bu/_/bdag 
[\[292b.4\]]ni thu bor gyur pa na/_/bdag gis thog mar gdugs kyis ni/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten la gdags byas/_/dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa na/_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/skye ba de dang de dag tu/_/phyug cing 
[\[292b.5\]]longs spyod che ba dang /_/nor dang 'brur ni ldan pa yi/_/bdag ni yon bdag chen por gyur/_/bdag gis tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/_/sbyin pa mi nyung btang byas te/_/slong ba pa dang dge sbyong dang /_/bram ze so sor tshim par byas/_/shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/_/'dod chags 
[\[292b.6\]]bral zhing zag med pa/_/tha ba med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/_/lnga brgya po dag tshim par byas/_/dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/_/srid pa tha ma 'di la ni/_/shAkya phyug po'i rigs su skyes/_/btsas ma thag tu tshig smras pa/_/khyim 'di na ni nor 'bru dag_/ji ga cung zad cig yod 
[\[292b.7\]]dam/_/'di ltar sbyin pa ngas btang ste/_/dbul po rnams ni tshim par bya/_/dbul po rnams la zas byin dang /_/gtong bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/_/ji ga nor lta yod dam khyed/_/bdag la myur du legs par smros/_/de dag bdag gi tshig thos nas/_/yid 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]skyo bar ni gyur nas su/_/ma ma gtogs par phyogs dang ni/_/phyogs su rnam par rgyug par byed/_/ma ni bu la byams pa yis/_/de tshe bdag la 'di skad smras/_/lha 'am mi 'am gnod sbyin nam/_/khyod su bdag la myur du smros/_/ma gcig khyod kyi 
[\[293a.2\]]bu bdag ni/_/mi lags srin po ma lags te/_/sbyin bdag tshe rabs dran pas na/_/rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba spro/_/bdag gi tshig de mas thos nas/_/yid ni dga' bar gyur nas kyang /_/dbugs 'byin byed cing smras pa ni/_/bu gcig ci dga' sbyin pa thong /_/yo byad mang 
[\[293a.3\]]po rnams kyis kyang /_/bdag la mas ni gso ba byas/_/kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba/_/bdag ni blta bas ngoms mi myong /_/bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang /_/khyim de nor dang 'bru rnams dang /_/gser dang bran dang las byed pa/_/rnams kyang rtag tu 'phel bar gyur/_/dpal 
[\[293a.4\]]skyed khye'u zhig btsas gyur la/_/btsas ma thag tu smras pas na/_/bdag gi ming ni gnyen rnams kyis/_/dpal skyed ces ni bya bar btags/_/de nas bdag gis sbyin btang zhing /_/dbul po rnams ni tshim byas te/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/_/khyim med par 
[\[293a.5\]]ni rab tu byung /_/bdag ni rnyed med 'jigs pa'am/_/bu lon nyen pas rab byung min/_/de tshe dad pas rab byung nas/_/mngon shes drug po bdag gis thob/_/bdag ni rgyal po blon po dang /_/de bzhin grong mi rnams kyis mchod/_/zas dang btung ba gos dang ni/_/gnas 
[\[293a.6\]]mal yang ni rnyed par gyur/_/de ltar gnas brtan dpal skyed kyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/dpal skyed kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas 
[\[293a.7\]]brtan rab tu mang po rnams kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/_/bdag sngon spos 'tshong gyur pa las/_/rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi/_/dge slong dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/_/khyed cag ji snyed bzhed pa yi/_/snyun sman bdag gis dbul bgyis te/_/shun pa rtsa 
[\[293b.2\]]ba 'bras bu'i sman/_/dge 'dun bdag gis tshim par bgyis/_/dge 'dun dbyar ni spyan drangs nas/_/bdag la dge slong gcig cig gis/_/a ru ra gcig ma gtogs par/_/de na 'ga' yang slong ba med/_/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/_/bdag ni log par lhung ma 
[\[293b.3\]]gyur/_/sman sbyin pa yi rnam smin ni/_/mthu chen 'di ni blta bar gyis/_/dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni/_/bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/a ru ra ni gcig byin pas/_/yun ring mtho ris rnams su dga'/_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/_/yul 
[\[293b.4\]]'khor bsod snyoms len pa dag_/slob pa na yang ma myong ngo /_/nub gsum kho na rig pa ni/_/gsum po bdag gis mngon sum byas/_/ngan ngon gyis ni 'tsho byas shing /_/phyag dar khrod kyi chos gos 'chang /_/khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba dang /_/bdag ni 'dres par mi 
[\[293b.5\]]gnas te/_/bdag gi tshe ni lo brgya dang /_/drug bcu lhag cig lon na yang /_/da tsam bar du'ang bdag gis ni/_/na ba mngon par mi dran te/_/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/_/chung ngu bgyis pa 'di dran te/_/de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong 'dod/_/bde ba 'byung ba nyams 
[\[293b.6\]]su myong /_/de ltar gnas brtan bak+ku las/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/bak+ku la'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/_tshe 
[\[293b.7\]]dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/_/bdag ni lham mkhan gyur pa na/_/mu ge byung nas de nas bdag_/ko ba'i ras ma rnams 'tshed do/_/bza' 
[\[294a.2\]]bar bya ba kho na'i phyir/_/ko ba'i ras ma 'tshed pa las/_/dge sbyong gzhan zhig zas kyi phyir/_/bsod snyoms la ni byon pa dang /_/de la bdag gis sems dad pas/_/ko ras kyi ni thug pa byin/_/dge sbyong des ni longs spyad nas/_/de nas nam mkhar 'phags par gyur/_/
[\[294a.3\]]bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/_/thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/_/de nas gang dang gang du ni/_/song ba kun du 'breng byas so/_/dga' ba rgya chen thob nas kyang /_/de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/_/gnas brtan 'di lta bu dang bdag_/lhan cig 'dug par gyur par 
[\[294a.4\]]shog_/dge slong 'di yi las kyis ni/_/dri med chos ni gang reg pa/_/bdag gis chos de rig gyur ces/_/de tshe smon lam btab par gyur/_/kha dog ldan pa ma yin zhing /_/dri ni smad par gyur pa dang /_/ro dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i/_/sbyin pa bdag gis de 
[\[294a.5\]]tshe btang /_/dge ba chung ngu byas pas kyang /_/bde ba mang po myong bar gyur/_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/bdag ni skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par 
[\[294a.6\]]byas/_/bdag gis smon lam gang btab pa'i/_/byang chub dam pa 'di reg ste/_/bdag gis da ltar bsil gyur pa'i/_/mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob/_/de nas gnas brtan chen po ni/_/gnas brtan zhes bya mthu chen gyis/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi 
[\[294a.7\]]las ni lung bstan to/_/gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa gnas brtan gsum la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas de rnams kyis kyang lung bstan par brtsams pa/_bdag cag gsum ni spun gyur nas/_/lhan cig tshong dpon gyur pa na/_/
[\[294b.2\]]'od srung mchod rten ral pa dang /_/shag shig 'dug pa mthong gyur nas/_/tshong pa thams cad bsdus nas ni/_/des ni slar yang sar pa brtsigs/_/spun rnams dag ni lhan cig tu/_/gdugs gsum zhig ni gdags pa byas/_/dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/_/mtho ris 
[\[294b.3\]]gnas su yun ring dga'/_/mi rnams su ni slar 'ongs nas/_/phyug po'i rigs chen dag tu skyes/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma mthong nas/_/mu stegs gzhan las rab tu byung /_/nai rany+dza na'i chu ngogs su/_/cho 'phrul mdzad pa mthong nas ni/_/de nas de la rab 'byung 
[\[294b.4\]]phyir/_/bdag cag gis kyang gsol ba btab/_/de nas thugs rje can gyi ni/_/thugs brtses bdag cag rab tu phyung /_/bdag cag ga yA mgor son nas/_/gau ta ma'i bstan pa thos/_/de nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa dam pa thob/_/da 
[\[294b.5\]]ltar ston pa bkur byas shing /_/de tshe mchod rten mngon btud pas/_/bdag cag kun ni rab byung nas/_/bsil bar gyur te mya ngan 'das/_/lteng rgyas dang ni chu klung dang /_/ga yA 'od srung gnas brtan gsum/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan 
[\[294b.6\]]to/_/lteng rgyas dang /_chu klung dang /_ga yA 'od srung rnams kyi le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas dang /_chu klung 
[\[294b.7\]]dang /_/ga yA 'od srung rnams kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_bdag sngon dri 'tshong gyur pa na/_/dri rnams 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]'tshong la mkhas gyur pas/_/der ni de tshe nyo ba'i phyir/_/bud med gzhon nu ma dag 'ongs/_/der ni bdag gis gzugs ldan ma'i/_/bud med 'ongs pa mthong nas ni/_/'dren brkyang gis ni tshig smras shing /_/chags pa'i sems kyis reg par byas/_/
[\[295a.2\]]'du zhing lhan cig 'khod pa'am/_/mi tshangs spyod pa spro med kyang /_/ma brtags gzhan gyi bud med la/_/lag pas reg par byas pas na/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes/_/slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/_/lag pa g.yas pa bskams 
[\[295a.3\]]par gyur/_/de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa na/_/rtag tu bdag gi lag pa ni/_/g.yas pa zha zhing rnam par bskams/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/_/khyim med par ni rab tu byung /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bder gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa 
[\[295a.4\]]yang bdag gis thob/_/btsun pa bdag gis mi dge ba/_/gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/_/las rnams chud mi za bas na/_/de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong /_/da dung du yang btsun pa dag_/bdag ni rdzu 'phrul ldan gyur na'ang /_/lag pa g.yas 'di ji lta bar/_/g.yon pa de lta ma 
[\[295a.5\]]lags so/_/skyes pa'am bud med gang yang rung /_/byi bo byed pa gang yin pa/_/sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni/_/de ni sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa'i mis/_/rab 'bar me ni ji lta bar/_/gzhan gyi bud med rnam spang zhing /_/rang gi chung mas chog par gyis/_/
[\[295a.6\]]gzhan gyi bud med mthong nas ni/_/skyes pa gang zhig de la chags/_/dmyal ba'i tshor bas nyen pa yi/_/sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur/_/de dag gis de ltar sdig byas pas/_/sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan du na/_/yun ring dmyal bar de yi ni/_/'bras bu mi nyung nyams su myong /_/
[\[295a.7\]]bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'dir/_/bla na med pa'i gnas thob nas/_/sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing /_/bsil bar gyur cing mya ngan 'das/_/de lta bas na bde 'dod cing /_/sdug bsngal nyid ni mi 'dod pas/_/gzhan gyi bud med 'gro mi bya/_/de ltar sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]gnas brtan grags pas ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan no/_/gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa me skyes 
[\[295b.2\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa me skyes tshe dang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_rgyal 
[\[295b.3\]]po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/_/rnam par gzigs kyi tshangs spyod tshe/_/nyon mongs med ces bya ba yi/_/tshong dpon nor mang zhig tu gyur/_/thub chen rnam par gzigs pa yi/_/'khor ni stong phrag brgya dag dang /_/drug bcu rtsa gnyis yod par gyur/_/de tshe rgyal po bshes 
[\[295b.4\]]ldan dang /_/bdag gis mi yi khyu mchog ni/_/zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/_/phyir zhing bshos thang bskyed pa yis/_/tshogs dang bcas te tshim par byas/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas zla gsum du/_/bshos gsol de nas bshes ldan gyis/_/de tshe rjes gcod ston mo 
[\[295b.5\]]ni/_/bza' bca' dang ni na bza' dang /_/gnas mal dag dang ldan pa gsol/_/de nas skyed mos tshal bstar pa/_/rgyal po des ni phul bar gyur/_/de bzhin dge slong re re la/_/gos kyis kun nas g.yogs pa'i stan/_/brgya stong dag dang de yi tshe/_/gser gyi dra bas g.yogs 
[\[295b.6\]]pa yi/_/glang po shin tu legs brgyan pa/_/mi nyung ba dag sbyin par btang /_/dge slong re re'i spyi bor ni/_/de tshe gdugs kyang 'dzin par byed/_/de nas bud med legs brgyan lus/_/tsan dan a ga rus bskus pa/_/de dag dge slong re re la'ang /_/bsnyen bkur dag ni byed du 
[\[295b.7\]]bcug_/rgyal po des ni de lta bu'i/_/rjes gcod pa la bkur sti byas/_/drang srong gtso bo rnam par 'dren/_/rgyal pos tshim par byas pa dang /_/stan de phun sum tshogs mthong nas/_/de nas bdag gis bsams pa ni/_/bdag la bza' dang bca' yod kyang /_/'di 'dra ba yi 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]stan med de/_/phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra dang /_/glang po bdag la ga la bdog_/lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur ba/_/brgya byin bdag gi drung du 'ongs/_/de nas brgya byin bdag la smras/_/khyod kyi grogs po ngas bya zhes/_/des ni lha yi skyed mos tshal/_/mdzes shing 
[\[296a.2\]]yid du 'ong ba sprul/_/lha yi gdan ni bshams nas ni/_/lha yi g.yogs pa rnams kyis g.yogs/_/de nas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das/_/rnam gzigs 'jig rten gyis bkur ba/_/mi mchog de ni nyan thos bcas/_/gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs nas/_/sa srung 
[\[296a.3\]]la sogs glang po rnams/_/lha yi rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa/_/dge slong re re'i spyi bor ni/_/de tshe gdugs dag 'dzin par byed/_/de nas rnam par 'dren pa ni/_/lha yi zhal zas rnams kyis bstabs/_/thub pa nyan thos thabs cig la/_/bdag gis lha yi gos kyis g.yogs/_/dge 
[\[296a.4\]]ba'i las ni de byas pas/_/bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/bsod nams byas pas lha dang ni/_/mi yi nang du mdzes gyur pas/_/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/_/ngan 'gro bdag gis mi shes so/_/rnam par gzigs pa dpal ldan po/_/drang srong chen pos bsnyen bkur bas/_/bdag gi skye 
[\[296a.5\]]ba tha ma 'di/_/rgyal po'i khab tu bdag skyes so/_/gzugs can snying po'i grong khyer du/_/nor chen phyug po'i khyim du ni/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos ni/_/de tshe bdag rjed bkur sti byas/_/blon po rnams dang grong mi la/_/kun nas sdug cing yid du 'ong /_/lha yi 'dod pas rtag 
[\[296a.6\]]tu ni/_/srid pa 'dir ni bdag tshim byas/_/mir gyur na yang lha rnams kyi/_/'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong /_/de nas ded dpon bla na med/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa po/_/thub pa chen po thugs brtse bas/_/rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gyur/_/sangs rgyas shes 
[\[296a.7\]]rab chen po ni/_/rgyal po'i khab byon bdag gis thos/_/bcom ldan thub de gang na bar/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis song ba dang /_/'jig rten gsal ba 'od mdzad pa/_/sgron ma 'dzin pa mthong nas ni/_/de tshe babs te rkang pas ni/_/thub pa'i spyan sngar song nas kyang /_/thub pa che la 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]bdag mgu bas/_/zhabs gnyis la ni mgos phyag byas/_/skyes mchog la ni phyag byas nas/_/phyogs gcig tu ni 'dug nas su/_/'gro bas bsnyen bkur byas pa yi/_/dpa' chen bdud kyi 'ching ba bcad/_/ded dpon mi yi nyi ma ni/_/ring po ma thogs mnyes par byas/_/
[\[296b.2\]]'jig rten ston pa bla med pa/_/des ni bdag la thugs brtse bas/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bshad de/_/de tshe bdag gis so sor rtogs/_/de nas bdag gis thugs rje can/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'di skad gsol/_/dpa' bo bdag ni rab 'byung zhing /_/bsnyen par rdzogs par 
[\[296b.3\]]thob par 'tshal/_/de nas shes rab dam pa can/_/sangs rgyas gang zag zla med pas/_/dge slong tshur shog ces gsungs pas/_/bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/_/des na bdag ni bag yod cing /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan brtan po yis/_/bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das zhi ba'i/_/
[\[296b.4\]]gnas kyi dam pa reg par gyur/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/srid par 'khor bar skye ba dang /_/'chi ba rnams las bdag grol cing /_/mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa las/_/
[\[296b.5\]]thams cad du ni bdag grol to/_/de ltar gnas brtan me skyes kyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/me skyes kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe 
[\[296b.6\]]dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 
[\[296b.7\]]de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_ka shi'i yul 'khor dar byed pa/_/rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya byung /_/rgyal po kr-i kI'i bu tha [{]chungs[,]chung[}]/_/de yi tshe na bdag gyur to/_/'od srung dpal dang ldan pa yi/_/mchod rten chen po brtsigs pa dang /_/pha yi yid ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]de la gdugs bu chung zhig phul/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod rten la/_/gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa des/_/rab byung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/lhan cig 'grogs gyur smon lam btab/_/dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/_/gang dang gang du skyes par ni/_/bsod 
[\[297a.2\]]nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di/_/bang mdzod stug por bdag skyes te/_/der yang tshong dpon khyim du skyes/_/rigs kyi bu gcig par gyur te/_/mi dbang kau rab bya dang ni/_/de bzhin kun sdug yid du 'ong /_/de bzhin yul mi rnams 
[\[297a.3\]]dang ni/_/bdag ni gnyen tshogs yid du 'ong /_/mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang /_/gzugs bzang shin tu dbyibs legs shing /_/mi yi 'byor pa rnams kyis ni/_/'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs/_/ston pa dga' zhing yid 'ong ba/_/bang mdzod stug por gshegs pa ni/_/bdag 
[\[297a.4\]]gis mthong nas sems dad pas/_/rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab/_/ston pa gang zag zla med de/_/bsam pa kun la mkhas gyur pas/_/bdag gi bsam pa des mkhyen nas/_/rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa/_/pha ma dag gis ma gnang ba'i/_/gang zag dge yang sangs rgyas rnams/_/
[\[297a.5\]]rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad kyis/_/song la bdag nyid thar bar gyis/_/de nas khyim du bdag song nas/_/pha ma gnyis la smras pa ni/_/yab gcig gnang bar mdzod cig bdag_/khyim ma mchis par rab 'byung ngo /_/pha mas bdag las thos nas ni/_/de tshe yid mi bder gyur nas/_/bu 
[\[297a.6\]]gcig khyod ni bdag cag gnyis/_/shi bar gyur na'ang mi gnang ngo /_/de thos nas ni bdag gis su/_/gal te mi gnang 'di nyid du/_/zas mi 'tshal bar bdag 'gum zhes/_/sa la yang ni nyal ba byas/_/de tshe dkar po'i chos dag gis/_/bskul nas rab 'byung don gnyer zhing /_/
[\[297a.7\]]thar par 'dod pas zhag drug tu/_/zan ma zos par 'dug pa dang /_/de nas bdag dang mdza' ba yi/_/ne'u zlas pha ma la smras pa/_/'di ni gnang bar gyur na legs/_/khyed la shi bas ci zhig bya/_/gal te 'di ni rab 'byung bar/_/dga' na phyis kyang khyed cag gis/_/gson po nyid du 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]bltas so cog_/shi bar gyur na ci zhig rung /_/gal te rab tu byung ba la/_/'di ni dga' bar ma gyur na/_/khyed kyir zad mod pha ma las/_/gzhan na bu gnas ga la yod/_/bdag gi snyan smra ne'u zla la/_/pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa ni/_/gal te rab 'byung lta byed na/_/de 
[\[297b.2\]]lta na btang gzhan du min/_/de nas ne'u zla bdag gi drung /_/nye bar 'ongs nas smras pa ni/_/mkhas pa khyod ni pha ma yis/_/rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba ni/_/khyod la pha ma gnyis na re/_/gal te rab tu byung nas khyod/_/phyis kyang lta bar byed na ni/_/bu gcig song la rab tu byung /_/
[\[297b.3\]]legs zhes bdag gis mnyan byas te/_/de nas nyam ni brtas byas nas/_/ston pa'i spyan sngar song nas ni/_/'di skad ces ni tshig gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni gnang lags na/_/thub chen khyod kyi bstan pa la/_/bde gshegs rab 'byung gsol 'debs na/_/rgyal ba bdag ni rab 
[\[297b.4\]]tu phyung /_/de nas bdag ni rab byung nas/_/ston pa'i bstan la 'di ltar gnas/_/bdag gi kun sbyor thams cad zad/_/zag pa rnams ni bcom par gyur/_/bdag gis gdugs gcig btang bas ni/_/bde ba mang po myong bar gyur/_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha 
[\[297b.5\]]dang mi yi rnams su gyur/_/thams cad gzigs pas dgon pa pa/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/de ltar thugs rje che rgyal la/_/yid ni rab tu dad byas te/_/mchod rten la ni bkur sti byas/_/
[\[297b.6\]]'jigs pa che las rnam thar gyis/_/gnas brtan phyag dar khrod pa ni/_/yul 'khor skyong zhes grags pa yis/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/yul 'khor skyong gi le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu 
[\[297b.7\]]rtsa gsum pa/_de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sa ga tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sa gas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa gas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dpon gyi/_/gtso bo nor chen bdag gyur to/_/dbyar gyi dus su drang srong ni/_/lnga brgya dag ni nye bar byon/_/der ni tshong dpon lnga brgya yang /_/thams cad 
[\[298a.2\]]'dus par gyur nas ni/_/kun gyis drang srong re re zhig_/khyim khyim du ni bgo bar bya/_/rang gi don du kha zas ni/_/ji lta bu dag g.yo byed pa/_/dka' thub can de re re la'ang /_/rtag tu de 'dra kho na sbyin/_/de'i nang drang srong rgan po gang /_/de ni bdag gi skal bar 'ongs/_/tshong 
[\[298a.3\]]dpon mchog la de bzhin du/_/thub pa mchog ste 'tsham par gyur/_/bdag la lnga brgya pa yi zas/_/snod gang nas ni 'dren byed pa/_/de 'dra ba yi kha zas nyid/_/bdag gis dge slong de la byin/_/de nas de la bdag la ni/_/ser sna [(]shing [,]shin [)]tu mi bzad skyes/_/'di lta bu yi 
[\[298a.4\]]kha zas ni/_/bdag gis chung ma byin ma myong /_/sring mo ma yin de bzhin du/_/bu dang bu mo dag dang ni/_/phu nu la yang ma byin na/_/dge slong 'di la zla gsum du/_/sbyin pa lta zhig smos ci dgos/_/bdag ni lnga brgya po dag gis/_/gong tshogs chen por 'dir gyur gyis/_/ma la 
[\[298a.5\]]bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/_/gsad pa la ni brtson byas te/_/'di ni shi ba'i dus byas na/_/bdag la 'god pa mi 'byung zhes/_/de nas bdag gi sdig sems kyis/_/rta yi gcin ni bskol byas nas/_/nyes med pa ni gsad bya bar/_/kha zas rnams dang lhan cig byin/_/der ni 
[\[298a.6\]]zos ma thag tu yang /_/mi bzad pa yi nad langs te/_/rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dag_/ro smad nas ni zags par gyur/_/thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'/_/shes bzhin de nas dus las 'das/_/lha dang gnod sbyin gcig la gcig_/sgra ni shin tu sgrogs byed pa/_/kye ma 'o tshong dpon 
[\[298a.7\]]'di re sdig_/'di yis thub pa rang sangs rgyas/_/bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa/_/dbang ldan 'di ni bkrongs par gyur/_/nye du kun kyang 'khrugs nas ni/_/de nas bdag la smod byed pa/_/gang phyir thub pa 'di bsad pas/_/khyod kyis bsod nams min mang bskyed/_/nye du 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]rnams kyi tshig thos nas/_/bdag kyang yid mi bde bar gyur/_/drang srong de dag bsags nas ni/_/de nas bdag gis nyes pa bshags/_/bzod pa gsol nas de nas yang /_/nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags/_/lnga brgya la ni zhal zas kyis/_/gus dang bcas pas tshim 
[\[298b.2\]]par byas/_/bdag gis sdig pa de bshags nas/_/bzod gsol drang srong de dag ni/_/zas dang btung bas tshim byas nas/_/de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/_/gnas brtan 'di 'dra dag dang ni/_/bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog_/ji ltar 'di kun grol gyur pa/_/de bzhin 
[\[298b.3\]]'ching las grol bar shog_/bkren pa rnams kyi khyim du bdag_/lan 'ga'ang skye bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sems ni lan 'ga' yang /_/ser sna skye bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis rang sangs rgyas bsad pa'i/_/shin tu mi bzad las byas pas/_/de nas 'chi 'pho dus byas nas/_/dmyal ba rnams 
[\[298b.4\]]su skyes nas ni/_/yun ring lo ni stong dag tu/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong /_/slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/_/phyug cing nor chen gyur pa dang /_/'jig rten rnams kyis mchod bkur na'ang /_/bdag ni myur du 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu bdag 
[\[298b.5\]]ni nang grol dag_/'dzag pas 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/khyim pa'i rtags rnams spangs nas ni/_/khyim med par ni rab tu byung /_/bstan la brtson 'grus byas pas na/_/'dod chags thams cad yang dag bton/_/gang tshe len pa med pa yi/_/mya ngan 'das par bdag gyur na'ang /_/
[\[298b.6\]]rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma nang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dzag par gyur/_/bdag gis sdig las byas pa dang /_/dge ba'i las byas gang yin pa/_/dge dang sdig pa de dag gi/_/'bras bu de dag nyams su myong /_/mnyan yod dbus na skyes pa yi/_/dge slong mthu chen sa gas ni/_/dge slong 
[\[298b.7\]]dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/sa ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]byin pa can dge slong sa gas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_da tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_mu ge dag ni byung ba na/_/
[\[299a.2\]]grong khyer pa ni mtha' dag gis/_/lo bdun tshang bar dge slong gi/_/dge 'dun dag ni spyan drangs so/_/de na bdag gi skal bar ni/_/rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/_/bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa'i/_/thub pa mdzes pa gcig cig 'ongs/_/bdag gis dam bcas byas pa 
[\[299a.3\]]ni/_/las mi byed na bu dang ni/_/nang mi yang rung su la yang /_/bdag gis zas ni mi sbyin no/_/de ltar rnam par bsams nas ni/_/bdag gis sdig pa'i blo bsams pa/_/dge slong las mi byed pa 'di/_/bdag gis ci ste zas sbyin zhes/_/de nas drang srong bdag 'grogs 
[\[299a.4\]]nas/_/zhing las mtha' rnams blta ba'i phyir/_/mtha' dag tu ni bskor nas su/_/de yi 'og tu zas zar bcug_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/bsdus gzhom dang ni tsha ba yi/_/dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni/_/sdug bsngal kho na'i tshor ba thob/_/dmyal ba rnams 
[\[299a.5\]]nas shi 'phos bdag_/gang dang gang du skyes par ni/_/de tshe brtson pa mang byas na'ang /_/sdug bsngal kho nas zas rnyed do/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/yang dag dad pas rab 
[\[299a.6\]]byung nas/_/bdag gis zag pa rnams bcom ste/_/bdag gis mngon shes drug reg nas/_/dgra bcom nyid kyang thob par gyur/_/da dung du yang btsun pa bdag_/'di ltar rdzu 'phrul ldan lags na'ang /_/da lta lan mang song nas ni/_/sdug bsngal gyis ni zas sgrub bo/_/
[\[299a.7\]]lam ni ring por song nas kyang /_/bdag ni zas dag bsgrub pa na/_/gang tshe bdag ni dub gyur nas/_/de yi 'og tu zas 'grub bo/_/rus ni 'od srung las kyi ming /_/byin pa can ni mthu chen pos/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/'od srung byin 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]pa can gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//sdom ni/_grags ldan dang ni dpal skyed dang /_/bak+ku la gsum grags pa dang /_/me skyes dang ni yul 'khor skyong /_/sa ga 'od srung byin pa can/_/de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan 
[\[299b.2\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_
[\[299b.3\]]sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/_/bdag ni phag rdzir gyur pa na/_/phag rnams kha ni bcings nas su/_/'bab chu las ni sgrol bar byed/_/'bab chu las ni bsgral ba'i phyir/_/bdag gis chu dbus phyin pa dang /_/bskyod par gyur pas dbugs subs nas/_/phag rnams 
[\[299b.4\]]thams cad shi bar gyur/_/skyob pa med cing mgon med pas/_/bdag kyang 'bab chus khyer ba las/_/drang srong rjes su brtse ba dag_/'ongs nas bdag ni phyung bar gyur/_/de dag gis bdag de las bsgral/_/de nas bdag gis rab tu byung /_/bdag gis gdams ngag med par ni/_/
[\[299b.5\]]'du shes med la snyoms par zhugs/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_/lha rnams su ni bdag skyes so/_/lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/_/bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/_/khyim med par ni rab tu byung /_/rmongs shing g.yer po ma yin 
[\[299b.6\]]pas/_/bshad pa bdag gis ma rtogs so/_/btsun pa bdag gis zla gsum du/_/tshigs bcad gcig la zhugs nas ni/_/tshig bzhi pa yi rkang pa gcig_/rtogs pas 'dod chags kun bton to/_/btsun pa da ltar bdag gis ni/_/las gang bgyis pa dran lags te/_/bskal pa mi 
[\[299b.7\]]nyung yun ring du/_/'khor ba 'dir ni bdag gis brgyugs/_/'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/_/lam phran bstan gyis dkar gnag las/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/lung ni bstan pa byas pa yin/_/lam phran bstan gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas dge slong 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_/tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[300a.2\]]pa sprul khol gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_sangs rgyas 'od srung mya ngan 'das/_/tha mar byung ba'i dge slong ni/_/sde snod gsum ldan mang du thos/_/chos kyi ser sna can du gyur/_/dge slong gzhan dag shes gyur na/_/bdag dang mtshungs par 'gyur 'ong zhes/_/bdag gis 
[\[300a.3\]]dge slong rnams la chos/_/ma ston cing ni ma bshad do/_/bdag gi drung du dge slong gang /_/nye bar 'ongs nas 'dri byed na'ang /_/thams cad gdams ngag ma byin par/_/thams cad du ni spyos shing bgyi/_/dge slong rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas/_/de tshe bdag la bkur sti byed/_/chos ni rab tu 
[\[300a.4\]]mi ston pa/_/khyod kyi de ni bzang min zer/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus bab tshe/_/bdag gis chos ni gzhan dag la/_/ma bstan de ni legs min zhes/_/bdag ni yid la 'gyod par gyur/_/tshe yi lhag ma nyung ngu zhig_/zhag bdun lus nas bdag gis ni/_/rab tu byung ba rnams bsogs te/_/de nas nyes 
[\[300a.5\]]pa bshags pa byas/_/bdag gis nyes pa bshags byas shing /_/ser sna de ni rnam bsal nas/_/de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/_/don bzang ba yi chos bshad do/_/bdag gis blo la ci lcogs pas/_/legs par bshad pa'i chos thos nas/_/phan tshun 'doms shing gcig la gcig_/smra bar yang ni byed du bcug_/
[\[300a.6\]]de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/_/chos ni cung zad gcig bshad pas/_/'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa yi/_/lha yi 'jig rten dag tu dga'/_/lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos te/_/bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/_/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi dag tu/_/shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs su 
[\[300a.7\]]skyes/_/nor chen longs spyod chen po dang /_/gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang /_/thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing /_/phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar phyin to/_/khyim re nas ni skyes pa re/_/khyim med par ni rab 'byung las/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byor pas na/_/bdag ni rab 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]byung ma btub bo/_/rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa/_/bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/_/yang dang yang du rab 'byung ba/_/yang dag len pa skul ma mdzad/_/de nas ded dpon zla med pa/_/sangs rgyas la ni bdag gis gsol/_/[(]ra [,]re [)]zhig bdag gis lo bdun du/_/sbyin pa mi nyung gtang bar 
[\[300b.2\]]bgyi/_/bdag gis sbyin pa dag btang nas/_/lo bdun lon par gyur pa dang /_/shes rab mchog can khyod las ni/_/de nas bdag ni rab tu 'byung /_/lo bdun dag ni thogs ches la/_/tshe ni cung zad tsam yin pas/_/sang nyid 'chi yang su shes kyis/_/de ring nyid du brtul te gyis/_/bdag 
[\[300b.3\]]gis gus pas sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsung ni slar bzlog ma byas par/_/btsun pa bdag ni dgung bdun na/_/thugs brtses rab tu dbyung bar mdzod/_/bdag gis zhag bdun sbyin btang ste/_/phongs pa rnams ni tshim byas nas/_/bdag gi phyir ni nye du dag_/grong khyer du ni mel tshe btsugs/_/
[\[300b.4\]]snang ba chen po rnams kyis ni/_/grong khyer mchog ni gsal bar byas/_/skye bo dag gis ma tshor bar/_/rab 'byung phyir ni mngon du byung /_/bdag ni dad pas rab byung nas/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la brtson byas te/_/lo ni nyi shu lnga lon yang /_/sems mnyam pa yang ma thob bo/_/de nas bdag 
[\[300b.5\]]gi sdig pa'i sems/_/'dod la zhen pa skyes pa ni/_/bdud rtsi rtogs par ma gyur gyis/_/dman par slar ni bdag ldog snyam/_/de nas ngo tsha khrel yod pa/_/don chen dag ni skyes gyur pa/_/bdag la nye du'i tshogs smod cing /_/skyon du yang ni 'grang 'gyur ba/_/de ni bdag dang 
[\[300b.6\]]'tsham min zhing /_/de ni bzang po ma yin gyis/_/bdag lta gson na'ang ci ru rung /_/mtshon gyis gdab par bya'o snyam/_/mtshon rnon bdag gis blangs nas su/_/skyil mo krung ni bcas nas kyang /_/mtshon ni ske la gtad pa las/_/de nas sems ni rnam par grol/_/bdag sems 
[\[300b.7\]]tha ba las grol nas/_/yang dang yang du brjod pa ni/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/_/e ma'o chos nyid e re bzang /_/sngon ni bdag gi 'du shes gang /_/so so'i skye bo shi bla snyam/_/bdag gis srog la ma bltas pas/_/zhi ba dam pa thob par gyur/_/sngon ni 'khums 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]par gyur pa yis/_/dam chos ser sna byas pa gang /_/btsun pa de yi 'bras bu ni/_/sdug bsngal ba yis rnam par grol/_/bdag gis 'chi ba'i dus na chos/_/dam pa rab bstan gang yin pa'i/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i pha 
[\[301a.2\]]rol phyin/_/shAkya'i bu pho dbang po brtul/_/sprul khol mthu chen ldan pas ni/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/sprul khol gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa 
[\[301a.3\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_sngon 
[\[301a.4\]]ni phrag khur khyer ba yi/_/rtswa thun dbul por gyur pa na/_/bdag gis dge sbyong grags ldan pa/_/nyon mongs bcom la bsod snyoms phul/_/shAkya'i rigs la bdag skyes na'ang /_/bdag ni ma 'gags yin par shes/_/rol mo glu la mkhas gyur pas/_/pheg sgra phyad pas bslang ba na/_/
[\[301a.5\]]rdzogs sangs ga las bsnyengs med pa/_/ston pa bdag gis mthong bar gyur/_/mthong nas bdag ni sems dad pas/_/khyim med par yang rab tu byung /_/bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/_/bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/_/rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan zhing /_/gzabs pa'i 
[\[301a.6\]]bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa mthar phyung nas/_/rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/_/bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/_/sngon gyi gnas ni shes gyur te/_/sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams su/_/bdag gis lan bdun skye ba blangs/_/slar yang mi yi nang du ni/_/
[\[301a.7\]]mi yi dbang po lan bdun byas/_/de tshe 'dzam tshal dbang phyug gi/_/rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur to/_/'dir ni bdun dang der bdun te/_/bdag gis lan ni bcu bzhir 'khor/_/bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/_/gnas ni sngon du shes gyur te/_/las kyi 'bras bu de lta bu/_/bdag gis de 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]tshe nyams su myong /_/gang dang gang du skyes pa na/_/dga' ba dag gis rgyu bar byed/_/sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_/'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba dang /_/'di lta bu dang gzhan gyur shes/_/'phags pa'i yan lag lnga ldan dga'/_/yan lag lnga pa'i ting 'dzin la/_/zhi ba phyogs gcig 
[\[301b.2\]]goms byas shing /_/shin tu sbyangs thob lam gyis ni/_/lha yi spyan ni rnam par sbyangs/_/ston pa 'jig rten bla med kyis/_/bdag gi kun rtog mkhyen nas kyang /_/yid las byung ba'i sku yis ni/_/bdag drung rdzu 'phrul gyis byon nas/_/ston pa spros med la dgyes pas/_/spros pa dang ni bral ba 
[\[301b.3\]]bshad/_/bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/_/bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/_/rtag par pha rol gnon brtan zhing /_/gzabs pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/_/sangs rgyas bstan la mthar phyung nas/_/rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/_/'chi ba'ang mngon par mi dga' zhing /_/
[\[301b.4\]]'tsho ba'ang mngon par mi dga' ste/_/shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis/_/dus la so sor rtog par byed/_/yangs pa'i 'od ma'i grong khyer gyi/_/'od ma'i tshang tshing de'i drung du/_/bdag gi srog ni zad nas kyang /_/zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis bsod snyoms byin 
[\[301b.5\]]pas ni/_/'bras bu thob pa 'di yin te/_/rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa'i/_/ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byas/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/thams cad gzigs pas bsod nams can/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan 
[\[301b.6\]]to/_/de ltar gnas brtan ma 'gags pas/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/ma 'gags pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[301b.7\]]'dzin gyi bu nag po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nag po tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_/tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]bar byed de/_bu ram sbyor ba'i khang pa na/_/bu ram shing rnams 'tshir ba las/_/rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/_/nad pa gsor rung zhig 'ongs nas/_/bdag gis thub pa nub bdun du/_/bu ram til mar bsnyen bkur byas/_/skal ldan zhag bdun 
[\[302a.2\]]'das pa dang /_/de nas de ni mkha' la 'phags/_/de nas bran de nyer 'ongs nas/_/bdag la smras par gyur pa ni/_/yon gnas rab tu byung gyur pa/_/de lta bu ni song bar gyur/_/drang srong mkha' la song ngo zhes/_/bdag gis de las tshig thos nas/_/sems mgu ba dang yid 
[\[302a.3\]]bde bas/_/de yi tshe na dad pa byas/_/sems rab dang ba de dang ni/_/bu ram sbyin par btang ba des/_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/_/rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/_/ded dpon 'di 
[\[302a.4\]]ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/da dung du yang btsun pa dag_/bdag gi chos gos bsod snyoms dang /_/yo byad dang ni gnas mal gyi/_/
[\[302a.5\]]rnyed pa mang po skye bar gyur/_/bdag ni chos gos 'drub pa na/_/bu ram btung ba blud pa'i phyir/_/bdag la bu ram snod bzhi zhig_/dgos so snyam du bsams pa dang /_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/_/de nas lha yis smras pa ni/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin bu nag po la/_/bu 
[\[302a.6\]]ram btung ba byin cig dang /_/mi yi dbang po khyod kyis ni/_/bu ram btung ba don chen 'gyur/_/'tsho byed a mra'i tshal du ni/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bu la bu ram skyol/_/rgyal po'i mchog ni mthu chen po/_/gzugs can snying pos bdag la ni/_/snod chen bu ram gyis bkang ba/_/bzhi 
[\[302a.7\]]po dag ni bskur bar gyur/_/de nas des ni bu ram dag_/ro dang ldan pa khyer 'ongs nas/_/stong ni nyis brgya lnga bcu yi/_/dge slong dge 'dun tshim par byas/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin bu dgra bcom pa/_/mngon shes drug ldan mthu chen po/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]ni lung bstan to/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos rang gi las kyi 
[\[302b.2\]]rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_bdag sngon lus 'phags mi thi la'i/_/bdag po rgyal por gyur pa na/_/dgos pa zhig gi phyir 
[\[302b.3\]]'dug nas/_/skye bo rjes su bstan pa na/_/de nas drang srong dka' thub che/_/gzi brjid mchog 'jigs 'ongs gyur te/_/de ni nye bar 'ongs nas kyang /_/bdag la 'di skad tshig smras so/_/sa bdag bdag ni rkun ma ste/_/bdag gis ma byin chab 'tshal gyis/_/rkun po'i chad pa ji lta 
[\[302b.4\]]bar/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gcad du gsol/_/drang srong chos kyi yon tan dga'/_/de la bdag gis der smras pa/_/khyod la chu ni gnang bar byas/_/khyod ni song la ci bder spyod/_/rgyal po bdag gi 'gyod pa ni/_/de ltas bsal ba'i rngo mi thog_/bdag la chad pas gcod mdzod dang /_/'gyod 
[\[302b.5\]]pa dag dang 'bral bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis de ni skyed mos tshal/_/gzhir ni zhag drug spang ba byas/_/de ni zhag drug lon nas phyir/_/rang gi bsti gnas gnas su song /_/zhe sdang med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/sdig pa bdag gis byas pas kyang /_/rab tu tsha dang thig nag tu/_/lo ni drug 
[\[302b.6\]]bcu rnams su btsos/_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/_/ma yi mngal du lo drug ni/_/tshang bar yang ni 'dug par gyur/_/bdag ni zhe sdang med bzhin du/_/lus dang ngag gi las byas pa/_/las rnams chud mi za bas na/_/de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong /_/de ltar 
[\[302b.7\]]gnas brtan sgra can zin/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/sgra can zin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_rnam par 
[\[303a.2\]]gzigs kyi gsung rab la/_/bdag gis lan gcig khrus byas te/_/dge slong dge 'dun khrus byas nas/_/de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/_/gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang /_/bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog_/dag cing dri ma med pa dang /_/nyon mongs med cing zag bral shog_/
[\[303a.3\]]kha dog bzang po dag dang ni/_/gzugs bzang gyur ces smon lam btab/_/de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/_/lha rnams su ni skyes par gyur/_/bdag ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i/_/mi dang lha ni rnams su gyur/_/gang dang gang du skyes par ni/_/longs spyod chen pos shin tu gnas/_/
[\[303a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni/_/shin tu dkar po bdag gis brtsigs/_/de nas byug pas thams cad ni/_/ser por gyur pa de ltar byugs/_/de nas mtshan rnams 'dod pa'i phyir/_/gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur ba dang /_/gzugs bzang dbyibs ni legs 'gyur bar/_/smon 
[\[303a.5\]]lam du ni gdab pa byas/_/dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/_/grong khyer bA rA Na sIr ni/_/ka shi'i rgyal po kr-i kI yi/_/bu pho 'bring por bdag skyes so/_/'od srung mchod rten mthong nas ni/_/de nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de/_/mchod rten de la bdag gis ni/_/gdugs 'bring zhig ni 
[\[303a.6\]]gdags pa byas/_/khrus de dang ni bsro gang dang /_/yung gi byug pas byugs pa dang /_/gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa yis/_/bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/_/shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs skyes nas/_/sangs rgyas skyob pa'i 
[\[303a.7\]]mched du gyur/_/bdag gi lus ni 'di la yang /_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yod pa/_/sum bcu lhag pa ma yin pa'i/_/sum bcu dman pa ma yin pa'o/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]pa yang bdag gis thob/_/thams cad gzigs pas mdzes pa yi/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/_/nyes bsal zag pa zad nas ni/_/go 'phang dam pa thob par gyur/_/de ltar gnas brtan dga' bos ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi 
[\[303b.2\]]mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/dga' bo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba 
[\[303b.3\]]lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_'di ni bdag sngon tshong pa ni/_/nya pa zhes ni bya bar gyur/_/tshong pa'i lam du zhugs pa na/_/dbang 
[\[303b.4\]]du gyur cing zag med pa/_/nyon mongs med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/_/drang srong zhig ni 'gron par 'ongs/_/de yi bar du bdag gis ni/_/rtag par zas la mgron du bos/_/gang du brang ni 'debs 'gyur ba/_/der ni gding ba dag kyang bshams/_/rkang pa'i chu dang til mar dang /_/de yi mar me dag 
[\[303b.5\]]kyang bshams/_/ji srid lam yod de srid du/_/bdag gis de la bkur sti byas/_/tshong pa rnams kyis rim bzhin du/_/rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang /_/dge slong gru drung nyer 'ongs nas/_/bdag gis de la smras pa ni/_/btsun pa rgya mtsho 'di la ni/_/nor gyi slad du bzhud dam ci/_/btsun 
[\[303b.6\]]pa bdag cag phongs pas na/_/'dod pa dag gi phyir yang ni/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu tshogs la/_/nyen can du ni 'jug par byed/_/bdag la dge slong des smras pa/_/bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa yin/_/khyed cag gnyen kun lhan cig tu/_/nor cher bsod nams che bder gyur/_/de tshe de la bdag 
[\[303b.7\]]gis ni/_/rab [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]chos gos bzang po phul/_/mgo bos phyag ni byas nas yang /_/de la bskor ba dag byas so/_/de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/des ni chos gos blangs nas ni/_/de dag thams cad lta bzhin du/_/de yi 'og tu mkha' la 'phags/_/cho 'phrul byed pa de mthong 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]nas/_/de tshe bdag ni skyo gyur nas/_/bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas te/_/de nas smon lam btab pa ni/_/gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang /_/bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog_/'di yis chos ni gang dag thob/_/de dag bdag gis thob par shog_/rdzogs sangs rgyas 
[\[304a.2\]]ni mnyes byed cing /_/rab tu 'byung ba thob pa dang /_/dge 'dun la yang rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/rnam 'phrul bkur sti byed par shog_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/_/lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/_/mi yi 'thob pa thob nas kyang /_/bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/skye ba de dang de dag tu/_/bdag ni nor 
[\[304a.3\]]chen phyug pa dang /_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/bskal pa tha ma 'di la ni/_/srid pa tha ma 'di la yang /_/ku shi zhes bya'i gyad rnams kyi/_/gyad kyi bur ni bdag skyes te/_/blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang /_/gzugs bzang spyod pa mdzes 
[\[304a.4\]]pa dang /_/thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing /_/phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin no/_/sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge ni/_/bla na med pa mnyes par byas/_/mthong nas bdag sems dad byas te/_/khyim med par ni rab tu byung /_/ma ga d+hA yi ri brgyud nas/_/'od ma'i tshal du gnas byas 
[\[304a.5\]]na/_/dge slong dge 'dun mtho 'tsham pa'i/_/nyan thos dag cig der lhags te/_/gnas mal dag ni bskos na yang /_/dge slong rnams la spyo byed de/_/rnam par 'tshe zhing smod pa dang /_/yang dang yang du gshe bar byed/_/tshangs mtshungs spyod pa rnams mthong nas/_/bdag ni snying rje 
[\[304a.6\]]bar gyur te/_/bdag ni zag pa zad gyur kyang /_/nyid kyis dge slong bsnyen bkur bya/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams nas ni/_/bstan pa 'di la brtson byas pas/_/dgra bcom bdag gis thob nas ni/_/mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/_/ston pa'i spyan sngar song 
[\[304a.7\]]nas ni/_/thub la mgo bos phyag byas te/_/thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/_/skyes bu dam pa la gsol pa/_/'dod chags gti mug gis ma lags/_/byams sems gus dang bcas pa yis/_/thub pa bdag ni dge slong gi/_/rim gro bgyid par gnang bar mdzod/_/pha 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]rol sems la mkhas pa yi/_/ston pas bdag gsol mkhyen nas ni/_/nyid kyis dge slong dge 'dun mdun/_/gnyug ma'i rim gro byed du bcug_/byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ni/_/de bzhin ngag dang yid kyis kyang /_/bdag gis rtag tu sems smad nas/_/dge slong 
[\[304b.2\]]dge 'dun rim gro byas/_/spyod pa la ni zhugs pa dang /_/lam nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag_/bdag gis mthong nas dga' ba dang /_/so sor yid ni bde gyur nas/_/til mar rab 'bar lta bu yi/_/bdag gi sor lnga'i sgron ma yi/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan byas nas/_/
[\[304b.3\]]gnas mal dag ni 'cha' bar byed/_/dge slong gang dag bdag gi ni/_/cho 'phrul 'di ni lta 'dod na/_/nam ni sros par gyur pa dang /_/mun khung bdag drung lhags nas ni/_/de rnams la ni ci rigs par/_/byams sems gus dang bcas pa yis/_/gnas mal dag 
[\[304b.4\]]ni 'cha' byed cing /_/skye bo mang po skyo ba skyed/_/bdag gis bsams pa gang yin dang /_/bdag gis smon lam gang btab pa/_/bdag gis bzang po de grub cing /_/go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob/_/de lta bur ni gyad bu nor/_/zag pa med cing dbang gyur pas/_/ma dros 
[\[304b.5\]]pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/gyad bu nor gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye sde tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rang gi 
[\[304b.6\]]las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_/'das pa dag gi dus na bdag_/rngon pa dag tu gyur pa na/_/nags chen nyams dga' byul ba 
[\[304b.7\]]dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnam pa sna tshogs mthong /_/dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams dang /_/gzhu yi tshogs dag blangs nas ni/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang po'i ri yi rdzong /_/de yang der ni bdag gis brgyus/_/bdag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams mthong na/_/gdug pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/_/
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams kyis/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang po rab tu bsnun/_/bdag gi lag na gzhu dang ni/_/dug gis bskus pa'i mda' srel bzhin/_/rang sangs rgyas shig ljon shing gi/_/drung na bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur/_/bdag gis dge sbyong de 
[\[305a.2\]]mthong nas/_/de tshe yid ni mi bder gyur/_/de nas thub pa gnod med pa'i/_/lus la mdas ni bsnun par gyur/_/de yi 'og tu dge slong de/_/mda' yi zug rngu'i sdug bsngal ldan/_/shing de nyid kyi drung du ni/_/len pa med par mya ngan 'das/_/rtsub pa'i las de 
[\[305a.3\]]byas pas na/_/sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni/_/de la lo ni stong phrag tu/_/bdag gis sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/de nas dmyal las shi 'phos nas/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas song nas ni/_/ri yi rdzong ni de nyid du/_/bdag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams su skyes/_/rtag tu 'jigs 
[\[305a.4\]]shing bag tsha zhing /_/bkres shing skom pas nyen pas na/_/rid cing shin tu sdug bsngal bas/_/bdag ni de dang der rgyu'o/_/rdzong der rngon pa gdug pa ni/_/shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyis/_/dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnon gyis/_/bdag gi lus la bsnun par gyur/_/
[\[305a.5\]]bdag 'gyel de dag gis mthong nas/_/bdag ni gson zhing 'gul bzhin du/_/mtshon gyis yan lag rnams kyi sha/_/bcad nas de rnams khyer zhing 'dong /_/bdag ni sa phyogs de nyid du/_/sha yi ched du bsad byas te/_/de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[305a.6\]]mang po bsgrubs pa yin/_/ri bo de nyid ngos na ni/_/dka' thub ldan la mthu che zhing /_/rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa'i/_/drang srong rab tu mang po mthong /_/bdag gis drang srong de mthong nas/_/de nas byams pa'i sems bsgoms te/_/blo bzang byams dang ldan pa la/_/
[\[305a.7\]]yang dang yang du blta byas so/_/dka' thub ldan pa de rnams la/_/bdag gis gus bcas sems dad byas/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/_/bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/_/zas don gnyer ba'i slong ba ni/_/rang sangs rgyas shig mthong nas ni/_/gus pa yis ni rtag par de/_/
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]bdag gis zas la spyan drangs so/_/btsun pa de tshim byas nas su/_/de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/_/drang srong 'di lta bu dag dang /_/bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog_/rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing /_/bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/_/'jigs shing skrag pa med 
[\[305b.2\]]pa yi/_/zag pa med la gnas par shog_/dge ba'i las de byas pas na/_/lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/_/mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas kyang /_/phyug cing nor ni mang bar gyur/_/rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa/_/ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byas/_/bdag gis 
[\[305b.3\]]shAkya thub mthong nas/_/khyim med par ni rab tu byung /_/dad pas rab tu byung nas kyang /_/bstan la dga' bas gnas byas pas/_/bdag gis dgra bcom thob nas ni/_/mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/_/da dung du yang btsun pa dag_/bdag ni thams cad dbang gyur 
[\[305b.4\]]na'ang /_/phug gi nang du zhugs nas su/_/'chi ba nye bar gyur pa na/_/sbrul gdug shin tu mi bzad pa/_/bdag gi lus la 'bab par gyur/_/btsun pa bdag gis nyes spyad pa/_/gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/_/las ni chud mi za bas na/_/de yi 'bras bu nyams su 
[\[305b.5\]]myong /_/de ltar gnas brtan nye sde yis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/nye sde'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la 
[\[305b.6\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston 
[\[305b.7\]]par byed de/_dgon pa shin tu 'jigs chen gyi/_/mu ge dag ni byung ba na/_/rang gi zas ni don gnyer ba/_/slong ba po ni lnga brgya yi/_/de rnams kun gyi dpon gyur cing /_/de dag kun gyis gtsor bkur te/_/de rnams kun gyis bslangs pa yi/_/zas ni bdag la 'bul bar byed/_/
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]de dag bzang ngam ngan pa'ang rung /_/thob pa bdag la 'ged par byed/_/bdag gi tshig gis gnas pas na/_/de dag bdag la brnyas mi byed/_/mi zhig snum khur zhig khyer nas/_/tshong 'dus nang nas 'gro ba las/_/bdag gis de las mthus phrogs 
[\[306a.2\]]te/_/khyer nas de nas song ba dang /_/de nas bdag gis brgyugs pa dang /_/phyi bzhin du ni snyegs ma byung /_/smyags bcad bros par gyur pa na/_/de dag gis ni gzung ma nus/_/'bab chu'i pha rol rgal nas ni/_/bdag ni phyogs gcig 'dug nas su/_/'ga' zhig 'ong 
[\[306a.3\]]bar 'gyur snyam nas/_/mtha' dag tu ni lta bar byed/_/snum la g.yos legs byas zin pa'i/_/snum khur bdag gis zos na ni/_/des na bdag ni lto 'grangs pas/_/nyin zhag gcig ni thub 'gyur snyam/_/de nas skal ldan rang sangs rgyas/_/yang srid skye ba zad gyur pa/_/rdzu 
[\[306a.4\]]'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa/_/drang srong 'jigs pa zhig 'ongs so/_/bdag gi sems la bsams pa ni/_/sdug bsngal bkren par gyur pa ni/_/sngon chad bsod nams ma byas pas/_/des bdag 'di ltar bkren par gyur/_/ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/_/snum khur gtsang ma 'di sbyin te/_/bdag 
[\[306a.5\]]ni ltogs par shi bla yi/_/'di lta bkren pa mi rung ngo /_/de la bdag sems dad byas nas/_/yid mgu ba dang rangs pa yis/_/dge slong dam pa mchod 'os pa'i/_/yon gnas de la snum khur phul/_/skal ldan gyis ni de blangs nas/_/bdag nyid la ni snying brtse'i phyir/_/de nyid 
[\[306a.6\]]du ni longs spyad nas/_/de nas mkha' la 'phags par gyur/_/de nas smon lam btab pa ni/_/bdag ni bkren par mi 'gyur zhing /_/kha dog bzang po rnams dang ni/_/rigs btsun pa yang don du gnyer/_/gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang /_/bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs 
[\[306a.7\]]par shog_/khyod nyid kyis ni gang rtogs pa/_/de 'dra'i chos kyang shes par shog_/dge ba'i las de byas pas na/_/bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/_/lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/_/lha dang mi yi rgyal srid kyang /_/bdag gis mang po nyams su myong /_/
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]las de yis ni lan 'ga' yang /_/bdag ni ngan 'gror ma song ngo /_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/_/shAkya rnams kyi grong mchog tu/_/rigs btsun par ni bdag skyes so/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/_/yang dag sangs rgyas 
[\[306b.2\]]bla med pa/_/shAkya seng ge 'di mnyes byas/_/gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/nye du'i gnas su gshegs pa na/_/de tshe bdag ni nye du yi/_/mdun du bdar nas rab tu byung /_/bdag gi smon pa gang yin pa/_/de ni bdag gis yongs rdzogs te/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil 
[\[306b.3\]]gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/rgyal po'i rgyud las rab byung ba/_/sangs rgyas nye du bzang ldan gyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//
[\[306b.4\]]de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston 
[\[306b.5\]]cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_skyob pa log par dad sel gyi/_/mchod rten zhig ni rtsig pa na/_/de tshe bdag ni mkhar len pa/_/gla mir gyur te de nas ni/_/bdag gis mchod rten rtsig pa la/_/yang dang yang du dpyad pa ni/_/mchod 
[\[306b.6\]]rten 'di ni che ches pas/_/nam zhig na ni mthar phyin 'gyur/_/mchod rten 'di ni 'phang dma' zhing /_/chung ngu zhig tu byas gyur na/_/'god pa chung zhing nyon mongs med/_/myur du mthar yang phyin par 'gyur/_/las kyi rnam smin de dang ni/_/ngag gi nyes par spyad pa des/_/de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus 
[\[306b.7\]]byas te/_/dmyal ba rnams su skyes par gyur/_/dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag_/gang dang gang du skyes par ni/_/kha dog ngan cing bong chung la/_/bdag ni yongs kyis smad par gyur/_/'od srung gi ni gsung rab tshe/_/sngon ni khu byug phor gyur nas/_/bA rA Na sI'i lam gyi bar/_/tshal stug po yi nang 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]na gnas/_/de na 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun byas la/_/bdag gis 'jam dbyangs skad phyung zhing /_/nam mkha' las ni der bskor to/_/ji tsam yang dag sangs rgyas ni/_/bsod snyoms don phyir gshegs mthong na/_/'byung ba dang ni 
[\[307a.2\]]gshegs pa la/_/rtag tu yang ni bskor ba byas/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/_/bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla med pa/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil 
[\[307a.3\]]gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis/_/'jam dbyangs rnams kyi mchog dang ni/_/mang du thos dang chos 'dzin dang /_/dge ba'i spobs pa can du bstan/_/lha 'am yang na mi yang rung /_/'khor bzhi po dag bdag las ni/_/
[\[307a.4\]]snyan cing 'jebs pa'i chos thos nas/_/thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/dge ba nyung ngu byas pa dang /_/mi dge mang po byas pa yi/_/las rnams chud mi za bas na/_/de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong /_/de ltar gnas brtan mdzes bzang gis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug 
[\[307a.5\]]nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/mdzes bzang gi le'u ste sum bcu pa'o//_//sdom ni/_lam phran sprul khol ma 'gags dang /_/nag po lnga pa sgra can dang /_/dga' bo nor dang nye sde dang /_/bzang ldan dang ni mdzes bzang ngo /_/de nas dge slong 
[\[307a.6\]]gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi 
[\[307a.7\]]rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_bdag ni sngon ni yangs pa yi/_/spra chen spre'u dbang gyur pa na/_/lhung bzed mang po mthong nas ni/_/rgyal ba'i lhung bzed blangs pa las/_/dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]bdag bkag nas/_/de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/_/'di ni lhung bzed mi gcog gis/_/dge slong rnams kyis ma dgag zhig_/ston pa'i lhung bzed khyer nas ni/_/shing gi khar ni 'dzegs nas su/_/sbrang rtsis yongs su bkang nas kyang /_/dal bus rim gyis babs nas ni/_/
[\[307b.2\]]lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can thogs te/_/ston pa la ni phul ba las/_/ston pas srog chags bcas par ni/_/mkhyen te bdag las ma bzhes nas/_/bdag gis phyogs gcig song nas ni/_/de la srog chags yod mthong nas/_/srog chags med par gtsang byas te/_/ston 
[\[307b.3\]]pa la ni phul ba dang /_/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/_/bdag las sbrang rtsi ma bzhes par/_/ma brtags thugs su chud nas ni/_/bde bar gshegs pas ma bzhes snyam/_/de nas lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can/_/de tshe bdag gis chus btab nas/_/sems ni mgu dang dga' 
[\[307b.4\]]ba yis/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la phul ba las/_/de nas gang zag zla med pa/_/ston pa'i phyag 'jam gnyis kyis su/_/bdag la lhung bzed bzhes nas ni/_/de ni nyan thos rnams la gtad/_/bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/_/thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/_/de 
[\[307b.5\]]nas chos rgyal spyan snga nas/_/gar byed cing ni de nas song /_/de nas smon lam btab pa ni/_/mi nyid dag ni thob nas su/_/ston pa 'di la brten nas ni/_/byang chub dam pa 'di reg shog_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag_/mi yi srid pa thob nas ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla 
[\[307b.6\]]med pa/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang /_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag ni dgra bcom dbang gyur cing /_/mngon shes drug ldan rdzu 'phrul che/_/
[\[307b.7\]]dge slong rnams kyis bdag la ni/_/gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can du shes/_/bsod nams byas pas grags ldan pa/_/bdag ni rtag tu bkur zhing mchod/_/dge slong dge 'dun yongs bskor nas/_/bdag ni rgyu zhing song ba na/_/de nas dgon pa'i lam du ni/_/dge slong 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]dge 'dun skom gyur nas/_/de na sems la smon pa ni/_/de ring sbrang rtsi rnyed gyur cig_/de nas mi ma yin rnams kyis/_/bdag smon shes te phyogs bzhi nas/_/sbrang rtsi khur gyis blangs nas ni/_/de dag tu ni 'bul bar byed/_/bdag gis sbrang rtsi ci dgos pa/_/bzang 
[\[308a.2\]]po dag las blangs nas ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun tshim byas te/_/de nas lhag par legs par gyur/_/'das ma thag pa'i skye ba la/_/spre'u'i rgyal po de byas pas/_/log par ltung nas bdag 'phos nas/_/'chi med go 'phang reg gyur te/_/ji skad bdag gis smon pa yi/_/thams cad 
[\[308a.3\]]'byor pa nyid du gyur/_/ston pa bkur sti byas pas 'dir/_/rang gi don ni yongs su rdzogs/_/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba gang /_/bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te/_/de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang /_/bde 'byung 'dod pa nyams su myong /_/de ltar gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can/_/dge 
[\[308a.4\]]slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_/de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 
[\[308a.5\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_/tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung 
[\[308a.6\]]ston par byed de/_bshes ldan grong du bdag gis sngon/_/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/_/sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs pa ni/_/grong khyer dam par 'jug pa mthong /_/thugs rje che ldan mthong nas ni/_/me tog sil mas gtor nas der/_/me tog rtsa bas yar bteg cing /_/gyen du kha 
[\[308a.7\]]bltas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnas/_/de nas bdag ni rab dga' bas/_/thub pa'i zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/_/thal mo legs par sbyar nas ni/_/de la bskor ba byas par gyur/_/bdag gis chos ni ma thos shing /_/bdag ni skyabs su ma song bar/_/sems dad nyid cig byas nas ni/_/
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]bde gshegs drung nas bdag song ngo /_/mthu chen rnam par gzigs pa la/_/dge ba'i las de byas pas na/_/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/_/ngan 'gro mngon par mi shes so/_/bdag ni lha lus rab dga' zhing /_/lha yi 'dod pa yang dag 'byor/_/mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas kyang /_/
[\[308b.2\]]bdag ni nor chen phyug por gyur/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/_/nor che longs spyod che ba yi/_/bram ze rnams kyi rigs su gyur/_/sgra nges sbyor dang shes gsal bcas/_/skyes bu chen po mtshan dang ni/_/tshig gi don bcas ston pa yis/_/gsang tshig 
[\[308b.3\]]rnams kyi pha rol phyin/_/bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni/_/tshal du gsang tshig brjod pa'i phyir/_/bram ze rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/_/bdag ni khyim nas byung ba las/_/bdag gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun bdar nas/_/dpa' bo chen po ma ga d+hA'i/_/
[\[308b.4\]]grong mchog tu ni 'jug pa mthong /_/bdag gis thugs rje ldan mthong nas/_/yid dga' bar ni gyur pa dang /_/sngon gyi rgyu ni de dag gis/_/mtshan rnams la ni brtags pa las/_/'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan rnams ni/_/sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs rdzogs shing /_/dpe byad rnams kyis mdzes 
[\[308b.5\]]pa yi/_/grags par ldan pa mthong bar gyur/_/mtshan dang ldan pa de mthong nas/_/mgo bo yis ni phyag byas te/_/phyogs gcig 'dug nas gus pas ni/_/'dren pa de la mngon bstod pa/_/ji ltar gsang tshig la gda' ba/_/khyod la de bzhin de gda' bas/_/khyod sangs rgyas par the 
[\[308b.6\]]tshom med/_/'jig rten gyi ni ston pa mchog_/khyod ni tshangs pa brgya byin khyod/_/khyod las lhag pa ma mchis te/_/khyod ni nyi ma khyab 'jug lags/_/khyod ni 'jig rten bla na med/_/rgyal ba khyod 'dra'ang ma mthong na/_/lhag pa lta zhig ga la zhig_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/khyod 
[\[308b.7\]]ni rgyal ba bdud zil non/_/khyod ni mgon med rnams kyi gnas/_/rten med rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags/_/khyod kyi nyan thos nyid du mchis/_/khyod ni bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig_/de nas gser gyi mchod sdong lta'i/_/phyag ni de yis [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}]dzad de/_/rgyal ba'i phyag ni smad mdzad 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]nas/_/bdag gi mgo la kun du byugs/_/yid ni rab tu dang byas pas/_/khyod kyis bsod nams mang po bskyed/_/sems ni rab tu dang rnams kyi/_/yon chung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/yon gnas bla na med pa yi/_/sangs rgyas la ni khyod kyis bsten/_/bram ze
