[\[309a.2\]]khye'u yis mchod sbyin byas/_/zhing rab la ni sa bon btab/_/ngan song gi ni lam bcad pas/_/khyod la ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med/_/bram ze khye'u yis bdud rtsi yis/_/sgo phye bar ni dogs med byos/_/khyod ni rab tu 'byung 'dod na/_/ral pa kun ni myur spangs te/_/nga yi 
[\[309a.3\]]spyan sngar rab byung la/_/bram ze tha ba med par gyis/_/bdag ni chos nyid la dga' nas/_/de na slob ma'i tshogs smra ba/_/khyod ni bram zer gyur zin na/_/ji ltar dge sbyong mgo reg 'gyur/_/dkar po'i rigs 'di spangs nas ni/_/nag po'i rigs 'di khas len nam/_/
[\[309a.4\]]'jig rten na ni bram ze gtso/_/pha rol phyin cing tshangs pa yi/_/snying dang kha nas skyes pa yin/_/bram ze tshangs pas sprul pa yin/_/khyed cag kun ni mi mkhas pa/_/khyed cag kun ni mi shes pa/_/'di na bdag ci gsang tshig gi/_/de nyid rig cing pha rol phyin/_/bdag ni shes rab 
[\[309a.5\]]mtha' yas kyis/_/gsungs pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin/_/de bzhin du ni bdag byed kyis/_/gang dag der 'gro mi 'dod pa/_/ci sems ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/gar dga' der ni 'deng la rag_/bdag ni gsang tshig don mi gnyer/_/ltos par yang ni mi byed do/_/de nas bdag gi 
[\[309a.6\]]slob ma'i tshogs/_/mchi mas brnangs shing ngu bzhin gyis/_/snying ni rje rje skad smras nas/_/de nas de rnams phyogs phyogs dong /_/de nas thugs rje che ldan pa'i/_/thub pas bdag la gsungs pa ni/_/dge slong tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[309a.7\]]par gyur/_/khyim rnams nas ni khyim med par/_/yang dag dad pas rab tu byung /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa chub byas nas/_/mngon par shes kun reg gyur te/_/sngon gyi gnas ni rjes su dran/_/lha yi mig ni rnam par dag_/bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/_/'chi 'pho skye ba shes par 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]gyur/_/zag pa zad pa thob pas na/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul mngon du byas/_/de ltar gnas brtan rgyu can gyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/gnas brtan rgyu can gyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[309b.2\]]de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[309b.3\]]pa kauN+Di n+yas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_sngon ni thub chen 'od srung gi_/dam pa'i chos ni nub pa na/_/nyan thos thams cad 'dus nas su/_/phan tshun dag tu smras pa ni/_/ston pa thugs rje 'od srung ni/_/mya ngan 'das pas nges par yang /_/rab tu byung ba srab 
[\[309b.4\]]gyur cing /_/dam chos kyang ni ston mi 'gyur/_/bdag cag ji skad thos pa'i chos/_/phan tshun yang dag gsal byas nas/_/sangs rgyas bstan las spro ba dang /_/brtson 'grus brtsam pas gnas par bya/_/de dag ri la 'dzegs nas ni/_/zag pa zad pa ma thob par/_/re 
[\[309b.5\]]zhig 'di nas mi ldang zhes/_/rtswa yi gding ba dag la 'khod/_/srog la yang ni mi lta bar/_/brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa na/_/bdun gyis mngon par shes la reg_/dge slong dag ni mya ngan 'das/_/de yi bdun pa bdag yin te/_/dbang po brtul zhing bsod nams chung /_/
[\[309b.6\]]snyoms med sbyor la brtson pa yi/_/so so'i skye bo 'chi dus byas/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus ma btang zhing /_/de bzhin rab tu brtson gnas pas/_/dga' ldan rnams dang skal mnyam pa'i/_/lha yi 'jig rten rnams su skyes/_/de na shAkya seng ge yi/_/thub chen byang chub sems 
[\[309b.7\]]dpa' mthong /_/thub pa lha yi tshogs la ni/_/skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos ston mdzad/_/bdag gis de yi chos bshad pa/_/thos nas rtse gcig yid gyur te/_/dam chos yid la byed pa ni/_/lan 'ga'ang rnam par ma spangs so/_/lha yi 'jig rten bdag son nas/_/grong khyer ser skya 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i/_/kauN+Di n+ya rus bram ze yi/_/rigs can du ni skyes par gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen ldan/_/zas gtsang sras por gyur nas ni/_/dad pas byung nas dka' spyod pa/_/spyad par gyur pa de yi tshe/_/rgyal po'i mchog ni zas gtsang gis/_/
[\[310a.2\]]bdag bkug nas kyang smras pa ni/_/rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyis/_/der ni de yi nad g.yog byos/_/de tshe bdag gis yid dad pas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rim gro byas/_/lam 'di'i rnam dag 'gyur min zhes/_/yid byung nas ni gshegs par gyur/_/gang tshe shAkya thub 
[\[310a.3\]]pas ni/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/kun gyi thog mar bdag gis ni/_/de yi dam chos rtogs par gyur/_/'od srung gi ni gsung rab la/_/tshangs par spyod la bdag gis gnas/_/sangs rgyas bdag gis mnyes byas shing /_/zag pa zad pa thob par gyur/_/de ltar 
[\[310a.4\]]gnas brtan kauN+Di n+yas/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/kauN+Di n+ya'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor la 'di 
[\[310a.5\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed 
[\[310a.6\]]de/_bdag ni sngon gyi tshe rabs na/_/bA rA Na sI'i rgyal khab tu/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba'i/_/'dreg mkhan du ni gyur pa na/_/de yi skra dang kha spu rnams/_/'dreg cing 'chos par byed pa na/_/de nas mngon par rangs gyur nas/_/bgo bdag ni bdag la byin/_/gus dang bcas 
[\[310a.7\]]pa'i sdug sems kyis/_/rgyal po'i rim gro byed pa na/_/mnyes nas de nas de la ni/_/ma thos pa yi tshigs bcad bsgrags/_/'dod pa rnams ni mnog chung zhing /_/sdig pa'i rtsa dang mya ngan rtsa/_/rnam par smin pa rtsub pa yin/_/bram ze'i khye'u ni gang zhig gis/_/'dod pa'i yon 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]tan spangs nas ni/_/rab byung thob pa legs thob yin/_/ma thos tshigs bcad des thos nas/_/de nas skyo bar gyur pa dang /_/rgyal po bdag ni gnang bar mdzod/_/khyim ma mchis par rab 'byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos bdag la smras/_/gal te rab tu byung nas kyang /_/phyir kyang 
[\[310b.2\]]bdag la lta ba yi/_/khas blang ba ni bya ba'i rigs/_/rgyal dbang khyod la bdag gis ni/_/de bzhin bgyi bar dam bca' yis/_/bdag rab byung nas slar yang ni/_/lta bar bdag la thugs ches mdzod/_/de nas rgyal pos gnang nas ni/_/bdag gis dgon pa'i nags 
[\[310b.3\]]song nas/_/gzhung can drung du nyer song ste/_/khyim med par ni rab tu byung /_/ji ltar rigs par rab byung nas/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yi/_/tshad med pa la rab bsgoms pas/_/bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob/_/rgyal po de yi tshe la ni/_/de tshe bdag ming gang 
[\[310b.4\]]gA skyong /_/'byor pa che zhing mthu yang che/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis mchod par gyur/_/gzhung can drung du song nas ni/_/mgo bo yis ni phyag byas te/_/bdag gis phyogs gcig 'dug nas ni/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/_/slob dpon bdag gi tshig gson cig_/mi yi 
[\[310b.5\]]dbang po tshangs sbyin la/_/slar yang lta bar bgyi ba yi/_/dam bcas pa ni chung zhig mchis/_/gnang bar bya'o bram ze khyod/_/bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer song /_/khyod ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi 'gyur bar/_/dam bcas pa yi mthar phyung shig_/gnang bar bya yis khyod song la/_/kho 
[\[310b.6\]]bo yi ni tshig bzhin gyis/_/'di nas song la mi dbang po/_/tshangs sbyin dad pa skyed par gyis/_/gzhung can gyis ni bdag gnang nas/_/drang srong bskor ba byas nas ni/_/bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/_/rim bzhin du ni song ba las/_/de bzhin der ni bdag 'ongs zhes/_/tshangs sbyin 
[\[310b.7\]]nyid kyis thos nas ni/_/rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos ni/_/bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs/_/shing rta las babs bdag gi ni/_/rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/_/phyogs gcig tu ni 'dug par gyur/_/'dod pa rnams las rgal 'gyur ba'i/_/de la chos ni bshad pa dang /_/rgyal 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]pos thos nas yid dga' bas/_/'dod pa don du mi gnyer gyur/_/rgya che'i sems dang yid dga' bas/_/tshangs sbyin gyis ni 'di skad smras/_/bdag 'dod don du gnyer min pas/_/bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya/_/rgyal po tshur spyon dgon pa'i nags/_/
[\[311a.2\]]dben pa dag tu bzhud par bgyi/_/bram ze drang srong gzhung can gyi/_/drung du nye bar bzhud par mdzod/_/rgyal po des ni bu thu bo/_/'jigs med rgyal srid la bzhag ste/_/rgyal mchog rgyal srid spangs nas ni/_/khyim med par yang rab tu byung /_/nang mi dang ni blon chen dang /_/grong khyer 
[\[311a.3\]]pa ni thams cad dang /_/gnyen gyi tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas/_/rab tu 'byung phyir mngon du byung /_/gzhung can drung du song nas ni/_/mgo bos phyag ni byas nas kyang /_/rgyal pos thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab/_/stong phrag dag ni du ma dang /_/khyim 
[\[311a.4\]]med par ni rab byung ste/_/skra dang kha spu bregs nas kyang /_/ngur smrig gos ni bgos par gyur/_/gzhung can shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye 'gyur ba'i/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yi/_/chos ni kun la bshad par byas/_/gus dang bcas pa'i byams sems 
[\[311a.5\]]kyis/_/rgyal po de yi rim gro byas/_/de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas te/_/'od gsal rnams su song bar gyur/_/'od gsal nas ni shi 'phos nas/_/slar yang 'dir ni 'ongs pa na/_/gang dang gang du skyes par ni/_/nor che ba dang phyug por gyur/_/lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyi/_/
[\[311a.6\]]bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni/_/bdag gi lus kyi tha ma la/_/shAkya rnams kyi yul du ni/_/grong khyer ser skya zhes byar skyes/_/spyod yul spyod pa phun tshogs pa'i/_/shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan gyur/_/shAka sras thugs brtse'i bdag nyid can/_/nyan thos bcas 
[\[311a.7\]]la rim gro byas/_/rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pas ni/_/rab tu 'byung bar mngon 'byung ba/_/de rnams bdag gis skra bregs nas/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/_/dpon po 'tsho ba ma stsal na/_/bdag ni ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/de yi rgyan ni gang yin dang /_/gos rnams gyon pa gang 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]yin pa/_/'di ni khyod kyi 'tsho ba'o zhes/_/des ni kun dga' bdag la byin/_/rin chen mang po brtags nas ni/_/de la bdag ni skyo gyur nas/_/'di dag thams cad spangs nas ni/_/bdag ni rab 'byung gsol ba bya/_/bkren pa bdag la 'di lta bu'i/_/rin chen rnams kyis ci zhig bya/_/
[\[311b.2\]]gzhan 'ga' zhig gis thos na ni/_/srog la gdon lto za bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis nyid kyi snod spyad ni/_/gang yin shing la btags nas su/_/bor nas bdag ni khyim dag nas/_/byung ste nges par 'byung bar bya/_/bdag ni rin chen don gnyer min/_/bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya/_/bdag 
[\[311b.3\]]gi tshig de shAkya yi/_/rgyal pos thos nas 'di skad smras/_/khyod ni thog mar rab byung dang /_/rgan pa nyid du khyod 'gyur ro/_/rjes su thugs brtser dgongs nas ni/_/bdag la dge slong tshur shog gsungs/_/bdag ni thog mar rab tu byung /_/de nas rgyal rigs rab byung nas/_/bdag gi rkang 
[\[311b.4\]]la phyag byas pas/_/shAkya de rnams nga rgyal bor/_/de ltar bdag ni rab byung bas/_/mngon par shes pa drug reg nas/_/dgra bcom mngon shes drug ldan zhing /_/bdag ni 'dul ba'i pha rol phyin/_/ston pa nyid kyis 'dul ba 'dzin/_/rnams kyi mchog tu bsngags pa ste/_/dge slong 
[\[311b.5\]]dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/nye ba 'khor gyis las lung bstan/_/nye ba 'khor gyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni/_/gnas brtan 'od byed la gsungs pa/_/khyod kyis sngon byas gang yin pa'i/_/rang gi las ni 
[\[311b.6\]]lung ston cig_/rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs thos nas ni/_/sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis pa'i/_/rang gi las ni dran pa gang /_/de ni thub pa'i spyan sngar gsol/_/'jig rten gtso bo skyob pa po/_/sangs rgyas pad ma bla ma yi/_/mchod rten tshal stug bzhugs pa ni/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa rnams 
[\[311b.7\]]kyis bsten/_/mchod rten de la phyag bgyid pa/_/rngo thog pa ni 'ga' ma mchis/_/mi de rnams ni bsod nams dang /_/sdig pa rab tu ma 'tshal to/_/bdag gis song nas shing rnams dang /_/rtswa rnams bsal ba bgyis nas ni/_/phyags ma dag ni blangs nas kyang /_/de nas thams cad phyag 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]dar bgyis/_/bskor ba brgyad dang phyag bgyis te/_/mchod pa bgyis nas slar log lags/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag_/lha rnams su ni skyes pa na/_/'dod pa thams cad 'byor gyur cing /_/sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams su dga'/_/lha yul lha yi rgyal srid ni/_/
[\[312a.2\]]sum bcu rtsa drug bar du bgyis/_/de na bdag gi gnas mchis pa/_/gser gyi 'od ni shin tu gsal/_/rgyar ni dpag tshad sum bcu drug_/khor yug dpag tshad drug bcu tham/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/_/ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/_/mi yi nang du mi dbang ni/_/lan 
[\[312a.3\]]bdun bar du bgyis par gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/_/ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/_/bdag gi lus kyi gzi brjid ni/_/gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/_/ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/_/bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang /_/
[\[312a.4\]]rigs gnyis su ni bdag skyes lags/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/_/bdag la ngo mtshar gzhan byung ba/_/khyogs dang glang chen stong dang ni/_/bzhon pa mchog ni rnams kyis mchi/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/_/bdag la ngo mtshar gzhan byung ba/_/bdag gi mdun 
[\[312a.5\]]na sdong dum dang /_/tsher ma gyo mo rang nyid sel/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/_/ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/_/skad cig tsam yang bdag gis su/_/bro 'tshal bar ni mi dran lags/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/_/bdag la ngo mtshar gzhan byung ba/_/gang dang gang 
[\[312a.6\]]du bdag mchi bar/_/kun du bkra shis phun sum tshogs/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/_/ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/_/rtag tu bkur zhing mchod pas na/_/lha yi spyod pa lta bu mchi/_/skyob pa'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/_/ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/_/bdag gis 
[\[312a.7\]]lus la lan 'ga' yang /_/gnod pa byung bar mi dran lags/_/de ltar sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos/_/dri ma med pa bsam mi khyab/_/bsam mi khyab la mngon dad pa'i/_/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu che/_/de bas rga shi zad pa dang /_/phun sum 'byor pa 'dod pas ni/_/rgyal ba yi ni 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]mchod rten la/_/mchod pa bla na med pa gyis/_/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba gang /_/bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te/_/de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing /_/bde 'byung 'dod pa nyams su myong /_/de ltar dge slong 'od byed kyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho 
[\[312b.2\]]chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan to/_/'od byed kyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru tshe dang ldan pa 'od byed kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung 
[\[312b.3\]]bstan zin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa nam grus kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/_'di nas bskal pa bye ba'i sngon/_/sangs rgyas kun zil gnon de la/_/bdag gis dge ba gang bgyis pa/_/btsun pa 
[\[312b.4\]]bdag gis dran lags te/_/brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi/_/nyan thos rnams kyis mdun bdar nas/_/rgyal po'i pho brang dpe med du/_/skyes bu dam pa gshegs pa na/_/bdag kyang dgos pa zhig gi phyir/_/grong khyer gzhan nas der phyin nas/_/de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/mtshan mchog sum 
[\[312b.5\]]bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/_/me dang nor bu glog 'od dang /_/nyi ma zla ba'i 'od 'dra mthong /_/'od kun zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/sangs rgyas gzi brjid khyad par 'phags/_/gzi brjid me phung lta bu ste/_/sngon ma mthong ba mthong nas ni/_/bdag gi mdun na 'dug pa yi/_/bram ze zhig la dris pa 
[\[312b.6\]]dang /_/dris pas bdag la 'di skad smras/_/'di ni sangs rgyas rnam 'dren pa/_/lha dang mi mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/zla med pa yi gang zag yin/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/_/de tshe bdag ni rab dgar gyur/_/dga' zhing mgu ba skyes pas na/_/lus ni thams cad bde bar gyur/_/
[\[312b.7\]]mi ma yin rnams lha yul gyi/_/rol mo'i sgra rnams 'byin pa thos/_/lha yi tsan dan phye ma yang /_/grong khyer dam pa de ru bab/_/kha cig ut+pal tsam pa gzhan/_/de bzhin pa ri sha ka dang /_/gzhan dag tsan dan phye ma 'thor/_/bdag ni thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/yid ni mgu zhing rangs pa yis/_/nam 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]mkha' la ni 'phags te gnas/_/dga' dang rab tu dga' ba yis/_/lus kun tu ni khyab par gyur/_/dri dang phreng ba la sogs phyir/_/mtha' dag tu ni brgyugs pa las/_/de yi tshe na bskor kyang ni/_/me tog gcig kyang ma rnyed do/_/de tshe de na bdag gis ni/_/ha cang ring ba 
[\[313a.2\]]ma yin par/_/gdugs byed pa yi tshong khang na/_/dung ltar dkar ba'i gdugs shig mthong /_/gdugs phyir bdag gis de la ni/_/gsol btab nas ni gdugs blangs te/_/sems ni rab tu dang ba yis/_/sangs rgyas la ni gdugs bzung ngo /_/bdag gi lag nas gdugs shor ba/_/
[\[313a.3\]]bar snang dag la mngon 'phags nas/_/ston pa gshegs na gdugs 'gro zhing /_/bzhugs pa na yang sdod par gyur/_/nam mkha'i ngos la sprin lta bur/_/sangs rgyas la ni grib ma byed/_/thub pa'i sku ni mi 'dor bar/_/bar snang la ni 'dug par gyur/_/de nas bdag dang skye bo gzhan/_/cho 
[\[313a.4\]]'phrul rnams la brtags nas ni/_/thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/_/de bzhin gshegs la mgos phyag byas/_/de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/nyan thos mtshan ma bzung nas ni/_/rjes su dran pas yid dga' zhing /_/khyim gyi las kyi mtha' byas so/_/kye ma'o thob pa legs thob ste/_/
[\[313a.5\]]sangs rgyas mthong nas dran pa rnyed/_/yon tan bla na med pa ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag gis phul/_/yon gnas bla na med pa la/_/bdag gis gdugs phul gang yin pa'i/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag_/rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur/_/de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i/_/lha yi 
[\[313a.6\]]nang du bdag skyes te/_/lha yi rgyal por bdag gyur nas/_/lha ni bye ba rnams kyis mchod/_/slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/_/stobs kyis sgyur ba'i rgyal gyur cing /_/nor chen brtson 'grus che ba ste/_/rgyal po rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/bdag gis las 'di byas pas ni/_/yang dang yang du 
[\[313a.7\]]'khor ba na'ang /_/bdag byed pa yi las de ni/_/lan 'ga'ang bar ni ma bcad do/_/de lta bu yi yon gnas la/_/bdag gis dad pas phul ba yi/_/dge ba'i las de byas pas na/_/ngan 'gror song ba mi dran no/_/bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/_/mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/_/yang dag sangs rgyas bla 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]med pa/_/ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/_/bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/_/dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/_/bdud kyis lus ni lus chen po/_/ri bo lta bu dpag tshad tsam/_/nam mkha' la ni sprin lta bur/_/mdog 
[\[313b.2\]]mi sdug pa sprul pa dang /_/de nas bdag ni g.yeng byed pa/_/'di ko su zhig snyam pa las/_/'di ni mtho 'tsham byed pa yi/_/bdud yin par ni myur du shes/_/sdig can khyod 'dir ci dgar zad/_/lus ni khor yug gcig lta bu/_/mgo yang lhun po lta bur ni/_/byas te 'dir ni 'ong la rag_/bdag 
[\[313b.3\]]ni dgra bcom dbang gyur pa/_/rig gsum ldan pa'i dge sbyong ste/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gang yin pa'i/_/bde bar gnas pa rnams kyang thob/_/bsod snyoms byas pa lan gcig gis/_/zhag bdun du yang 'dug nas ni/_/rnam par grol ba'i dga' myong ba/_/de lta bu dag bdag gis 
[\[313b.4\]]bsgoms/_/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/_/gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/_/de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing /_/bde 'byung 'dod pa nyams su myong /_/de ltar nam gru blo ldan gyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/rang gi las ni lung bstan 
[\[313b.5\]]to/_/nam gru'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag gis rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan lags kyis/_
[\[313b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de nyid kyi phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i rigs lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_des na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na yang gor ma'i dum bus zhabs kyi mthe bo rma byung bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[313b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed ces bya ba nas/_khye'u zhig btsas nas bskyed bsrings te chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[314a.2\]]bzhin no/_/de'i ma shi nas de nas khyim bdag des chung ma gzhan zhig blangs te/_de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed ces bya ba nas de las kyang khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas khyim bdag des khye'u phu bo shos chung ma blangs nas de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' 
[\[314a.3\]]mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u dang bu mo mang du btsas so/_/ji tsam dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag dang chung ma dang bcas te shi nas bu de phu bo nyid kyi drung du song ba dang /_chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras khye'u 'di khyod kyi cir mchi lags/_des smras pa/_spun du 'ong ngo /_/
[\[314a.4\]]rje'i sras ci 'di yang khyim gyi bgo skal dbang ngam/_'di la yang phyed la bdag cag la yang phyed yin no/_/rje'i sras 'di ni mi gcig pa lags na/_ji ltar 'di la yang phyed la bdag cag mang po la yang phyed lags/_bzang mo 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos yin no/_/rje'i 
[\[314a.5\]]sras gal te de lta na 'di khums shig_/bzang mo nor gyi phyir nu bo bsad du ga la rung /_des de la yang dang yang du smras pa dang 'dod pa la bsten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas des khas blangs so/_/des bsams pa/_gal te grong du gsad na ni skye bo mang pos 
[\[314a.6\]]tshor bar 'gyur gyis/_dgon par gsad par bya'o snyam nas des de bos te smras pa/_nu bo me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir dgon par 'dong ngo /_/de de dang lhan cig dgon par dong ba las de nas des ri phug tu rdos bsnun te bsad do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i 
[\[314a.7\]]tshe de'i dus na gang gis khyim bdag gi bu yis khyim gyi nu bo de dgon par rdos gsod pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_nga yis khyim gyi nu bo nor gyi phyir dgon par rdos bsnun te bsad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/_/las de kho na'i lhag mas de bzhin gshegs pa nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang zhabs kyi mthe bo rdo'i dum bus rma byung bar gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin 
[\[314b.2\]]las ci zhig mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas 
[\[314b.3\]]shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba gnas shig na ded dpon gnyis shig gnas pa las/_de gnyis kyis gru bo che legs par bsgrubs nas nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya 
[\[314b.4\]]mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i gling du phyin to/_/de na gcig gis ni bag yod par rin po che rnams kyis gru bkang ngo /_/cig shos kyis ni bag med par ro/_/de gnyis chas pa las ji tsam na de'i gru bag med par bkang ba de bying bar gyur to/_/
[\[314b.5\]]gru bying ba des smras pa/_bdag 'o nir chug shig_/des de srang la bcal te rin po che las bor nas gru bo cher bcug go/_/de der zhugs nas bsams pa/_'di ni don grub pas 'gro la bdag ni don med pa 'di lta mi srid kyis 'di'i gru dbug par bya'o snyam nas/_des dben 
[\[314b.6\]]par dal bus dbug par brtsams pa las ded dpon des rig nas smras pa/_ded dpon gru ma dbug zhig thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/_phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can de slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/_de nas des mdung thung gis 
[\[314b.7\]]bsad do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon gang gis ded dpon gsod pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas ded dpon mdung thung gis bsad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/_/las de'i lhag ma kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang zhabs la seng lding gi tshal pas zug par gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin 
[\[315a.2\]]las ci zhig mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas yul sa lar ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa'i lhung bzed bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du phyir gshegs te bsod snyoms gcig kyang ma brnyes par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[315a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na bram ze'i khye'u zhig gnas so/_/sangs 
[\[315a.4\]]rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs 'joms zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/_
[\[315a.5\]]de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing gnas so/_/de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/bram ze'i khye'u zhig kyang zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la khyim zhig tu zhugs pa las des zas 
[\[315a.6\]]ma thob nas de phyir byung ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs med kyis khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/bram ze'i khye'u des de zhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba de ci dag byed pa blta'o snyam nas de slar log ste de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing sgo phag tu bsdad pa las/_
[\[315a.7\]]ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung mas rang sangs rgyas de lus mdzes shing sems dang ba mthong nas/_de nas de dad pa skyes te de'i lhung bzed gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas bkang ngo /_/des de thogs te phyir byung ba bram ze'i khye'u des mthong nas smras pa/_kye rab tu byung ba re 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]zhig khyod kyis bsod snyoms ci 'dra ba zhig grub pa lta'o/_/de ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas des bstan to/_/de nas phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can des de'i lag par thal mos bsnun pa dang lhung bzed lhung bas kha zas rnams sa la bo ba dang 
[\[315b.2\]]bram ze'i khye'u des rdog pas brdzis so/_/rang sangs rgyas des de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis ci'i phyir kha zas rnams chud gzan/_ci ste khyod slong bar gyur na ngas byin par 'gyur ba zhig_/des rang sangs rgyas de la smad pa mang du byas nas/_slar log pa 
[\[315b.3\]]dang drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su song nas 'dug go/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can ngas rang sangs rgyas kyi zas bcad pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par 
[\[315b.4\]]smin pas lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang yul sa lar zan gcad pa byas so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin 
[\[315b.5\]]las ci zhig mdzad na/_phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas kun tu rgyu mo mdzes mas yang dag pa ma lags pas skur pa btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas 
[\[315b.6\]]shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_
[\[315b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la spun gnyis shig rab tu byung bar gyur te/_gnas 'jog dang /_b+ha ra dwa dza zhes bya'o/_/de nas gnas 'jog gis ni brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/b+ha ra dwa dzas kyang bklags shing bton pas sde snod gsum la byang bar gyur te/_sde snod gsum gyi chos kyi gtam la rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/des ji tsam na khyim bdag gcig la 
[\[316a.2\]]bskul nas/_des de'i ched du gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig rtsig tu bcug go/_/de nas des phu bo gnas 'jog la spring ba/_lhan cig 'khod kyis shog shig_/des thos nas 'ongs so/_/de nas khyim bdag des spyod lam zhi ba/_lus mdzes 
[\[316a.3\]]pa/_sems dang ba de mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/_de dad pa skyes nas kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas te chen po la 'os pa'i ras zung gcig bskon to/_/de nas b+ha ra dwa dza phrag dog skyes nas bdag ni 'di'i thams cad la sngon du 'gro ba yin 
[\[316a.4\]]na/_bdag la ni 'dis lan 'ga' yang ras ma byin/_'di ni 'ongs nas ring por ma lon pa kho nar ras zung bskon no snyam nas/_de phu bo gnas 'jog la nyes pa'i glags tshol bar gyur to/_/des de tshor nas bsams pa/_'di ni phrag dog gi rang bzhin can 
[\[316a.5\]]yin pas gal te/_bdag gis 'di la ras zung 'di ma byin par gyur na lhag par yang mi dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des de la byin na 'on kyang de nyes pa'i glags tshol ba lhur len cing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig gtsug lag 
[\[316a.6\]]khang der song zhing byi dor gyi las byed do/_/b+ha ra dwa dzas de la smras pa/_bu mo kho bos ras zung 'di khyod la sbyin gyis/_khyod kyis kho bo'i tshig bzhin byos shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis ci zhig bgyi/_khyod kho bo'i ras zung 'di gyon la khyim 
[\[316a.7\]]gyi byi dor gyi las byos shig_/gal te khyim bdag gis khyod kyi ras zung 'di ga las 'ongs zhes 'dri dang /_'phags pa gnas 'jog gis bdag la stsal to zhes smros shig_/gal te ci'i phyir 'dri dang /_dpon po skyes pa rnams kyis bud med rnams la ci'i slad du stsol 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]ba de yang 'dri'am zhes smros shig_/de nas des ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du thams cad byas pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag des gnas 'jog la ma dad pa bskyed pa dang bdag nyid chen po de dag ni bkur sti ma yin pas skrag pas de langs te song ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam 
[\[316b.2\]]du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi b+ha ra dwa dza gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas de na dgra bcom pa la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po dang zhes bya ba nas/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so zhes 
[\[316b.3\]]bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang kun tu rgyu mo mdzes mas yang dag pa ma yin par skur pa btab bo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas bram ze'i bu mo rtswa 
[\[316b.4\]]mis yang dag pa ma lags pas skur pa btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa thun mong dang /_thun mong ma yin pa/_tshogs 
[\[316b.5\]]rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/thun mong gang zhe na/_dge slong dag sngon byung bA rA Na sI na bram ze rig byed dang /_rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze rnams kyi gsang 
[\[316b.6\]]tshig ston te/_de bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis lhag par bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed cing mchod de dgra bcom par bkur ro/_/ji tsam na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las bA rA Na sIr phyin pa dang /_
[\[316b.7\]]bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis lus mdzes pa dang sems dang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs thams cad mngon par dad par gyur te/_gang gi sbyin pa'am/_bya ba'am/_'jig rten pha rol gyi ched yod pa gang yin pa de de la byed 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]do/_/de nas bram ze de'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti nub par gyur nas/_drang srong de la phrag dog skyes nas phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blos bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di ni drang srong ma yin te/_'on kyang 'di ni 
[\[317a.2\]]'dod pa la longs spyod pa yin no/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan po de de bzhin te/_'di ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa lags kyis 'di ni drang srong ma lags so/_/de nas de rnams kyis lam po che dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum 
[\[317a.3\]]mdo rnams su bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su smras pa/_'di ni drang srong ma yin te/_'on kyang 'dod pa la longs spyod pa yin no/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos thos nas ma dad pa bskyed pa dang /_de bkur sti ma yin pas skrag nas bA rA Na sIr song ngo /_/
[\[317a.4\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no/_/ngas drang srong la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi 
[\[317a.5\]]rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba nas/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang dge slong lnga brgya dang /_thabs cig la bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis yang dag 
[\[317a.6\]]pa ma yin pas skur pa btab ste/_de ni thun mong zhes bya'o//_//zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa spyan snga thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan sngar gtugs te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen stod lung pa chen po'i thugs 
[\[317a.7\]]dam dang bstun nas dag par byas pa'o//_//mang+ga laM//_//
